original: tasmādar thakāma iha vaṭe prativasantaṃ yakṣaṃ pūjayeditiva daprāmāṇikaprasiddhivijṛmbhitametadityabhisandhāya kimu na kṛto vāttikakṛtā iṣṭadevatānamaskāra  #

original: yathā ca tatra śataikāṃśikaḥ phalābhāvaḥ phalakoṭistūtkaṭā tathātrāpi /

original: yadvacanena hi yaḥ pravartate sa tadvacanādeva viśeṣasmṛtimapekṣate,

atha anabhimata prayojanam āryāvarta nivāsinam prati dākṣiṇātyasya mātula kanyakā pariṇaya prakrama upadeśa vat

original: athābhimatasyāpi śakyasyāpi prayojanasya laghīyasyupāyāntare satyapi gururayamupāyaḥ pipāsuṃ prati gīrvāṇataraḍgiṇītīrasamīpakūpakhananopadeśavat
analyzed: atha abhimatasya api śakyasya api prayojanasya laghīyasī upāya antare sati api guruḥ ayam upāyaḥ pipāsum prati gīrvāṇa taraḍgiṇī tīra samīpa kūpa khanana upadeśa vat
etāsu ca anartha saṃbhāvanāsu na pravartate

original: yadyapi niścayākārameva jñānamādhatte tathāpi tathābhūtasyaiva bhūyo bhūyaḥ prameyaviraholabdherviśeṣānupalabdheśca saṃdehastadavaskandatītyarthaḥ

original: tathā pūrvapakṣiṇaḥ kvacidapi viniścayo nāstyevetyādikaścābhimāno viruddhyetetyata āha--api tviti /

avyabhicāri tvam aviparīta anubhava janaka tvam aviparīta anubhava janana avacchi nnā sattā iti yāvat

original: evaṃ copadhidvayāvacchinnāyāḥ sattāyā upādhibhedād bhinnāyā ivaikasminnarthe samavāyaḥ kṛtakatvānityatvayoriva na viruddhaḥ /
analyzed: evam ca upadhi dvaya avacchinnāyāḥ sattāyāḥ upādhi bhedāt bhinnāyāḥ iva ekasmin arthe samavāyaḥ kṛtaka tva anitya tvayoḥ iva na viruddhaḥ
tena avyabhicāri tvena jñāyamānena iti śeṣaḥ

original: pramāṇyāvadhāraṇaṃ tarhi kkopayujyata ityata āha--tadeva hīti //
analyzed: pramāṇya avadhāraṇam tarhi kka upayujyate iti atas āha tat eva hi iti
pramāṇam hi pramā karaṇam
na ca karaṇa tva ādayaḥ sāmānya viśeṣāḥ santi
sāmānya saṃkara prasaṅgāt
kim nāma sādhakatamatvam eva karaṇa tvam
tad viśeṣakaḥ tu kriyā viśeṣaḥ eva
sa ca atra pramā lakṣaṇaḥ
pramā ca aviparīta upalabdhiḥ
atas aviparīta anubhava janaka tva lakṣaṇam avyabhicāri tvam eva prāmāṇyam iti arthaḥ
yadi evam tad avadhāraṇa pūrvakam eva prameya ādi avadhāraṇam astu iti atas āha tat ca iti
pramā karaṇa tvam hi na anavadhāritāyām pramāyām avadhārayitum śakyam iti arthaḥ
tarhi pramā tvam eva avadhāryatām

original: na hi tadapyaupādhikaṃ yenopādhyanavadhāraṇe naivāvadhāryetetyata āha--tathā hīti /
analyzed: na hi tat api aupādhikam yena upādhi anavadhāraṇe na eva avadhāryeta iti atas āha tathā hi iti
vijñānasya pramāyāḥ

original: svato vetyasya svātmanā vā svagrāhakeṇa vetyarthaḥ /

tatra prathamam dūṣayati na khalu iti
dharma dharmiṇoḥ abheda pakṣe anātma saṃvedanam iti etat eva dūṣaṇam
ānātma saṃvedana tā ca upapādayiṣyate iti hṛdayam
bheda pakṣe prāk eva iti

original: yo hi yad gṛhṇāti sa taddharmamapi gṛhṇīyāditi saṃbhāvyetāpi /

yadi api ca śabda gandha ādayaḥ vyoma bhūmi ādi agrahe api gṛhyante
tathā api na tad dharma tayā iti arthaḥ
sva grāhakeṇa vā iti dūṣayati na api iti

original: taddhi mānasaṃ vā syāt laiḍgikaṃ vā?
analyzed: tat hi mānasam vā syāt laiḍgikam vā

original: ubhayamapi manaso jñātatālakṣaṇāt liṅgād vā aviśiṣṭāt jāyamānaṃ kathamiva tadābhāsaviśiṣṭaṃ gṛhṇīyat?

original: viṣayaviśeṣāt tu tathātve apramāṇyasyāpi svata eva grahaṇaprasaṅgāt,

original: pramāyāḥ prāyikatayā tadvāsanāyāḥ samutkaṭatvādapramāpi samutkaṭatvādapramāpi prametyeva gṛhyate /
analyzed: pramāyāḥ prāyika tayā tad vāsanāyāḥ samutkaṭa tvāt apramā api samutkaṭa tvāt apramā api pramā iti eva gṛhyate

original: śuktikāyāṃ śuktikātvamiti yadi tathāpyāsaṃjakasyāpi yadyāsaṃjakatvamavagataṃ kathaṃ na svato 'prāmāṇyagrahaṇaprasaṅgaḥ?

original: na ca kṛtrimaṃ rūpamaparibhūya grahaṇaṃ grahaṇāmityucyate,

original: na hi tatra kiñcidanavasthādikaṃ paśyāma ityata āha--eteneti /

original: kadācit pramāṇavyavahārasauṣṭhavāt svīkriyetāpi yadyayaṃ tena nirvahet,
analyzed: kadācid pramāṇa vyavahāra sauṣṭhavāt svīkriyeta api yadi ayam tena nirvahet

original: yathā hi pramāṇaṃ svātmānaṃ gṛhṇat prāmāṇyamapi gṛhṇāti tathā tadābhāsamapi tadābhāsatva gṛhṇīyāt /

sva ātma bhūtasya apramāṇyasya sva sa vedana tayā grahaṇe samāropa asaṃbhāvāt
agrahaṇe vā sva saṃvedana naya anupapatteḥ
dharma dharmiṇoḥ bhedāt svarūpa grahaṇe api na aprāmāṇya rūpa dharma grahaṇam iti yadi
tadā prāmāṇyasya api agrahaṇam syāt
tasmāt sva saṃvedana naye api sva rūpa vedana mātram syāt

paratas vā iti dūṣayati na api iti

original: prātyakṣike ca vahnijñāne prātyakṣikameva vahnijñānāntaramiti yāvat /

original: aniścite ca prāmāṇye tadatadrūpasaṃdeho 'pi kvacid durlabhaḥ,

original: tadevaṃ paricchedadvāreṇa paricchedakamunnīyata iti paricchedasyaiva sāmānyaviśeṣayoḥ paricchedatvāparicchedatve darśite /

na ca ekasya eva jñānasya viruddha dharma saṃsargaḥ
jātyā hi buddhiḥ anubhavaḥ smṛtiḥ ca
tatra smutiḥ apramā eva
anubhavaḥ tu svarūpa anubhavaḥ asvarūpa anubhavaḥ ca
saḥ ayam viṣaya kṛtaḥ viśeṣaḥ
nānā viṣayā ca ekā buddhiḥ bhavati eva

original: tataśca saiva buddhiḥ svarūpāvasthitenārthena nirūpyamāṇā pramā /
analyzed: tatas ca sā eva buddhiḥ svarūpa avasthitena arthena nirūpyamāṇā pramā
asvarūpa avasthitena nirūpyamāṇā tu apramā iti tathābhūta avacchinna anubhava tvam eva pramāṇa tvam
atathābhūtena tu avacchinnam apramāṇa tvam iti bhavati apramāṇasya api sāmānya paricchedaka tvam iti
racitā bhūmiḥ
kim etāvatā iti āha asti tāvat asādhāraṇam kāraṇam asamarthāyāḥ pravṛtteḥ tathā eva unnīyamānam
tasya ca vyāpāraḥ viparīta artha paricchedaḥ eva asādhāraṇaḥ
tat ca evaṃbhūta vyāpāra upakaraṇam apramāṇam iti vyavahniyate

original: evaṃ ca pravṛttisāmarthyāsāmarthyasaṃdehe 'pi yadi tajjanakamapramāṇamasamarthaiva sā /
analyzed: evam ca pravṛtti sāmarthya asāmarthya saṃdehe api yadi tad janakam apramāṇam asamarthā eva sā
atha na tat apramāṇam
tad janyā pravṛttiḥ api na asamarthā iti apramāṇāt niyataḥ samartha pravṛtti vyatirekaḥ
pramāṇam ca atra ubhaya vyatireka grāhakam viruddha kārya tvam liṅgam
prakṛta kāryasya tad vyatireka grāhi ca pratyakṣam adhyavaseyam iti na apramāṇāt artha vyabhicāriṇoḥ atha vyabhicāri jñāna vyāpārāt iti arthaḥ
siddhaḥ vyatirekaḥ
kim ca atas iti atas āha tathā ca iti
arthavat tvam artha avyabhicāri tvam
artha avyabhicāri anubhava janaka tvam iti arthaḥ

original: nanu tasyā ityatra kathamanantaratvena prakṛtāmasamarthāṃ vihāya vyavahitvenāprakṛtāpi samarthaiva pravṛtti /
analyzed: nanu tasyāḥ iti atra katham anantara tvena prakṛtām asamarthām vihāya samarthā eva
parāmṛśyate iti atas āha asamarthā tu iti
pūrva prakāntam yogyam eva prakṛtam ucyate
na tu anantara uktam iti arthaḥ
nanu anuditasya anuvādaḥ kka upayujyate iti atas āha saṃprati iti
pūrvam vyākhyātum idānīm ākṣeptum iti arthaḥ
ākṣepa samādhānayoḥ sphuṭa avabhāsi tve api saṃgraha vivaraṇayoḥ paunarūktyam pariharan āha ākṣipati iti

original: saṃdehādapi pravṛttestatra tatra darśanāt nirūcchvāsamākṣepamujjīvayati--na tāvaditi /
analyzed: saṃdehāt api pravṛtteḥ tatra tatra darśanāt nirūcchvāsam ākṣepam ujjīvayati na tāvat iti
amum eva artham bhāṣyeṇa saṃvadati sā iyam iti
uktā bhāṣyakutā iti śeṣaḥ
kim atas yadi evam iti atas āha na ca iti
artha viniścayaḥ ukta rūpaḥ śreyaḥ hetutā anumāna sahitaḥ iti yāvat
prāmāṇya avadhāraṇam śreyaḥ hetu tā liṅga parāmarśa prasava ucitam antareṇa iti arthaḥ
evaṃrūpa tā ca
prāmāṇya avadhāraṇasya vyāpti smaraṇa sāhityam eva iti tasya api bījam samuccinoti śreyaḥ hetu tā anumāna nimitta vyāpti grahaṇam ca iti
tābhyām vinā iti
svarūpa niścaya śreyaḥ hetutā anumānābhyām vinā iti arthaḥ
vyāpti grahaṇa ānantarye api tad phalasya eva anumānasya yogyatayā prakrānta tvāt
imam eva vārtika artham pariśodhayan sphuṭayati tat idam uktam iti
niścaya anumāne na prāmāṇya avadhāraṇa anumāna bīja bhūta vyāpti grahaṇābhyām vinā
te ca na pravṛttyā vinā
pravṛttiḥ ca na niścaya anumānābhyām vinā iti ākṣepa saṃkṣapaḥ
iha ca dvidhā pravṛttiḥ
aihika phalā āmuṣmika phalā ca
tatra āmuṣmika phalā prāmāṇya avadhāraṇa pūrvikā eva
aihika phalā tu apekṣita upāya tā jñāna mātra adhīnā artha niścayam api nā apekṣate
prāk eva pramāṇa srūpa jñānam
kutastarām tad viniścayam
yatra api pravṛtteḥ prāk eva pramāṇa tattva viniścayaḥ

original: tatrāpyasau svahetubalādāyato na pravṛttiṃ prati prayojakaḥ,
analyzed: tatra api asau sva hetu balāt āyataḥ na pravṛttim prati prayojakaḥ

original: anyathaikāntikavijayāniścaye prāmāṇyākṣepaka eva vijigīṣuḥ kathāyāṃ na pravarteta //
analyzed: anyathā aikāntika vijaya aniścaye prāmāṇya ākṣepakaḥ eva vijigīṣuḥ kathāyām na pravarteta

original: na hi jalpato vitaṇḍayato vā avaśyamaikāntiko vijayaḥ /
analyzed: na hi jalpataḥ vitaṇḍayataḥ vā avaśyam aikāntikaḥ vijayaḥ

original: tasmādarthāniścaye 'pi pravṛttirityubhayavādisiddhaṃ hṛdi nidhāya siddhāntamupakramate--tatra brūma iti /
analyzed: tasmāt artha aniścaye api pravṛttiḥ iti ubhaya vādi siddham hṛdi nidhāya siddhāntam upakramate tatra brūmaḥ iti
dṛṣṭa artheṣu iti adṛṣṭa artha āgama ādi vyudāsaḥ
tatra pravṛtteḥ phala abhisaṃbandha aniścayāt
anabhyāsa daśā āpanneṣu iti abhyāsa daśā āpannā pitṛ vacana ādi vyudāsaḥ

original: te hi pramāṇatayā pravṛtteḥ prāgava niścīyante /
analyzed: te hi pramāṇa tayā pravṛtteḥ prāk ava niścīyante
abhyāsa śvā viparītaḥ vivakṣitaḥ
tena sva ātmani abhyāse api pravṛtti sāmarthyāt eva tad niścayaḥ viparīta abhyāsa virahāt

original: sa ca viṣayagocarastannāntarīyakārthagocaro vā tajjātīyatvāvadhāraṇopāyo yatra svarūpato 'pi nāsti tatra pravṛttisāmarthyādeva tadgocarasya
analyzed: sa ca viṣaya gocaraḥ tad nāntarīyaka artha gocaraḥ vā tad jātīya tva avadhāraṇa upāyaḥ yatra svarūpataḥ api nā asti tatra pravṛtti sāmarthyāt eva tad gocarasya
yathā vaidya vacanāt anartha nivṛtti saṃbhāvayataḥ asaṃstuta pradeśa sthiteṣu mūleṣu

original: yatra tu svarūpābhyāso 'styeva tadgataṃ tu śreyaḥsādhanamabhyastam,
analyzed: yatra tu svarūpa abhyāsaḥ asti eva tad gatam tu śreyaḥ sādhanam abhyastam
tatra pravṛtti sāmarthyena tad sādhanatva grāhiṇaḥ prāmāṇyam

original: yathā angiḥ pākādisamartha iti saṃbhāvitāptatvasya vacanādupalabhya svayaṃ pacataḥ /
analyzed: yathā angiḥ pāka ādi samarthaḥ iti saṃbhāvita āpta tvasya vacanāt upalabhya svayam pacataḥ

original: yatrāpi śreyaḥsādhanatve 'bhyāsaḥ svarūpe tvanabhyāsastatrāpi svarūpagocarasyaiva prāmāṇyaṃ pravṛttisāmarthyādavasīyate /
analyzed: yatra api śreyaḥ sādhana tve abhyāsaḥ svarūpe tu anabhyāsaḥ tatra api svarūpa gocarasya eva prāmāṇyam pravṛtti sāmarthyāt avasīyate
yathā agniḥ pāka ādi samarthaḥ evā iti niścitavataḥ apariśīlita vana vahnau
sarvatra eva artha bhūyaḥ tvam
viparyaye tu anartha māndyam saṃbhāvayataḥ pravṛttiḥ
svarūpa śreyaḥ sādhanatva niścaye api phala saṃdehaḥ iva iti āha no khalu iti

original: tadamī saṃśayānā apipravartamānāḥ phala iva svarūpaśreyaḥsādhanatvayoriti śeṣaḥ /
analyzed: tat amī saṃśayānāḥ apipravartamānāḥ phale iva svarūpa śreyaḥ sādhana tvayoḥ iti śeṣaḥ
pramāṇasya svarūpa grāhiṇaḥ śreyaḥ sādhanatva grāhiṇaḥ ca iti arthaḥ
artha avyabhicāri pramā sādhana tvam iti yāvat
viniścitya artha avyabhicāri pramā viniścaya dvāreṇa iti śeṣaḥ
tad jātīyasya anyasya etāvatā eva samartha tve abhyāsa daśā āpannasya iti dṛṣṭārtha pramāṇa saṃgraha artham
pravṛtti sāmarthyāt prāk eva samarthāyāḥ pravṛtteḥ pūrvam eva iti
tena ayam arthaḥ
yadi api dṛṣṭa artheṣu abhyāsa daśā āpanneṣu api pravṛtti sāmarthyam asti
tena api ca prāmāṇyam avadhārayitum tatra śakyate

original: tathāpi tajjātīyatvalakṣaṇenaiva liḍgena pravṛtteḥ prāgevāvadhārite prāmāṇye tatpramāturūttarakālaṃ pramitsaiva nāsti /
analyzed: tathā api tad jātīya tva lakṣaṇena eva liḍgena pravṛtteḥ prāk eva avadhārite prāmāṇye tad pramātuḥ uttara kālam pramitsā eva nā asti
tad nibandhana tvāt ca anumāna pravṛtteḥ
yadi punar pramitsā anapekṣam eva samartha pravṛtti janaka tvam parāmṛśyate
tadā kā kṣatiḥ
tena api anumīyatām prāmāṇyam
pramāṇa saṃplavasya api vyavasthāpanāt iti
nanu kim idam tad jātīya tvam
na tāvat pramāṇa jātīya tvam
sādhya aviśiṣṭa tva prasaṅgāt
na api samartha pravṛtti janaka jātīya tvam
tat hi samartha pravṛtti saṃbandhaḥ vā syāt
tad upahitaḥ vā niyata prāgabhāvaḥ
na tāvat ādyaḥ
pravṛtteḥ prāk eva iti vacanāt
na api uttaraḥ
tasya atīndriyasya liḍgam vinā pratyetum aśakya tvāt

original: liḍgaṃ ca tasya prāmāṇyaikaniyatasya yadyasti tadā prāmāṇyameva tenānumīyatām,
analyzed: liḍgam ca tasya prāmāṇya eka niyatasya yadi asti tadā prāmāṇyam eva tena anumīyatām
kim tad jātīya tva anumānena
prāmāṇya aniyatasya tu tasya anumānena kim
nā api pratyakṣa siddhaḥ eva kaścid dharmaḥ tad jātīya tvam
pratyakṣa tve tu tasya anabhyāsa daśā apanana gocare api pramāṇe pratīti prasaṅgāt
tathā ca
tatra api pravṛtteḥ prāk eva prāmāṇya avadhāraṇam syāt
vyāpteḥ api prāk eva pratīta tvāt

original: na hyayaṃ kvacidapi tajjātīyatvena prāmāṇyaṃ nānumitavāt /
analyzed: na hi ayam kvacid api tad jātīya tvena prāmāṇyam na anumitavāt
tatra na asti eva tad jātīya tvam
kim pratyakṣeṇa pratīyatām iti ced na

original: abhyāsadaśāpanneṣu tajjātīyatvena prāmāṇye 'numīyamāne pravṛttisāmarthyānumitaprāmāṇyasya sādhanavikalatayā dṛṣṭāntābhāsatvaprasaṅgāt /
analyzed: abhyāsa daśā āpanneṣu tad jātīya tvena prāmāṇye anumīyamāne pravṛtti sāmarthya anumita prāmāṇyasya sādhana vikala tayā dṛṣṭānta ābhāsa tva prasaṅgāt
tasmāt tad jātīya tvam atiriktam na paśyāmaḥ iti

original: satyam, tathāpi jñānasya viṣyanibandhanatvāt tattadviṣayopādhaya eva te te jñānopādhayastaistairūpādhibhirūpādhīyamānaṃ jñānameva tajjātīyaṃ  #
analyzed: satyam tathā api jñānasya viṣya nibandhana tvāt tad tad viṣaya upādhayaḥ eva te te jñāna upādhayaḥ taiḥ taiḥ upādhibhiḥ upādhīyamānam jñānam eva tad jātīyam
tasya bhāvaḥ tattvam bhavati

original: te copādhayaḥ pratibhedaṃ svasaṃjñābhirabhidhātumaśakyā iti tajjātīyatvamityanayā vācobhaḍgyā darśitāḥ /
analyzed: te ca upādhayaḥ pratibhedam sva saṃjñābhiḥ abhidhātum aśakyāḥ iti tad jātīya tvam iti anayā vācobhaḍgyā darśitāḥ
atas eva atra vīpsā draṣṭavyā
tad tad jātīya tvam iti
tathā hi anubhavaḥ tāvat svarūpa prakārau ālambate

original: tatra dharmisvarūpeṇopadhīyamāno 'nubhavaḥ pramaiveti tena rūpeṇānubhūte tasmin pramātvamevānubhūtaṃ bhavatītyagre sphuṭībhaviṣyati /
analyzed: tatra dharmi svarūpeṇa upadhīyamānaḥ anubhavaḥ pramā eva iti tena rūpeṇa anubhūte tasmin pramā tvam eva anubhūtam bhavati iti agre sphuṭībhaviṣyati
prakāra viṣayaḥ tu anubhavaḥ ubhayathā
kaścid svarūpa prakāreṇa upādhīyate
kaścid asvarūpa prakāreṇa api iti atas kvacid saṃśayaḥ

original: tatra svarūpaprakāreṇopahitamanubhava vivektuṃ viśiṣṭāḥ prakāropādhayo bhavanti /
analyzed: tatra svarūpa prakāreṇa upahitam anubhava vivektum viśiṣṭāḥ prakāra upādhayaḥ bhavanti

original: te ca niyamena vibhramaviṣayavirodhitayā nirdhāritasvabhāvabhedā guṇādaya eva /
analyzed: te ca niyamena vibhrama viṣaya virodhi tayā nirdhārita svabhāva bhedāḥ guṇa ādayaḥ eva
tat idam sāmānyatas tāvat lakṣaṇa sahacarita lakṣya viṣaya jñāna tvam eva jñāna gatam tad jātīya tvam iti pratyakṣe gatiḥ

original: yadā tvapratyakṣe lakṣye lakṣaṇena jñānaṃ janyate tadānumānaṃ taditi tasyānyathaiva gatirbhaviṣyatīti /
analyzed: yadā tu apratyakṣe lakṣye lakṣaṇena jñānam janyate tadā anumānam tat iti tasya anyathā eva gatiḥ bhaviṣyati iti
tatra dravye gandhavati pṛthivī jñānam ityādi sāmānyatas
kara caraṇa ādimati śarīra jñānam ityādi viśeṣataḥ
guṇeṣu ketakī ādau saurabha jñānam
śaḍkha ādau śveta jñānam ityādi

original: karmaṇi tu avātulena tiṣṭhatā tīvravegāsaṃskṛtena calajjalādisvacchavilokanādivirahiṇā yad dravyaṃ calatītyupalabhyate tat tatheti /
analyzed: karmaṇi tu tiṣṭhatā tīvra vega asaṃskṛtena calat jala ādi svaccha vilokana ādi virahiṇā yat dravyam calati iti upalabhyate tat tathā iti

original: evaṃ teṣu teṣu viśeṣeṣu te te viśeṣā vyabhicāravirodhino na pratipadamanukramituṃ śakyante /
analyzed: evam teṣu teṣu viśeṣeṣu te te viśeṣāḥ vyabhicāra virodhinaḥ na pratipadam anukramitum śakyante
tat evam tad tad upādhi viśiṣṭa tad tad viṣaya anubhava tvam eva tad jātīya tvam iti mantavyam
tat evaṃbhūtasya jñānasya viṣaya nāntarīyaka tvena upādhi abhyāsaḥ eva abhyāsa daśā āpanna tvam

original: yatra tu sa evārtho bhūyo bhūyo 'bhyastaḥ,
analyzed: yatra tu saḥ eva arthaḥ bhūyas bhūyas abhyastaḥ
tatra saṃvādaka tvam eva tad jātīya tvam
evam tāvat bāhya pratyakṣam samarthitam
pratyakṣa samāna nyāya tayā āgamasya prāmāṇyam samarthayati evam ca iti
atra api tad jātīya tvam āpta praṇetṛka tvam

original: abhyāsadaśāpannatvaṃ punaretasya bhūyodarśanena mantrāyurvede tajjātīyatvāya prāmāṇyāvinābhāvasiddhiḥ /
analyzed: abhyāsa daśā āpanna tvam punar etasya bhūyas darśanena mantrāyurvede tad jātīya tvāya prāmāṇya avinābhāva siddhiḥ
mantrāyurvedasya anabhyāsa daśā āpanna tvam tad asiddhaḥ nivedayiṣyate sūtrakāreṇa dvitīya adhyāye

original: yathā ca prāmāṇyaṃ pravṛttisāmarthyenāvadhāryate anabhyāsadaśāpanneṣu tathāprāmāṇyamapi pravṛttiviparyayeṇa /
analyzed: yathā ca prāmāṇyam pravṛtti sāmarthyena avadhāryate anabhyāsa daśā āpanneṣu tathā aprāmāṇyam api pravṛtti viparyayeṇa
yathā ca pravṛtteḥ prāk eva abhyāsa daśā āpanneṣu
tad jātīya tayā prāmāṇyam avadhāryate
tathā aprāmāṇyam api iti mantavyam
upādhi virodhaḥ ca tad jātīya tvam
tad abhyāse eva abhyāsa daśā āpanna tvam
yathā candramasi candra dvaya jñānam
śaḍkhe pīta jñānam
guḍe tikta jñānam ityādi
tasmāt sandigdhe pravṛtti sāmarthyam avadhāraṇīyam iti
syāt etat
sāmarthya punar asyāḥ phalena abhisaṃbandhaḥ

original: atha phalajñānasyaiva prāmāṇyaṃ kathamavadhāraṇīyamityatra keṣāñcinmatamāha--na ceti /
analyzed: atha phala jñānasya eva prāmāṇyam katham avadhāraṇīyam iti atra keṣāñcid matam āha na ca iti
na punar udanya upaśamam api parīkṣyate iti udanya upaśamanam api iti arthaḥ
tat etat anupapannam

original: phalajñānaṃ hi phalasya siddhāvasthasya sādhanānarhatayā niṣprayojanībhūtatvād vā na parīkṣyet tattajjātīyajñānasya sarvāsvavasthāsu arthāvyabhicāritayā  #
analyzed: phala jñānam hi phalasya siddha avasthasya sādhana anarha tayā niṣprayojanībhūta tvāt vā na parīkṣyet tad tad jātīya jñānasya sarvāsu avasthāsu artha avyabhicāri tayā
niḥśaṅka tvāt vā iti
na tāvat ādyaḥ
phalasya siddha avastha tve tadvat tat sādhanībhūtasya api niṣprayojanībhūta tvāt aparīkṣya tva prasaṅgāt
tat sādhanam parīkṣyate iti ceta
phale api evam astu

original: siddha eva hi phale parīkṣite tatsādhanasya tathātvasiddhāvuttarottarulābhisandhiḥ syāt /
analyzed: siddhe eva hi phale parīkṣite tad sādhanasya tathātva siddhau syāt
na api dvitīyaḥ

original: phalajñānasyāpi bhūyo bhūyaḥ spapnādyavasthāsu vyabhicāra darśanāt /
analyzed: phala jñānasya api bhūyas bhūyas spapna ādi avasthāsu vyabhicāra darśanāt

original: svasthāvasthasya phalajñānaṃ na vyabhicaratīti cet--evaṃ tarhi pirīkṣitameva phalajñānaṃ syāt /
analyzed: svastha avasthasya phala jñānam na vyabhicarati iti ced evam tarhi pirīkṣitam eva phala jñānam syāt

original: tathā hi yat svasthāvasthasya phalajñānaṃ tadavyabhicārīti vyāptisiddhau yatraiva tathābhūtajñānatvaṃ paśyati,
analyzed: tathā hi yat svastha avasthasya phala jñānam tat avyabhicāri iti vyāpti siddhau yatra eva tathābhūta jñāna tvam paśyati
tatra eva avyabhicāram avadhārayati iti anena abhiprāyeṇa āha vayam tu iti

original: asyāpyabhyāsadaśāpannatvaṃ prāmāṇyāvināmūtaliḍgopalambhastathā tajjātīyatvaṃ punaḥ svasthāvasthasya phalajñānatvameva /
analyzed: asya api abhyāsa daśā āpanna tvam prāmāṇya a vinā a mūta liḍga upalambhaḥ tathā tad jātīya tvam punar svastha avasthasya phala jñāna tvam eva
etena icchā dveṣa prayatna jñānam vyākhyātam

original: nanu yadvijñāna dṛṣṭāntayitavyaṃ tasyāpi prāmāṇyaṃ kathaṃ sādhanīyam?
analyzed: nanu dṛṣṭāntayitavyam tasya api prāmāṇyam katham sādhanīyam

original: evaṃ tattatsādhanasyāpi dṛṣṭāntaparamparāyāḥ kathamityata āha--na ceti /
analyzed: evam tat tat sādhanasya api dṛṣṭānta paramparāyāḥ katham iti atas āha na ca iti
phala jñānasya iti upalakṣaṇam

original: tajjātīyatvena liḍgena prāmāṇye sādhiyitavye yadyad dṛṣṭāntīkriyate tasya tasyeti mantavyam //
analyzed: tad jātīya tvena liḍgena prāmāṇye sādhiyitavye yat yat dṛṣṭāntīkriyate tasya tasya iti mantavyam
pravṛtti sāmarthyam anavakāśam eva
na hi asti tat vijñānam yat sarvathā eva apūrva viṣayam

original: tathā ca pramāṇator'thapratipattipravṛttisāmarthyayoḥ kathamanāditvamāha--vārttikakāra ityata āha--eteṣu ca madhya iti /
analyzed: tathā ca pramāṇatoḥ ṛtha pratipatti pravṛtti sāmarthyayoḥ katham anādi tvam āha vārttikakāraḥ iti atas āha eteṣu ca madhye iti
śaḍkita vyabhicāram tad jātīya tva aparāmarśāt iti śeṣaḥ

original: yadyapi phalaṃ na pravṛttiviṣayastathāpi tatsādhanagocarāyāḥ tatsaṃtānagocarāyā eva
analyzed: yadi api phalam na pravṛtti viṣayaḥ tathā api tad sādhana gocarāyāḥ tad saṃtāna gocarāyāḥ eva
vā pravṛtteḥ tad jātīya phala antara saṃbandhaḥ tad nāntarīyaka vijātīya phala saṃbandhaḥ vā

original: svasya narāntarasya vā pravṛttisāmarthyaṃ phalajñānasya draṣṭāvyam //
analyzed: svasya nara antarasya vā pravṛtti sāmarthyam phala jñānasya draṣṭāvyam
tat evam samāna nyāyatayā rūpa ādi bāhi artha pratyakṣa prāmāṇya samarthana anantaram śabdra prāmāṇyam

original: samarthya tadubhayopapattaye samānanyāyatayaiva āntarapratyakṣajñāneṣu madhye phalajñānaprāmāṇyaṃ samarthitam /
analyzed: samarthya tad ubhaya upapattaye samāna nyāya tayā eva āntara pratyakṣa jñāneṣu madhye phala jñāna prāmāṇyam samarthitam
samāna nyāya tayā eva icchā dveṣa prayatna gocarasya api
jñānasya prāmāṇya samarthanam sūcitam iti anaṃvyavasāyaḥ avaśiṣyate

original: tasya cānumānasamānanyāyatayā anumānaprāmāṇyasamarthanānantarameva samarthanaṃ kariṣyata ityabhiprāyavānāha--anumānasyeti /
analyzed: tasya ca anumāna samāna nyāya tayā anumāna prāmāṇya samarthana anantaram eva samarthanam kariṣyate iti abhiprāyavān āha anumānasya iti
dvidhā hi vyabhicāra śaḍkā kāraṇataḥ svarūpataḥ ca

original: sā ca vyāptipakṣadharmatāgrāhakaireva pramāṇairapanīyata iti bhavati nirastasamastavyabhicāraśaṅkamanumitijñānam /
analyzed: sā ca vyāpti pakṣa dharmatā grāhakaiḥ eva pramāṇaiḥ apanīyate iti bhavati nirasta samasta vyabhicāra śaṅkam anumiti jñānam

original: tasyaivaṃbhūtasya svata eva prāmāṇyaṃ niścīyata iti śeṣaḥ //
analyzed: tasya evaṃbhūtasya svatas eva prāmāṇyam niścīyate iti śeṣaḥ
nanu pramāṇa tva aviśeṣe api katham anumiteḥ eva svatas
na pratyakṣa ādeḥ iti atas āha anumeya iti
anumiti jñānam hi arthasya tathātvam vyavacchindat eva utpadyate vahnimān eva ayam iti
tathā ca anuvyavasānena anuvyavasīyamānam idam sva svārtha avadhāraṇa ātmakam eva avasīyate
na ca aviparīta arthaka tvam anubhavasya anadhyavasya tā avadhāraṇa ātmaka tvam asya avasitam bhavati
tathā ca tat avaśyam avaseyam
tat eva ca prāmāṇyam
kadācid evaṃbhūta anuvyavasāye api viparyaya tva śaḍkā tat avaskandati iti avaśiṣyate
sā ca liṅga samuttha tvāt eva nā asti
na hi viśeṣa darśana grasta utpattau śaḍkā avakāśaḥ
tat etat āha na hi iti
liṅga ākāram vijñānam niścita avyabhicāram iti śeṣaḥ
pratyakṣa śābda jñāne tu na ayoga vyavaccheda ātmake
api tu āropa a nārāpa sādhāraṇa viṣaya mātra avabhāsinī
tathā ca anuvyavasāyena api tathā eva anubhūyete

original: na tvavadhāraṇātmakatayeti na tayoḥ svataḥ prāmāṇyagrahaḥ /
analyzed: na tu avadhāraṇa ātmaka tayā iti na tayoḥ svatas prāmāṇya grahaḥ
atha daivāt ayoga vyavaccheda ātmake eva utpadyete anuvyavasīyete ca
tadā ca niyāmakam antarbhāvya eva

original: tadabhāve tvaviśeṣādavadhāraṇātmakatvaṃ paribhūya tadatadrūpasādhāraṇamevāvatiṣṭheta ityāśayavān niyāmakābhāvamevāha--pratyakṣajñānaṃ tviti
analyzed: tad abhāve tu aviśeṣāt avadhāraṇa ātmaka tvam paribhūya tad a tad rūpa sādhāraṇam eva avatiṣṭheta iti āśayavān niyāmaka abhāvam eva āha pratyakṣa jñānam tu iti
dhūma ādi yukta dhūmadhvaja ādi jñāne hi yadi api arthasya api arthena avyabhicāraḥ asti
yadi api ca arthāt api tathābhūtāt eva tat jñānam jāyate
tathā api avyabhicāraḥ vā
tad grahaḥ vā
prāktanaḥ tatra akiścitkaraḥ eva
indriya āpāta mātrāt eva yugapad ubhayoḥ api eka jñāna avabhāsi tayā parāmarśa kāla anapekṣaṇāt
aparāmṛṣṭasya ca aniyāmaka tvāt
tat idam uktam api tu sattā mātreṇa avasthitāt iti
avyabhicāriṇaḥ api iti śeṣaḥ

original: etena śaḍkāmātramapanīyate jñānāntarairiti yaduktaṃ kaiścit tannirastam /
analyzed: etena śaḍkā mātram apanīyate jñāna antaraiḥ iti yat uktam kaiścid tat nirastam
śaḍkā hi saṃśayaḥ eva abhidhīyate
sa ca tattva nirṇaya vyatirekeṇa apanetum aśakyaḥ evā iti tattva nirṇaya upāyaḥ anusartavyaḥ

original: tathā ca jñānasvarūpagrāhiṇaḥ kauṇṭhye pratyakṣādyantarābhāve cānumānamevopāya iti tadāha--pravṛttisāmarthyamiti //
analyzed: tathā ca jñāna svarūpa grāhiṇaḥ kauṇṭhye pratyakṣa ādi antara abhāve ca anumānam eva upāyaḥ iti tat āha pravṛtti sāmarthyam iti
syāt etat yadi pratyakṣa śābda jñānayoḥ paratas prāmāṇyam
tat kim idānīm anuvyavasāyasya api paratas eva

original: tathā ca liḍgaṃ niścitameva niścāyakamityanena nyāyena liṅgāntaraparamparājñānamanavasthāmavatārayatītyata āha--jñānagateti /
analyzed: tathā ca liḍgam niścitam eva niścāyakam iti anena nyāyena liṅga antara paramparā jñānam anavasthām avatārayati iti atas āha jñāna gata iti
atra api sā eva yuktiḥ
a tad rūpa vyudāsena eva sva viṣayam ālambya eva utpatteḥ tathā eva anubhavaḥ
utpatteḥ eva ārabhya viṣaya viśeṣa grahaṇa grasta tvāt ca na śaḍkā avakāśaḥ
viśeṣaḥ ca anuvyavasāya tvam eva
na hi a jānan na api kaścid jānāmi iti anuvyavasyati

original: na ca śuktikākāre jñāne rajataṃ jānāmīti syāditi tadidamuktam--tādṛśasyeti /
analyzed: na ca śuktikā ākāre jñāne rajatam jānāmi iti syāt iti tat idam uktam tādṛśasya iti
upalakṣaṇam ca etat

original: sabāhyabhyantaraṃ dharmi mātragocaramapi pratyakṣaṃ svata eva pramāṇam,
analyzed: sa bāhi abhyantaram dharmi mātra gocaram api pratyakṣam svatas eva pramāṇam
vibhramasya api nirālambana sye kvacid anupapatteḥ iti
uktu yuktim hṛdi nidhāya atidiśati etena iti
upamānam upamitiḥ iti arthaḥ
vyākhyātam
svatas avadhārya prāmāṇya tayā iti śeṣaḥ
na hi atideśa vākya artha jñāna sādṛśya jñānayoḥ prāmāṇye niśvite upamitiḥ ābhāsībhavati
yadi api ca anumāna upamāna anuvyavasāya dharmi jñānānām api prāmāṇyam paratas api śakya graham eva

original: santi hi tatrāpi yathāyogaṃ liṅgasādṛśyajñānasamutthatvādīni tajjātīyatvaliṅgāni tathāpi koṣṭhagatyā svata eva prāmāṇyagraho 'tra na svayamiti  #
analyzed: santi hi tatra api yathāyogam liṅga sādṛśya jñāna samuttha tva ādīni tad jātīya tva liṅgāni tathā api koṣṭha gatyā svatas eva prāmāṇya grahaḥ atra na svayam iti
saḥ eva darśitaḥ

original: vipratipannaṃ prati tu parata eva sādhanīyaṃ taditi paramārthaḥ /
analyzed: vipratipannam prati tu paratas eva sādhanīyam tat iti paramārthaḥ
atas svatas eva iti avadhāraṇam na ayoga vyavacchede na api anya yoga vyavacchede
kim tarhi atyanta ayoga vyavacchedaḥ iti
nanu etāvatā api indriya ādīnām prāmāṇyasya kutas siddhiḥ

original: na hi phalayathārthatvamevāmīṣāṃ prāmāṇyamityata āha--sevadanasya ceti /
analyzed: na hi phala yathārtha tvam eva amīṣām prāmāṇyam iti atas āha sevadanasya ca iti
nanu indriya ādayaḥ yadi artha vyāmicāriṇaḥ katham artha dhiyam avyabhicāriṇī janayeyuḥ
tathātve vā rāsabhaḥ api vahna dhiyam avyabhicāriṇī
aviśeṣāt iti atas āha na ca iti
yathā ārdra indhanam dahana vyamicāri api dahana saṃbandhāt
dahana avyabhicāriṇam dhūmam janayan na niyoga paryanuyogau arhati kāraṇa svābhāvyāt

original: tathendriyādyapyarthavyabhicāriṇaṃ tathāvidhasahakāryupabṛṃhitaṃ tenārthena saṃbandhāt tadarthāvyabhicāri jñānaṃ janayedityarthaḥ /
analyzed: tathā indriya ādi api artha vyabhicāriṇam tathāvidha sahakāri upabṛṃhitam tena arthena saṃbandhāt tad artha avyabhicāri jñānam janayet iti arthaḥ
tat etat prāmāṇyam na avaśyam sarvatra avadhāryate
tadā āśrayasya eva saṃvedanasya sarvatra an avadhāraṇāt

original: tathā sati cānavasthāyā viṣayasaṃcāro na syāt /
analyzed: tathā sati ca anavasthāyāḥ viṣaya saṃcāraḥ na syāt
tasmāt tīvra saṃvegi tayā yat tu saṃvedanam avaśyam saṃvedanīyam
yatra yatra ca aparaḥ

original: sāmānyato vā vipratipadyate jijñāsate vā tatra tatra prāmāṇyamuktenāpāyenāvadhāraṇīyamityato
analyzed: sāmānyataḥ vā vipratipadyate jijñāsate vā tatra tatra prāmāṇyam uktena apāyena avadhāraṇīyam iti atas
na anavasthā iti āśayavān upasaṃhāra vyājena uktam artham saṃkalayya āha tasmāt atha saṃdehāt iti

original: nanvarthāniśvayenāpi pravartamāno na hi tatsādhanatāmanumāya pravartitumarhati arthitvābhāvāt,
analyzed: nanu artha aniśvayena api pravartamānaḥ na hi tad sādhanatām anumāya pravartitum arhati arthi tva abhāvāt
na hi tad sādhana tva anumānam vyāpti grahaṇam vinā

original: na ca so 'pi pravṛtti vineti tadavasthamevetaretarāśrayatvamityata āha--arthasyeti /
analyzed: na ca saḥ api pravṛtti vinā iti tad avastham eva itaretarāśraya tvam iti atas āha arthasya iti

original: yadyapi prāmāṇyāniścayavadapekṣitopāyatvāniścayenāpi tatra tatra pravartate tathāpyapekṣitopāyatāṃ pākṣikīmapyurarīkṛtya pravṛttiḥ /
analyzed: yadi api prāmāṇya aniścaya vat apekṣita upāya tva aniścayena api tatra tatra pravartate tathā api apekṣita upāya tām pākṣikīm api urarīkṛtya pravṛttiḥ
na ca tad saṃśayaḥ tasyām api anupalabdhāyām anyatra api syāt
atas punar api upalabdhiḥ āyātā iti
atas anādi tām ādāya eva parihṛtam
artha pratipattiḥ iti vārttike yadi api artha śabdaḥ apekṣita upāyam eva āha tasya eva pravṛtti viṣaya tvāt
aryamāna tvāt ca
tathā api dharmi mātra pratipatti anumeya pratipattyoḥ bhinna kāla tvāt apekṣita tvāt ca tathā eva vyācaṣṭe artha pratipattiḥ iti

original: nanu pramāṇasya prayojanavattvamākṣiptaṃ vā samādhīyeta jijñāsitaṃ vā jñāpyeta?
analyzed: nanu pramāṇasya prayojanavat tvam ākṣiptam vā samādhīyeta jijñāsitam vā jñāpyeta
na tāvat ādyaḥ

original: na hyasti puruṣo yaḥ pramāṇaṃ niṣprayojanamiti brūyāt,
analyzed: na hi asti puruṣaḥ yaḥ pramāṇam niṣprayojanam iti brūyāt
tad mūla tvāt sarva puruṣa artha siddheḥ

original: yasya tu puruṣārtho nāsti sa nirūcchvāsa eva śīryeta /
analyzed: yasya tu puruṣa arthaḥ na asti sa nirūcchvāsaḥ eva śīryeta
na api dvitīyaḥ
tasya saṃśaya ādi vat sūtra pāṭha anantaram eva jñāpayitum ucita tvāt iti atas āha tatra idam iti
na iyam pramāṇa prayojana jijñāsā

original: kiṃ nāma? śāstrārthaubhūtasya paramanyāyasya niḥśreyasaṃ prati gurupāyatve manyamānena laghīyati pravṛttyupāyaṃ vidyamāne śāstrārambha evākṣipyate
analyzed: kim nāma parama nyāyasya niḥśreyasam prati guru pāya tve manyamānena laghīyati pravṛtti upāyam vidyamāne śāstra ārambhaḥ eva ākṣipyate
sa ca samādhātum ārabdhaḥ iti arthaḥ
daśānām duḥkha saṃjñā bhāvanam mumukṣu tā dāḍhrayā artham
ātmanaḥ yāthātmyam sakala upādhi vinirmukta tvam
tasya bhāvanam dhyānam

original: ādigrahaṇena tu tadupāyabhūtāḥ pravṛttayo yamaniyamāsanaprāṇāyāmadhāraṇālakṣaṇa gṛhyante /
analyzed: ādi grahaṇena tu tad upāya bhūtāḥ pravṛttayaḥ yama niyama āsana prāṇāyāma dhāraṇā lakṣaṇa gṛhyante
ātma tattva sākṣātkāraḥ iti samādhiḥ
vairāgyam
paramā vaśīkāraḥ
etena sa aḍga upāḍgaḥ yogaḥ darśitaḥ

original: śaḍkāmukvā bhāṣyamuttarayati--tatredamupaniṣṭhata iti tathāpi nyāyasya gurupāyatve na parihṛtam,
analyzed: śaḍkām ukvā bhāṣyam uttarayati tatra idam upaniṣṭhate iti tathā api nyāyasya guru pāya tve na parihṛtam
nyāya nirṇota arthasya api pravṛtti apekṣāṇāt
pravṛttasya nyāya anapekṣaṇāt iti atas āha etat uktam bhavati iti

original: nanu ubhayorapi tulyatve kuto viśeṣāt pramāṇameva vyutpādyate na pravṛttiparītyata āha--tathāpīti /
analyzed: nanu ubhayoḥ api tulya tve kutas viśeṣāt pramāṇam eva vyutpādyate na pravṛtti pari iti atas āha tathā api iti

original: śravaṇamanananididhyāsanasākṣātkāralakṣaṇāyā pravṛtteḥ svarūpataḥ phalataśca pramāṇāntarbhūtatvāt tadvyutpādanameva pravṛttivyutpādanam /
analyzed: śravaṇa manana nididhyāsana sākṣātkāra lakṣaṇāyāḥ pravṛtteḥ svarūpataḥ phalataḥ ca pramāṇa antar bhūta tvāt tad vyutpādanam eva pravṛtti vyutpādanam

original: na ca pravṛttivyutpādanena pramāṇaṃ vyutpāditaṃ bhavati /
analyzed: na ca pravṛtti vyutpādanena pramāṇam vyutpāditam bhavati

original: na hi pravṛtteḥ phalaṃ pramāṇaṃ tatsvarūpaṃ vetyarthaḥ /
analyzed: na hi pravṛtteḥ phalam pramāṇam tad svarūpam vā iti arthaḥ
nanu śāstra arthasya prayojana vyutpādana avasare pramāṇam arthavat iti kutas
na hi pramāṇam śāstṛ arthaḥ

original: api tu nyāya ityata āha--sāmānyābhidhānaṃ ceti //
analyzed: api tu nyāyaḥ iti atas āha sāmānya abhidhānam ca iti
tat anena prabandhena niṣprayojana tva aśakya prayojana tva anabhimata prayojana tva upāya gaurava śaḍkāḥ parihṛtāḥ

original: tat kimaparamavaśiṣyate yadarthaṃ lokavṛttamanūdyata ityataḥ prathama tātparyamanusmārayanneva vārttikamavatārayati--prāmāṇyeti /
analyzed: tat kim aparam avaśiṣyate yad artham loka vṛttam anūdyate iti atas tātparyam anusmārayan eva vārttikam avatārayati prāmāṇya iti

original: apramāṇenetyatrāpi yadyapi vāñmanasavisaṃvādaḥ niṣedhavidhyupāya eva hi pramāṇam /
analyzed: apramāṇena iti atra api yadi api vāñmanasa visaṃvādaḥ niṣedha vidhi upāyaḥ eva hi pramāṇam
tasmāt niṣedha upāya tām jānataḥ api apramāṇena niṣedhāmi iti vacanam

original: tathāpi vyāmohādapyupapatterevaṃbhūtābhiprāyasthairye 'pi nāsmākaṃ kācit kṣatirityetāvatā anujñaivāttaraṃ dattam--vāḍmanasayorvisaṃvāda iti
analyzed: tathā api vyāmohāt api upapatteḥ evaṃbhūta abhiprāya sthairye api nā asmākam kācid kṣatiḥ iti etāvatā anujñā evā attaram dattam vāḍmanasayoḥ visaṃvādaḥ iti
prāmāṇya agrahe pramāṇena iti evam vaktum na śakyate

original: tataḥ pramāṇenetyevaṃ vadato 'vaśyaṃ prāmāṇyaṃ manasi viparivartate /
analyzed: tatas pramāṇena iti evam vadataḥ avaśyam prāmāṇyam manasi viparivartate
tathā ca agṛhīta prāmāṇyena iti vacanam manaḥ visaṃvādi iti arthaḥ
loka vṛttam abādhitaḥ vyavahāraḥ iti arthaḥ
nanu pramāṇena khalu ayam jñātā ityādi
bhāṣyam loka vṛtta anuvādaḥ astu
pramāṇataḥ ityādi punar katham iti atas āha kāraṇa pradarśana dvāreṇa iti
na hi loka vṛttam sva rūpeṇa upayujyate

original: kiṃ tarhi? tasyāvaśyābhyupeyatayā tadupāyo 'pyavaśyābhyupeya ityanenābhisandhinā sopāyameva tadanūdyata ityarthaḥ //
analyzed: kim tarhi tasya avaśya abhyupeya tayā tad upāyaḥ api avaśya abhyupeyaḥ iti anena abhisandhinā sa upāyam eva tat anūdyate iti arthaḥ

original: āgāmibhāṣye heyādīnāṃ sphuṭatvāt tasyedānīmakṣarārtho vyākriyata iti mā śaḍkiṣṭhā ityāha--asyaiveti /
analyzed: āgāmi bhāṣye heya ādīnām sphuṭa tvāt tasya idānīm akṣara arthaḥ vyākriyate iti mā śaḍkiṣṭhāḥ iti āha asya eva iti
vārttika saṃbaddhaḥ granthaḥ aratha padāni iti ākāraḥ vārttikagranthaḥ tasya
tādṛśaḥ eva bhāṣya gataḥ bhāṣya saṃbaddhaḥ granthaḥ tasya iti arthaḥ

original: amidheyānāṃ paurvāparyaniyamāya guṇapradhānabhāve jijñāsyamāne abhidhānarūpasya śāstrasya kaḥ prastāva ityata āha--śāstraśabda iti /
analyzed: amidheyānām paurvāparya niyamāya guṇa pradhāna bhāve jijñāsyamāne abhidhāna rūpasya śāstrasya kaḥ prastāvaḥ iti atas āha śāstra śabdaḥ iti

original: evaṃ tarhi heyādīnāṃ śāstrārtharūpatayā na pṛthakkoṭitvam /

original: tathā caikakoṭikatayā kimapekṣya guṇapradhānabhāvacintetyata āha-atra ceti /

original: kathaṃ punaranena pramāṇādicaturvargo 'tra labhyate iti vārttikamanuktopālabhbho mā bhūdityata āha--teneti /
analyzed: katham punar anena pramāṇa ādi catur vargaḥ atra labhyate iti vārttikam anukta upālabhbhaḥ mā bhūt iti atas āha tena iti

siddhiḥ pratītiḥ niṣpattiḥ ca
tatra heya upāyayoḥ pratītiḥ eva

yadi api ca hānasya api pramāṇa rūpasya pratītiḥ asti eva

original: jñānāt tu yasmāt tasya pramāṇāyattatvameveti bhāvaḥ /

original: nanu pramātrādīnāmapi prayojanavattvādarthavadityanena kiṃ pramāṇasyādhikyamāhitamityata āha--atiśāyane matuciti //

original: ubhayamāpyanupapannamabhinnatvāt tathā hi ya evārthaḥ pramātā prameyaṃ pramitiriti sa eva heyo 'dhigantavya iti ya evārtho hānopāyāviti sa  #

original: na hi bhavati tarūṇā vā vṛkṣeṇa vedaṃ sādhanīyaṃ tarūvṛkṣābhyāṃ vetyata āha--vivakṣābhedenati /

original: tathāpi yathā pramāṇtvena pramāṇaṃ jñeyaṃ tathā hānatvenāpi /

original: vivakṣābhedasya copapatti pratipadaṃ bhāṣyakāra eva darśayiṣyati /

original: pañcamyāḥ taseḥ prayogaṃ darśayitvā pañcamīvyatirekeṇa taseḥ ākṣepasamādhāne asaṃgate ityākṣepaṃ vyākhyāyāvatārayati--vacanavyāptyarthamiti

original: tathā sati vyāpārabhedo na syāditi jñāpanārthamityarthaḥ /

original: cānuvādakatvaṃ śabdābhyāsasya prayojanavattāvyatirekeṇa sidhyatītyataḥ prayojanaṃ darśayati--pramākārakāntarebhya iti /

original: laukike tu prayoge saṃkhyābhidhānādvibhakteḥ sārthakatvaṃ draṣṭavyamiti /

original: agnyādiviśiṣṭe parvatādau pratyakṣānumānayoḥ saṃplavādityata āha--viśiṣṭo bhinna iti /

viṣaya tva sāmānya abhiprāyam ekavacanam
artha samārthya samuttham pratyakṣam yatas atas ṛṣi gocaram
tat kim hetu tvam eva viṣaya lakṣaṇam

nanu ca sāṃvyavahārikam sva lakṣaṇam api evam eva iti atas āha sva lakṣaṇam iti

original: nanu yadyapi pratyakṣaṃ na sāmānyarūpamavagāhate tathāpi yadyanumānamapi svalakṣaṇamavagāheta tata eva tāvatāpi saṃplavaḥ syādityata āha--na  #
analyzed: nanu yadi api pratyakṣam na sāmānya rūpam avagāhate tathā api yadi anumānam api sva lakṣaṇam avagāheta tatas eva tāvatā api saṃplavaḥ syāt iti atas āha na
ca iti
nanu bhavatu anumānam sāmānya mātra niyatam

original: bhaviṣyati ca sāmānyamapi sattvādākārādhāyakamato 'pi saṃplavasiddhirityata āha--na ceti /
analyzed: bhaviṣyati ca sāmānyam api sattvāt ākāra ādhāyakam atas api saṃplava siddhiḥ iti atas āha na ca iti

vicāra asaha tvāt iti abhiprāyaḥ

original: tat kiṃ sāmānyasyāsattvāt svalakṣaṇe ca pratibandhagrahāsaṃbhavādanumānaṃ nirviṣayamevetyata āha--tadidamiti /
analyzed: tat kim sāmānyasya asattvāt sva lakṣaṇe ca pratibandha graha asaṃbhavāt anumānam nirviṣayam eva iti atas āha tat idam iti
tat kim anumānam apramāṇam eva aparamārtha gocara tvāt
yadi evam katham tat anyat ullikhya anyatra pravartayati

original: kathaṃ ca bādhitākāraṃ pramāṇatayā vyavahiyata ityata āha-tasmāditi //
analyzed: katham ca bādhita ākāram pramāṇa tayā vyavahiyate iti atas āha tasmāt iti

original: nanu pramāṇāntareṇa saha saṃplavo bhaviṣyatyanayorityata āha--na ceti /

nanu sva lakṣaṇa sāmānya lakṣaṇayoḥ vyavasthāyām api pratyakṣa anumānayoḥ viṣaya antare saṃplavaḥ bhaviṣyati anayoḥ
asti hi viṣaya antaram tadvat iti āha na ca iti

original: na hyasatā sāmānyena paramārthasat svalakṣaṇaṃ tadvad bhavitumarhati,

original: so 'yaṃ gahanaḥ panthā ityāśayavān āha--yathā caitaditi /

original: viśeṣa ityatra yadi karmakārakaṃ na ca

original: tatastadvannāmāparo 'stītyata āha--viśeṣa iti saṃplavamamṛṣyamāṇa idamāha mīmāṃsaha iti śeṣaḥ /

original: na ca vācyaṃ smṛtisaṃtatiradhigatisaṃtatirvā astu vyavahārapravartinī na kaścidviśeṣa iti,

original: smṛtisaṃtateścāvaśyaṃbhāvitayā tata eva vyavahārisiddhāvadhigatisaṃtatikalpanāyāṃ kalpanāgauravaprasaṃgādityāśayavān piṣṭapeṣaṇamevopasaṃharati--adhigatamiti
analyzed: smṛti saṃtateḥ ca avaśyaṃbhāvi tayā tatas eva vyavahāri siddhau adhigati saṃtati kalpanāyām kalpanā gaurava prasaṃgāt iti āśayavān piṣṭa peṣaṇam eva upasaṃharati adhigatam iti

original: nanu anyatheti vārttike yadi kāraṇagatamanyaprakāratvaṃ vivakṣitaṃ tadā kāraṇagataprakārabhede 'pi na kaścid viṣayagato viśeṣaḥ piṣṭapeṣaṇaparihāropayogī  #
analyzed: nanu anyathā iti vārttike yadi kāraṇa gatam anya prakāra tvam vivakṣitam tadā kāraṇa gata prakāra bhede api na kaścid viṣaya gataḥ viśeṣaḥ piṣṭa peṣaṇa parihāra upayogī
darśitaḥ syāt

original: na ca viṣayābhede 'pi pramāṇabhedāt kaścit phalaprakārabhedaḥ prakṛtopayogavānastītyata āha--ayamabhisandhiriti /

piṣṭa peṣaṇe niṣphala tvam vā syāt

adhigate api arthe kim iti adhigati sādhanam adhigati karoti iti praśna mātram vā
sādhana asaṃbhavaḥ eva vā iti
tatra sādhana asaṃbhavam dūṣayati na hi iti
sva kāraṇa pratibandhe hi pramāṇam na syāt

etena anubhava tvam darśitam
smṛteḥ hi asādhāraṇam kāraṇam saṃskāraḥ
ātma antaḥkaraṇa ādīnām jñāna antara sādhāraṇyāt
sa ca cira kāla utpannaḥ na pratyutpannaḥ
yat tu pratyutpannam udbodha apara nāma sahakāri na tad ādhāraṇam
anubhavasya tu catuṣṭaya sannikārṣa ādi asādhāraṇam
tat ca pratyutpannam pratyagram utpannam
tathābhūtā buddhiḥ abādhitā iti śeṣaḥ
a viśaṣṭa phala tvam abhyupetya para abhiprāyam nirākaroti tad janakāni iti
prathama pramāṇa phalataḥ api aviśiṣṭa phala tayā yadi ānarthakyam
dvitīya vat prathama pramāṇasya api dvitīya a viśiṣṭa phala tayā ānarthakyam syāt
anapekṣa tvat sārthakam iti
ced evam tarhi dvitīyasya api sva phale anapekṣatvam eva

anadhika artha tve ca siddha sādhānāt
sādhya sama tvāt ca
vyavahāra niṣedhe ca tad nimitta viraha upādhika tvāt
bādhita tvāt ca
pramā vyavahāra nimittam ca vakṣyāmaḥ iti arthaḥ

original: eve tarhi vārttikārthaḥ ka ityata āha--sa eva ceti /

original: sa evānena kiṃ na pradarśyata ityata āha--yadyapīti /

original: evaṃ siddhaṃ pramāṇaṃ hṛdi kṛtvā saṃplavavyavasthe vicārite /

original: tasmād yathaivācchinnaviṣayatayā vyāpriyamāṇaḥ paraśuḥ chedanaṃ tathā pramite viṣaye vyāpriyamāṇamindriyādikaṃ pramāṇamiti momāṃsakāḥ //

original: tataścārthavyavasthāpanahetutvāt sa eva pramāṇaṃ yadāha--arthasārūpyamasya pramāṇam,

original: bhāvapraśnavyākhyānena bhavitṛpraśno vyākhyāta iti tu sahetyaśyāhṛtya kecid vyācakṣate /

original: nanu sthāṇurvā puruṣo vetyatropadarśitayorantaraḥ prāpyata eva,

yadi api anubhāva abhiprāyeṇa upalabdhau vyākhyāyamānāyām smṛti hetau na asti prasaṅgaḥ

asti ca smṛteḥ api jñāna tvam iti anena abhiprāyeṇa uktam na hi asau iti
atīta arthe paramparayā tad kāryatayā api śabda liṅga ādeḥ artha sambandhaḥ asti

original: anāgate tu so 'pi nāstītyata āśaḍkitaṃ jñāpakatayeti /

original: tasyāpi taramparayā arthakāryatvamarthajñāpakatvaṃ ca sākṣāt samānamityarthaḥ /

original: tathā hi, na tāvad asya smṛtitvameva pravṛttinamittam,

pratīyamāna itara saṃsṛṣṭāḥ tu upādhayaḥ tad jñāna saṃsargiṇaḥ vā syuḥ anyathā vā

original: na tāvat stambhādiṣu taditarasaṃsargiṇaḥ kṣaṇabhaḍgurāḥ kecanāvaśyaṃ tajjñānasaṃsargabhājo bhavanti /
analyzed: na tāvat stambha ādiṣu tad itara saṃsargiṇaḥ kṣaṇa bhaḍgurāḥ kecana avaśyam tad jñāna saṃsarga bhājaḥ bhavanti
kvacid bhavanti api iti ced
tatra eva tad dhiyām pramāṇa tā syāt

original: yatra tu tadekajñānasaṃsargiṇa upādhayo na santi tatra dhārāvāhikabuddhīnāmapramāṇatvameva syāt /
analyzed: yatra tu tad eka jñāna saṃsargiṇaḥ upādhayaḥ na santi tatra dhārāvāhika buddhīnām apramāṇa tvam eva syāt

original: tathāvidhā eva ca vicāraviṣayatvenābhipretā jñānāntaragocarā viṣayāntarasaṃsargiṇa
analyzed: tathāvidhāḥ eva ca vicāra viṣaya tvena abhipretāḥ jñāna antara gocarāḥ viṣaya antara saṃsargiṇaḥ

original: upādhayo bhaviṣyantīti cet--evaṃ tarhi dhārāvahanabuddhayo na syureva iti lābhāya
analyzed: upādhayaḥ bhaviṣyanti iti ced ivam tarhi dhārā vahana buddhayaḥ na syuḥ eva iti lābhāya
gataḥ mūlam api hāritavāt

original: na khalu pramāṇāntareṇa indriyāntareṇa tenaiva vā taddharmiparityāgāddharmyantare anubhūyamāne vivakṣitaikaviṣayabuddhidhārasaṃbhavaḥ /
analyzed: na khalu pramāṇa antareṇa indriya antareṇa tena eva vā tad dharmi parityāgāt dharmi antare anubhūyamāne vivakṣita eka viṣaya buddhi dhārā saṃbhavaḥ
iṣṭaḥ eva ayam arthaḥ iti ced na
apūrva apūrva upādhi upanipāta niyame pramāṇa abhāvāt
anupanipātinām ca jñāna antareṇa aṣi an ākalanāt

original: ata eva ghaṭo 'yaṃ ghaṭo 'yamiti buddhisahasrasyāpi na viṣayakṛtaṃ viśeṣamūpalabhāmahe /
analyzed: atas eva ghaṭaḥ ayam ghaṭaḥ ayam iti buddhi sahasrasya api na viṣaya kṛtam viśeṣam ūpalabhāmahe
anupalabhyamānasya tu viṣaya tva kalpanāyām sarva sarvajña tā āpattiḥ iti
tasmāt stambha ādiḥ eva prāgabhāva nivṛtti pradhvaṃsa abhāva anutpatti rūpaḥ vartamānaḥ
tad avacchinnaḥ kālaḥ api vartamānaḥ
sa ca tathāvidhaḥ aneka jñāna sādhāraṇaḥ eva
na ca etāvatā jñāna yaugapadya āpattiḥ
sūkṣma kāla apekṣayā krama saṃbhavāt
na ca sūkṣma upādhīnām apratītiḥ ced atas asaṃbhavaḥ eva
kārya krameṇa eva unnīyamāna tvāt
nā api pratyabhijñāna anupapattiḥ
pūrva jñāna viṣaya anusaṃdhānam eva hi pratyabhijñānam
tat ca jñāna kramāt eva upapannam
tasmāt kāla tad upādhi pratyakṣa tve api na sarvatra sūkṣma upādhi saṃsargaḥ
na api tad pratītiḥ
tat idam uktam parama sūkṣmāṇām iti
etena etat nirastam siddhe sādhakatama tva abhāvāt iti
na hi sādhakatamasya tathātvam sādhākatama antara apekṣayā
kim tu pradhāna kriyā kāraka antara apekṣayā

original: anyathā yatra karaṇānāṃ samuccayastatra parasparāpekṣayā anatiśayitatvādakaraṇatvāpatteḥ karaṇānāṃ samuccayaḥ kvacidapi na syāt /
analyzed: anyathā yatra karaṇānām samuccayaḥ tatra paraspara apekṣayā anatiśayita tvāt akaraṇa tva āpatteḥ karaṇānām samuccayaḥ kvacid api na syāt
itara kāraka apekṣayā tu dhārāvāhika buddhiṣu api pramāṇasya atiśayi tvam asti eva
yat tu chinne kuṭhārasya akāraṇa tvam iti
tad chidā lakṣaṇa phala abhāvāt
na ca chinne chidā antara abhāvavān

original: na ca jñāte 'pi jñānāntarāsaṃbhavo yenātrāpyaphalatvādevākaraṇatvaṃ bhavet,
analyzed: na ca jñāte api jñāna antara asaṃbhavaḥ yena atra api aphala tvāt eva akaraṇa tvam bhavet
dhārāvāhika jñāna utpatteḥ
tasmāt yaḥ an adhigata artha bodhanam pramāṇam icchati
tasya dhārāvāhika buddhayaḥ apramāḥ prasajyeran iti arthaḥ
śaṅkatena ca iti

original: pravṛttiṃ prāptiṃ ca janayadeva vijñānaṃ pramā,
analyzed: pravṛttim prāptim ca janayat eva vijñānam pramā
tad artham eva pramāṇa anusaraṇāt
ādyam ca tathā
tatas tat eva pramā
dvitīya ādīnām ca na pravṛtti prāpti hetu tvam
atas na etāni pramā rūpāṇi
tatas tad janakāni api na pramāṇāni iti tat etat iṣyate eva iti arthaḥ
pariharati nahi iti
na hi a pravartayat eva vijñānam artham prāpayati
na api haṭhāt eva pravartayati
kim tu artha upadṛṣṭi rūpa tayā
sā ca sarva samānā iti arthaḥ
tat idam uktam pradarśanam ca iti

original: nanu tathāpi prathamādevāpekṣitasiddhaḥ puruṣasya kiṃ dvitīyādinetyata āha--puruṣeti //
analyzed: nanu tathā api prathamāt eva apekṣita siddhaḥ puruṣasya kim dvitīya ādinā iti atas āha puruṣa iti
syāt etat
vādi vipratipattayaḥ vārttika kṛtā na nirākṛtā
nā api viśeṣa vidhānasya śeṣa pratiṣedha viṣaya vāt iti nyāyaḥ nā avirodhāt
na hi anadhigata artha gantari sārūpya iva artha vyavasthāpayitari śaktau vā
ātma anātma prakāśayitryām upalabdhi hetu tvam virudhayate iti atas āha aupalabdhi iti
vyāpakasya avyāpaka viruddha tvāt anadhigata artha gantuḥ tena rūpeṇa pramāṇa tvam eva arthāt niṣiddham iti arthaḥ
sārūpya śaktī nirākaroti hetu iti
tadīya tayā hi artha pritītim vyavasthāpayan ākāraḥ pramāṇam iti kaḥ ṛthaḥ

original: na tāvat tadīyatayā niyatāṃ pratītaṃ janayan,
analyzed: na tāvat tadīya tayā niyatām pratītam janayan
sva ātmani kriyā virodhāt
na api jñāpayan
prati
na api niścāyayan
ākāra tadvatoḥ ekatvena vyāvṛttyoḥ ca eka niścaya gocara tvena niśceya niścāyaka tva niyama anupapatteḥ
nīlam aham hi akāra niścayaḥ
na ca atas aparaḥ tadīya tā niścayaḥ nāma
nīlam idam iti ākāra vyavasāyaḥ

original: atha nīlamahaṃ jānāmītyarthakarmakapratītyanuvyavasāya iti cet--tat kiṃ buddhāvaniścitāyāmevākāro niścitaḥ?
analyzed: atha nīlam aham jānāmi iti artha karmaka pratīti anuvyavasāyaḥ iti ced tat kim buddhau aniścitāyām eva ākāraḥ niścitaḥ
na ca etat saṃbhavati
sāmānya aniścaye viśeṣa aniścayāt
niśrvīyate eva

original: paraṃ na tadīyatayeti cet--atha keyamarthākārādanyā tadīyatā nāma?
analyzed: param na tadīya tayā iti cetatha kā iyam artha ākārāt anyā tadīya tā nāma
tad udbhāva tvam iti ced nanu evam anumitim bhāvāyan ākāraḥ pramāṇam
om iti cethanta
hatam tarhi pāmara pratyakṣam atiriktam artham anumāpayatā ākāreṇa vyavasthāpita tvāt

original: api ca yā kriyā yatkaraṇaphalatvena vivakṣitā,
analyzed: api ca yā kriyā yad karaṇa phala tvena vivakṣitā
janayat eva tām tat karaṇam iti loka siddham

original: na hi chidāmajanayanto 'pi cakṣurādayastanniścāyakatāmātreṇa chedanatayā vayavahniyante /
analyzed: na hi chidām a janayantaḥ api cakṣuḥ ādayaḥ tad niścāyaka tā mātreṇa chedana tayā

original: api tu aniścāyayanto 'pi janayanta eva kuṭhārādayaḥ /
analyzed: api tu a niścāyayantaḥ api janayantaḥ eva kuṭhāra ādayaḥ
tat atra api pramām janayat eva a niścāyakam api pramāṇam iti vyavahniyatām
na tu tām ajanayat niścāyakaḥ api ākāraḥ
evam ca loke anukūla tā

original: anyathā tu piribhāṣāṃ kurvatā loko 'pratipāditaḥ syāt /
analyzed: anyathā tu piribhāṣām kurvatā lokaḥ a pratipāditaḥ syāt
na ca janya janakayoḥ tādātmya gandhaḥ api iti
etena śaktiḥ pramāṇam iti pratyuktam
śakteḥ śakaya niṣṭha tvāt
śakayam ca kāryam ucyate
prakāśanam ca ātma bhūta tvāt na tasyāḥ kāryam iti
tat idam uktam hetu hetumat bhāvasya iti
nanu yadi pramāṇa siddham
kim tatra pramātṛ ādinā kartavyam
na hi siddhena siddham eva sādhyate
na ca anyatra caritārthasya anyatra kāraka tvam asti
atha asiddham
katham pramāṇam
na hi asiddham kārakam nāma
na api akārakam karaṇam
na api akaraṇam pramāṇam iti atas āha ayam arthaḥ iti
karaṇībhūtasya paraśoḥ saṃyogasya śeṣaḥ
karaṇam vyāpārya utpādya
vā phala artham kartavya antara abhāvāt kartuḥ caritārtha tā
karaṇasya tu phalena vinā aparyavasānam acaritārtha tā iti arthaḥ
atha prameyasya katham pramāṇe caritārtha tvam

original: na hi pramātṛvat tenāpi pramākaraṇamutpādyate vyāpāryate vetyata āha--prameyasya tviti /
analyzed: na hi pramātṛ vat tena api pramā karaṇam utpādyate vyāpāryate vā iti atas āha prameyasya tu iti
ayam āśayaḥ
sarvatra hi karma kāraka karaṇa phala tad vyāpārayoḥ viṣaya tayā vyavatiṣṭhate

original: tatra phalaviṣayatvamasya na karmatvaṃ prati prayojakam,
analyzed: tatra phala viṣaya tvam asya na karma tvam prati prayojakam
asattvena akārakasya api phala viṣaya tvāt
yat āha kevalam ityādi
karaṇa vyāpāra viṣaya tvāt tu karma tvam
na hi asti saṃbhavaḥ karma ca
na ca karaṇa vyāpāra viṣayaḥ iti

original: tatra karaṇasya vyāpāraviṣayatvābhāvāt vyāpāra eva na nirvahediti tannirvāha evāsya caritārthatvamiti /
analyzed: tatra karaṇasya vyāpāra viṣaya tva abhāvāt vyāpāraḥ eva na nirvahet iti tad nirvāhe eva asya caritārtha tvam iti
tat idam uktam tatra api indriya saṃbandha mātre iti
na ca karaṇam api kartṛ vyāpāra viṣayaḥ tāvat mātreṇa eva caritārtham adhika vyāpāravat tvāt
na api karma vyāpāra viṣayaḥ karaṇam
na api phala viṣayaḥ
tad uddeśena karmaṇaḥ kartrā a vyāpārita tvāt
phalasya tad nirūpaṇa adhīna nirūpaṇa tvāt
yena karma vat asya caritārtha tvam kalpyeta
tasmāt
kartṛ karmaṇoḥ caritārtha tve api acaritārtham eva karaṇam iti
samavāyi tva viṣaya tva kṛtām saṃnipatya upakāraka bhrānti prayoga āmyām nirākaroti tat siddham etat iti
yadi api anumeya ādi atīta ādi ahetuḥ eva
tathā api sāmānya niṣedhaḥ viśeṣa prakāram api āśrayeta iti etāvatā eva dṛṣṭānta tvam
tasmāt
tat eva phala hetuḥ
saṃnipatya iti śeṣaḥ
kathañcid iti
anāhatye iti arthaḥ

original: tadanena kārakāntare 'caritārthasya hetutvameva karaṇatvamiti karaṇalakṣaṇaṃ darśayatā kartṛvyāpāragocaraḥ karaṇamityapi karaṇalakṣaṇaṃ sūcitam
analyzed: tat anena kāraka antare acaritārthasya hetu tvam eva karaṇa tvam iti karaṇa lakṣaṇam darśayatā kartṛ vyāpāra gocaraḥ karaṇam iti api karaṇa lakṣaṇam sūcitam
tathā eva ṭīkākṛtā vyākhyātam
etat ca yadvān iti vārttike sphuṭībhaviṣyati

original: akaraṇā pramāṇotpattiḥ prasajyeta kartuḥ karaṇe caritārthatvāditi kiṃ kena saṃgatamityata āha--nākaraṇa iti /
analyzed: akaraṇā pramāṇa utpattiḥ prasajyeta kartuḥ karaṇe caritārtha tvāt iti kim kena saṃgatam iti atas āha na akaraṇe iti
vastu saddhi pradhāna kriyā saṃbandha nibandhana prabhṛtayaḥ kāraka śabdāḥ iti āśayavataḥ
codyam yadi ityādinā buddhi siddha pradhāna kriyā saṃbandha nibandhana pravṛttayaḥ kāraka śabdāḥ

original: ityāśayavataḥ samādhānam--na pācakaśabdādivadityādinā iti ṭīkāyāṃ vikṣiptasya vārttikatātparyasya saṃkṣepaḥ /
analyzed: iti āśayavataḥ samādhānam na pācaka śabda ādi vat ityādinā iti ṭīkāyām vikṣiptasya vārttika tātparyasya saṃkṣepaḥ

original: tulyavaditi tulayā saṃmitamiva na nyūnaṃ nātiriktaṃ vetyarthaḥ /
analyzed: tulya vat iti tulayā saṃmitam iva na nyūnam na atiriktam vā iti arthaḥ

original: tadanena prapajcena pramāṃ pramātṛprameyayorakāraṇatvameva darśitamati bhramo mā bhūdityupasaṃhāravyājenāha--tatpramāṇamiti /
analyzed: tat anena prapajcena pramām pramātṛ prameyayoḥ akāraṇa tvam eva darśitam ati bhramaḥ mā bhūt iti upasaṃhāra vyājena āha tat pramāṇam iti
sati api ca upalabdhi sādhanatve sākṣāt iti śeṣaḥ
saṃ pratyayaḥ jhaṭiti sphuṭa pratyayaḥ
atra hetuḥ sātiśaya tva iti
sādhakatama artha pṛcchati iti na tāvat sādhakānām phala kṛtau atiśaya anatiśayau
tasya ekasya sarvān prati aviśeṣāt
na api vyāpāra kṛtau
paraspara vyāpāra vilakṣaṇa vyāpāravat tā mātrasya sarva sādhāraṇyāt
phala anuguṇa tvam tu vyāpārasya aviśiṣṭam eva iti āśayavān iti hṛdaya śeṣaḥ
yadi api ayoga vyavacchedaḥ eva atiśayaḥ
tathā api tulya tve sati api atiśaya anatiśayau tasya eva cintyete

original: na tu vaidharmyamātramatiśaya ityabhisaṃdhāyānyayogavyavacchedo 'pi darśitaḥ ayogānyayogavyavacchedābhyāmiti /
analyzed: na tu vaidharmya mātram atiśayaḥ iti abhisaṃdhāya anya yoga vyavacchedaḥ api darśitaḥ ayoga anya yoga vyavacchedābhyām iti
amum ca artham anantaram eva vibhāvayiṣyati

original: nanu yathā kartrādau sati phalaṃ nāvaśyakam,
analyzed: nanu yathā kartṛ ādau sati phalam na āvaśyakam
tathā karaṇe api sati kadācid na bhavet
kāraka tva aviśeṣāt
dṛśyate ca

original: na hi paraśau sati chidā bhavetyevetyata āha--pramātṛprameye hīti /
analyzed: na hi paraśau sati chidā bhava iti eva iti atas āha pramātṛ prameye hi iti
upakṣīṇa vṛttinī iti vyāpāravataḥ kāraka tvam abhipraiti
tena paraśuḥ api vyāpāravān eva san karaṇam
tathābhūtena ca phalasya ayoga vyavacchedaḥ eva
na tu vyāpāravatā api kartṛ ādinā
tad vyāpāreṇa karaṇa vyāpārasya saṃpādana vilambanāt
vyāpāravataḥ tu karaṇasya na anyat saṃpādanīyam asti iti arthaḥ
tat idam uktam pramāṇa vyāpāre sati tu bhavati eva iti
tat anena vyāpāravataḥ phala avyabhicāri tvam sādhakatama tvam iti darśitam
kalpa antaram yadvān iti
paratantreṇa iti
para vyāpāryeṇa āśrīyate apekṣate iti arthaḥ
etat eva pūrvam uktam iti smārayati kartṛ adhīnam ca iti
yadi api kartṛ vyāpārya tvam karaṇa tvam iti na vyabhicarati eva

original: tathāpi paramparāvyāpāryeṇāpi karmaṇā vyabhiyāro mā bhūdityāśaḍkya prakṛte 'vadhāraṇaṃ saṃbhavaprācuryāt kṛtam /
analyzed: tathā api paramparā vyāpāryeṇa api karmaṇā vyabhiyāraḥ mā bhūt iti āśaḍkya prakṛte avadhāraṇam saṃbhava prācuryāt kṛtam
āgāmi vārttikasya kalpa antara tvam nivārayati asya eva iti
kalpa antaram iti
pūrva kalpa vivaraṇena paunarūktya bhiyā kalpa antaram gṛhītam kathañcid
samarthayati pūrveṇa iti
karmaṇaḥ svātantryam asaṃbhavi
tatas viśeṣa niṣedhaḥ anupapannaḥ iti atas āha akatṛ tvam iti
kalpa antaram saṃyoga vat iti
atra api kāraka antarebhyaḥ carama vyāpāram karaṇam iti lakṣaṇam
kalpa antaram pratipatteḥ iti
atra api anantaram phalam karaṇam iti lakṣaṇam
vikalpa samuccaya abhāvāt caḥ avadhāraṇe
asmin pakṣe saḥ eta atiśayaḥ iti arthaḥ
kalpa antaram asādhāraṇā iti
sarva karaṇeṣu asādhāraṇa tva upapādana anupayogāt prakṛte pramāṇe ghaṭayati catatraḥ iti
atra api pramā vivakṣita jāti bheda vyapadeśakam pramāṇam iti lakṣaṇam

original: pramāṃ prati kāraṇānā sādhāraṇatvāsādhāraṇatve nirūpyamāṇe puruṣaviṣayasya sādhāraṇyasya kimāyātamityata āha--aśeṣa iti /
analyzed: pramām prati kāraṇānā sādhāraṇa tva asādhāraṇa tve nirūpyamāṇe puruṣa viṣayasya sādhāraṇyasya kim āyātam iti atas āha aśeṣaḥ iti
kalpa antaram pramā kāraṇā iti
atra api
svarūpāt kāryātaḥ kartuḥ arvāk prāk kartṛ kāryayoḥ
pramā jāteḥ pramā hetu viśeṣāt māna lakṣaṇam
iti saṃgraha ślokaḥ

original: tadebhirnimittaiḥ karaṇavyavahāre vyavasthāpyamāne yadi karmādivyavahāranimittasamāveśāt tadvyavahāro 'pi bhavati,
analyzed: tat ebhiḥ nimittaiḥ karaṇa vyavahāre vyavasthāpyamāne yadi karma ādi vyavahāra nimitta samāveśāt tad vyavahāraḥ api bhavati
bhavatu tasya iṣyamāṇa tvāt
ebhiḥ nimittaiḥ tu karma ādi vyavahāraḥ na iṣyate
sa tu na asti eva
tathā hi sarvatra karma vyavahāraḥ karaṇa vyāpāra viṣaya tva ādibhiḥ
karaṇa vyavahāraḥ ca kartṛ vyāpāra viṣaya tva ādibhiḥ

original: teṣāṃ ca nimittānāṃ bheda eveti nātiprasaṃgaḥ /
analyzed: teṣām ca nimittānām bhedaḥ eva iti na atiprasaṃgaḥ
tātparyataḥ vyācaṣṭe vākye asphuṭa tvāt iti arthaḥ

original: evaṃ ca satyagre arthyata iti vyutpattirapi tātparyaparatayaiveti manatavyam /
analyzed: evam ca sati agre arthyataḥ iti vyutpattiḥ api tātparya para tayā evā iti manatavyam
kasmāt punar iti
na hi pramāṇa viṣayasya pramāṇasya arthavat tvam avyutpādanīyam eva iti śaḍkā bījam
tātparya antaram iti
kathañcid bhāga asiddha tā parihārasya phalasya eka tvāt

original: tat kiṃ pravṛttisāmarthyābhāvādapramāṇameva tadityata āha--na ceti /
analyzed: tat kim pravṛtti sāmarthya abhāvāt apramāṇam eva tat iti atas āha na ca iti
katham tarhi tad prāmāṇyam avaseyam iti atas āha tsya api iti

original: na tāvat sarvo viṣayaḥ sarvatra sarvasya sarvadopakṣaṇīyaḥ,

na ca vayam ityādinā abhāvasya sāmārthyam aḍgīkṛtam
na tu sāmarthyena sat vyavahāraḥ
an anusaṃhita sāmarthyasya api sat vyavahāra viṣaya tvāt
api tu asti nāsti pratīti viṣaya tvena
na hi asti saṃbhavaḥ sat iti vyavahniyate
na ca astipratyaya viṣayaḥ iti

original: asaditi vā vyavahniyate na ca nāstipratyayaviṣayaḥ iti prakāraṇārthaḥ //
analyzed: asat iti vā vyavahniyate na ca nāsti pratyaya viṣayaḥ iti prakāraṇa arthaḥ
syāt etat
prameya vailakṣaṇya vat pramāṇa vailakṣaṇyena api sākṣātkāra ādi vat pratīti bhedaḥ ghaṭate
tatas sat antare eva iyam na asti iti prati iti
kadācid bhavet iti āśaḍkya āha saṃprati iti
abādhite prasiddhatare vipratipattiḥ na kāñcid kṣatim āvahati iti arthaḥ
nanu niṣidhyatām bhāva antaram
tathā api abhāvidhau kim āyātam

original: na hi nīlaniṣadhe pītādividhiravaśyamityata āha--nīlapītau hīti /
analyzed: na hi pīta ādi vidhiḥ avaśyam iti atas āha nīla pītau hi iti
nanu sarva śaḍkā nirākaraṇa paṭīyasi pratyakṣe api pravṛtte kutas tarkasya avakā ārśaḥ
tatas kim atra upapattyā iti atas āha yadi kaścid iti

original: santyeva hi kecid vādino ye vipakṣadaṇḍamapaśyantaḥ pratyakṣaparikalitamapahnutya śaḍakāmutthāpayanti,
analyzed: santi eva hi kecid vādinaḥ ye vipakṣa daṇḍam a paśyantaḥ pratyakṣa parikalitam apahnutya śaḍakām utthāpayanti

original: tān sāṃkhyādīn prati ayaṃ prakāra ityarthaḥ /
analyzed: tān sāṃkhya ādīn prati ayam prakāraḥ iti arthaḥ
pūrvavat vyākhyeyam
tulya upalambha yogya tā tarka antarbhāvena iti arthaḥ
nanu abhāve tad pratyakṣa tāyām ca bahu vipratipatti bījam asti iti āha sarva ca etat iti
nanu yadi asat bhedāḥ prakṛta anupayoginaḥ
tadā anupayogāt eva na ucyante iti ucyatām
atha upayoginaḥ tadā avaśyam vaktavyāḥ eva

original: pāratantryeṇa pratibhāsanāt nocyanta iti kkopayujyata ityata āha--niṣedhyeti /
analyzed: pāratantryeṇa pratibhāsanāt na ucyante iti kka upayujyate iti atas āha niṣedhya iti
pratipādanāya hi te vaktavyāḥ
tat ca pratiyogi adhikaraṇa pratipādanāt eva arthataḥ bhūtam iti kim tad artha prayāsena iti arthaḥ

original: tadidamuktaṃ gamyanta iti nāktā ityartha iti /
analyzed: tat idam uktam gamyante iti na aktāḥ iti arthaḥ iti
nanu yadi upāya pratipādanena eva pratipāditāḥ iti na uktāḥ

original: tarhi prameyādayo 'pi pramāṇapratipādanenaiva pratipāditā iti kiṃ tatkathanenāpi?
analyzed: tarhi prameya ādayaḥ api pramāṇa pratipādanena eva pratipāditāḥ iti kim tad kathanena api
atha pratītāḥ api prayojana viśeṣāt abhyarhita tayā pratipādyante

original: hanatāsadbhedā api upayuktāstathā kiṃ netyata āha--atha veti //
analyzed: hanatā asat bhedāḥ api upayuktāḥ tathā kim na iti atas āha atha vā iti

original: nanu bhāvaprapañcavadabhāvaprapañce 'pyuddiṣṭo veditavya iti pratijñāter'the caturvargānantarbhāvāditi heturbhāgāsiddho viruddhaścetyata āha-niḥśreyaseti
analyzed: nanu bhāva prapañca vat abhāva prapañce api uddiṣṭaḥ veditavyaḥ iti pratijñāteḥ athe caturvarga anantarbhāvāt iti hetuḥ bhāga asiddhaḥ viruddhaḥ ca iti atas āha niḥśreyasa iti
tena caturvarga anantarbhāvaḥ hetuḥ

original: tadadhikāraṇatayā tathābhūta eva bhāvaprapañco dṛṣṭānto nocyata iti sādhyam /
analyzed: tad adhikāraṇatayā tathābhūtaḥ eva bhāva prapañcaḥ dṛṣṭāntaḥ na ucyate iti sādhyam
niḥśreyasa upayogī tu uddiṣṭaḥ veditavyaḥ
catuvarga antarbhāvāt
upayukta bhāva prapañca vat iti vārttika arthaḥ iti arthaḥ

original: ata evoddiṣṭo veditavya iti anupalabdhibādhitaṃ manyamāna uttaragranthamavatārayati--atheti /
analyzed: atas eva uddiṣṭaḥ veditavyaḥ iti anupalabdhi bādhitam manyamānaḥ uttara grantham avatārayati atha iti
kāraṇa anupalabdhyā sarve eva anupalabdhi prabhedāḥ upalakṣitāḥ
apavargaḥ eva mardha abhiṣiktaḥ pradhāna tayā rāja kalpaḥ
etat api upalakṣaṇam
arthaḥ api śatru putra ādi abhāva ādiḥ
pravṛttiḥ api ahiṃsā ādiḥ
pretyabhāvaḥ api pūrva śarīra parityāga ādiḥ
phalam api utpanna roga pradhvaṃsa ādi asat bhedaḥ iti mantavyam

original: saṃśayasya jñānarūpatvādasadrūpatā na saṃbhavatīti tamullaḍghyātidiśati--evaṃ prayojaneti /
analyzed: saṃśayasya jñāna rūpa tvāt asat rūpa tā na saṃbhavati iti tam ullaḍghya atidiśati evam prayojana iti
tathā hi sandhyā vandana prāyaścitta ādau ahita nivṛttiḥ eva prayojanam
dṛṣṭāntaḥ api kaścid abhāva rūpaḥ yathā suṣupti avasthānam apavarge dṛṣṭāntayiṣyati
siddhāntaḥ api nairātmya ādiḥ pareṣām

original: asmākaṃ ca yathā bhābhāvastamaḥ [vai. sū. 5.2.19] ityevamādiḥ /
analyzed: asmākam ca yathā bhā bhāvaḥ tamaḥ vai iti evamādiḥ
sarveṣām apavargaḥ duḥkha abhāvaḥ iti
avayava tarka nirṇaya vāda jalpa viṇḍāḥ tu sat bhedāḥ eva
hetvābhāsāḥ dvividhāḥ
yathā anityaḥ śabdaḥ sattā rahita tvāt
cākṣuṣa tvāt iti evamādiḥ
chalam jātayaḥ ca sat bhedāḥ eva
nigrahasthāneṣu vipratipatti vidhāḥ sat bhedāḥ
tat idam uktam evam tatra tatra ūhanīyam iti
nanu bhāṣye asat bheda kathana vārtā api na asti iti atas āha atra iti
paraspara viruddhayoḥ abhidhāna anabhidhānayoḥ paramārthika tvam na saṃbhavati

original: tat kataradatra pāramārthikamityata āha--dvitīye tu kalpe pāramārthikaṃ iti /
analyzed: tat katarat atra pāramārthikam iti atas āha dvitīye tu kalpe pāramārthikam iti
sūtrasya sa prapañca tātparyam pramāṇataḥ ityādi prapañcaḥ

original: sacca khalu ṣāḍaśadhā vyūḍhamupadekṣyata iti tātparyam /
analyzed: sat ca khalu ṣāḍaśadhā vyūḍham upadekṣyate iti tātparyam
tasya tātparyam iti
tāsām khalu āsām iti avatāra bhāṣyasya
na tu sūtra pāṭhasya
avayava artham vyācikhyāsunā iti anena eva tātparyasya sphorita tvāt
dvandva svarūpam āha tad tātparya abhidhānāya iti śeṣaḥ
dvigu avyayībhāvau prayoga mātra nirākṛta tvāt na upanyastau
saṃbhāvita prayogān bahuvrīhi karmadhāraya tatpuruṣān nirākaroti bahuvrīhi iti asaṃbhavāt artha asaṃbhavāt
ṣaṣṭhī samāse iti saṃbhāvita tatpuruṣa upalakṣaṇa param
iti hi ityādi hi iti arthaḥ
tena artha nirdeśam samupādāya saṃśaye api bahuvacanam draṣṭavyam

original: tatrāpi sādharmyavaidharmyavipratipattijanyānāṃ saṃśayānāṃ parasparanirapekṣāṇāmeva nyāyapravartakatvamiti tātparyam /
analyzed: tatra api sādharmya vaidharmya vipratipatti janyānām saṃśayānām paraspara nirapekṣāṇām eva nyāya pravartaka tvam iti tātparyam
dṛṣṭānte api viśeṣa lakṣaṇa karaṇa avasare dvivacanam eva
tasya api paraspara nirapekṣa udāharaṇa saṃpratipattiḥ prayojanam evam
siddhāntānām api sva prayojane paraspara anapekṣa tvā īmā iva
tat ca bahuvacana samāna arthena saṃkhyā vacanena pratipāditam

original: avayavānāṃ tu yadyapyekasmin vākyārthe pratipādayitavye mithaḥ sāpekṣatvam,
analyzed: avayavānām tu yadi api ekasmin vākya arthe pratipādayitavye mithas sāpekṣa tvam
tathā api paraspara asaṃpratyayitam artham abhidadhatām eva iti bahuvacana prayojanam
hetvābhāseṣu api bahuvacanasya sva vyāpāre paraspara nirapekṣa tva pratipādanam eva tātparyam
tathā chala jāti nigrahasthāneṣu api

original: yatra tu nirdeśo nāsti tatra lakṣaṇe yathāvacanaṃ vigrahaḥ,
analyzed: yatra tu nirdeśaḥ na asti tatra lakṣaṇe yathāvacanam vigrahaḥ
sāmānya mātrasya eva prayojaka tvāt iti bhāvaḥ
kārakasya artha rūpa tvāt na tasya abhidheyam asti iti atas āha kāraka arthaḥ pradhāna kriyā iti

original: arthaśabdaḥ pradhānakriyāvacano na kvacid dṛṣṭa itya āha--yaduddeśeneti /
analyzed: artha śabdaḥ pradhāna kriyā vacanaḥ na kvacid dṛṣṭaḥ iti aḥ āha yad uddeśena iti

original: kārakāṇāmavivakṣetyetāvataiva susthe pradhānakriyāyā avivakṣā kimarthamityata āha--kārakagrahaṇeti //
analyzed: kārakāṇām avivakṣā iti etāvatā eva susthe pradhāna kriyāyāḥ avivakṣā kimartham iti atas āha kāraka grahaṇa iti

original: nanu kārakāṇāmavivakṣā śeṣalakṣaṇa tadā syād yadi tatra kārakatvaṃ saṃbhavet,
analyzed: nanu kārakāṇām avivakṣā tadā syāt yadi tatra kāraka tvam saṃbhavet
tat eva tu na asti iti atas āha yadi api iti
atra codayati śaiṣikyām ṣaṣṭhyām

a vyatireke tad anupapatteḥ ṣaṣṭi arthasya saṃbandhasya anupapatteḥ

original: tasyāsvatantratvāt pramāṇādayo gamyanta iti kiṃ kena saṃgatamata āha--bhāvasyeti /
analyzed: tasya asvatantra tvāt pramāṇa ādayaḥ gamyante iti kim kena saṃgatam atas āha bhāvasya iti

original: na pramāṇādimātramucyate tattvaśabdena atha ca nārthāntaraṃ tattvamiti parasparavyāhatamityata ekadeśinaṃ kiñciduddīpayati--abhede 'pītīti
analyzed: na pramāṇa ādi mātram ucyate tattva śabdena atha ca na artha antaram tattvam iti paraspara vyāhatam iti atas eka deśinam kiñcid uddīpayati abhede api iti iti

original: anāropitarūpeṇa svarūpataḥ pratīyantāṃ pramāṇādaya ityetadarthamanatiriktārthamapi tattvagrahaṇaṃ kṛtamityarthaḥ /
analyzed: anāropita rūpeṇa svarūpataḥ pratīyantām pramāṇa ādayaḥ iti etad artham anatirikta artham api tattva grahaṇam kṛtam iti arthaḥ
dṛṣṭāntam asiddham mattvā sa upapatti vyācaṣṭe dvitva ekatvayoḥ iti

original: vyavahāragativastugatyoḥ samānayogakṣematvaṃ manyamāno hyabhāvamapahnotuṃ na śaknotyeva,
analyzed: vyavahāra gati vastu gatyoḥ samāna yogakṣema tvam manyamānaḥ hi abhāvam apahnotum na śaknoti eva
abhāva vyavahāra gateḥ sarva vādi siddha tvāt
yaḥ tu vastu nirapekṣaḥ api vyavahāraḥ asti iti manyate

nanu dṛṣṭa aniḥśreyasa dūṣaṇe kim tātparyam

original: na hi tadasmānna siddhyatītyata āha--etaduktaṃ bhavatīti /

analyzed: anumānam eva atra arthe pramāṇam iti vipratipannam pratipipādayiṣatām iti śeṣaḥ upaniṣadā api

original: santānānumānasya ca pṛthagupadeśācca prameyasya pramāṇādibhyaḥ prathamasūtre etadvivaraṇādvacavacchetturagranthamevāvatārayati--yadi ceti /

tat iyatā
prabandhena vārttikakṛtā kim kṛtam iti atas āha tat anena iti
uttara vārttika viṣayībhūta bhāṣyam tāvat vyācaṣṭa atha kim iti

original: tat kathaṃ tatrānūdyata ityata āha-- niḥśreyaseti /

original: tadabhiprāyaṃ tena taccaitaduttarasūtreṇānūdyate ityasyānuvādānantaramavyākhyāne 'pi na doṣaḥ /

original: evaṃ cārthaṃ dvitīyasūtra ityādinā pūrvameva vyākhyātatvāt tu nehedaṃ vyākhyātamityarthaḥ //
analyzed: evam ca artham dvitīya sūtre ityādinā pūrvam eva vyākhyāta tvāt tu na iha idam vyākhyātam iti arthaḥ

original: nanu dveṣaḥ kiheya eva na vā pravṛttiheturityata āha--upalakṣaṇamiti /

original: tat kathaṃ tattvajñānamityucyata ityata āha--hīyate hīti /

original: arthapadānīti bhāṣyagatasyārthapadasya tvanyathārtho bhaviṣyatīti yaduktaṃ tadāha--puruṣārthasthānānīti /

tātparyam iti arthaḥ
vārttikasya iti śeṣaḥ

original: prasthānaṃ prakāra itthambhāvaḥ tathā cetthambhūtatvādānvīkṣikyā iti yadyapyabhimatameva,
analyzed: prasthānam prakāraḥ itthambhāvaḥ tathā ca itthambhūta tvāt ānvīkṣikyāḥ iti yadi api abhimatam eva

original: tathāpi nirūpapattika itthambhāvaḥ syādityata āha--prasthānaṃ vyāpāraḥ /
analyzed: tathā api nirūpapattikaḥ itthambhāvaḥ syāt iti atas āha prasthānam vyāpāraḥ

original: pratyayārthastu saṃśayādibhiḥ padārthaiḥ pṛthak prasthāpyate iti vadatā bhāṣyakāreṇaiva darśitaḥ /
analyzed: pratyaya arthaḥ tu saṃśaya ādibhiḥ padārthaiḥ pṛthak prasthāpyate iti vadatā bhāṣyakāreṇa eva darśitaḥ

original: nyāvyutpādane vyāpāravattayā hi iyamānvīkṣikī vidyāntarād bhidyate /

original: tato 'syāḥ saṃśayādayo 'pi viṣayabhūtāḥ tānantareṇa nirviṣayatayā vidyaiva na syāt /

atra iva śaṅkatena ca vācyam iti

original: na hyanyā vidyāḥ svaṃ svamarthaṃ pratipādayantyo 'pi kathametadityaśraddhāmalamapanetumīśate vinaināmānvīkṣikīmityāśayavān pariharati--etasyā  #
analyzed: na hi anyāḥ vidyāḥ svam svam artham pratipādayantyaḥ api katham etat iti aśraddhām alam apanetum īśate vinā enām ānvīkṣikīm iti āśayavān pariharati etasyāḥ
