vārttika antara viṣayam bhāṣyam darśayati sa ca ācam ityādi bhāṣyam iti
nirdalam deśyam dīpayati jñānam iti
upalabdhaḥ a nirṇotaḥ ca iti vyāghātaḥ anupapannaḥ eva upalabdheḥ nirṇaya paryāya tvasya anantaram eva nirākṛta tvāt

original: nāpi pramāṇapravṛttiviṣaya upalabdho bhavannirṇota eva bhavedityata ākṣepturabhiprāyantaraṃ darśayati--pañcarūpa iti /
analyzed: na api pramāṇa pravṛtti viṣayaḥ upalabdhaḥ bhavat nirṇotaḥ eva bhavet iti atas ākṣeptuḥ abhiprāya ntaram darśayati pañca rūpaḥ iti
yathā pratyakṣam āgamaḥ vā ajñāte api avatarati
tathā a sandigadhe api

original: anumānaṃ tu yathā nājñāte tathā asaṃdigdhe 'pi tasmādasyānyaiva rītirityarthaḥ /
analyzed: anumānam tu yathā na ajñāte tathā asaṃdigdhe api tasmāt asya anyā eva rītiḥ iti arthaḥ
na samarthayase iti
na tādātmyam iti bhāvaḥ
paraspara samānena adhikaraṇena saṃbandha mātra sāmānādhikaraṇyam

original: na tu tādātmyamityabhipretya parihāraṃ vivṛṇoti--sāmānya viśeṣayoriti /
analyzed: na tu tādātmyam iti abhipretya parihāram vivṛṇoti sāmānya viśeṣayoḥ iti

original: saṃdigdhe pravartave ityasya yogyatāparatāṃ darśayati-asaṃdigdha iti /
analyzed: saṃdigdhe pravartave iti asya yogyatā para tām darśayati asaṃdigdhe iti
saṃśaya anarhaḥ ca prakāra dvayena
sarvathā ajñātaḥ viśeṣataḥ vā nirṇātaḥ
tad viparītaḥ tu saṃdigdhaḥ saṃśaya arhaḥ
tatra nyāyaḥ pravartate iti tātparyam
atas eva vyatireka pradhānām upalakṣaṇatayā ekām vidhām udāharati nahi iti

original: nanu kiṃ punaḥ prayojanamiti praśne yena prayuktaḥ pravartata ityuttaraṃ vaiyātyādityata āha--sphuṭataramevaitaditi /
analyzed: nanu kim punar prayojanam iti praśne yena prayuktaḥ pravartate iti uttaram vaiyātyāt iti atas āha sphuṭataram eva etat iti
nanu vayam
nu iti sva abhimata pradarśanam eka deśi mate a paritoṣam sūcayitum

original: na cāparitoṣabījamupalabhāmaha ityatastadvījaṃ praśnapūrvakameva tāvad darśayati--tatreti /
analyzed: na ca aparitoṣa bījam upalabhāmahe iti atas tat vījam praśna pūrvakam eva tāvat darśayati tatra iti
sarveṣām eva kāmya tvāt dharma ādīnām iti

original: tathā ca dharmādiviṣayastātsādhanaviṣayo vā kāmastatrāpi pravartaka ityarthaḥ /
analyzed: tathā ca dharma ādi viṣayaḥ vā kāmaḥ tatra api pravartakaḥ iti arthaḥ
na ca tad viṣaya tvena api dharma ādīnām upādānam
srak candana ādīnām api upādāna prasaṅgāt iti
sarakaḥ pānam
nanu tathā api na eteṣām prayojana tva kṣatiḥ iti atas āha dharma mokṣayoḥ iti
ca etat
kāka arthayoḥ api viraktān prati aprayojaka tvam iti draṣṭavyam
tena etat uktam bhavati

original: na hi dharmādiṣu dharmatvādikameva pravṛttiṃ prati prayojakam /
analyzed: na hi dharma ādiṣu dharma tva ādikam eva pravṛttim prati prayojakam
kim nāma iṣyamāṇa tvam
anyathā aviśeṣeṇa sarvasya sarvatra pravṛtti prasaṅgāt iti

original: nanu yathāśrute ko doṣo yena viṣayeṇa viṣayiṇaṃ pratyayamupalakṣayatīti vyākhyetyata āha--asatyoriti /
analyzed: nanu yathāśrute kaḥ doṣaḥ yena viṣayeṇa viṣayiṇam pratyayam upalakṣayati iti vyākhyā iti atas āha asatyoḥ iti
satyoḥ vā iti saptamī
uttara vārttikam grahītum etat
yathāśrutam dūṣayati tathā api iti

original: iha phalajñānamanyatra pravartavat tatsādhana eva pravartayatīti ato nātiprasaṅga ityevaṃ yadyapi śaṅkitumucitam, tathāpi
analyzed: iha phala jñānam anyatra pravarta vat tad sādhane eva pravartayati iti atas na atiprasaṅgaḥ iti evam yadi api śaṅkitum ucitam tathā api
tad sa dhana tvena ajñāne pravṛttiḥ eva na asti iti atas tad jñānam antarbhāvya āśaṅkate tad sādhana tva jñānāt iti
sāmānādhikaraṇyena eka viṣaya tayā
saṃpratipatteḥ avirodhataḥ kārya kāraṇa bhāva siddheḥ iti arthaḥ
evam tarhi
sukha duḥkha āpti hānibhyām iti vārttikam asaṅgatam eva kim iti atas āha etat uktam bhavati iti
vivakṣitu prasthalīkaroti tena iti
pravṛtti viṣaya tayā iṣyamāṇa tvam upādeya tā
sva rūpeṇa iṣyamāṇa tvam uddeśya tā
ubhayoḥ api jñānam prayojayati iti ubhayam api prayojanam
iyān tu viśeṣaḥ yat upādeya jñānam sākṣāt pravartaṃyati

original: etadeva ca tasya sākṣātpravartakatvaṃ yat sākṣāt prayatnajananasamarthāmicchāṃ prasūte /
analyzed: etat eva ca tasya sākṣāt pravartaka tvam yat sākṣāt prayatna janana samarthām icchām prasūte
sā eva ādyā pravṛttiḥ iti ucyate

original: uddeśyajñānaṃ tu tadviṣayāmicchāṃ janayat tathābhūtatatsādhanajñānajananadvāreṇa ityarthaḥ //
analyzed: uddeśya jñānam tu tad viṣayām icchām janayat tathābhūta tad sādhana jñāna janana dvāreṇa iti arthaḥ
nyāya parīkṣā śabdayoḥ ekārtha tvam apaśyataḥ ākṣepaḥ iti āha nyāya iti

original: nanu parīkṣāśabdasya vicāraṇārthatve prayojanāpekṣitvaṃ kadācid yujyate,
analyzed: nanu parīkṣā śabdasya vicāraṇā artha tve prayojana apekṣi tvam kadācid yujyate

original: sa cet nyāyārthastasya ca vyutpattibalena pramāṇamātramarthaḥ,
analyzed: sa ced nyāya arthaḥ tasya ca vyutpatti balena pramāṇa mātram arthaḥ

original: tasya ca na prayojanāpakṣeti sarvaṃ samākulamityākṣepāvatāraṭīkārthāḥ /
analyzed: tasya ca na sarvam samākulam iti ākṣepa avatāra ṭīkā arthāḥ
nanu etāvatā api codyam tad avastham eva iti atas samādhānam vibhajate pratyakṣa ādi iti
nanu avayavaiḥ arthasya parīkṣaṇam adhigatiḥ yadi nyāyaḥ
tarhi kim tasya phalam iti atas āha arthasya
liṅgasya iti
atha yadi parīkṣā apara nāmā nyāyaḥ na anumeya viṣayaḥ
kutas tad adhigamaḥ bhaviṣyati iti atas āha parīkṣitam tu iti

original: atha yathā pramāṇamūlairavayavairliḍgāṃ pratipādyate tathānumeyameva kiṃ netyata āha--na tviti /
analyzed: atha yathā pramāṇa mūlaiḥ avayavaiḥ liḍgām pratipādyate tathā anumeyam eva kim na iti atas āha na tu iti
nanu saṃdigdha tva aviśeṣe api kutas etat iti atas āha tasya iti
parīkṣā nāspada tvāt liṅga pratipādanam antareṇa tad apekṣiṇā pratyāhatya pratipādayitum aśakya tvāt iti arthaḥ
na tarhi pramāṇaiḥ iti

original: tathā cārthasya liṅgasya parīkṣādhigatirna pramāṇphalaṃ syāt /
analyzed: tathā ca arthasya liṅgasya parīkṣā adhigatiḥ na pramāṇ phalam syāt
atha pramāṇaiḥ eva
niṣphalāḥ tarhi avayavāḥ iti āśayaḥ

original: na sākṣādityādinā liṅgādhigatāvavayavānāṃ svātantryaṃ nirākurvatā adhigaterapramāṇaphalatvamapāstam,
analyzed: na sākṣāt ityādinā liṅga adhigatau avayavānām svātantryam nirākurvatā adhigateḥ apramāṇa phala tvam apāstam
ca āvedayatā avayavānām ānarthakyam apāstam iti

original: pramāṇatvāviśeṣai'pi tasyaiva vipratipannapuruṣapratipādakatvaṃ nānyasyetyatrāpi hetuṃ paraḥ prakṣyatītyatastathaivāha--samasteti /
analyzed: tasya eva vipratipanna puruṣa pratipādaka tvam na anyasya iti atra api hetum paraḥ prakṣyati iti atas tathā eva āha samasta iti

original: tadayaṃ vārtikārthaḥ so 'yamitthaṃbhūtasamastapramāṇopakaraṇātmā yatastasmāda vipratipannapuruṣapratipādakaḥ tataśrva parama iti
analyzed: tat ayam vārtika arthaḥ saḥ ayam itthaṃbhūta samasta pramāṇa upakaraṇa ātmā yatas tasmāt a vipratipanna puruṣa pratipādakaḥ paramaḥ iti
vyavahriyate iti arthaḥ
nanu na aviruddha tvam eva āśrita tvam āśritasya api aviruddha tvāt viruddhasya api āśrita tvāt
atas eva na avinābhāvaḥ api anayoḥ
tat katham āha āśrita tvam iti avirodhi iti
na ca eva tat prakṛtam iti atas āha pad ca avayave iti
nyāya mūla phalayoḥ eka viṣaya tvam vastutas
tat ca avirodhe sati nirvahati na anyathā iti
tat etat bhāṣyakāreṇa arthataḥ vārttikakāreṇa akṣaraiḥ eva vivṛtam iti arthaḥ
yadi api agni śabdaḥ tejaḥ viśeṣa vacanaḥ sūryāloka ādau agni vyavahāra adarśanāt
tathā api tejā mātre api kvacid
tad abhiprāyeṇa paramāṇunā bhāga asiddha tā api mā bhūt iti āśayavān āha agniḥ avayavī iti
nanu viruddha arthaṃparicchedaḥ eva pramāṇa virodhaḥ

original: sa cātra pratyakṣeṇa sphuṭatara eveti kimartha praśnaḥ kaḥ punarityata āha--idamatreti /
analyzed: sa ca atra pratyakṣeṇa sphuṭataraḥ eva iti praśnaḥ kaḥ punar iti atas āha edam atra iti
tatas eva rūpa traya asaṃpatteḥ eva
tat anumānam ābhāsam iti vyavahartavyam iti śeṣaḥ
na ca rūpa traya saṃpannam eva idam
sādhya siddhi prasaṅgāt iti
atra śaṅgate atha iti

original: nanu yadi rūpatrayasaṃpattireva avinābhāvaḥ tadā kathaṃ bādhayā saha saṃbhavaḥ?
analyzed: nanu yadi rūpa traya saṃpattiḥ eva avinābhāvaḥ tadā katham bādhayā saha saṃbhavaḥ
iha eva saṃbhavāt iti atas āha bādhāyām iti

original: ato na ca sapakṣetyādiśaḍkā na niravakāśā bhavati /
analyzed: atas na ca sapakṣa ityādi śaḍkā na niravakāśā bhavati

original: yatredaṃ tatredamityākāreṇa pakṣasyāpi sādhanavataḥ sādharmyavattāpratītiḥ sarvopasaṃhāraḥ /
analyzed: yatra idam tatra idam iti ākāreṇa pakṣasya api sādhanavataḥ sādharmyavat tā pratītiḥ sarva upasaṃhāraḥ

original: ayaṃ ca yatra nedaṃ sādhyamasti tatrāpyetat sādhanamabhimatamastītyetāvanmātreṇaiva bhajyate /
analyzed: ayam ca yatra nā idam sādhyam asti tatra api etat sādhanam abhimatam asti iti etāvat mātreṇa eva bhajyate

original: eṣa ca vyabhicāraprakāraḥ pakṣe 'pi na nivārayituṃ śakya ityarthaḥ /
analyzed: eṣa ca vyabhicāra prakāraḥ pakṣe api na nivārayitum śakyaḥ iti arthaḥ

original: na bādhasya svātantryeṇa dūṣaṇatvaṃ vyabhicārāt pakṣadharmatāvirahiṇi tadabhāvāt /
analyzed: na bādhasya svātantryeṇa dūṣaṇa tvam vyabhicārāt pakṣa dharma tā virahiṇi tad abhāvāt
yatra ca bādha saṃbhavaḥ tatra tayoḥ eva anyatra avagata svātantryayoḥ vidyamāna tvāt anumānam ābhāsa tām gatam
vyabhicāra ādi utthāpanena tu viroghaḥ caritārthaḥ iti
pūrvapakṣa arthaḥ

original: anumānāviṣaye prayoga iti yathāśrute vārttike parābhimatamapakṣadharmatvameva sphuṭamapakṣasyaivānumānāviṣayatvāt,
analyzed: anumāna aviṣaye prayogaḥ iti yathāśrute vārttike para abhimatam apakṣa dharma tvam eva sphuṭam apakṣasya eva anumāna aviṣaya tvāt
atas anyathā vyācikhyāsuḥ bhūmim āracayati vakṣyate hi iti
atiprasaṅgāt ativyāpteḥ iti anumāna adhikāre vakṣyate hi iti yojanā
kim atas yadi evam iti atas āhasa ca iti
ārdra indhanam eka upādhiḥ eka vyabhicārāt
adhyayanam ubhaya upādhiḥ ūbhaya vyabhicārāt
saḥ ayam ityādinā na asti iti antena pratyakṣasya akāraḥ darśitaḥ
yadi abhaviṣyat iti tarkasya
na asti eva iti phala bhūtasya niśrvayasya

original: nanu kṛtakasya tejaso baddhau viparivartānatve yo yaḥ kṛtakaḥ sarvo 'nuṣṇa iti sarvopasaṃhāro na saṃbhavatyeva /
analyzed: nanu kṛtakasya tejasaḥ baddhau viparivarta anatve yaḥ yaḥ kṛtakaḥ sarvaḥ anuṣṇaḥ iti sarva upasaṃhāraḥ na saṃbhavati eva
a parisphurati ca tasmin na tarām

original: na hi yadyatra na sphurati tadapi tasya viṣaya ityata āha--sāmānyena yo yaḥ kṛtaka iti /
analyzed: na hi yat yatra na sphurati tat api tasya viṣayaḥ iti atas āha sāmānyena yaḥ yaḥ kṛtakaḥ iti
anena ākāreṇa saḥ api buddhau viparivartate eva

original: na tu viśeṣākāreṇa vyāptigrahaṇaviṣayatāmagniragādityata āha--na tu nirvimajya viśeṣato jñātvā tejo 'vayavini eva saṃbandho 'vadhārita ityarthaḥ
analyzed: na tu viśeṣa ākāreṇa vyāpti grahaṇa viṣaya tām agniḥ agāt iti atas āha na tu nirvimajya viśeṣataḥ jñātvā tejaḥ avayavini eva saṃbandhaḥ avadhāritaḥ iti arthaḥ

original: atha sāmānyākāreṇāpi tejo 'vayavinaḥ kimityavakāśo deyo yāvatā pṛthivyādāveva vyāptiravadhāryatāmityata āha--na hīti /
analyzed: atha sāmānya ākāreṇa api tejaḥ avayavinaḥ kim iti avakāśaḥ deyaḥ yāvatā pṛthivī ādau eva vyāptiḥ avadhāryatām iti atas āha na hi iti

original: na hi samānyākāreṇa vyāptaugṛhyamāṇāyāṃ pratyakṣabādhāt prāgeva tejo 'vayaviparityāge kācidupapattirasti,
analyzed: na hi samāni ākāreṇa vyāptau gṛhyamāṇāyām pratyakṣa bādhāt prāk eva tejaḥ avayavi parityāge kācid upapattiḥ asti
anyatra a darśanāt

original: tathā ca na kevalaṃ sa eva na dṛṣṭaḥ,
analyzed: tathā ca na kevalam saḥ eva na dṛṣṭaḥ

original: pṛthivyādayo 'pi kecinna dṛṣṭā eveti te 'pi parityājyāḥ /
analyzed: pṛthivī ādayaḥ api kecid na dṛṣṭāḥ eva iti te api parityājyāḥ
evam ca gṛhītvā gṛhītvā vyāptiḥ grahītavyā

original: adṛṣṭeṣu vyabhicārāśaṅkayā na vetyubhayathāpi sarvānumānocchedaprasaṅga ityarthaḥ /
analyzed: adṛṣṭeṣu vyabhicāra āśaṅkayā na vā iti ubhayathā api sarva anumāna uccheda prasaṅgaḥ iti arthaḥ

original: svayameva paraḥ pakṣaṃ gṛhṇātvityabhisandhinā sukumāraprakāramāha--na tāvaditi /
analyzed: svayam eva paraḥ pakṣam gṛhṇātu iti abhisandhinā sukumāra prakāram āha na tāvat iti

original: na hi vyāptyanapavāde vyabhicārāvakāśaḥ samastīti hṛdayam /
analyzed: na hi vyāpti anapavāde vyabhicāra avakāśaḥ samasti iti hṛdayam
tarhi tad apavāde sati eva hetoḥ anaikāntika tvam astu iti āśayavān āśaṅkate pratyakṣeṇa iti
iha vyāpteḥ apavādaḥ pakṣa tām a paribhūya
tad paribhave vā
tatra ādyam tāvat dūṣayati na iti
pravṛtta anumāna apratirodhe vyāpteḥ apavādaḥ iti kutas

original: tatpratirodhaṃ tu viparītapratyakṣaṃ na cet karoti,
analyzed: tad pratirodham tu viparīta pratyakṣam na ced karoti
kaḥ aparaḥ kariṣyati iti āśayaḥ
nanu yadi pakṣe api vyabhicāraḥ saṃbhavati

original: sa nodbhāvya iti kasyāyaṃ daṇḍa ityata āha--anyatheti /
analyzed: sa na udbhāvyaḥ iti kasya ayam daṇḍaḥ iti atas āha anyathā iti

original: na na pakṣadharmatāmaparibhūya pratyakṣeṇa vyabhicāraḥ śakyagrahaḥ,
analyzed: na na pakṣa dharma tām a paribhūya pratyakṣeṇa vyabhicāraḥ śakya grahaḥ

original: na hyasti saṃbhavaḥ saṃdigdhasādhyadharmā dharmo tadviraheṇa nirṇotaśceti śūnyahṛdayaṃ prati tu pratibandirityarthaḥ /
analyzed: na hi asti saṃbhavaḥ saṃdigdha sādhya dharmāḥ tad viraheṇa tad viraheṇa śūnya hṛdayam prati tu pratibandiḥ iti arthaḥ
pratyakṣeṇa pakṣa dharma tā paribhavāt vyabhicāraḥ bhaviṣyati iti āśaṅgate pratyakṣeṇa iti
nirākaroti tarhi iti
yathā hi sādhya viparīta pravṛttiḥ eva sādhya nivṛttiḥ
tathā viparīta pramāṇa pravṛttiḥ eva sādhana nivṛttiḥ

original: anyathā viparītapramāṇapravṛttāvapi yadi sādhakaṃ na nivartate tadā tadāyattaṃ sādhyamapi na nivarteta,
analyzed: anyathā viparīta pramāṇa pravṛttau api yadi sādhakam na nivartate tadā tad āyattam sādhyam api na nivarteta

original: tadanivṛttau tu na pakṣatvakṣatiriti na vyabhicārāvakāśa
analyzed: tad anivṛttau tu na pakṣa tva kṣatiḥ iti na vyabhicāra avakāśa
iti arthaḥ
siddham artham vārttike samarpayati tat idam uktam iti

original: nanu yadi nāmānumānanivṛtteḥ pūrvamapakṣadharmatvaṃ vyabhicāro boddhārayituṃ na śakyastathāpi taduttarakālaṃ tāvacchākyata eva,
analyzed: nanu yadi nāma anumāna nivṛtteḥ pūrvam apakṣa dharma tvam vyabhicāraḥ boddhārayitum na śakyaḥ tathā api tad uttara kālam tāvat śākyataḥ eva
tatas tau eva stām
kṛtam apahṛta viṣaya tvena iti atas āha evam ca iti
yāvat hi pratyakṣa virodhena anumānam na dūṣyate
tāvat vyabhicāra ādi avakāśaḥ na asti eva
tatas sa avakāśau etau
pratyakṣa virodham upajīvataḥ
tena ced dūṣitam anumānam kim ābhyām

original: na hi mṛto 'pi māryata iti siddhāntasaṃkṣepaḥ //
analyzed: na hi mṛtaḥ api māryate iti siddhānta saṃkṣepaḥ

original: nanvaśrāvaṇaḥ śabda ityevaṃ bruvāṇaḥ kathaṃ śabdāsattvamabhipreyāt,
analyzed: nanu aśrāvaṇaḥ śabdaḥ iti evam bruvāṇaḥ katham śabda asattvam abhipreyāt
yāvatā indriya antara grāhyam eva kim iti na amipraiti
atha tatra virodhaḥ asti
tat kim svarūpa apalāpe sa na asti

original: tasmādabhiprāyaḥ parasya niyantuṃ na śakyata ityata āha--na hīti /
analyzed: tasmāt abhiprāyaḥ parasya niyantum na śakyate iti atas āha na hi iti
indriya antara vyāpāra vyabhicārāt tad agrāhya tva viniścaya pakṣe svarūpa apalāpaḥ eva abhipretaḥ
tatra eva idam udāharaṇam iti arthaḥ
vārttikam niveśayitum pīṭham āracayati sa viśeṣaṇe hi iti
viśiṣṭa vidhān api iti upalakṣaṇam viśiṣṭa niṣedhaḥ api draṣṭavayaḥ iti
agatiḥ pramāṇa antarāt alābhaḥ
lauhitya viśiṣṭam uṣṇīṣam
vidhīyate
jīrṇa tā malavat tā viśiṣṭam vāsaḥ pratiṣidhyate
na sama sita śrāvaṇa pada śravaṇam śrutiḥ
viśeṣaṇa a viśeṣya bhāva avasthita pada samūhaḥ vākyam
tayoḥ sāmarthyāt
etat uktam bhavati
samāse na uttara padārtha niṣedha arthaḥ
tatra eva asya sāmarthyam vācaka tvam yatas
asamāsa pakṣe api samāna adhi kāraṇayoḥ viśeṣaṇa viśeṣyayoḥ madhye viśeṣaṇena eva na saṃbadhyate
tatra eva asya sāmarthyam anvaya yogya tā yatas

original: tadihobhayathāpi saḍketabalādanvayayogyatābalād vā na naḥ śabdapadena saṃbandha iti //
analyzed: tat iha ubhayathā api saḍketa balāt anvaya yogya tā balāt vā na naḥ śabda padena saṃbandhaḥ iti
syāt etat
śrūyamāṇasya naḥ śrāvaṇa padena eva astu saṃbandhaḥ
śabda niṣedhaḥ tu arthāt āpadyate iti atas āha na api iti

original: śrūyamāṇo hyartho yena vinā nopapadyate sa tenākṣipyamāṇor'thād āpadyata ityucyate /
analyzed: śrūyamāṇaḥ hi arthaḥ yena vinā na upapadyate sa tena ākṣipyamāṇaḥ ṛathāt āpadyate iti ucyate
na ca upapādakaḥ virodhī nāma
sa hi anupapādakaḥ eva iti arthaḥ
virodham eva dyotayati śrāvaṇa tva iti
nanu kalpitena api adhikaraṇena niṣedha nirūpaṇam upapadyate tasya
tuccha tvāt

original: tathā ca nāsattvādhikaraṇatvayorvirodha ityata āha--na ceti /
analyzed: tathā ca na asattva adhikaraṇatvayoḥ virodhaḥ iti atas āha na ca iti
evam vyavasthite vārttika artha
dyotayati na ca śrāvaṇa tvam iti
śabda śrotrayoḥ saṃbandha śabda grahaṇa upāya bhūtaḥ
nanu yadi saṃbandhaḥ
katham vārttikakāraḥ vṛttiḥ iti āha iti atas āha vṛttiḥ iti
nanu na sākṣāt vede naraśiraḥ
kapāla āśaucam śrūyate
pratyuta
rudraḥ ha vā mahāvratam cacāra

original: sa eva naraśīrṣamaṃpasaṃdadhāra iti viparitaiva śrutiḥ /
analyzed: saḥ eva nara śīrṣam aṃpasaṃdadhāra iti viparitā eva śrutiḥ
atas katham āgama virodhaḥ iti atas āham anvādimiḥ iti
yadi api asmin arthe na sākṣāt śrutiḥ pratīyate
tathā api tad mūlā smṛtiḥ eva sphuṭatarā pramāṇam
rudraḥ hava ityādi tu arthavāda mātram naramedha ādau prāśastya pratipādana artham
na asya śuci tāyām pramāṇam bhavati iti arthaḥ
nanu upadarśitam āgamam dṛṣṭvā api kutas pṛcchati iti atas āha na asmākam iti
atra vastu iti śabda itara pramāṇa gocare āgama antarāṇām apramāṇyāt iti arthaḥ

original: kutaḥ punarasya nirghṛṇasya kapālaśaucābhimāna ityata āha--avigītā hīti /
analyzed: kutas punar asya nirghṛṇasya kapāla śauca abhimānaḥ iti atas āha avigītāḥ hi iti
na hi āgamāt eva dharma ādi viniścayaḥ api tu avigītāt vyavahārāt api
sa ca asmākam api asti

original: na ca vācyaṃ sārvatriko vyavahāraḥ pramāṇam /
analyzed: na ca vācyam sārvatrikaḥ vyavahāraḥ pramāṇam
yathā kanyā pariṇayana vidhau purandhrīṇām ācāraḥ
prādeśikaḥ tu ayam iti āśaḍkya udāharaṇam kṛtam dākṣiṇātyānām iva iti
upahāse bījam āha śruti smuti iti
āhnenaivuka ādi kriyāḥ āmnāya mūlāḥ avigīta veda artha anuṣṭhātṛ vyavahāra tvāt agnihotra ādi vat iti prayogaḥ

original: atha śreyohetutaivāsyāḥ kuto nāvasīyata ityata āha--na khalviti /
analyzed: atha śreyaḥ hetu tā eva asyāḥ kutas na avasīyate iti atas āha na khalu iti
yadi api śakyate eva etat āpātataḥ
tathā api nirmūla tva śaḍkā lakaḍkita tvena anuṣṭhāna paryanta tām na yāyāt
atas mūla anumānam eva sādhīyaḥ iti arthaḥ
na veda anumāne mūlam liṅgam iti arthaḥ

original: kimuktaṃ bhavati śucītyanena punaruktatāṃ pariharannāha--api ceti /
analyzed: kim uktam bhavati śuci iti anena punarukta tām pariharan āha api ca iti
atha trayī vidveṣāt iti
na ca vācyam
yāvati vivādaḥ tāvān eva arthaḥ pakṣaḥ
gomaya ādeḥ tu śuci tvam ubhaya vādi siddham atas tāvat eva dṛṣṭāntayiṣyate iti
tasya api śuci tvam na āgama prāmāṇyam an abhyupagamya śakyam abhyupagantum iti codayati atha iti
vyutthita abhisandheḥ praśnaḥ iti arthaḥ
abhisandhim āha na khalu iti
nanu ekasmin anumāna dvaya samāveśaḥ virodhaḥ carasti eva tat katham abhāvāt iti atas āha ayam abhisandhiḥ iti

original: na hi pūrvapravṛttena yadeva tadeva bādhyate,
analyzed: na hi pūrva pravṛttena yat eva tat eva bādhyate
aniyama prasaṅgāt
atas uktam tabdala bhāvi iti
sva siddhi artham sva āśraya siddhi artham sva syāpaka siddhi artham ca tad apekṣam iti arthaḥ
sva vyāpaka sādhakena bādhitam udāharati evam iti

original: svasādhakena bādhitaṃ tu yathaikasantatipatitāni jñānāni ekapratipattṛvirahe 'pi pratisandhānayogyāni kāryakāraṇabhāvādityapi draṣṭavyam //
analyzed: sva sādhakena bādhitam tu yathā eka santati patitāni jñānāni eka pratipattṛ virahe api pratisandhāna yogyāni kārya kāraṇa bhāvāt iti api draṣṭavyam
na hi atra kārya kāraṇa bhāvaḥ eka pratipatra bhāve siddhi ati
kva tarhi asamāveśaḥ yat abhisandhāya āha samāveśa abhāvāt iti atas āha tasmāt iti
samasta rūpa upapattiḥ sāmarthyam
samāveśa pakṣe avaśyam antatas ekatarasya anyatara rūpa hānyā bhavitavyam
anyathā tat ekam vastu ubhaya ātmakam anubhaya ātmakam vā syāt
tasmāt
vastutas tulya balayoḥ viruddhayoḥ samāveśaḥ na asti
samāviṣṭayoḥ ca na vāstavī tulya bala tā iti arthaḥ

original: tat kimidānīṃ satpratipakṣatā nāstyevetyata āha--na hīti /
analyzed: tat kim idānīm sat pratipakṣa tā na asti eva iti atas āha na hi iti
evam etat vastutas sat pratipakṣa tā na asti eva
kim tu agṛhyamāṇa viśeṣa avasthāyām pramā an utpādaka tvam paraspara pratikṣepeṇa
atas saḥ eva doṣa tvena upanibaddhaḥ muninā iti arthaḥ
etat eva vārttika mukhena darśayati kasmāt punar iti
anumānayoḥ ukta rūpayoḥ anvaya vyatireka saṃpannayoḥ api samāveśa darśanāt yathāśruta vārttikam asaṃgatam iti atas āha aiha iti
abādhita viṣayeṇa saha pratyakṣa ādīnām api samāveśaḥ na asti
tatas tebhyaḥ na
kaścid anumānasya viśeṣaḥ uktaḥ syāt
atas tad rūpa parihāreṇa upalakṣaṇam

original: nanu yathā agṛhyamāṇaviśeṣāvasthāyāmanumānayoḥ satpratipakṣatvaṃ tathā pratyakṣānumānayorapyastu tataḥ kva bādhyabādhakabhāvaḥ?
analyzed: nanu yathā agṛhyamāṇa viśeṣa avasthāyām anumānayoḥ sat pratipakṣa tvam tathā pratyakṣa anumānayoḥ api astu tatas kva bādhya bādhaka bhāvaḥ
atha viśeṣeṇa gṛhīte pratyakṣam anumānasya bādhakam iṣyate
anumānam api evam iṣyatām
tathā ca paraspara nirapekṣayoḥ anumānayoḥ api bādhya bādhaka bhāvaḥ astu iti āśayavān codya abhiprāyam āha pratyakṣam api iti
parihāra abhiprayam āha tulya balau hi iti
pratyakṣam hi na anumānasya anyathāsiddhi ananyathāsiddhī pratīkṣate
kim tu svayam ananyathāsiddham sat anumānam āskandati eva
yathā uṣṇa tva grāhiṇā ananyathāsiddhena pratyakṣeṇa anuṣṇa tva anumānam anaupādhika tayā bādhaka jñānāt pūrvam ananyathāsiddham api āskanditam
tat etat anayoḥ henā adhika bala tvam
anumānam tu svayam ananyathāsiddham api sat pratipakṣa anumānasya anyathāsiddhim pratīkṣate

original: na hyananyathāsiddhaṃ tattvena bādhituṃ śakyate aviśeṣāt /
analyzed: na hi ananyathāsiddham tattvena bādhitum śakyate aviśeṣāt
tat etat anayoḥ tulya bala tvam
na ca ananyathāsiddhena api anyathāsiddham bādhyatām iti yuktam
tasya anyathā asiddha tvena eva dūṣita tvāt

original: na ca yatra pratyakṣamanyathāsiddhaṃ tatrānumānenāvaśyamanyathāsiddhena bhavitavyam,
analyzed: na ca yatra pratyakṣam anyathā siddham tatra anumānena avaśyam anyathāsiddhena bhavitavyam
ubhayoḥ an anya asiddhau vastu
dustaram vyasanam āsādayet
tatas tat api tena eva paribhūtam
kim tatra pratyakṣa bādhayā iti vācyam
tad anyathā asiddheḥ pratyakṣa bādha utthāpya tvāt iti viśeṣaḥ
tasmāt yāvat pratyakṣasya ananyathāsiddha tvam na avadhāryate
tāvatkālam eva tatra
nirṇaya anudayaḥ sat pratipakṣa rūpa tām pratirūpayati
tad uttara kālam tu kim varākam anumānam iti arthaḥ
tat idam uktam pratyakṣam ananyathāsiddham iti
upadarśita prakārāt anyena prakāreṇa vyavasthāpayitum aśakyam iti arthaḥ

original: anyaprakāravyavasthāpanaṃ ca viṣayasekocamātreṇa na bādhakaṃ vinā bhrāntatvenāpi /
analyzed: anya prakāra vyavasthāpanam ca viṣaya seka uca mātreṇa na bādhakam vinā bhrānta tvena api
tathā sati atiprasaṃgāt iti
atha upamāna ityādi codyam saṃbhāvayati go sadṛśaḥ iti
nanu na upamāna viruddham iti vipratipattiḥ eva saṃpratipattiḥ nāgarika loka saṃpradāyena iti atas āha na bhavati iti anuṣajyate
yodya vārttika stham iti śeṣaḥ
anyathā asiddha pratyakṣa āgama samutthāpitam upamānam anumānena yadi vādhyate sat pratipakṣyate vā

original: tadā tathābhūtau pratyakṣāgamāvevābādhitau satpratipakṣitau vā syātām /
analyzed: tadā tathābhūtau pratyakṣa āgamau eva a bādhitau sat pratipakṣitau vā syātām
tathā ca sati sarvam samākulam āpadyeta

original: tasamād yathā tābhyāmanumānamapanudyate tathā tadutthāpitaphalaśarīreṇopamānenāpīti ṭīko pabṛṃhitasya vārttikasyārthaḥ //
analyzed: yathā tābhyām anumānam apanudyate tathā tad utthāpita phala śarīreṇa upamānena api iti ṭīkā upabṛṃhitasya vārttikasya arthaḥ

original: vādajalpau saprayojanāvityādibhāṣye yadyapi prayojanamaṅgatayā śrūyate tathāpyaḍgi pratyetavyam /
analyzed: vāda jalpau sa prayojanau ityādi bhāṣye yadi api prayojanam aṅga tayā śrūyate tathā api aḍgi pratyetavyam
tena ayam arthaḥ bhāṣyasya
prayojanam tāvat vāda jalpau vyāpnoti

original: vitaṇḍāṃ tu vyāpnoti na veti cintyata iti vivaraṇārthaḥ /
analyzed: vitaṇḍām tu vyāpnoti na vā iti cintyate iti vivaraṇa arthaḥ
nanu vāda jalpayoḥ prayojanavat tva siddhau vitaṇḍāyāḥ tat cintyeta api

original: tayoreva tu prayojanavattvaṃ kena bhāṣyeṇa pratipāditamityata āha--tatra śabdārthamiti /
analyzed: tayoḥ eva tu prayojanavat tvam kena bhāṣyeṇa pratipāditam iti atas āha tatra śabda artham iti
vakṣyati hi pṛthak upadiṣṭaḥ upalākṣaṇa artham
upalakṣitena vyavahāraḥ tattva jñāna artham bhaviṣyati iti

original: sa ca vyavahāro hetvābhāsebhyo hetovivecanalakṣaṇo 'vāntaraprayojanamapi asādhāraṇatayeha tatraśabdena bhāṣyakārasya vivakṣitamatastadeva vārttikakṛtā  #
analyzed: sa ca vyavahāraḥ hetvābhāsebhyaḥ hetaḥ vivecana lakṣaṇaḥ avāntara prayojanam api asādhāraṇa tayā iha tatra śabdena bhāṣyakārasya vivakṣitam atas tat eva vārttikakṛtā
vyākhyātam iti arthaḥ

original: nanu tathāpi tatra nyāye vivecayitavye iti yuktaṃ ,
analyzed: nanu tathā api tatra nyāye vivecayitavye iti yuktam

original: na hi nyāyābhāsa eva viveka pradhānamityata āha--nyāyāmāsa iti tu sannidhānāditi //
analyzed: na hi nyāya ābhāsaḥ eva viveka pradhānam iti atas āha nyāya ābhāsaḥ iti tu sannidhānāt iti
tat anena vicāra viṣayaḥ vivicya darśitaḥ
parīkṣa pūrvarūpam saṃśayam darśayitum tad kāraṇa tayā vyākhyātṛ vipratipattim āha pratipakṣa iti
parīkṣāyāḥ prayojanam āha tatra yadi iti
pūrvapakṣaḥ tatra kecid iti
siddhāntaḥ parapakṣa sādhana iti

original: yadyapi parapakṣadūṣaṇenāpi prayojanena vitaṇḍāyāḥ saprayojanatva siddhacati,
analyzed: yadi api parapakṣa dūṣaṇena api prayojanena vitaṇḍāyāḥ
yam artham adhikṛtya pravartate tat prayojanam
iti vacanāt

original: yadi ca parapakṣadūṣaṇamapi nādhikuryāt tadā vaitaṇḍika eva na syāt /
analyzed: yadi ca para pakṣa dūṣaṇam api na adhikuryāt tadā vaitaṇḍikaḥ eva na syāt

original: tathāpyetadeva svayaṃ kiñcidapyanabhyupagacchato na syādityataḥ pāriśeṣyādapi svapakṣasiddhim abhisaṃdadhānasyaiva pravṛttiryuktetyāśayaḥ /
analyzed: tathā api etat eva svayam kiñcid api anabhyupagacchataḥ na syāt iti atas pāriśeṣyāt api sva pakṣa siddhim abhisaṃdadhānasya eva pravṛttiḥ yuktā iti āśayaḥ
na asti eva asau vādī yaḥ kiñcid api nā abhyupagacchet
antatas narthasya eva abhyupagamāt
tad anabhayupagame tu kiñcid api
na abhyupagacchāmi iti etat api na brūyāt
tasmāt kim anena asat udbhāvanena iti atas āha nāstikaḥ hi iti
nāstikaḥ mādhyamika ādiḥ

original: anena hi parapakṣo nāmyupagamyate na punaḥ parapakṣapratiṣedho 'bhyupagamyata ityarthaḥ /
analyzed: anena hi parapakṣaḥ na amyupagamyate na punar parapakṣa pratiṣedhaḥ abhyupagamyate iti arthaḥ
tat idam uktam parapakṣa pratiṣadha mātra prayuktaḥ pravartate iti
tathā hi na idam jagat asti
bādhyamāna tvāt
na api na asti pratīyamāna tvāt
na api sat asat rūpam virodhāt
na api anubhaya rūpam
virodhāt eva apratīteḥ ca iti
nanu na hi yat eva pratyeti
tat eva abhyupagacchati

original: tathā sati prativādivacanārthaḥ pratītaścedabhyupagataḥ syādita matānujñā nigrahasthānam /
analyzed: tathā sati prativādi vacana arthaḥ pratītaḥ ced abhyupagataḥ syāt matānujñā nigrahasthānam
apratītaḥ ced ajñānam nigrahasthānam iti āyātam iti atas āha pratipattiḥ abhyupagamaḥ
iha vivakṣitaḥ iti śeṣaḥ
tathā api abhyupagama viṣaya tvāt eva na pakṣaḥ tasya jñāpya tvāt iti atas āha yadi api iti
tad nāntarīyaka tvāt iti abhyupagama nāntarīyaka tvāt
jñāpya tāyāḥ pakṣa śabdena siddhāntaḥ atra vivakṣitaḥ iti arthaḥ
asiddha viruddha tva ādi doṣaḥ vādi ukta sādhana viṣayaḥ iti śeṣaḥ
adṛṣṭāntasya api sādhana vikala ādeḥ pratyakṣa viṣaya tvāt iti ativyāptiḥ
āgama ādi viṣayasya api vyāpti grahaṇa gocarasya dṛṣṭānta tvāt iti avyāptiḥ
nanu tathā api ativyāptiḥ eva iti atas āha atra ca iti
saṃmugdham vārtikam vivecayati yat teṣu teṣu iti
atha lakṣaṇa sūtra vyāghātaḥ eva kasmāt na bhavati
yāvatā tat api pratyakṣa apratyakṣa sādhāraṇam iti atas
tu udāharaṇa iti
sādhāraṇam viśeṣa viṣaya tayā api śakyam vyākhyātum iti arthaḥ
tat kim idānī bhāṣyam alagnam eva iti atas āha tasmāt iti

original: nanvanumānāt ko 'paro nyāyo yenānumānāśrayatāmuktvāpi nyāyāśrayatāṃ dṛṣṭāntasya pṛthagāha bhāṣyakāraḥ,
analyzed: nanu anumānāt kaḥ aparaḥ nyāyaḥ yena anumāna āśraya tām uktvā api nyāya āśraya tām dṛṣṭāntasya pṛthak āha bhāṣyakāraḥ
vārtikakāraḥ api tathā eva anumanyate iti atas
āha nyāyasya pañca avayava ātmakasya iti
tathā api āśraya tvam saṃyoga samavāyābhyām dṛṣṭāntasya na ghaṭate
vākyasya ākāśa āśraya tvāt iti attaḥ uktam mūlam iti
tathā api anumāna āśraya tvam dṛṣṭāntasya asaṃgatam liṅgasya pakṣa āśraya tvāt
tad jñānasya ca āma āśraya tvāt
atas uktam anumānam nimitta tvam āha iti
pūrva pratyakṣa dṛṣṭam iti yathāśrutam bahu ākulayati iti atas āha dṛṣṭānta iti

original: evaṃ ca satyanumānanimittatvāt pakṣasyāpi pṛthagabhidhānaṃ syāditi na codyam /
analyzed: evam ca sati anumāna nimitta tvāt pakṣasya api pṛthak abhidhānam syāt iti na codyam
siddhānta abhidhānena eva gatārtha tvāt iti
nanu śabde dṛṣṭānta apekṣā na asti eva
agniṣṭomena yajeta svarga kāmaḥ
ityādau tam antareṇa eva vākya artha pratīteḥ iti atas āha saṃbandha grahaṇa viṣayaḥ iti
saṃbandha grahaṇa viṣaya tā mātreṇa dṛṣṭānta tvam vivakṣitvā idam uktam
na punar vyāpti lakṣaṇa saṃbandha viśeṣa grahaṇa viṣaya tayā iti abhiprāyaḥ

original: yattu tatpramāṇye tadviṣayagocarānumānābhiprāyeṇa dṛṣṭāntāpekṣā āgamasyāpyastīti kaiścid vyākhyātaṃ tat pūrvaṃ jñātaṃ cārthaṃ parasmā ācaṣṭa  #
analyzed: yat tu tad pramāṇye tad viṣaya gocara anumāna abhiprāyeṇa dṛṣṭānta apekṣā āgamasya api asti iti kaiścid vyākhyātam tat pūrvam jñātam ca artham parasmai ācaṣṭa
iti vadatā vārtikakṛtā eva apāstam
atas tat upekṣitavān iti
atra artha amyupagamayoḥ guṇa pradhāna bhāvasya vivakṣā tantra tvāt artha abhyupagamaḥ abhyupagamyamānaḥ vā arthaḥ siddhāntaḥ
tena sūtra bhāṣya vārttika ṭīkāsu mithas na virodhaḥ
idam itthaṃbhūta śabdayoḥ viśeṣaṇa viśeṣya māva bhramam nivārayati idam iti iti
na tu
puruṣa viśeṣe vyavasthāpayati iti

original: vyavasthāśabdo na puruṣaviśeṣe abhyupagamaniyamamāha--kiṃ tarhyanabhyupagamasamuccayaṃ nirākurvan svarūpaniyamamityarthaḥ /
analyzed: vyavasthā śabdaḥ na puruṣa viśeṣe abhyupagama niyamam āha kim tarhi anabhyupagama samuccayam nirākurvan svarūpa niyamam iti arthaḥ
nanu vāda ādi pravṛtti artham prati tantra siddhānte eva upayujyate
tat kim aparaiḥ iti atas āha tathā iti

original: nanu yata eva sarvatantrasiddhānta na vipratipattiviṣayaḥ,
analyzed: nanu yatas eva sarva tantra siddhānta na vipratipatti viṣayaḥ
atas eva na vāda ādi pravṛtti hetuḥ iti atas āha tathā
hi iti
yadi api sva rūpeṇa sarva tantra siddhāntaḥ na vāda ādi pravṛtti aṅgam
tathā api prati tantra ādi siddhānta utthāpana dvārā nyāya āśraya tayā ca upayujyeta iti arthaḥ
etena eva prati tantra siddhānta prayojanam chalataḥ prakaṭīkṛtam
nyāyaḥ syāt
asati sarva tantra siddhānte iti śeṣaḥ
adhikaraṇa siddhānta prayojanam āha tathā iti

original: sādhyasāmānyavyāptaṃ sādhānasāmānyamiti sādhanaviśeṣāt sādhyaviśeṣaḥ kathaṃ gamyeteti yojanā /
analyzed: sādhya sāmānya vyāptam sādhāna sāmānyam iti sādhana viśeṣāt sādhya viśeṣaḥ katham gamyeta iti yojanā
ayam arthaḥ

original: adhikaraṇasiddhāntena hi phalena viṣayeṇa vā pakṣadharmatā phalavatī viṣayavatī vā syāt /
analyzed: adhikaraṇa siddhāntena hi phalena viṣayeṇa vā pakṣa dharma tā phalavatī viṣayavatī vā syāt

original: tadabhāve tu sā niṣphalā nirviṣayā vā,
analyzed: tad abhāve tu sā niṣphalā nirviṣayā vā

original: tathā ca vyāptirapi sāmānyaviṣayā satī kevalā sāmānyamātramupanīya pakṣe kathaṃ vyavasthāpayet?
analyzed: tathā ca vyāptiḥ api sāmānya viṣayā satī kevalā sāmānya mātram upanīya pakṣe katham vyavasthāpayet
a vyavasthāpya ca katham kṛtārthā syāt
tathā ca anumāna mātram ucchidyeta
evam ca kva nyāyaḥ
kva vā vā ādāyate iti

original: tasmādadhikaraṇasiddhānto 'pi pakṣadharmatāphalaviṣayatayā avaśyaṃ vyutpādanīyo yena vyāptirapi tatsahāyā satī phalavatī syāditi //
analyzed: tasmāt adhikaraṇa siddhāntaḥ api pakṣa dharmatā phala viṣaya tayā avaśyam vyutpādanīyaḥ yena vyāptiḥ api tad sahāyā satī phalavatī syāt iti
mukhyam artha gṛhītvā śaṅkate nanu iti
bhaktyā ca vṛttyā pariharati avayavāḥ iva iti
bhaktim āha yathā hi iti
kriyā udāharaṇam somena iti
soma padasya karma nāmadheya tvāt
dhātvartha mātra vivakṣayā ca karaka padāt
vastutas tu somasya api kāraka tvam eva
godohanena iti kāraka udāharaṇam
apaḥ praṇayanasya vākya antara prāpta tvāt
prātipadika artha udāharaṇam yasya iti vrātya śabdasya arthavataḥ a dhātu apratyaya rūpa tvāt

original: tathāpi na samūho vyutpādita ityata āha--tadaneneti /
analyzed: tathā api na samūhaḥ vyutpāditaḥ iti atas āha tat anena iti

original: nanu viśeṣapratyayahetavo 'vākyabhūtā api santīti anenābhiprāyeṇa pṛcchati--ka iti /
analyzed: nanu viśeṣa pratyaya hetavaḥ avākya bhūtāḥ api santi iti anena abhiprāyeṇa pṛcchati kaḥ iti

original: pratyayasya prādhānyaṃ nirākurvanneva pratyayapadopādānaprayojanamāha--na ca taditi /
analyzed: pratyayasya prādhānyam nirākurvan eva pratyaya pada upādāna prayojanam āha na ca tat iti
viśeṣaṇa asiddhim parihāran āha pratītiḥ ca iti
atha anubhavaḥ eva kasmāt na bhavati
na hi antya padam na anubhūyate eva

original: tathā sati smaryetāpi kathamityata āha--na hīti /
analyzed: tathā sati smaryeta api katham iti atas āha na hi iti

original: tathāpyevaṃbhūtasyāpi tadasya smṛtiranubhūtimantareṇa na syādityata āha--saṃbhavanti tviti /
analyzed: tathā api evaṃbhūtasya api tat asya smṛtiḥ anubhūtim antareṇa na syāt iti atas āha saṃbhavanti tu iti

original: astu tarhi tadanubhava evārthapratītyaṅgamityata āha--na caita iti /
analyzed: astu tarhi tad anubhavaḥ eva artha pratīti aṅgam iti atas āha na ca ete iti
tat anena anubhavaḥ eva artha pratyāyana aṅgam iti nirastam
anubhava smṛti samuccayam nirākaroti na ca pūrva iti
smṛtyu nabhavayoḥ tu syāt sahabhāvaḥ iti anuṣañjanīyam
etat ca upāntya antya varṇa anubhava antarāle smṛti abhyupagamena draṣṭavyam

original: yadi tu varṇānāṃ nirantarotpādavatāṃ nirantarā evānubhavāstadā vinaśyadavinaśyadavasthayoḥ upāntyāntyānubhavayoreva sahabhāvaḥ śaṅganīyaḥ,
analyzed: yadi tu varṇānām nirantara utpādavatām nirantarāḥ eva anubhavāḥ tadā vinaśyat avinaśyat avasthayoḥ upāntya antya anubhavayoḥ eva sahabhāvaḥ śaṅganīyaḥ
nirākaraṇīyaḥ ca ukta yuktyā
atas na pṛthak āśaḍkitaḥ ṭīkākṛtā

original: kāraṇasamuccayavaśād viṣayāsamuccayavataḥ pratyayasya svarūpasamuccayaṃ parasvīkṛtaṃ śaṅkate--na ca pūrveti /
analyzed: kāraṇa samuccaya vaśāt viṣaya asamuccayavataḥ pratyayasya svarūpa samuccayam para svīkṛtam śaṅkatena ca pūrva iti
nirākaroti saṃbandha iti
yadi api sahakāri lābhāt aparaḥ saṃskārasya udbodhaḥ nāma nā asti

original: tathāpi na yaḥ kaścit pratyayaḥ tasya sahakārī,
analyzed: tathā api na yaḥ kaścid pratyayaḥ tasya sahakārī
sarvadā sarva saṃskāra udvodhe sarva smṛti prasaṅgāt
nā api saḍketa viśeṣa smaraṇe pada eka deśa varṇa anubhavaḥ tad saṃskārasya sahakārī
tathā sati atiprasaṅgāt
tasmāt pada tvena pratisandhānam eva samaya smṛti hetu saṃskārasya
sahakārī iti upagantavyam

original: tathā caikapraghaṭṭakenāpi vicitrajñānena viṣayīkṛto varṇāḥ khaṇḍaśaḥ padabhāvena pratisandheyāḥ,
analyzed: tathā ca eka praghaṭṭakena api vicitra jñānena viṣayīkṛtaḥ varṇāḥ khaṇḍaśas pada bhāvena pratisandheyāḥ
artha saṃbaddha tvena smartavyāḥ iti kutas iti arthaḥ
prakriyā ta
antya varṇa anubhavasya utpādaḥ
tad saṃskāra pada tva pratisandhānayoḥ u utpadyamāna tā iti ekaḥ kālaḥ
atha tayoḥ utpādaḥ

original: sa eva padapratisandhānotpādātmā samayasaṃskārodbodhaḥ saṃbandhasmaraṇasyotpadyamānatā saṃskārodbodhād vicitrapratyayasya vinaśyattetyekaḥ
analyzed: saḥ eva pada pratisandhāna utpāda ātmā samaya saṃskāra udbodhaḥ saṃbandha smaraṇasya utpadyamāna tā saṃskāra udbodhāt vicitra pratyayasya vinaśyat tā iti ekaḥ

original: atha saṃbandhasmaraṇotpādaḥ vicitrapratyayasya vināśaḥ padatvānusaṃdhānasya vinaśyattetyekaḥ kālaḥ /
analyzed: atha saṃbandha smaraṇa utpādaḥ vicitra pratyayasya vināśaḥ pada tva anusaṃdhānasya vinaśyat tā iti ekaḥ kālaḥ
na ca etat adṛṣṭam kalpanam iti āha atas eva iti
nanu eka praghaṭṭakena vicitra pratyayaḥ eva anusaṃghāna ātmā bhaviṣyati
kariṣyati ca samaya smṛtim tathāvidhām
atha api
pūrva smṛtiḥ aśeṣa pada avagāhinī ekā eva svīkartavyā iti atas āha evam ca iti
anubhūtam hi pratisaṃdhīyate
na tam prathamatas eva

original: tathā ca pūrvavarṇāṇāmunabhūtatvena padatvānusaṃdhānasaṃbhave 'pi antyavarṇasyānanubhūtatayā nāntyapadapratisaṃdhānasaṃbhavaḥ /
analyzed: tathā ca pūrva varṇāṇām una bhūta tvena pada tva anusaṃdhāna saṃbhave api antya varṇasya ananubhūta tayā na antya pada pratisaṃdhāna saṃbhavaḥ
na ca anubhava anusaṃdhānayoḥ eka kāla tā
kārya kāraṇa bhāvāt
tasmāt tad anantaram eva pada tva anusaṃdhānam iti suṣṭhu uktam

original: yadā padārthapratyāyane 'nubhavo na kāraṇamiti tadaupayikasmṛtyutpattau tu kāraṇameveti /
analyzed: yadā padārtha pratyāyane anubhavaḥ na kāraṇam iti tad aupayika smṛti utpattau tu kāraṇam eva iti
avadhāraṇa ādi iti atra ādi śabdena taṣām smaraṇam vivakṣitam

original: prakaraṇādayastu yogyatāviśeṣatvāt tatraivāntarbhūtā iti tata eva vākyārthapratīterūpapatteḥ,
analyzed: prakaraṇa ādayaḥ tu yogyatā viśeṣa tvāt tatra eva antarbhūtāḥ iti tatas eva vākya artha pratīteḥ ūpapatteḥ
anupapattau tu asiddhiḥ lakṣaṇasya doṣaḥ iti āśayaḥ
nanu krama anubhūtānām api eka smṛti samārohaḥ saṃbhavati eva

original: kiṃ tu padāni krameṇāpi nānubhūtānītyata uktam--nirantareti,
analyzed: kim tu padāni krameṇa api na anubhūtāni iti atas uktam nirantara iti
nirantara smṛtibhiḥ viṣayīkṛtāni tatas eka smṛti saṅkalitāni iti arthaḥ
nairantaryam ca smṛtīnām sannikarṣāt boddhavyam
nanu etāvatā api asiddham eva lakṣaṇam
na hi evaṃbhūtam api antya padam viśeṣa pratipatti hetuḥ iti āśayavān āha syāt etat iti

original: nanu pratyekaṃ vyabhicāre hi parasparānugrahaḥ syāt /
analyzed: nanu pratyekam vyabhicāre hi paraspara anugrahaḥ syāt

original: na ca padakadambakapratisaṃdhānavat tadarthasmṛtirapi tathāvidhāṃ vākyārthapratyayotpatti prati vyabhicaratītyata āha--etaduktaṃ bhavatīti
analyzed: na ca pada kadambaka pratisaṃdhāna vat tad artha smṛtiḥ api tathāvidhām vākya artha pratyaya utpatti prati vyabhicarati iti atas āha etat uktam bhavati iti
ayam āśayaḥ

original: na tāvat tadārthā eva vākyārthe pramāṇam,
analyzed: na tāvat tadā arthāḥ eva vākya arthe pramāṇam
sarvadā tad pratīti prasaṅgāt
na api te eva smṛtāḥ
prakāra antareṇa api smṛtānām tathā bhāva prasaṅgāt
na api te eva padaiḥ smāritāḥ
padānām padārtha smaraṇa mātra upayoge pūrva vat pratīti prasaṅgāt

original: vākyārthapratītyupayoge tu teṣāṃ kathaṃ na taddhetutvam /
analyzed: vākya artha pratīti upayoge tu teṣām katham na tad hetu tvam
tathā api guṇa pradhāna bhāva vinagimanāyām kaḥ hetuḥ iti
ced asādhāraṇa kāraṇa tvam padānām
tad arthānām tu atīta anāgata ādi rūpatayā kāraṇa tvam eva na asti
kutas
atas eva na smṛtiḥ teṣām vyāpāraḥ
kim tu kāraṇībhūtānām padānām eva

original: tathā ca vyāpārāvyabhicāramādāya nirvyāpārāvasthāyā vyabhicāravatāmakāraṇatvābhyupagamo bahuvyākulayatīti //
analyzed: tathā ca vyāpāra avyabhicāram ādāya nirvyāpāra avasthāyāḥ vyabhicāravatām akāraṇa tva abhyupagamaḥ bahu vyākulayati iti
pratisandhīyamānaḥ iti vārttika nirākaraṇīyam ativyāpaka tvam darśayati yadi iti
niṣpatteḥ bhedam darśayitum punar
siddhiḥ vyākhyānam anuvadati vāstavaḥ iti

original: na hi pratijñāvacanaṃ niśvāyakaṃ viśiṣṭasyeti śeṣaḥ /
analyzed: na hi pratijñā vacanam niśvāyakam viśiṣṭasya iti śeṣaḥ
hetu vacana ādi vaiyarthyāt
vaiyarthya prasaṅgāt
sādhanasya nyāyaḥ pravṛtti prakāraḥ
sa ca na anupalabdhaḥ ityādi bhāṣye darśitaḥ
tasya atipātaḥ abhāvaḥ eva
tam eva vyutpādayet pradhāna tayā iti śeṣaḥ
tasya ca nyāya viṣeṣasya ātma ādi viṣayasya iti arthaḥ
alaukika upacāra tvāt prayojanam āha āgama upacārasya iti
artha saṃvādena iti karaṇe tṛtīyā
āgama virodha śaṅgā nivṛttiḥ anugrahaḥ
dṛḍha bhūmiḥ ca saṃskāraḥ āgama eka viṣaya tvāt

original: saprayojanaśca bhavati niḥśreyasena prayojanena prayojanavāṃśca jñāto bhavatītyarthaḥ /
analyzed: sa prayojanaḥ ca bhavati niḥśreyasena prayojanena prayojanavān ca jñātaḥ bhavati iti arthaḥ
kutas
āgama artha jñānasya iti
nirūḍha tvāt prasiddha tvāt iti arthaḥ

original: tat khalu hetuvacanamanumānapratipādakaṃ parāmṛśyamānaliṅgapratipādakaṃ yadi syāt,
analyzed: tat khalu hetu vacanam anumāna pratipādakam parāmṛśyamāna liṅga pratipādakam yadi syāt
tadā viṣaya tayā anumānena parāmṛśyamānena liḍgena anugrahītavyam

original: na ca tasya parāmṛśyamānaṃ liṅga viṣaya iti bhāvaḥ //
analyzed: na ca tasya parāmṛśyamānam liṅga viṣayaḥ iti bhāvaḥ

original: nanu yadeva dṛśyamānaṃ liḍgaṃ hetuvacanasya viṣayaḥ,
analyzed: nanu yat eva dṛśyamānam liḍgam hetuvacanasya viṣayaḥ
tat eva anumiti bhāvakam iti atas āha na ca liṅga darśana mātram iti
dṛśyamāna liṅga mātram iti
api tu saṃbandha smṛti sahakāri iti parāmṛśyamānam liṅgam iti arthaḥ
tat idam uktam tasmāt na liṅga vacanam anumāna pratipādakam iti

original: dvitīyadaśanaviṣayaliḍgaṃ pratipādakaṃ na parāmṛśyamānaṃ liḍgaṃ pratipādakamityarthaḥ /
analyzed: dvitīya daśana viṣaya liḍgam pratipādakam na parāmṛśyamānam liḍgam pratipādakam iti arthaḥ
vyākhyānam grantha anurodhāt asphuṭam iti āśayavān āha etat uktam bhavati iti
evam ca tad pratipādakasya tad viṣaya pratipādakasya iti arthaḥ
liṅga parāmarśaḥ tāvat anumānam
tasya ca
vyāpti smṛti sahakāri tā anumitau
dvitīya a liṅga darśanasya api vyāpti smṛti sahakāri tā parāmarśa jñāna janane eva iti ubhayoḥ api saṃbandha smṛti sahakāri tā sāmyāt anumāna tvam
tatas tad viṣaya liṅgasya api
tatas tad anugṛhītasya tad vacanasya api iti arthaḥ
kim asya upacārasya phalam iti atas āha evam ca iti

original: nanu pratyakṣaviṣayasya smṛtitaḥ punarūpadarśanāditi vaktavye kuto viparītamabhihitamityata āha--yatreti /
analyzed: nanu pratyakṣa viṣayasya smṛtitaḥ punar ūpa darśanāt iti vaktavye kutas viparītam abhihitam iti atas āha yatra iti
yadi api pūrva pratyakṣa viṣayaḥ dṛṣṭāntaḥ

original: tathāpyudāharaṇakāle tayāsmṛtyārūḍha eva vyāpriyata ityetāvatā tathaivoktamityarthaḥ /
analyzed: tathā api udāharaṇa kāle tayā asmṛtyā ārūḍhaḥ eva vyāpriyate iti etāvatā tathā eva uktam iti arthaḥ
na kevalam pratyakṣeṇa saha eka viṣaya tvam upacāre bījam
api tu samāna vyāpāra tvam api iti āha punar ūpa darśanāt panuḥ smaraṇāt

original: pratyakṣamapi hi vipratipatti paribhūya vyāptiviṣayatayā dṛṣṭāntaṃ smārayati--tadvacanamapīti /
analyzed: pratyakṣam api hi vipratipatti paribhūya vyāpti viṣaya tayā dṛṣṭāntam smārayati tat vacanam api iti
aparam api bījam āha mūla bhūta iti
nanu yathā śabda tad arthayoḥ upanaye vārttā api nā asti
tat katham āha yathā tathā iti
atas āha aupanayaḥ hi iti
yadi api nigamane api pramāṇa viśeṣa samāveśaḥ asti eva
tathā api jāti abhiprāyeṇa ayam vivakṣitaḥ

original: na ca tatra catuṣṭavijātīyaṃ pramāṇamastītyatastadvyākhyānāt pūrvameva paramatvopapādanāya samastapramāṇaviniveśanamāha---so 'yamiti //
analyzed: na ca tatra pramāṇam asti iti atas tad vyākhyānāt pūrvam eva parama tva upapādanāya samasta pramāṇa viniveśanam āha saḥ ayam iti
mūla samavāya abhāvāt aupacārikaḥ samavāyaḥ bhaviṣyati iti atas uktam pramāṇānām vā iti

original: adhyāropo viniveśanaṃ vā bhrāntirvā na saṃbhavatītyata āha--adhyāropa iti /
analyzed: adhyāropaḥ viniveśanam vā bhrāntiḥ vā na saṃbhavati iti atas āha adhyāropaḥ iti
samārthya hi iti

original: tadanena kiṃ punaḥ samarthyamiti pṛcchato 'bhisandhiḥ darśitaḥ /
analyzed: tat anena kim punar samarthyam iti pṛcchataḥ abhisandhiḥ darśitaḥ
uttara abhisandhim āha eha tu iti
sāmarthya ākāṅkṣayoḥ paraspara vyāpteḥ ākāṅkṣā eva sāmarthya śabdena iha vivakṣitā iti arthaḥ
tat eva rūpayoḥ samavāya sāmarthyayoḥ pradarśanena phalam darśayati tat atra iti
prayojana abhede api ākāṅkṣā virahita tvāt vākya eka vākya tvam na bhavati
yathā
bhagaḥ vām vibhajatu
pūṣā vām vibhajata
aryamā vām vibhajatu ityādi
atas uktam vibhajyamānā iti
ākāḍkṣāyām api vākya eka vākya tvam na bhavati
yathā

original: syonaṃ te sadanaṃ kṛṇomi ghutasya dhārayā suśevaṃ kalpayāmi ityādi /
analyzed: syonam te sadanam kṛṇomi ghutasya dhārayā su śevam kalpayāmi ityādi
atas uktam ekam prayojanam iti
tat enena
artha eka tvāt ekam vākyam sa ākāḍkṣam ced vibhāge syāt
iti jaiminīya vākya ekavākyatā lakṣaṇam abhimatam

original: nanu yadi vipratipannaḥ vākyenaiva paraḥ pratibodhayituṃ śakyate,
analyzed: nanu yadi vipratipannaḥ vākyena eva paraḥ pratibodhayitum śakyate

original: atha vākye tadarthe vā vipratipadyamānaḥ kenopāyena bodhanīyaḥ?
analyzed: atha vākye tad arthe vā vipratipadyamānaḥ kena upāyena bodhanīyaḥ
vākya antareṇa ced anavasthā iti atas āha yadi api iti
ananyathā asiddha pratyakṣa āgama agocara abhiprāyam etat iti arthaḥ
vikalpaḥ anuvāda viśeṣaḥ
tasya prayojanam vidhiḥ pratiṣedhaḥ vā
atra ca ākṣepa avasare pratiṣadhaḥ eva
viśeṣa pratipādaka tvam iti vadatā tattva vyavasthā āśraya tvam vivṛtam
tatra tattvam viśeṣaḥ
tasya pratipattiḥ vyavasthā
tad hetu tvam āśraya tvam

original: tatra viśeṣaḥ ka ityata uktama--dharmaviśiṣṭo dharmoti /
analyzed: tatra viśeṣaḥ kaḥ iti atas uktam adharma viśiṣṭaḥ

original: vākyāddhi sādhanadharmaviśiṣṭo dharmo sākṣāt pratīyate sādhyarūpadharmaviśiṣṭastu taddvāretyubhayamapi vivakṣitvā saṃmugdhamuktamiti //
analyzed: vākyāt hi sādhana dharma viśiṣṭaḥ sākṣāt pratīyate sādhya rūpa dharma viśiṣṭaḥ tu tad dvārā iti ubhayam api vivakṣitvā saṃmugdham uktam iti

original: nanu pramāṇāntaratve 'pi tarkasya pramāṇapadena saṃgraha eva sāmānyena viśeṣasya saṃkalanāt,
analyzed: nanu pramāṇa antara tve api tarkasya pramāṇa padena saṃgrahaḥ eva sāmānyena viśeṣasya saṃkalanāt
tat kim iti āhana
pramāṇa antaram iti

original: ata āha--pramāṇapadena hīti dṛṣṭo hi sāmānyaśabdenāpi kasyacidasaṃgrahaḥ kutaścit kāraṇādityabhisandhiḥ /
analyzed: atas āha pramāṇa padena hi iti dṛṣṭaḥ hi sāmānya śabdena api kasyacid asaṃgrahaḥ kutaścid kāraṇāt iti abhisandhiḥ

original: ata eva pramāṇāntaratvaśaḍkāyāṃ saṃgṛhītebhyo viśeṣebhyo 'nyatvamuktvā prameyaṃ dṛṣṭāntatvenopāttam /
analyzed: atas eva pramāṇa antara tva śaḍkāyām saṃgṛhītebhyaḥ viśeṣebhyaḥ anya tvam uktvā prameyam dṛṣṭānta tvena upāttam
a niśrvāyaka tvāt
svātantryeṇa iti śeṣaḥ
kim tu pramāṇa viṣaya vibhāga hetutayā iti
yasya
pramāṇasya iyam itikartavya tā tadīya viṣaye tad apekṣa tvāt iti arthaḥ
etat uktam bhavati

original: tarko hi pramārūpaṃ vā pramāṇaṃ syāt liṅgadarśanavat,
analyzed: tarkaḥ hi pramā rūpam vā pramāṇam syāt liṅga darśana vat
a pramā rūpam vā indriya ādi vat
na tāvat ādyaḥ
tasya āhārya āropa rūpa tvāt
atas eva na tad karaṇasya api prāmāṇyam apramā phala tvāt
na api dvitīyaḥ
sva viṣaya vyāpya viṣaryaye hi asya prāmāṇyam āśāḍrikatam
tena ca na asya niyāmakaḥ saṃbandhaḥ
asaṃbaddhasya gamaka tve atiprasaṅgaḥ

original: tadviparyayasya tu tena saha svābhāvikaḥ saṃbandho 'sti /
analyzed: tad viparyayasya tu tena saha svābhāvikaḥ saṃbandhaḥ asti
tena tad saṃvalitasya pravṛtteḥ tad itikartavya tā tvam eva

original: na hi viparyayāparyavasitaṃ kvacidapi kṛtārthaṃ prasaṅgamīkṣāmahe //
analyzed: na hi viparyaya aparyavasitam kvacid api kṛtārtham prasaṅgam īkṣāmahe

original: nanvevaṃ tarhi pramāṇasyāpi kevalasya na kvacidapi kṛtārthatvam /
analyzed: nanu evam tarhi pramāṇasya api kevalasya na kvacid api kṛtārtha tvam

original: tathā ca sati prasaṅgatadviparyayapiṇḍa eva pramāṇyaṃ paryavasyet /
analyzed: tathā ca sati prasaṅga tad viparyaya piṇḍaḥ eva pramāṇyam paryavasyet
evam etat sa itikartavya tākasya eva sarvatra karaṇa tvāt
itikartavya tā tadvat bhāva kalpanāyām tu ayam vibhāgaḥ
tat idam vakṣyati tasya prasaṅga rūpa tayā pāratantryeṇa svayam asādhāka tvāt iti
prasaṃjanīyasya pramāṇa viruddha tvena aniṣṭa tvam ayukta tvam
sādhanīyasya pramāṇa aviruddha tvena iṣṭatvam yuktatvam
tena ayam arthaḥ vārttikasya
yadi evam na abhaviṣyat tadā evam yukta tvam ahāsyat
idam ca ayuktatvam upādāsyata iti atas āha etikāreṇa iti
tatas
vārttikena avirodhaḥ
bhāṣyam tu prasaṃge sphuṭam eva

original: nanu bhavatīti pramāṇavyāpārāt prāgeva yadi niścitam,
analyzed: nanu bhavati iti pramāṇa vyāpārāt prāk eva yadi niścitam

original: tadā tarkaḥ pramāṇameva syādityata āha-- saṃbhavatīti /
analyzed: tadā tarkaḥ pramāṇam eva syāt iti atas āha saṃbhavati iti
saṃbhāvanā ca iha avirodha mātram
na tu saṃśayaḥ
ayukta aṃśasya api saṃśaya āspada tvāt
anujñā ca iyam eva yat pravartamāna pramāṇa anukūla tvena avasthānam
tat āha etat uktam bhavati iti
anujānan tad viruddha dharma vyudāsa rūpeṇa a virodhayan iti arthaḥ
anugṛhṇāti savyāpārīkaroti iti arthaḥ

original: tadviṣayapramāṇānukūlyena tarkasyāpi tadviṣayatvamiti bhrāntimāśaḍkya nirākaroti--na ceti /
analyzed: tad viṣaya pramāṇa ānukūlyena tarkasya api tad viṣaya tvam iti bhrāntim āśaḍkya nirākaroti na ca iti
pāratantryeṇa viparyaya paratantra tayā iti arthaḥ
āropa rūpa tām upadarśaman eva sva viṣaya dvārā api asya prāmāṇyam nirācaṣṭe asti hi iti
na prasaḍgaḥ hetuḥ na prasajyamānaḥ
hetuḥ liṅgam asiddha tvāt iti arthaḥ

original: nanu na hi yadeva vidyate tadeva dṛśyata ityasti niyama ityata āha--tena saheti /
analyzed: nanu na hi yat eva vidyate tat eva dṛśyate iti asti niyamaḥ iti atas āha tena saha iti

original: tasmāt nāstīti phaladvāreṇa tarkasyānugrāhyaṃ pramāṇaṃ darśitam /
analyzed: tasmāt na asti iti phala dvāreṇa tarkasya anugrāhyam pramāṇam darśitam
tena anujñāyamānam pramāṇam pravartate phalam sādhayati
phalam āha kevalam eva idam iti
kaivalya svarūpa vipratipatteḥ tat vivṛṇoti na iha iti

original: tadevamabhāvaviṣaye pratyakṣe 'pi tarkaṃ darśayatā anupalabdhiliṅgakānumānasya sādhyo 'bhāva iti saugatamatamapāstam /
analyzed: tat evam abhāva viṣaye pratyakṣe api tarkam darśayatā anupalabdhi liṅgaka anumānasya sādhyaḥ abhāvaḥ iti saugata matam apāstam
anupalabdheḥ api niṣedha rūpa tayā anumāna antara sādhya tāyām anavasthānāt
asiddhāyāḥ ca āgamaka tvāt
pratyakṣataḥ tad siddhau tu anumāna anavakāśāt
vyavahārasya api vikalpa anugata vyāpārāt pratyakṣataḥ eva saddhi tvāt
anyathā vidhi vyavahāra artham api upalabdhi liṅgakam anumānam āstheyam
evam ca punar api anavasthā eva
na hi liṅgam api a vyavahniyamāṇam eva anumitim bhāvayet
tasmāt vidhi vyavahāra vat niṣedha vyavahāraḥ api pratyakṣa siddhaḥ eva

original: vipratipannaṃ prati tu parīkṣakaistarkaḥ sahāyatvenopaneya iti ramaṇīyam /
analyzed: vipratipannam prati tu parīkṣakaiḥ tarkaḥ sahāya tvena upaneyaḥ iti ramaṇīyam
āgama sahāyam tarkam āha evam svarga iti

original: yajetetyatra samānapadopāttatvād bhāvyatvācca dhātvarthaḥ sādhyo bhavatu,
analyzed: yajeta iti atra samāna pada upātta tvāt bhāvya tvāt ca dhātvarthaḥ sādhyaḥ bhavatu
bhavatu

original: vā puruṣārthatvāt svarga iti saṃśaye tarkasyāvatāraḥ /
analyzed: vā puruṣa artha tvāt svargaḥ iti saṃśaye tarkasya avatāraḥ
yadi sādhyaḥ dhātvarthaḥ syāt

original: tadopadeṣṭurāptatvaṃ vidheśceṣṭopāyatvaṃ vākyasya tadabhidhāyakatvaṃ prekṣāvatā ca pravṛttirna syāt /
analyzed: tadā upadeṣṭuḥ āpta tvam vidheḥ ca iṣṭa upāya tvam vākyasya tad abhidhāyaka tvam prekṣāvatā ca pravṛttiḥ na syāt
asti ca etat sarvam pramāṇataḥ siddham iti arthaḥ
anujñāyamānam pramāṇam āha samāna pada iti

original: na hi yāgabhāvanāyāḥ svargaphalatve dhātvarthasyātatphalatve samānapadopāttattvabhāvyatvayoḥ kaścid vidodhaḥ /
analyzed: na hi yāga bhāvanāyāḥ svarga phala tve dhātvarthasya a tad phala tve samāna pada upātta tva bhāvya tvayoḥ kaścid vidodhaḥ
tasmāt tad avirodhena svarga phala tvam yuktam
dhātvarthasya ca sādhya tvam viruddha tayā ayuktam iti arthaḥ

original: nanu pramāṇānugrahāya yuktatvāyuktatve vivecayati tarko na tu niścinoti iti kuto viśeṣādityata āha--na ceti /
analyzed: nanu pramāṇa anugrahāya yukta tva ayukta tve vivecayati tarkaḥ na tu niścinoti iti kutas viśeṣāt iti atas āha na ca iti
kriyā atipattiḥ iti

original: kriyātipattiḥ pratyayopasthāpite ghaṭasattvadhātvarthasādhyatve eva kriyātipattiśabdena vivakṣite,
analyzed: kriyā atipattiḥ pratyaya upasthāpite ghaṭa sattva dhātvartha sādhya tve eva kriyā atipatti śabdena vivakṣite

original: na hyevaṃbhūtapratyayāviṣayo ghaṭo vā sādhyatayā dhātvartho vāstītyarthaḥ /
analyzed: na hi evaṃbhūta pratyaya aviṣayaḥ ghaṭaḥ vā sādhyatayā dhātvarthaḥ vā asti iti arthaḥ
kim atas yadi evam iti atas āha yad āśraya iti

original: yasminnāśraye tulyopalambhayogyatvena duḥkhatvena vā aniṣṭaprasaṃjakena hetunā upapannastarko yuktāyuktaviṣayaviścayasādhanaṃ
analyzed: yasmin āśraye tulya upalambha yogya tvena duḥkha tvena vā aniṣṭa prasaṃjakena hetunā upapannaḥ tarkaḥ yukta ayukta viṣaya viścaya sādhanam
bhaviṣyati saḥ eva na asti iti arthaḥ
tat anena prasajyamānasya āśraya asiddhi sādhana asiddhī dirśite
pūrvam tu svarūpa asiddhiḥ darśitā
tasmāt āropa tvāt na sva viṣaye pramāṇam sva viṣaya vyāpya viparyaye niyāmaka abhāvāt ca

original: niyatasaṃbaddhasvaviṣaye viparyayāpekṣitve tu pāratantryāt na pramāṇamityarthaḥ /
analyzed: niyata saṃbaddha sva viṣaye viparyaya apekṣi tve tu pāratantryāt na pramāṇam iti arthaḥ
tarhi kva asya upayogaḥ iti atas āha niśrayāya tu iti

original: nanu tarkapramāṇayorabhimataṃ bhedaṃ mīmāṃsāyā vedādabhedavādo virūṇaddhītyata āha--pramāṇeti /
analyzed: nanu tarka pramāṇayoḥ abhimatam bhedam mīmāṃsāyāḥ vedāt abheda vādaḥ virūṇaddhi iti atas āha pramāṇa iti
atha yathāśrute eva
vārttika arthaḥ kā asmāt na bhavati iti atas āha aitikarttavya tā tvam ca ityādinā
nikāya viśiṣṭābhiḥ r ityasya vyākhyānasya
śarīra indriyāṇām śukra śoṇita ādeḥ āhāra ādi bhūta kārya tvāt
tad kārya tvāt ca buddhi vedanayoḥ nimitta antare pramāṇam na asti iti tātparyam

original: vicitranimittatve sādhye bhedavatvāditi hetuḥ svarūpābhiprāyeṇānaikāntikaḥ syāt svarūpabhedavatāmapi
analyzed: vicitra nimitta tve sādhye bhedava tvāt iti hetuḥ svarūpa abhiprāyeṇa anaikāntikaḥ syāt svarūpa bhedavatām api
ghaṭa ādīnām avicitra nimitta tvāt atas prakāra abhiprāyeṇa vyācaṣṭe vicitra tvāt iti arthaḥ iti
vaicitryeṇa utpādāt iti arthaḥ
nanu nimitta vaicitrya mātra prasādhane siddha sādhanam

original: na hi nimittaṃ kiścid vicitram astītyetāvataiva dharmādharmasiddhiḥ,
analyzed: na hi nimittam kiścid vicitram asti iti etāvatā eva dharma adharma siddhiḥ

original: dharmādharmalakṣaṇavicitranimittasādhanena tu nānvayo na vyatireka ityata āha--pramāṇamuktveti /
analyzed: dharma adharma lakṣaṇa vicitra nimitta sādhanena tu na anvayaḥ na vyatirekaḥ iti atas āha pramāṇam uktvā iti

original: nimittasya vaicitrye janmano vaivitryagrasaṅgaḥ nimittasyāvaicitrye janmano 'vaicitryaprasaṅgaḥ /
analyzed: nimittasya vaicitrye janmanaḥ vaivitrya grasaṅgaḥ nimittasya avaicitrye janmanaḥ avaicitrya prasaṅgaḥ
yāga ādīnām eva nimitta tve niranvaya pradhvastāt kārya utpatti prasaṃgaḥ
nimittasya nitya tve kāryasya sadātana tva prasaṃgaḥ
aneka dravya tve abhyudaya sādhāraṇa tva prasaṃgaḥ
sādhāraṇa eka dravya tve api eva doṣaḥ

original: emistarkaiḥ pakṣadharmatāmupajīvya pravṛttairanugṛhyamāṇaṃ sāmānyavyāptibalapravṛttaṃ vaicitryānumānaṃ viśeṣavirodhaṃ paribhūyābhimataṃ viśeṣaṃ  #
analyzed: emiḥ tarkaiḥ pakṣa dharmatām upajīvya pravṛttaiḥ anugṛhyamāṇam sāmānya vyāpti bala pravṛttam vaicitrya anumānam viśeṣa virodham paribhūya abhimatam viśeṣam
sādhayati iti arthaḥ
nanu jātyā kim phala nirṇayaḥ na asti eva
yena kāla viśeṣam pṛcchati kadā punar iti atas abhiprāyam āha syāt etat iti

original: nanu nirṇayopādānaprayojane vaktavye nirṇītaprayojanasya tarkasya punarāvṛttau kiṃ tātparyamityata āha--saṃkalayyeti /
analyzed: nanu nirṇaya upādāna prayojane vaktavye nirṇīta prayojanasya tarkasya punarāvṛttau kim tātparyam iti atas āha saṃkalayya iti
saṃkalanayā ubhayoḥ avinābhāvaḥ vivakṣitaḥ iti arthaḥ
sva siddhānta anurūpam sādhanam dūpaṇam ca āhatuḥ iti sva ādhya para sādhyayoḥ yathāsaṃkhyam

original: nanu yadyapi sarvatra jalpe nirṇayāvasānatvameva nāsti kvacidanirṇaye 'pi puruṣāparādhataḥ kathāvicchedāt,
analyzed: nanu yadi api sarvatra jalpe nirṇaya avasāna tvam eva nā asti kvacid anirṇaye api puruṣa aparādhataḥ kathā vicchedāt
tathā api yatra nirṇaya avasāna tvam asti

original: na tato jalpādanyatarādhikaraṇanirṇayāvasānatvena vādo vyavacchetuṃ śakyate /
analyzed: na tatas jalpāt anyatara adhikaraṇa nirṇaya avasāna tvena vādaḥ vyavacchetum śakyate
na ca sarva vāda vyāptiḥ
nirṇayasya vāda phala tvāt
phalasya ca upāya avyāpaka tvāt iti atas āha vāde hi iti
nirṇayāḥ vasāna tā hi tad yogya tā abhipretā

original: sā ca vivadamānayoḥ tattvabubhutsutayā tamuddhiśya pravṛttiḥ /
analyzed: sā ca vivadamānayoḥ tattva bubhutsu tayā tam uddhiśya pravṛttiḥ
tat idam uktam
tatva bubhutsoḥ vādinoḥ vāde adhikārāt iti
tat ayam arthaḥ
tattva nirṇayam uddhiśya tayoḥ sādhana dūṣaṇa vacana saṃdarbhaḥ vādaḥ iti
evam ca na avyāptiḥ na vā atiprasaṅgaḥ

original: jalpaḥ punaḥ kīdṛśa ityata āha--jalpe tviti /
analyzed: jalpaḥ punar kīdṛśaḥ iti atas āha jalpe tu iti
puruṣa śakti iti uddeśyam āha
tat ayam arthaḥ
bhavatu nāma kvacid jalpataḥ api tattva nirṇayaḥ
tathā api na asau addeśyaḥ na ca śraddheyaḥ
sva śakti parā śakti khyāpana mātram uddeśyam iti
tasmāt anyatara nirṇaya avasāna tvena iti
nirṇaya avasāna abhiprāyeṇa iti arthaḥ
nanu jalpa vitaṇḍayoḥ vāda viśeṣa tve katham sāmānya viśeṣayoḥ parisaṃkhyā samabhivyāhāraḥ

original: kathaṃ ca parasparaviruddhayoḥ sāmānyaviśeṣabhāvo 'pītyata āha--viśiṣyete iti /
analyzed: katham ca paraspara viruddhayoḥ sāmānya viśeṣa bhāvaḥ api iti atas āha viśiṣyete iti
aparam api bheda hetum āha vādāt jalpa vitaṇḍayoḥ iti śeṣaḥ

original: pūrvaṃ vādavyākhyānāvasare bhede heturuddeśyaviśeṣābhisandhiruktaḥ tadapekṣayā aparamapīti /
analyzed: pūrvam vāda vyākhyāna avasare bhede hetuḥ uddeśya viśeṣa abhisandhiḥ uktaḥ tad apekṣayā aparam api iti

original: yau tau vādajalpayoḥ prayoktātau tāvekatrāvijigīṣayā anyatra vijigīṣayā viśeṣitau vādajalpau parasparato vyavacchindāte ityarthaḥ //
analyzed: yau tau vāda jalpayoḥ tau ekatra avijigīṣayā anyatra vijigīṣayā viśeṣitau vāda jalpau parasparataḥ vyavacchindāte iti arthaḥ

original: dūṣayitum ekadeśivyākhyānaṃ tanmatena vyācaṣṭe iti yojyam /
analyzed: dūṣayitum eka deśi vyākhyānam tad matena vyācaṣṭe iti yojyam
ubhayathā api anaikāntika tvāt iti

original: yadyapi vyabhicārādarśane 'pi avinābhāvo na sidhyati pṛthagabhidhānasya puruṣecchādhīnatvāt,
analyzed: yadi api vyabhicāra adarśane api avinābhāvaḥ na sidhyati pṛthak abhidhānasya puruṣa icchā adhīna tvāt
vāde codanīya tvasya ca an udbhāvane tattva pratipatti vyāghāta hetu tva prayukta tvāt

original: tathāpi vyabhicārasya sphuṭatvāt sa eva darśitaḥ /
analyzed: tathā api vyabhicārasya sphuṭa tvāt saḥ eva darśitaḥ

original: tasmād vāde codanīyā bhaviṣyantītyanena pṛthagabhidhānaprayojanamātraṃ pratipāditam /
analyzed: tasmāt vāde codanīyāḥ bhaviṣyanti iti anena pṛthak abhidhāna prayojana mātram pratipāditam
hetu tvam punar avivarkṣitam eva tārkikaṃmanyena ekadeśinā āropitām iti arthaḥ
nanu evaṃrūpa prayojana lābhaḥ api katham
na hi pṛthak abhidhāna mātram atra pramāṇayitum śakyam iti atas āha sāmānyena iti
sāmānyaḥ abhihitam viśeṣataḥ abhidadhatā sūtrakṛtā prayojana viśeṣaḥ sūcitaḥ
saḥ eva bhāṣyakṛtā darśitaḥ iti arthaḥ
atha yadi etat eva vivakṣitam asya sūtrakṛtaḥ

original: tadā kimiti na kvacit śāstrapradeśe svayameva darśitavānityata āha--etāvāneveti /
analyzed: tadā kim iti na kvacid śāstra pradeśe svayam eva darśitavān iti atas āha etāvān eva iti
atha bhāṣyakāreṇa katham idam unnītam iti atas āha tatra iti
kim evam api iti
kim anena pratipāditena phalam iti arthaḥ
nanu agrevāde codanīya tvam eva pratipādayati
iha tu vidyā prasthāna bheda jñāpana artha tvam varṇayati

original: tat kuto na virodha ityata āha--vādajalpavitaṇḍā ityādi /
analyzed: tat kutas na virodhaḥ iti atas āha vāda jalpa vitaṇḍāḥ ityādi
atra eva arthe sūcakam vārttikam āha atas eva iti
ayam arthaḥ

original: yadi vidyāśabdenāsya vādādayo na vivakṣitāḥ kathamagre vādavyāpāraṃ darśayitvā jalpavitaṇḍayoḥ sarvāṇyeva nigrahasthānāni vyāpāratvenāha?
analyzed: yadi vidyā śabdena asya vāda ādayaḥ na vivakṣitāḥ katham agre vāda vyāpāram darśayitvā jalpa vitaṇḍayoḥ sarvāṇi eva nigrahasthānāni vyāpāra tvena āha

original: tad yadayameva brūte nūnamayamasyārtho vivakṣita iti /
analyzed: tat yat ayam eva brūte nūnam ayam asya arthaḥ vivakṣitaḥ iti
tat ayam tātparya saṃkṣapaḥ
na tāvat ajñāta svarūpa vat ajñāta vyāpāra phala bhedāḥ vāda ādayaḥ cetanena adhiṣṭātum śakyante
na ca an adhiṣṭhibhyaḥ phala siddhiḥ

original: tasmāt svarūpavad vyāpāraphalabheda apyamīṣāṃ pratipādanīyā bhavanti /
analyzed: tasmāt sva rūpa vat vyāpāra phala bhedaḥ api amīṣām pratipādanīyāḥ bhavanti
atas eva caturthe phalam api darśayiṣyati
sūtra kāraḥ
prayujyeran saṃbhāvyeran iti

original: na tu teṣāmasti saṃbhavati prayoga iti /
analyzed: na tu teṣām asti saṃbhavati prayogaḥ iti
nanu lakṣaṇena padārtha svarūpam na vyavasthāpyate
api tu vyavasthitam jñāpyate

original: tat kuto lakṣaṇatantrtvamityata āha--lakṣyata iti lakṣaṇamiti /
analyzed: tat kutas lakṣaṇa tantrtvam iti atas āha lakṣyate iti lakṣaṇam iti

original: nanu yadi pṛthagabhidhānenaiva vāde codanīyatvaṃ pratipādyate,
analyzed: nanu yadi pṛthak abhidhānena eva vāde codanīya tvam pratipādyate
katham nyūna adhika apasiddhāntānām pṛthak anabhidhāne tatra codanīya tva pratipattiḥ

original: athānyathāpi teṣāṃ tad gamyata eva tadā hetvābhāseṣvapi sa eva prakāro 'sta,
analyzed: athā anyathā api teṣām tat gamyate eva tadā hetvābhāseṣu api saḥ eva prakāraḥ
kṛtam pṛthak abhidhānena iti atas āha hetvābhāsānām ca iti
ayam āśayaḥ

original: na hi hetvābhāsāḥ pṛthagabhihitā ityeva vāde codanīyatvaṃ teṣāṃ gamyate /
analyzed: na hi hetvābhāsāḥ pṛthak abhihitāḥ iti eva vāde codanīya tvam teṣām gamyate
api tu vādasya tattva pratipitsu kathā tvāt
hetvābhāsānām ca anudbhāvane tattva pratipatti vyāghātāt tattva bubhutsunā avaśyam udbhāvanīyāḥ te
anyathā vādaḥ vāda tvam jahyāt
hetvābhāsānām ca anudbhāvanam tattva pratipatti vyāghātakam iti

original: ayameva ca nyāyo viśeṣataḥ pṛthagabhidhānena sūcitaḥ sūtrakāreṇa /
analyzed: ayam eva ca nyāyaḥ viśeṣataḥ pṛthak abhidhānena sūcitaḥ sūtrakāreṇa
sa ca nyūna ādiṣu
samānaḥ iti

original: evaṃ ca vyavasthite vārtikakṛto 'pi praśno nāprāstāvika ityāha--tatra pṛcchatīti /
analyzed: evam ca vyavasthite vārtika kṛtaḥ api praśnaḥ na aprāstāvikaḥ iti āha tatra pṛcchati iti
nanu yadi jalpa vitaṇḍayoḥ tattva pratipādana artham avatāraḥ kim apratibhā ādi udbhāvanena
atha na tad artha tvam tayoḥ
kim tad avatāreṇa
na ca anya artha tve tayoḥ etad śāstra vyutpādya tvam iti atas āha sāhaṅkāraḥ hi iti
ahaṅkṛtasya tasya
tattva pratipatteḥ ayogāt ahaṅkāra śātanam eva anayoḥ tattva pratipādana artha tvam

original: taccāpratibhādyudbhāvanaṃ vinā na syāditi tattvaṃ pratipipādayiṣatā kartavyamevedamityarthaḥ //
analyzed: tat ca apratibhā ādi udbhāvanam vinā na syāt iti tattvam pratipipādayiṣatā kartavyam evā idam iti arthaḥ

original: nanuc chalādīnāṃ parijñānaṃ na sākṣānniḥśreyasa upayujyate ātmādivat /
analyzed: nanu chala ādīnām parijñānam na sākṣāt niḥśreyase upayujyate ātma ādi vat
nā api tad vyavasthāna dvārā pramāṇa vat
nā api nyāya aṅga tayā saṃśaya ādi vat
na ca parijñānam eva phalam
a puruṣa artha tvāt iti atas āha parijñānasya ca phalam uktam iti
tattva pratipati upāya bhūta kathā traya parikara śuddhi dvārā tad parijñānam niḥśreyasa upayogi iti arthaḥ

original: svayaṃ ca sukaraḥ prayoga iti granthasya pratyakṣasiddhatvāt kimuktaṃ bhavatīti tatsvarūpapraśno 'saṃgata ityataḥ pūrayati--anena bhāṣyeṇeti
analyzed: svayam ca sukaraḥ prayogaḥ iti granthasya pratyakṣa siddha tvāt kim uktam bhavati iti tad svarūpa praśnaḥ asaṃgataḥ iti atas pūrayati anena bhāṣyeṇa iti
bhāṣye prayojana antara abhidhānam na sūtrakṛt abhihita prayojana virodhi

original: kiṃ tu tadanuguṇam evetyāśayavān sautraṃ prayojanamanuvadati--sūtrakāreṇeti /
analyzed: kim tu tad anuguṇam eva iti āśayavān sautram prayojanam anuvadati sūtrakāreṇa iti
na hi asti saṃbhavaḥ
puruṣa arthaḥ ca a pramāṇa hetukaḥ ca iti
tena ayam arthaḥ bhāṣyasya
yatas sarvam prekṣāvat prayojanam ānvīkṣikī vyutpādya pramāṇa mūlam

original: ato niḥśreyasasya paramapuruṣārthasya tanmūlatāyāṃ viparyayaśaḍkaiva nāsti,
analyzed: atas niḥśreyasasya parama puruṣa arthasya tad mūla tāyām viparyaya śaḍkā eva nā asti
a tad mūla tve puruṣa artha tva hāni prasaṃgāt iti
tat idam uktam na asti eva tat iti
nanu na
tāvat itarāsu pramāṇa vyavahāraḥ na asti eva
tad itara vyavahārasya api uccheda prasaṃgāt

original: pramāṇavyavahāra sadbhāve tu kimānvīkṣikyā tatra prakāśayitavyam?
analyzed: pramāṇa vyavahāra sadbhāve tu kimānvīkṣikyā tatra prakāśayitavyam
tad pramāṇaiḥ eva prakāśi tattvāt iti atas āha yadi api iti
vyutpāditena tatra vyavahāraḥ tad vyutpattiḥ tu itas eva
na tu tatas iti arthaḥ

original: nanu praṇetṛśrotrapramāṇopajīvanamānvīkṣikyāmapi samānamato na vidyāntarād viśeṣa ityata āha--na tu pramāṇādīti /
analyzed: nanu praṇetṛ śrotra pramāṇa upajīvanam ānvīkṣikyām api samānam atas na vidyā antarāt viśeṣaḥ iti atas āha na tu pramāṇa ādi iti
pramāṇa upajīvane samāne api yathā etat vyutpādyam upajīvanti tāḥ
na evam tat vyutpādyam iyam api iti arthaḥ

original: nanu upajīvakatāsāmye 'pi parasparopajīvyopajīvakabhāvaḥ kva nāma dṛṣṭa ityata āha--yatheti /
analyzed: nanu upajīvaka tā sāmye api paraspara upajīvya upajīvaka bhāvaḥ kva nāma dṛṣṭaḥ iti atas āha yathā iti
pratyakṣa ādi api hi sva prāmāṇya vyavasthitaye pramāṇa antaram apekṣate
anumānam api sva utpattaye
tathā api pratyakṣa ādi eva apekṣya anumānam sva viṣayu pravartate
na tu upajīvaka anumānam apekṣya pratyakṣa ādi
anumāna antaram tu sva prāmāṇya vyutpādakam apekṣate
tat api na tadā eva

original: kiṃ tu prāgeva ityabhiprāyeṇa vyutpādyasajātīyāpekṣānirākaraṇāyoktam--na pratyakṣādiviṣayamapi tadānīmeveti /
analyzed: kim tu prāk eva iti abhiprāyeṇa vyutpādya sajātīya apekṣā nirākaraṇāya uktam na pratyakṣa ādi viṣayam api tadānīm eva iti
pratyakṣa ādi rūpaḥ viṣayaḥ pratyakṣa ādi viṣayaḥ iti
vidyā upakaraṇam pramāṇa ādi

original: tasya grahaṇaṃ pramāṇādigrakāśitamarthamitarā vidyāḥ pratipādyante iti vārttikena /
analyzed: tasya grahaṇam pramāṇa ādi grakāśitam artham itarāḥ vidyāḥ pratipādyante iti vārttikena
etat uktam bhavati
vārttike pramāṇa ādi grahaṇam bhāṣya ukta vidyā prakāśaka tva nirvāhāya
na tu svātantryeṇa
atas na virodhaḥ

original: tadevaṃ svarūpeṇāpekṣāṃ darśayitvā viṣayagatā apekṣā bhāṣyakṛtā darśitā--upāya iti /
analyzed: tat evam sva rūpeṇa apekṣām darśayitvā viṣaya gatā apekṣā bhāṣyakṛtā darśitā upāyaḥ iti
tat vārttikam yojayitum vyācaṣṭa saṃprati iti

original: nanu vidyāntarāṇāṃ śabdātmakatayā pramāṇatvāt tasya ca svapratipādye 'napekṣatvāt,
analyzed: nanu vidyā antarāṇām śabda ātmaka tayā pramāṇa tvāt tasya ca sva pratipādye anapekṣa tvāt
kim tatra ānvīkṣikī kariṣyati iti atas āha na hi iti
pramāṇasya sataḥ sva pratipādye pramāṇa antara apekṣā na asti
na tu sva itikartavya tā bhūta tarka apekṣā api
sa ca ānvīkṣikī labhyaḥ iti arthaḥ

original: atha tarkamanapekṣamāṇasya kiṃ syādityata āha--mā bhūditi /
analyzed: atha tarkam an apekṣamāṇasya kim syāt iti atas āha mā bhūt iti
ādi grahaṇena
yajamānaḥ prastaraḥ
ityādi grāhyam

original: tathāpīha gobalīvardanyāyena pramāṇasya svapadopāttatvāt prayojanajijñāsātarkā eva vivakṣitāḥ /
analyzed: tathā api iha gobalīvarda nyāyena pramāṇasya sva pada upātta tvāt prayojana jijñāsā tarkāḥ eva vivakṣitāḥ
pramāṇasya nivaśaḥ pravattiḥ
tasya dvāram avirodhaḥ
artha tattvam padārtha tattvam vākya artha tattvam vā
avadhārya pramāṇa antarāt arthavādāt eva vā

original: evaṃ ca daṇḍanītyāṃ yathā yamo rājā kubero vā rājatyādi,
analyzed: evam ca daṇḍanītyām yathā yamaḥ rājā kuberaḥ vā rājati ādi

original: vārttāyāṃ māghe parikarṣitā bhūmiḥ suvarṇamayaṃ phalamādhatta ityādi tarkānapekṣayā viphalāyate /
analyzed: vārttāyām māghe parikarṣitā bhūmiḥ suvarṇa mayam phalam ādhatte ityādi tarka anapekṣayā viphalāyate

analyzed: viṣayam iti śeṣaḥ iti atra api vidheya tayā niṣedhya tayā iti śeṣaḥ

original: ataḥ sādhye saṃśayaḥ kiṃ vidhipadasamabhivyāhṛtapadatvādagnihotrādivadvidhiviṣayo bhavatu svargo 'dhikārivad vā neti pūrvapakṣamādarśayanneva  #
analyzed: atas sādhye saṃśayaḥ kim vidhi pada samabhivyāhṛta pada tvāt agnihotra ādi vat vidhi viṣayaḥ bhavatu svargaḥ adhikāri vat vā na iti pūrvapakṣam ādarśayan eva
tatra aniṣṭa prasaṃgam āha tatra yadi iti

original: na ca śyenādisādhyāyā hiṃsāyā vihitatvenārthatvameva bhavatu kā kṣatiriti vācyam /
analyzed: na ca śyena ādi sādhyāyāḥ hiṃsāyāḥ vihita tvena artha tvam eva bhavatu kā kṣatiḥ iti vācyam

original: vidhirhi pravartakaḥ svajñānena icchāmantarā kṛtvā prayatyanotpādakaṃ iti yāvat /
analyzed: vidhiḥ hi pravartakaḥ sva jñānena icchām antarā kṛtvā iti yāvat

original: sa ca prayatno na sādhyaviṣayaḥ kartuṃ śakyate /
analyzed: sa ca prayatnaḥ na sādhya viṣayaḥ kartum śakyate

original: upayo hi prayatnaviṣayo na tu phalam /
analyzed: upayaḥ hi prayatna viṣayaḥ na tu phalam

original: tasmāt prayatnaviṣayatvāt sādhanetikartavyate eva vidhīyete na tu sādhyam,
analyzed: tasmāt prayatna viṣaya tvāt sādhana itikartavya te eva vidhīyete na tu sādhyam
tad aviṣaya tvāt
na hi jñāpaka tva mātram vidhi tvam
api tu icchā prayatna viṣaya jñāpaka tvam iti

original: tasmāt śyenādisādhyā hiṃsā anarthabhūtaivārthaḥ syād yadi vidhiviṣayaḥ syāditi sādhūktam /
analyzed: tasmāt śyena ādi sādhyā hiṃsā anartha bhūtā eva arthaḥ syāt yadi vidhi viṣayaḥ syāt iti sādhu uktam

original: siddhānte pramāṇamādarśayanneva sādhyapadasamabhivyāhārastarhi kvopayujyate ityāśaḍkāmapanayati--atha sādhyāṃśamiti /
analyzed: siddhānte pramāṇam ādarśayan eva sādhya pada samabhivyāhāraḥ tarhi kva upayujyate iti āśaḍkām apanayati atha sādhya aṃśam iti
iṣṭa abhyupāya tā hi na iṣṭam a pratītya pratyetum śakyā
na ca apravṛttā eva sā pravartayati
atas tām viśeṣṭum iṣṭasya anuvādaḥ ayam iti arthaḥ
tat kim idānīm avihitam iti etāvatā eva anarthaḥ
na iti āha na hiṃsyāt iti

original: nanu bhavatvevaṃ tāvat tathāpyānvīkṣikyā kimāyātamityata āha--tadiheti /
analyzed: nanu bhavatu evam tāvat tathā api ānvīkṣikyā kim āyātam iti atas āha tat iha iti
viṣaya antaram āha evam iti

original: yathā ābhikhyāyāḥ prayojakatvaṃ kṣīrahomasthāne tadviniveśanād rasādisāmyāt,
analyzed: yathā prayojaka tvam kṣīra homa sthāne tad viniveśanāt rasa ādi sāmyāt
vājinasya aprayojaka tvam avarjanīya utpattika tvāt
ādi grahaṇena śeṣa bhāga homa vilopa ādayaḥ gṛhyante

original: sarvā vidyā iti vidyaśabdena taddharmān lakṣayatīti na bhāṣyavyākhyāvirodhaḥ /
analyzed: sarvāḥ vidyāḥ iti vidyā śabdena tad dharmān lakṣayati iti na bhāṣya vyākhyā virodhaḥ
vārttikakāraḥ tu dharmāṇām vidyā pāratantryam vivakṣan iti śeṣaḥ
saṅkara prasaṅgaḥ iti phalasya
tathā ca vidyā antar ulena eva asya phalavat tvam na
punar asādhāraṇam phalam asyāḥ asti iti arthaḥ
asāṅkaryam darśayitum tāsām eva tāvat asādhāraṇam phalam āha vidyā antarāṇi iti
etasyāḥ asādhāraṇam phalam āha eha tu iti
anyatra asyāḥ pratipādita upayoga virodhaḥ mā bhūt iti āśayavatā uktam pramāṇa ādi
yadi api sādhāraṇam iti
etena etat uktam bhavati
vidyā antar ulāni api yadā ānvīkṣikyām āyatante sā iyam ūṣmasiddhiḥ asyāḥ
yat tu pradhānam asyāḥ phalam tat asaṃkīrṇam eva vidyā antareṣu asaṃbhavāt iti
vāda ādīnām iti a tad guṇa saṃvijñānaḥ bahuvrīhiḥ
vādasya para abhibhava artham apravṛtteḥ

original: jalpādayo hi madādihetavaḥ parābhibhavopāyatvāt dravyaśarīrasaṃpattivaditi prayogaḥ /
analyzed: jalpa ādayaḥ hi mada ādi hetavaḥ para abhibhava upāya tvāt dravya śarīra saṃpatti vat iti prayogaḥ
tatra asya viruddha tvam tāvat āha tatra jalpa ādīnām iti
ayam āśayaḥ
na tāvat pratipādyasya jalpa vitaṇḍayoḥ adhikāraḥ

original: kiṃ tu pratipannasya tattvapratipattipālanārthaṃ duravaliptapratipādanārthaṃ ca tayoradhikāraḥ /
analyzed: kim tu pratipannasya tattva pratipatti pālana artham duravalipta pratipādana artham ca tayoḥ adhikāraḥ
para ahaṅgāra śātanam ca mada māna ādi viruddham eva
teṣām doṣa viśeṣa tvāt
ahaḍkāra śātanasya ca tad nirodha rūpa tvāt
na ca para abhibhāva upāya bhūta śabda vācya tā mātreṇa anumānam
vāc ādīnām api viṣāṇi tva prasaṃgāt iti
syāt etat
para abhibhava upāya tvena hetunā mada māna ādi hetu tvam mā saitsīt

original: anvayavyatirekābhyāmeva tu siddhacatvityata āha--madamānādihetutvaṃ ca heturasiddha iti /
analyzed: anvaya vyatirekābhyām eva tu siddha catu iti atas āha mada māna ādi hetu tvam ca hetuḥ asiddhaḥ iti

original: sati ca tattvavidāṃ na saṃbhavantīti vadatā yathāśrutasya
analyzed: sati ca tattva vidām na saṃbhavanti iti vadatā yathāśrutasya
para abhibhava upāya tvasya anaikāntika tvam api sūcitam
atas jalpa ādi tattva jñānavatām api yadi māna ādayaḥ dṛśyante
na te tad hetukāḥ
kim tu balavat mithyājñāna hetukāḥ eva iti sanaka ādi udāharaṇa phalam iti
etat ca sphuṭam iti abhiprāyeṇa āha upasaṃharati iti
pariśuddhiḥ
apratīta svarūpasya prayojana āmisaṃbandhasya parīkṣā na yujyate
riḥ āśraya tvāt
prathama sūtram tu uddeśa param eva iti atas āha tat evam iti
abhidheya saṃbandha prayojana parāt eva tasmāt uddeśaḥ api avagataḥ
sa ca apekṣita tvāt gṛhītaḥ iti arthaḥ
etena parīkṣā viṣayaḥ darśitaḥ
ucitam darśayan eva tad atikrame hetum āha teṣām iti
ā etena chalataḥ saṃbandha parīkṣāyāḥ prayojanam api
darśitam
abhidhānasya dvaividhyam ubhaya koṭi saṃsparśaḥ
samīcīnam ityādi anurodhena yathā vārttikāt ityādau ārthaḥ kramaḥ grāhyaḥ
tasmāt amidhāna sāmānyāt abhidhāna sādhargya mātrāt nirṇāyaka rahitāt dṛśyamānāt iti yāvat
ubhayathā darśanāt ca iti
tad sahacarita ubhaya koṭi darśana ja saṃskāra bhuvaḥ smaraṇāt iti yāvat
etat ca sūtrakārasya āpta tva avadhāraṇāt prāk iti mantavyam
yadi api

original: cātra vacana eva sākṣāt saṃśayaṃ darśayati,
analyzed: ca atra vacane eva sākṣāt saṃśayam darśayati

original: saṃbandhini ca prayojane tattvajñānakāryatayā parīkṣyamāṇe saṃbandha eva kāryakāraṇabhāvalakṣaṇaḥ parokṣito bhavatīti tadeva parīkṣyatayā nirdiśyate--tat  #
analyzed: saṃbandhini ca prayojane tattva jñāna kārya tayā parīkṣyamāṇe saṃbandhaḥ eva kārya kāraṇa bhāva lakṣaṇaḥ parokṣitaḥ bhavati iti tat eva parīkṣya tayā nirdiśyate etat
