yathā vyākhyāte vipratipadyamānam lakṣaṇa antareṇa bodhayati tathā hi āhuḥ iti
lāghavam vākyeṣu pada kṛtam
padeṣu su alpa tvam akṣara kṛtam iti apaunarūktyam
etat ca kārya kāraṇa bhāvasya yogavibhāgena abhidhīyamāna tvam abhyupagamya uktam
vastutas tu tena api asau sūcanīyaḥ eva
na hi yogavibhāgasya etat sāmarthyam
api tu artha ādhikya sūcana mātram
etat ca vibhāge api labhyate iti āha etaretara ityādi
nanu sūtre mithyājñāna mātram eva śrūyate
tat katham āha tatra ātma ādau iti atas āha yadi ani sāma iti
bhāṣya viṣaya tām vārttikasya darśayati tat etena iti

original: na khalu yathā kuṇḍe badaraṃ saṃyogena paṭe vā śauklyaṃ samavāyenetyarthaḥ /
analyzed: na khalu yathā kuṇḍe badaram saṃyogena paṭe vā śauklyam samavāyena iti arthaḥ

original: nanu na tāvat sattāmātreṇa sārūpyaṃ bhrāntāvupayujyate japākusumādisannidhānaparibhūtasitimni sphaṭhikādāvanupalabhyamānaviśeṣasmaraṇe 'pi
analyzed: nanu na tāvat sattā mātreṇa sārūpyam bhrāntau upayujyate japā kusuma ādi sannidhāna paribhūta sitimni sphaṭhikā ādau anupalabhyamāna viśeṣa smaraṇe api
tasmāt upalabhyamānam eva sārūpyam tad hetuḥ iti āstheyam
tat api asaṃgatam
sārūpyasya bheda adhiṣṭhāna tayā tad pratibhāsane bhedasya api pratibhāna abheda āropa anavakāśāt
tasmāt sat asatoḥ sārūpya abhāvāt iti āśaḍkā eva iyam anupapannā iti atas āha sarvatra hi iti
na hi idamane
sadṛśam iti kṛtvā sārūpya grahaṇam iti brūmaḥ

original: kiṃ tarhi? rajatādau yo dharmaścakacikyādiḥ upalabdhapūrvaḥ sa eva tajjātīyo vā purovartinyupalabhyate yadi tadā bhrānti,
analyzed: kim tarhi rajata ādau yaḥ dharmaḥ cakacikī ādiḥ upalabdha pūrvaḥ saḥ eva tad jātīyaḥ vā purovartini upalabhyate yadi tadā bhrānti
na atas anyathā iti arthaḥ
anvayam darśayitvā vyatirekam āha na hi iti
yadi api hasti maśaka ādau api yathā kathañcid sārūpyam asti eva
tathā api vyavacdedaka dharmeṇa anabhibhūtam sārūpyam iha abhipratam

original: vyavacchedakānabhibhūtatvaṃ ca tatra nāstītyataḥ sarvātmanā vā sārūpyamekadeśena vetyevamādi parāstaṃ veditavyam /
analyzed: vyavacchedaka anabhibhūta tvam ca tatra na asti iti atas sarva ātmanā vā sārūpyam eka deśena vā iti evamādi parāstam veditavyam
śaṅkate asadṛśe api iti
idam atra vivakṣitam
sārūpyam hi āropyasya āropa viṣayeṇa cintyate anyathā vā
anantare atiprasaṃgaḥ

original: prathame tu na tāvata pītaguṇī śuklaguṇini śaḍkhe āropyate,
analyzed: prathame tu na tāvata pīta guṇī śukla guṇini śaḍkhe āropyate
pītam cira vilvam idam iti pratyaya anudayāt
na api śukla guṇe pīta guṇaḥ
śukla guṇasya apratibhāsanāt
nā api śukla tva sāmānya ādhāre rūpa sva lakṣaṇe pīta guṇaḥ
cākṣuṣa pratītau śukla tva sāmānya anavabhāse tad ādhārasya rūpa sva lakṣaṇasya bhāsanā yogāt
bhāsane api vā dravya tva sāmānādhikaraṇyam na syāt
nā api pīta tvam sāmānyam śukla tva sāmānya ādhāre
tat hi tad ātma tayā vai āropyet
tad saṃsargi tayā vā

original: ādye śuklatvasāmānyādhārā vyaktiḥ pītatvasāmānyātmanā prathamānā na deśakālaniyatā syāt /
analyzed: ādye śukla tva sāmānya ādhārā vyaktiḥ pīta tva sāmānya ātmanā prathamānā na deśa kāla niyatā syāt
vyaktiḥ hi deśa kāla niyatā na sāmānyam
sā ca a prathitā eva

original: na ca pītatvasāmānyameva śuklaguṇavyaktirūpeṇaropyata iti sāmpratam /
analyzed: na ca pīta tva sāmānyam eva śukla guṇa vyakti rūpeṇa ropyate iti sāmpratam
tathā sati pīta tvam na pratīyeta
nā api śukla tva sāmānyam eva pīta tva sāmānya tad ātmatayā āropyeta
tathā sati śukla tvena śukla tvam pratīyeta
na hi tasya anyat kiñcid rūpam asti
yena pratīti patham avataret

original: sarvathā apratītaṃ ca nāropaviṣaya ityasaṃgatirevāsya kalpasya,
analyzed: sarvathā apratītam ca na āropa viṣayaḥ iti asaṃgatiḥ eva asya kalpasya

original: saṃsargitayā tu sāmānye āropyamāṇe śuklaguṇasya śuklatvenaiva pratītiḥ syāt /
analyzed: saṃsargi tayā tu sāmānye āropyamāṇe śukla guṇasya śukla tvena eva pratītiḥ syāt
na ca pītim apratīteḥ vinaya tāratamyam syāt
sāmānyasya eka rūpa tvāt

original: tasmāt pītaguṇa śaṅkhe samāropyata iti vācyam /
analyzed: tasmāt pītaguṇa śaṅkhe samāropyate iti vācyam
tathā ca guṇa guṇinoḥ kva sādṛśya vārtā api iti arthaḥ
samādhattena tatra api iti

original: na hyatra pītaguṇa āropyo 'pi tu pītaguṇaśca śaḍkhaśca āropaviṣayau,
analyzed: na hi atra pīta guṇaḥ āropyaḥ api tu pīta guṇaḥ ca śaḍkhaḥ ca āropa viṣayau
saṃsṛṣṭa svabhāva tvam tu āropyam

original: tathā ca saṃsṛṣṭasvabhāvābhyāṃ guṇaguṇibhyāmanayoḥ asaṃsṛṣṭasvabhāvayoḥ sārūpyamiha prayojakam /
analyzed: tathā ca saṃsṛṣṭa svabhāvābhyām guṇa guṇibhyām anayoḥ asaṃsṛṣṭa svabhāvayoḥ sārūpyam iha prayojakam

original: upadarśitaṃ ca taditi kimaprayojakena guṇisārūpyeṇa guṇasārūpyeṇa vā,
analyzed: upadarśitam ca tat iti kim aprayojakena guṇi sārūpyeṇa guṇa sārūpyeṇa vā
satā asatā vā iti arthaḥ
asaṃbandha agrahaḥ vaiyadhikaraṇya agrahaḥ viṣayiṇaḥ viṣayam upalakṣayati
tena vyādhi karaṇa grahaṇa aviṣayīkṛta tvam sārūpyam tayoḥ
yathā pītimā cirabilvayoḥ tathā eva pītima śaḍkhayoḥ iti uktam bhavati
eka indriya upanata saṃbandhi dvaya viṣayam sārūpyam upapādi indriya dvaya upanīta saṃbandhi dvaya viṣayam sārūpyam upapādayati evam tvac indriya iti
na ca evam sati
tādātmya bhrame api bheda agrahe eva sārūpyam astu
kṛtam cākacikya ādinā iti vācyam
tad antareṇa saṃskāra an udbodhāt tena ca
vinā rajata āropa niyama anupapatteḥ
iha tu saṃsṛṣṭa tva anubhava janita saṃskāra udbodhaḥ yāvat mātreṇa tāvat eva upayuktam
saṃsargasya ca saṃsṛjyamānau eva viṣayaḥ
tau ca anubhūyamānau eva iti
kim tad upanāyaka sādṛśya antara apekṣayā iti sarvam avadātam
nanu ayam anubhava kramaḥ anubhava bādhitaḥ eva iti atas āha ati śīghra tayā iti
nanu sādṛśyam ced bhrānti bījam upapāditam
tarhi sarvam sarvatra āropyet

original: asti hi kenacit kasyacit kathañcit sārūpyamityata āha--neti /
analyzed: asti hi kenacid kasyacid kathañcid sārūpyam iti atas āha na iti
evam dvi candra iti
tathāvidha apekṣā buddhi viṣaya tvam dvi candra bhrame
bheda mātra ārope tu nānā diś deśa avayava saṃbandhaḥ
evam anyatra api alāta cakra bhrame madhyā saṃbandhe sati sarva diś saṃbandhaḥ
ādi grahaṇāt a gacchati gati vibhrame vibhāga vaiparītyam
asthūleṣu keśeṣu sthūla vibhrame
tāvat deśa ācchādaka tvam

original: apsu daṇḍasya vakratābhrame taraṅgavakrimadaṇḍayorasaṃsargagraha ityevaṃ neyam /
analyzed: apsu daṇḍasya vakra tā bhrame taraṅga vakrima daṇḍayoḥ a saṃsarga grahe iti evam na iyam
sarvatra ca tattva agrahaḥ
saṃplavate iti
iha ātmanaḥ duḥkha hetu tvena śarīra indriya ādi vat heya tvam eva bauddhaiḥ āpāditam

original: yathā hi, indriyādinā vinā nātmā duḥkhaṃ janayitumalam,
analyzed: yathā hi indriya ādinā vinā na ātmā duḥkham janayitum alam
evam na indriya ādikam api tam antareṇa
na hi nirāśrayam duḥkha nāma
atas ātmā api heyaḥ
tat uktam dharmakīrtinā

original: na tairvinā duḥkhaheturātmā cet te 'pi tādṛśāḥ /
analyzed: na taiḥ vinā duḥkha hetuḥ ātmā ced te api tādṛśāḥ
dvayam api evam vairāgyam ca dvayoḥ tatas
iti tat ca etat asādhīyaḥ tathā hi
na tāvat ātmanaḥ hānam roga ādi vat vināśa lakṣaṇam nitya tvāt
nā api dandaśūka daṣṭa aḍgulī vat viprayoga ādi lakṣaṇam
nā api suta maraṇa ādi vat pratipatti nirodha lakṣaṇam
sva saṃvedana tvāt iti vedāntinaḥ
vayam tu brūmaḥ tat hi tadā syāt

original: yadi jñātasya sato duḥkhaṃ pratyātmano hetutvaṃ sutamaraṇāderiva /
analyzed: yadi jñātasya sataḥ duḥkham pratyātmanaḥ hetu tvam suta maraṇa ādeḥ iva
na tu etat asti
kim nāma sattā mātreṇa
tasmāt ātmanaḥ heya tva vyutpādanam vaiyātya mātra vijṛmbhitam etat

original: ātmadṛṣṭestu heyatvavyutpādanaṃ manāk sadalamityāśaḍkya nirākaroti--na tviti /
analyzed: ātma dṛṣṭeḥ tu heya tva vyutpādanam manāk sa dalam iti āśaḍkya nirākaroti na tu iti
abhyarhitatamam upakāryatamam
sattvam ātma
yadi api rāga ādi nivṛtti hetuḥ nairātma darśanam iti guḍajihvikā
vastutas tu na tāvat nitya ātma abhāva darśana mātram rāga ādi nivṛtti hetuḥ
cārvāka ādīnām eva vīta rāga tva prasaṃgāt
ahaṅkāra nivṛtti hetuḥ nairātmya darśanam
tatas eva rāga ādi nivṛttiḥ iti ced
sā api kim śarīra ādau cetane vā
ādye siddhasādhanam
śarīrāt avahaṅkārasya mithyātvāt
tad mūla tvāt ca rāga dveṣayoḥ

original: tannivṛttau tayorapi nivṛttiriti ko nāma nābhyupaiti /
analyzed: tad nivṛttau tayoḥ api nivṛttiḥ iti kaḥ nāma na abhyupaiti
na ca śarīra ādau ahaṅkāra nivṛtteḥ nitya ātma darśanam virodhi
kim tu anukūlam eva

original: na hi śuktikāto rajataṃ bhedenāvyavasthāpayatastasya rajatabuddhiḥnivartate /
analyzed: na hi śuktikātaḥ rajatam bhedena a vyavasthāpayataḥ tasya rajata buddhiḥ nivartate
atha cetana viṣayā eva ahaṅkāra nivṛttī rāga ādīn apanayati iti vivakṣitam
hanta evam su ākāre api idantā avyavahāriṇām pṛthagjanānām vīta rāga tva prasaṃgaḥ

original: na hi te śarīrādiviviktam ahamiti pratiyanti //
analyzed: na hi te śarīra ādi viviktam aham iti pratiyanti
atha bāhya ābhyantara viṣaya tayā ahaṅkāra nivṛttiḥ abhipretā
sā api kim sarvathā jñāna abhāvāt eva
cetanasya api idanta āspada tvāt eva vā
tasmin eva nāstitva adhyāropāt vā
na tāvat ādyaḥ
adṛṣṭi tva prasaṅgāt
na ca etat prayatna śatena api sidhyati
yathā yathā dṛṣṭi nirodhāya prayatnaḥ
tathā tathā dṛṣṭeḥ pratyāpatteḥ
na ca adṛṣṭeḥ eva rāga ādayaḥ vinivartante
yuga saha astram api suptasya punar jāgara avasthāyām rāga ādi darśanāt
na api dvitīyaḥ
aham abhāve sati idamaḥ api abhāvāt
sati para saṃjñā iti tvayā eva uktam yatas
na api tṛtīyaḥ
grahaṇa agrahaṇayoḥ ūbhayoḥ api asaṃbhavāt
yadi hi aham āspadam cetanaḥ gṛhītaḥ
katham nāstitā adhyāropaḥ
na gṛhītaḥ ced kutra nāstitā adhyāropaḥ
na ca prathamam grahaḥ
paścāt āropaḥ iti tvayā vaktum śakyate
na ca a parispharati niṣedhye niṣedha saṃbhavaḥ
sva pratipaṣṭha jñāna mātreṇa iti ced na
jñānasya sva pratiṣṭha tā dhrauvye api rāga ādi darśanāt
tad tad dahi rūpa plava virahe sati iti ced

original: tarhi bahirūpaplavavirahe svātmapratiṣṭhaṃ jñānaṃ rāgādinivṛttiheturityevaṃbhūtayātdṛṣṭyā kimaparāddham,
analyzed: tarhi bahis rūpa plava virahe sva ātma pratiṣṭham jñānam rāga ādi nivṛtti hetuḥ iti evaṃbhūtayā āt dṛṣṭyā kim aparāddham
yena tām nirasya nairātmya dṛṣṭiḥ ūpādīyate
audāsīnya dṛṣṭiḥ eva nairātmya dṛṣṭiḥ iti ced
kim idam audāsīnyam
śūnyatvam iti ced
evam tarhi sva ātma dṛṣṭiḥ api dṛṣṭiḥ na syāt iti adṛṣṭi tva prasaṃgaḥ
anālambana tayā niḥsaṃbandhi tvam audāsīnyam iti ced

original: tarhi nirātmīyatādṛṣṭiṃ vadan kuto nairātmyadṛṣṭiṃ supta iva pralapasīti /
analyzed: tarhi nirātmīya tā dṛṣṭim vadan kutas nairātmya dṛṣṭim suptaḥ iva pralapasi iti
evam pretyabhāva abhāva jñānasya iti paramam nidānam iti anuṣajyate
tathā ca
iti api guḍajihvikā
vastutas tu na asti karma
na asti karma phalam
na asti pretyabhāvaḥ iti
yāvat jīvet sukham jīvet na asti mṛtyoḥ agocaraḥ
iti nyāyam ālambamānena prāṇi vadha a datta ādāna ādau eva ghaṭitavyam
sādhīyaḥ ca evam asya kaivalyam iti
na ca
santānam ādāya pretyabhāva ādi dṛṣṭiḥ upapatsyate iti vācyam
tadā hi tam ādāya sā upapadyeta
yadi tad dṛṣṭiḥ anarthān nivartayet

original: arthācca pravartayet pravṛttinivṛttī ca saiva dṛṣṭiḥ karoti yā rāgadveṣau prasūte,
analyzed: arthāt ca pravartayet pravṛtti nivṛttī ca sā eva dṛṣṭiḥ karoti yā rāga dveṣau prasūte
tad mūla tvāt tayoḥ
tathā ca tādṛśī saṃtāna dṛṣṭiḥ api heyā eva
na tādṛśī ced nāstika tvam eva nirvāhayet
tat idam uktam saḥ ayam vṛścika bhiyā iti

original: tasmād yaḥ paralokārtho tasya paralokinamātmānamaḍgīkṛtyaiva svarge 'paparge vā prayatnaḥ,
analyzed: tasmāt yaḥ tasya para loka arthī tasya para lokinam ātmānam aḍgīkṛtya eva svarge apaparge vā prayatnaḥ

original: yastu nityamātmānaṃ nābhyupaiti tasya cārvākasya iva svargāpavargāveva na staḥ,
analyzed: yaḥ tu nityam ātmānam na abhyupaiti tasya cārvākasya iva svarga apavargau eva na staḥ
kutas tad arthā pravṛttiḥ iti āśayavān āha sā iyam iti
yat tu uktam ātmānam abhyarhitam paśyan iti saḥ ayam kasya prasaṅgaḥ
kim sarva duḥkha upaśamam upakāram apaśyataḥ paśyataḥ
vai ādyaḥ ced evam etat
na hi evaṃbhūtasya nairātmya dṛṣṭiḥ abhyupapadyate
na hi ātma ucchedam eva kaścid upakāra tvena manute

original: api tu duḥkhaṃ jihāsamāna ātmānaṃ jahāti,
analyzed: api tu duḥkham jihāsamānaḥ ātmānam jahāti

original: ātmānamanapahāya duḥkhasya hātumaśakyatvāditi manyamānastasmād duḥkhamajihāsataḥ sukhaṃ copādātumicchato nairātmyadṛṣṭerasaṃbhava eva /
analyzed: ātmānam an apahāya duḥkhasya hātum aśakya tvāt iti manyamānaḥ tasmāt duḥkham a jihāsataḥ sukham ca upādātum icchataḥ nairātmya dṛṣṭeḥ asaṃbhavaḥ eva

original: tathā ca tathābhūtasya nairātmyadarśino nityātmadarśino vā tulyaḥ saṃsāraḥ /
analyzed: tathā ca tathābhūtasya nairātmya darśinaḥ nitya ātma darśinaḥ vā tulyaḥ saṃsāraḥ
dvitīyaḥ tu kalpaḥ asaṃgataḥ eva

original: na hi sarvaduḥkhocchedam evopakāraṃ paśyati sukhāya tadupakārāya ca ghaṭata iti /
analyzed: na hi sarva duḥkha ucchedam eva upakāram paśyati sukhāya tad upakārāya ca ghaṭate iti
sarva duḥkha ucchedaḥ ca sukham ca iti vipratiṣiddham etat
evam sarva duḥkha ucchedam icchati param ca apakaroti iti etat api asaṃgatam

original: na hi parāpakāraḥ sarvaduḥkhocchedanidānamiti hṛdi nidhāyāha--abhyarhitatā ceti //
analyzed: na hi para apakāraḥ sarva duḥkha uccheda nidānam iti hṛdi nidhāya āha abhyarhita tā ca iti
aham iti kartṛ pada viṣayatvam
anena tad pravṛtti nimittasya kartṛ tvasya eka deśam upalakṣayati
tena ayam arthaḥ

original: itarakārakaprayoktṛtvam bāhyakārakaprayojyatāṃ ca dṛṣṭvā bhedāgrahe sati śarīrādau kartṛtvamāropyātmatvena viparyasyatīti tadidamuktam--tāṃ  #
analyzed: itara kāraka prayoktṛ tvam bāhya kāraka prayojya tām ca dṛṣṭvā bheda agrahe sati śarīra ādau kartṛ tvam āropya ātma tvena viparyasyati iti tat idam uktam tām
khalu iti

original: evaṃ siddhaṃ kṛtvā viparyayam anyathākhyātirūpamiti śeṣaḥ /
analyzed: evam siddham kṛtvā viparyayam anyathā khyāti rūpam iti śeṣaḥ
saṃprati sandihānaḥ viśeṣataḥ iti śeṣaḥ

original: nanu sthāṇāvevāyaṃ mama corapratyayo vṛtta ityāgāpālāṅganaṃ prasiddhamiti tadatra saṃśaya eva nāstītyata āha--parīkṣakāṇāmiti /
analyzed: nanu sthāṇau eva ayam mama cora pratyayaḥ vṛttaḥ iti āgāpāla aṅganam prasiddham iti tat atra saṃśayaḥ eva na asti iti atas āha parīkṣakāṇām iti
pratipattuḥ pratyayāt pratyetavyāt
avyatirekāt abhedāt iti arthaḥ
nanu idam rajatam iti atra dvayam pratibhāti
jñānasya ātmā
purovarti dravyam ca
tatra purovartinaḥ rajata tve pratiṣiddhe
arthāt āpadyate jñānasya iti
tad anyeṣām tu pratipatti anārohāt eva na avaka ārśaḥ
tat katham ucyate vaṇij vīthi ādau iti
atas āha āntara tvam tu asya anupalabdha caram katastyam

original: tataśca yathedaṃ nedamahaṃ nāhamityanayorvirodhāt samuccayābhimāno 'pi nāsti,

analyzed: asti ca tasmāt ubhayoḥ api rajata tva pratiṣedhaḥ anyasya rajata tvam vyavasthāpayati iti pāṣāṇarekhā iyam na durūttara pāṃsu pūraṇa mātreṇa apanetum śakyate

ubhau na staḥ iti ced

asadṛśasya api sattayā prakāśane ca atiprasaṅgaḥ iti arthaḥ

original: caturthe tu sāmyāpādane sati jñānadharmo vā agraho viśeṣaṇam,

na ca phala jñānena anaikāntika tvam tasya apravartaka tvāt eva

śuktiḥ iyam ityādi api draṣṭavyam

original: iyaṃ tvānumānikī pārokṣyavatī tasmānna kvacid vyabhicāraśaḍkā /

original: na tarhi ityādibhāṣyeṇa kaḥ sūtrāvayavo vyākhyāta iti śaḍkāmapanayanneva vārttikamavatārayati---saṃpratīti /

nanu lakṣaṇam tathā api aduṣṭam iti atas āha pratyakṣa kāraṇa iti

viṣaya saṃyogi cakṣuḥ ālokaḥ ca iti vadatā viṣaya saṃyogena eva āloka vyāpāraḥ na tvac indriya adhiṣṭhāna saṃyogena iti uktam
etat ca andhakāra madhya vartinā api āloka madhya varti viṣaya upalabdheḥ āloka madhya vartinā api ca andhakāra madhya stha anupalabdheḥ

original: nanu mahattvānekadravyavattvayoḥ parasparāvinābhūtayoragṛhyamāṇaviśeṣatvenobhayorapi cākṣaṣatvaṃ prati kāraṇatvāt samuccaya eva /

original: parasparavyabhicāriṇo hyarthakriyāyāṃ vikalpasambhavo na tvime tathā /

ubhaya upādāne ca asamartha viśeṣaṇam lakṣaṇam bhavet iti arthaḥ

original: ata evāgre satyapyevaṃ lakṣaṇakatva ityāha uktasāmagrīsambhave 'pi cakṣuravayavino na pratyakṣatā,

original: nityastu sāmānyarūpo na saṃskāraśabdavācyo nāpyupalabdhiphalaḥ, tasya
analyzed: nityaḥ tu sāmānya rūpaḥ na saṃskāra śabda vācyaḥ na api upalabdhi phalaḥ tasya

original: rūpādīnā svakāraṇavaśādeva sa svabhāvabhedo jāyate keṣāñcit,

upalabdhi phalaḥ ca bhavati iti arthaḥ
pratyakṣa lakṣaṇa tayā tad kāraṇam uktam

teṣām anyatama apāye api pratyakṣa anupapatteḥ iti āśayavān parihāram vyācaṣṭe pratyakṣa lakṣaṇā iti

original: nanu yadyapi svarūpataḥ santānato vā indriyābhedādindriyamanaḥsannikarṣābhedo yathāyathaṃ saṃbhavati,

original: tathāpi vijñānābhedo vyaktikṛto jātikṛto vā syāt /

original: tat ekadeśiparihāro garbhastrāveṇaiva gata upanyāsayogyo 'pi na bhavatītyāśayavānāha---yadā hīti //
analyzed: tat eka deśi parihāraḥ garbha strāveṇa eva gataḥ upanyāsa yogyaḥ api na bhavati iti āśayavān āha yadā hi iti

original: asti hi svarūpajātikṛtabhedātirikto viṣayakṛto viśeṣo buddhīnām /

na indriya manaḥ sannikarṣa bhedāt

original: tatra jñānasyāpi na viṣayakṛto bheda ityarthaḥ /

original: tasyaiva goścakṣuṣā saṃyogena tatraiva gavi samavāyena prathamaṃ śuklaguṇajñānaṃ paścād gamanakarmajñānamiti bhede 'bhedāditi /

yadi api aprasiddha tvam avyapadeśaka tva vyāpaka tvāt tad abhidhānena eva labdham

indriya manaḥ sannikarṣaḥ tu avyapadeśakaḥ aprasiddhaḥ ca iti etāvatā prakāra antara tvam

original: ubhayātīndriyādhāratā tu ātmamanaḥsannikarṣasyāpi nāstītyata āha--ātmā tu yadyapīti //

original: na hi rūpopabhogānarthinaḥ kṛṣṇasāre tṛṣṇā tatkarmasaṃbhavaḥ /

original: tathā ghrāṇodāharaṇaṃ pūtigrandhābhāvaviśiṣṭā surabhitarā kastūriketyato bahuvacanāvirodhaḥ /

original: etasyaivottaropādhitvena prayojakatvādityata āha---indriyasambandho bhavatu mā veti /

original: yadindriyasambaddhaṃ tadavaśyaṃ śarīrasambaddhamiti vā na pramāṇamasti,

original: na hyasti niyamo yat pradīpena sambaṇsate tadavaśyaṃ mallimayāpi yad vā mallimayā tadavaśyaṃ pradīpenāpi /

original: tasmāt tadanyathāsiddhirevetyasiddhivyavacchedārthaṃ sajalasatejaḥpaṭādigrāhiṇā prāpyakāriṇā tvagindriyeṇa viruddhamapi sahāntareṇa grahaṇaṃ  #

ajanakaiḥ anaikāntikam atas janaka tve sati iti

atha anubhdūta abhibhūta tayā na sūrasadana ādīnām grahaṇam

original: evaṃ tarhi viṣaya eva sa kaścit tādṛśo yo gṛhyate netara ityabhyupeyatām,

original: na hi sparśarasādayo grahaṇayogyā ityaprāptaireva tvagādibhirgṛhyante,

original: prāpyakāritvād vā tairanubhdūtābhibhūtā api te prāptatvamātreṇa gṛhyanta ityarthaḥ //

original: yadyapi kṣaṇabhaṅgapariṇāmanaye 'pi prāptānāmeva parasparaṃ kartṛkaraṇakarmaṇāṃ kāryajananam,
analyzed: yadi api kṣaṇa bhaṅga pariṇāma naye api prāptānām eva parasparam kartṛ karaṇa karmaṇām kārya jananam

original: na hi parasparamapratyāsīdantaḥ sahakāripratyayā bhāvānatiśāyayanto dṛśyante /
analyzed: na hi parasparam a pratyāsīdantaḥ sahakāri pratyayāḥ bhāvān atiśāyayantaḥ dṛśyante
pratyāsattiḥ tu nirantara utpādaḥ eva teṣām
sā eva ca svarūpa yogyatā

original: tathā ca svarūpayogyatāmindriyārthayobruvatā nirantarotpāda eva vaktavyaḥ,
analyzed: tathā ca svarūpa yogyatām indriya arthayoḥ bruvatā nirantara utpādaḥ eva vaktavyaḥ
na punar vyavahita viprakṛṣṭa utpannānām kvacid api svarūpa yogyatā nāma
tasmāt prāptau sva rūpa atiriktāyām vipratipadyeta

original: na tu nirantarotpāde 'pi tatrādhikāprāptiḥ sādhanamarhatītyāśayavānāha---niṣetsyete hīti //
analyzed: na tu nirantara utpāde api tatra adhika aprāptiḥ sādhanam arhati iti āśayavān āha niṣetsyete hi iti

original: evaṃ nivāritābhimānaḥ paradarśane 'pi pramāṇamapaśyan sandigdha iti //
analyzed: evam nivārita abhimānaḥ para darśane api pramāṇam apaśyan sandigdhaḥ iti

original: nanu janakatve satīti nirṇayahetuṃ paśyan kathaṃ nāma sandigdha ityata āha---ayamabhisandhiriti /

original: tvagādīnāṃ daṇḍādīnāṃ ca prāptānāmeva kāryajanakatvaṃ paśyan kathamiva sarvatra vipratipadyata ityato vipratipattibījamāha---yogyatayaiveti
analyzed: tvac ādīnām daṇḍa ādīnām ca prāptānām eva kārya janaka tvam paśyan katham iva sarvatra vipratipadyate iti atas vipratipatti bījam āha yogyatayā eva iti

original: nanvayaskāntasyāprāpyakāritve hetvantare 'pi kaḥ pratīkāra ityata āha---ayaskāntamaṇeriti /
analyzed: nanu ayaskāntasya aprāpyakāri tve hetu antare api kaḥ pratīkāraḥ iti atas āha ayaskānta maṇeḥ iti

original: nanu tasya vṛttibhedaḥ anupalambhabādhita ityata uktam---cakṣuṣa iveti /
analyzed: nanu tasya vṛtti bhedaḥ anupalambha bādhitaḥ iti atas uktam cakṣuṣaḥ iva iti

vyavadhāna viprakarṣau hi anirantara utpādaḥ vā syāt aprāptiḥ vā
svarūpa yogyatā vā
tatra anirantara utpāda abhāvaḥ
nirantara utpādaḥ syāt

original: na ca kṛṣpāsārasyārthena maṇervā lohena nirantarotpādaḥ saṃbhavati /
analyzed: na ca kṛṣpā sārasya arthena maṇeḥ vā lohena nirantara utpādaḥ saṃbhavati
aprāpti abhāvaḥ tu prāptiḥ eva
tathā ca kaḥ pratikūlaḥ anukūlam ācarati

original: sa ca bauddhanaye kāraṇajātīyasya nirantarotpādānna bhidyata ityuktam /
analyzed: sa ca bauddha naye kāraṇa jātīyasya nirantara utpādāt na bhidyate iti uktam

original: tasmāt sthiranaye kāryaṃ janayanti kāraṇāni parasparaprāptiṃ vā vyabhicaranti,

original: nanu lakṣaṇāntareṇa vyavasthite lakṣye kathamanyonyāśrayatvamityata āha---agatirveti /
analyzed: nanu lakṣaṇa antareṇa vyavasthite lakṣye katham anyonya āśraya tvam iti atas āha agatiḥ vā iti
tat hi lakṣya sāpekṣam anapekṣam vā
ādye anyonya āśraya tva doṣāt eva āgatiḥ

original: uttaratra tu avagate lakṣye tatsāpekṣeṇa lakṣaṇena kiṃ gamayitavyamityagatirevetyarthaḥ /
analyzed: uttaratra tu avagate lakṣye tad sāpekṣeṇa lakṣaṇena kim gamayitavyam iti agatiḥ eva iti arthaḥ
asti hi iti

original: yadi vijñānābhinnahetujatvāt sukhaṃ vijñānajātīyaṃ syāt sukhābhinnahetujatvāt tadapi sukhajātīyaṃ bhavet /

vijñānam na sukhena abhinna hetu jam iti ced
evam tarhi katham sukham api vijñānena abhinna hetu jam iti arthaḥ
nanu jñāna hetu anugamaḥ sukhe api asti
na tu sukha hetu anugamaḥ jñāne
atas yat kāraṇa anugamaḥ
yatra tad jātīya tvam tatra astu
yathā āḍkura mātra kāraṇa anugame yava aḍkurasya api aḍkura jātīya tvam

original: na tu sarvasya yavāḍkuratvam tatkāraṇānugamābhāvādityāśayavān āśaṅkate---avāntareti /
analyzed: na tu sarvasya yava āḍkura tvam tad kāraṇa anugama abhāvāt iti āśayavān āśaṅkate avāntara iti

original: na hyasti niyamo yajjātīyakāryahetucakrānagamo yatra tatra tajjātīyatvamiti /
analyzed: na hi asti niyamaḥ yad jātīya kārya hetu cakra anagamaḥ yatra tatra tad jātīya tvam iti
bīja jātīya kārya hetu cakra anugame api aḍkurasya bīja ajātīya tvāt iti sāmānya upasaṃhāre anaikāntika tvam
viśeṣa upasaṃhāre tu
sandigdha anaikāntika tvam āha na kiñcid iti
ākasmika tva prasaṅga bhayāt hi kārya bheda upapattaye sakala kāraṇa bhedam anusaran prayasyati bhavān

original: sa ca kāryabhedaḥ kiñcitkāraṇabhedenaiva bījāḍkurādivat jñānasukhādāvapyanākasmika ityarthaḥ /
analyzed: sa ca kārya bhedaḥ kiñcid kāraṇa bhedena eva bīja aḍkura ādi vat jñāna sukha ādau api an ākasmikaḥ iti arthaḥ
tat idam uktam tad artha tvāt ca iti
nanu rūpa rasa gandha sparśānām hi upādāna bheda abheda mātra anuviddham tad jātīya a tad jātīya tvam

original: na hyasti saṃbhavo rūpādyupādānaṃ cārūpādikaṃ ceti /
analyzed: na hi asti saṃbhavaḥ rūpa ādi upādānam ca arūpa ādikam ca iti
atas jñāna upādāna tve sukham jñāna jātīyam eva syāt

original: ajñānatve vā na jñānopādānatvamiti yadi pratyavatiṣṭhate tatrāha---na ceti /
analyzed: ajñāna tve vā na jñāna upādāna tvam iti yadi pratyavatiṣṭhate tatra āha na ca iti
yadi hi eka jātīya upādānatayā eka jātīya tvam bhavet
avāntara eka jātīyam api kim na syāt
tathā ca ekasmāt samanantara pratyayāt aneka avāntara jātī naya anutpāda prasaṅgaḥ

original: dṛśyate ca rūpajñānād rūpajñānaṃ rasajñānādijātīyaṃ ca /
analyzed: dṛśyate ca rūpa jñānāt rūpa jñānam rasa jñāna ādi jātīyam ca
sākṣātkāriṇaḥ sākṣātkāraḥ ca asākṣātkaraḥ ca ityādi
atha vilakṣaṇa aneka sahakāri praveśāt aneka avāntara jātīya kārya karaṇa svabhāvasya kasya nacid eva utpāda niyamaḥ upapādya
evam avāntara jāti bheda upapādana vat vivakṣita eka jātīya upādāna tve api vilakṣaṇa aneka sahakāri praveśāt
vivakṣita aneka jātīya kārya karaṇa svabhāvasya kasyacid eva utpāda niyamaḥ upapatsyate iti arthaḥ

original: so 'yamekopādānakatve 'pyavāntarajātibhedābhyupagamaḥ pareṣāṃ dṛṣṭāntārthamubhdāvitaḥ api cetyādyubhdāvitaṃ sandigdhavyāvṛttikatvaṃ sphuṭhayitumato  #
analyzed: saḥ ayam eka upādānaka tve api avāntara jāti bheda abhyupagamaḥ pareṣām dṛṣṭānta artham ubh dāvitaḥ api ca ityādi ubh dāvitam sandigdha vyāvṛttika tvam sphuṭhayitum atas
na a saṅgatam iti
tat etat sakalam bauddha siddhānta abhyupagamena uktam

original: paramārthatastu yadupādānavat tatsajātīyaṃ yadvyāpakopādānavat tadguṇajātīyamiti niyamaḥ /
analyzed: paramārthataḥ tu yat upādānavat tat sajātīyam yat vyāpaka upādānavat tat guṇa jātīyam iti niyamaḥ
atas parama niyamaḥ

original: tadyadi sattayā guṇatvena vā sukhajñānayorekajātīyatvaṃ sādhyate,
analyzed: tat yadi sattayā guṇa tvena vā sukha jñānayoḥ eka jātīya tvam sādhyate
tadā siddha sādhanam
anyatra aniyame asaḍkīrṇam udāharaṇam āha atas eva iti
eka upādāna tve api rūpa ādīnām na vyakti kṛtaḥ bhedaḥ

original: nāpyavāntara jātikṛtaḥ nāpi guṇatayā piṭharopādānatve 'pi karmaṇo 'guṇatvāt /
analyzed: na api avāntara jāti kṛtaḥ na api guṇatayā piṭhara upādāna tve api karmaṇaḥ aguṇa tvāt
atra upādāna mātra balena yathā dravya guṇa karmaṇām asatām eva sattvam bahis
tathā āntaram api jñāna sukha ādīnām
yathā ca dravya tvam pṛthivī ādīnām
guṇa tvam rūpa ādīnām
karma tvam utkṣepaṇa ādīnām
tathā avāntara kāraṇa bhedāt darśana sparśana smaraṇa ādīnām jñāna tvam nirūpādhi anukūla anūkūlatara ādīnām sukha tvam ityādi
ekam avāntara asādhāraṇa nimitta ādi bhedāt yathā pṛthivyāḥ
rūpasya śukla ādi bhedaḥ

original: utkṣepaṇasya ca pāṭavādibhedastathā jñānasyāpi darśanādibhedaḥ sukhasyāpi tāratamyādibhedo bhaviṣyatītyarthaḥ //
analyzed: utkṣepaṇasya ca pāṭava ādi bhedaḥ tathā jñānasya api darśana ādi bhedaḥ sukhasya api tāratamya ādi bhedaḥ bhaviṣyati iti arthaḥ

original: syādetat, ajñānarūpatāyāṃ punaḥ kiṃ pramāṇamityata upasaṃhāravyājenāha---tasmāditi /
analyzed: syāt etat ajñāna rūpa tāyām punar kim pramāṇam iti atas upasaṃhāra vyājena āha tasmāt iti
yadi api vijñāna sukha ādīnām bhinna jātīya tvam anubhava siddham

original: na hi candanamahaṃ jānāmītyatra sukhaṃ parisphurati tadāhaṃ sukhīti syāt /
analyzed: na hi candanam aham jānāmi iti atra sukham parisphurati tadā aham sukhī iti syāt

original: nāpi sukhyahamityatra jñānaṃ parisphurati tadā jānāmīti syāt,
analyzed: nā api sukhī aham iti atra jñānam parisphurati tadā jānāmi iti syāt
na ca etat asti

original: jñānaviśeṣaḥ sukhaṃ tathāvidhe ca sukhabuddhirbhavatyeveti cet---hanta bhostasya jñānaviśeṣasya viṣayaviśeṣo 'pyasti na vā?
analyzed: jñāna viśeṣaḥ sukham tathāvidhe ca sukha buddhiḥ bhavati eva iti bhoḥ tasya jñāna viśeṣasya viṣaya viśeṣaḥ api asti na vā
na asti ced
nirviṣaya jñānam sukham iti prāptam

original: na caitad dṛṣṭamiṣṭaṃ śakayaṃ vā sādhayitum /
analyzed: na ca etat dṛṣṭam iṣṭam śakayam vā sādhayitum
asti ced bāhyaḥ ābhyantaraḥ vā
na tāvat bāhyaḥ kaścid viṣaya bhedaḥ asti

original: yadeva hi rāgavatā gītamanubhūyate tadeva vītarāgeṇāpi /
analyzed: yat eva hi rāgavatā gītam anubhūyate tat eva vīta rāgeṇa api
tat eva gītam
param rāgavatā anukūla tayā
vīta rāgeṇa tu tad viparīta tayā iti ced
kim anukūla tvam asya nirūpa adhikam
sa upādhikam vā
katham kañcid prati
sopādhika tve saḥ evā ucyatām
icchā eva upādhiḥ iti ced na
itaretara āśraya tva prasaḍgāt
iṣyamāṇa tvāt anukūla tvam
tena ca iṣyamāṇa tvam iti

original: tasmāt tasya jñānaviśeṣasya sukhatvenābhimatasyābhyantara eva viṣayaviśeṣo nisargānukūlasvabhāva eṣṭavyaḥ,
analyzed: tasmāt tasya jñāna viśeṣasya sukha tvena abhimatasya ābhyantaraḥ eva viṣaya viśeṣaḥ nisarga anukūla svabhāvaḥ eṣṭavyaḥ

original: yaddhetutayā bāhyo viṣayo 'nukūlatayābhimatatveneṣyamāṇo bhavati sa evoktarūpo viṣayaḥ sukhamityucyate /
analyzed: yad hetutayā bāhyaḥ viṣayaḥ anukūla tayā abhimata tvena iṣyamāṇaḥ bhavati saḥ eva ukta rūpaḥ viṣayaḥ sukham iti ucyate

original: tathāpi mūḍhadhiyāṃ vyavahārārthaṃ samānāsamānajātīyavyavacchedakā dharmā jñānādīnāmuktāḥ /
analyzed: tathā api mūḍha dhiyām vyavahāra artham samāna asamāna jātīya vyavacchedakāḥ dharmāḥ jñāna ādīnām uktāḥ
tatra artha pravaṇa tvam jñānasya artha nirūpaṇa adhīna nirūpaṇa tvam iti arthaḥ
tat apravaṇa tvam ajñāna lakṣaṇam
tatra api anukūla vedanīya tvam sukha lakṣaṇam
pratikūla vedanīya tvam duḥkhasya iti evamādi samāna tantra anusādeṇa boddhavyam iti arthaḥ
nanu ajñāna ātmaka tve ghaṭa ādi vat avaśya saṃvedyāḥ sukha ādayaḥ na bhaveyuḥ
avaśya saṃvedyāḥ ca te
na hi a saṃvidite
sukhe pramāṇam anyat asti
tat etat jñāna ātma tve param upapadyate sva saṃvedana tvāt iti atas āha tīvra saṃvegi tayā iti

original: santi hi padārthāḥ svakarmopārjitatvāviśeṣe 'pi kecidadhyakṣā eva,
analyzed: santi hi padārthāḥ sva karma upārjita tva aviśeṣe api kecid adhyakṣāḥ eva
yathā sva śarīra ādayaḥ
kecid tu parokṣāḥ eva
yathā tad antargata nāḍī saṃsthāna ādayaḥ

original: evamajñānatvāviśeṣe 'pi kāraṇalabdhasvabhāvabhedāḥ kecit avaśyasaṃvedyāḥ sukhādayaḥ kecidanyathetyarthaḥ //
analyzed: evam ajñāna tva aviśeṣe api kāraṇa labdha svabhāva bhedāḥ kecid avaśya saṃvedyāḥ sukha ādayaḥ kecid anyathā iti arthaḥ
sagotram utthāpayati syāt etat iti
tathā api jāgara avasthāyām tāvat anubhava janana dvārā sukha utpattau indriya artha sannikarṣaḥ upayujyate
anyathā sukha vat anubhavaḥ api tena vinā eva syāt
na ca sākṣāt kāraṇam eva kāraṇam
tathā sati vyāpāriṇaḥ udāsīnāḥ prasajyeran
vyāpāra avyavadhāyaka tva vādaḥ tu atra api tulyaḥ iti atas āha aindriya artha sannikarṣasya tu iti
jñāna mātram avyāpārībhūtam tatra upayogāt iti arthaḥ
ayam āśayaḥ
bhavet evam yadi indriya artha sannikarṣasya jñānam vyāpāraḥ syāt
sa hi vyāpārī avyabhicārī bhavati

original: jñānaṃ punaḥ kāryāvasānamapi indriyārthasannikarṣam atipatatyeva svapnāntike /
analyzed: jñānam punar kārya avasānam api indriya artha sannikarṣam atipatati eva svapna antike
anyathā tu vyāpāra kalpanāyām aniyama prasaṅgaḥ iti
pariharati tat ayuktam iti asiddheḥ apratīteḥ
pramāṇa abhāvāt iti śeṣaḥ
nanu mānasaḥ atra anubhavaḥ pramāṇam iti atas āha tad jñānasya iti
kutas mithyātva avagatiḥ iti atas āha yathā hi iti

original: ālambnaṃ tvasya viparyāsasya yathā pūrvānubhūtā smaraṇārhā kāminītyevaṃ tajjānmapūrvānubhūtaṃ smaraṇārhaṃ sukhameva /
analyzed: ālambnam tu asya viparyāsasya yathā pūrva anubhūtā smaraṇa arhā kāminī iti evam tad ja anma pūrva anubhūtam smaraṇa arham sukham eva

original: viparyāsatvaṃ punaretāvataivāsya yat viprakṛṣṭadeśakālayoḥ kāminītajjanyasukhayoḥ sannikṛṣṭadeśakālatayāvabhāsaḥ /
analyzed: viparyāsa tvam punar etāvatā eva asya yat viprakṛṣṭa deśa kālayoḥ kāminī tad janya sukhayoḥ sannikṛṣṭa deśa kāla tayā avabhāsaḥ
na punar akāminī asukhayoḥ kāminī sukha tvena pratibhānam

original: tathā sati kāminītvasukhatvaniṣedhenānyasya kasyacit pratibhāsanaṃ bādhakaṃ bhavet /
analyzed: tathā sati kāminī tva sukha tva niṣedhena anyasya kasyacid pratibhāsanam bādhakam bhavet

original: na ca vācyam yadi na svapnāntike sukhamutpadyate na
analyzed: na ca vācyam yadi na svapna antike sukham utpadyate na
na smai ghirahī spṛhayet iti
mohāt asādhane api pravṛtti darśanāt
śīta apanuttaye guñjā puñjaḥ iva markaṭānām
tat idam uktam smaraṇa viparyāsaḥ iti

original: smaraṇe prāpte viparyāsaḥ smaraṇaviparyāsaḥ anubhavalakṣaṇastadviṣaya evetyarthaḥ //
analyzed: smaraṇe prāpte viparyāsaḥ smaraṇa viparyāsaḥ anubhava lakṣaṇaḥ tad viṣayaḥ eva iti arthaḥ

original: nanu sukhaduḥkhotpādaprayojanau dharmādharmau yadasukhaduḥkhārūpān dehādīn utpādayataḥ tattadarthatayaiva,
analyzed: nanu sukha duḥkha utpāda prayojanau dharma adharmau yat asukha duḥkha arūpān deha ādīn utpādayataḥ tad tad artha tayā eva
evam tayoḥ sarva utpattimatām nimitta tvam nirvahati
idam tu svapna jñānam na sukha rūpam
saṃkha sādhanam api yadi na syāt
na tarhi dharma nimittakam
na api adharma nimittakam aduḥkha tvāt a tad hetuka tvāt ca
tatas ca adṛṣṭa nirapekṣa utpattiḥ asya ca bahu ākulayet iti atas āha sukha iti
sukha ādi upabhogaḥ hi adṛṣṭasya pradhānam prayojanam
na ca sukhādi svarūpataḥ upabhogaḥ
kim tu tad anubhavaḥ

original: sa ca pratyutpannasukhādyanālambanatve 'pi pūrvotpannam ālambya jāyamānaḥ sarvaṃ samañjasayati /
analyzed: sa ca pratyutpanna sukha ādi anālambana tve api pūrva utpannam ālambya jāyamānaḥ sarvam samañjasayati
na ca sarvatra evam astu sāmagrī vaicitryāt
satya mithyā pratyaya vibhāga vyavasthāpanāt
na hi ekadā upalabdha rajata viṣaya saṃskāra vaśāt arajate api rajata pratyayaḥ iti sarvadā evam eva astu iti vaktum ucitam
yaḥ tu manyate svapne tāvat sukha ādikam anubhūyate iti avivādam

original: tatra tu bādhakaṃ bhavad dvirūpaṃ bhavet---asukhametaditi vā,
analyzed: tatra tu bādhakam bhavat dvirūpam bhavet asukham etat iti vā
na āsīt sukham iti vā
na ca etat asti

original: jāgarāvasthāyāṃ tu nāsīt kāminīti yujyate bādhakaṃ sthiratvāt /
analyzed: jāgara avasthāyām tu nā āsīt kāminī iti yujyate bādhakam sthira tvāt
sahasā apasaraṇasya api asaṃbhavāt
tad kāryāṇām ca daśana nakha kṣata ādīnām ananuvṛtteḥ
carama dhātu visarga ādīnām ca anuvṛttau api a tad kārya tvāt
tad kārya tvena tad anuvṛttau anyeṣām api tad kāryāṇām anuvṛtti prasaḍgāt

original: nāstīdānīṃ sukhamiti tvidānīntarasukhasya bādho na prāktanasya,
analyzed: na asti idānīm sukham iti tu idānīntara sukhasya bādhaḥ na prāktanasya
kṣaṇika tvāt tasya

original: tatkāryāṇāṃ ca harṣāśrupulakādīnāmanuvartamānānāmupalambhādanyathā āśutaravināśināṃ kṣaṇāntare 'darśanāt tadanubhavānāmaprāmāṇikatvameva syāt
analyzed: tad kāryāṇām ca harṣa aśru pulaka ādīnām anuvartamānānām upalambhāt anyathā āśutara vināśinām kṣaṇa antare adarśanāt tad anubhavānām aprāmāṇika tvam eva syāt

original: tasmātabādhitānubhavasiddhatvādasti svapnāntike sukhamiti taṃ pratyāha---na cāsatīti /
analyzed: tasmāt abādhita anubhava siddha tvāt asti svapnāntike sukham iti tam pratyāha na ca asati iti
yadi api svapnāntika sukhasya jāgara avasthāyām āhatya bādhakam nā asti

original: tathāpi svapnāntika eva tatkāraṇatvena pratītānāṃ candanavanitādīnāmasti bādhakam /
analyzed: tathā api svapnāntike eva tad kāraṇa tvena pratītānām candana vanitā ādīnām asti bādhakam

original: kāraṇe ca bādhite kāryaṃ bādhitameva yathā svapnāntikadṛṣṭapayodapaṭalabādhe
analyzed: kāraṇe ca bādhite kāryam bādhitam eva yathā svapna antika dṛṣṭa payoda paṭala bādhe
tad āśrayaḥ vidyut udyotaḥ

original: harṣāśruprabhṛtayastu na sukhakāryāḥ kiṃ tu sukhajñānakāryā iti na tāvanmātreṇa tatsaṃbhavopapattiḥ /
analyzed: harṣa aśru prabhṛtayaḥ tu na sukha kāryāḥ kim tu sukha jñāna kāryāḥ iti na tāvat mātreṇa tad saṃbhava upapattiḥ

original: tasmāt svapnāntikodāharaṇabalena jñānamātrakāryato sukhasya sidhyatīti manorathādyudāhṛtya parihṛtam //
analyzed: tasmāt svapnāntika udāharaṇa balena sukhasya sidhyati iti manoratha ādi udāhṛtya parihṛtam
caturdhā khalu saṃsāriṇām sukham utpadyate
kiñcid abhyāsāt yathā mṛgayā ādiṣu
kiñcid abhimānāt yathā candana ādiṣu
viṣaya saṃbhogāt yathā surabhi madhura gaura gāndhāra ādiṣu
kiñcid manoratha ādi saṃpratyaya mātrāt yathā bhaviṣyat putra ādi janma dina mahā utsava anucintana ādiṣu
te ca amī sva rūpa bhedavantaḥ anubhūyante

original: na hi yathā manoratheṣu sukhaṃ tathā viṣayasaṃbhoge /
analyzed: na hi yathā manoratheṣu sukham tathā viṣaya saṃbhoge
tathā sati tad parityāgena anya upādāna vaiyarthyāt
tāvat eva hi bubhukṣitaḥ modakān manorathayati
yāvat amī na asya paramārthataḥ sannidhīyante
atha manoratha vyasanam apahāya tatra eva niyamataḥ pravartate
tad eka jātīya tve sarvam asamañjasam syāt
jāti bhede tu kāraṇa bhedaḥ avaśya abhyupetavyaḥ iti arthaḥ
tat atra indriya artha sannikarṣasya sattvam anuvidha tve sukha utpattiḥ iti siddhāntinaḥ vivakṣitam
tat ca anyathā asiddham iti manvānaḥ punar pūrva uktam smārayati jñāna mātram eva iti
na atra tad sattva anuvidhāna mātram vivakṣitam
kim nāma jāti bhedaḥ
kāraṇa bhedam ākṣipati

original: sa ca kāraṇabhedo 'nuvihitabhāvābhāva eva sidhyatītyatra vivakṣitamiti pratipipādayiṣuruktam evānubhāṣate /
analyzed: sa ca kāraṇa bhedaḥ anuvihita bhāva abhāvaḥ eva sidhyati iti atra vivakṣitam iti pratipipādayiṣuḥ uktam eva anubhāṣate
na viṣaya asannidhāne iti
tat idam uktam tādṛśasya sukha bhedasya anutpādāt iti
yādṛśaḥ indriya artha sannikarṣāt utpadyate iti śeṣaḥ
śaṅkate viṣaya iti

original: jñānābhede hi bhinnajātīyaṃ sukhaṃ kāraṇāntaraṃ bhinnamākṣipet /
analyzed: jñāna abhede hi bhinna jātīyam sukham kāraṇa antaram bhinnam ākṣipet
iha tu jñānam eva bhinna jātīyam iti arthaḥ
pariharati hanta īśvarasya api iti
nanu viṣaya sākṣātkāraḥ api iṣṭa upalabdhi lakṣaṇaḥ sukha hetuḥ

original: sa ca tādṛśo nāstīśvare tasya bubhukṣāvirahāt ,
analyzed: sa ca tādṛśaḥ nā asti īśvare tasya bubhukṣā virahāt
katham tasya sukha utpāda prasaṅgaḥ iti atas āha yoga ṛddhi sampannānām iti

original: nanu te 'pyalaṃpratyayavantaḥ kathamiva sukhabhājo bhaveyurityata āha--asatyāmiti /

original: na hi te sarvadaiva pratipakṣadhāraṇāvanto mā bhūdamīṣāṃ sarvadā bhogavirahād dharmādharmapracayatādavasthyam /
analyzed: na hi te sarvadā eva pratipakṣa dhāraṇāvantaḥ mā bhūt amīṣām sarvadā bhoga virahāt dharma adharma pracaya tādavasthyam

original: tasmād yadā pratipakṣadhāraṇā nāsti tadā viṣayasākṣātkāramātrādeva teṣāṃ sukhaṃ prasajyetetyarthaḥ //
analyzed: tasmāt yadā pratipakṣa dhāraṇā nā asti tadā viṣaya sākṣātkāra mātrāt eva teṣām sukham prasajyeta iti arthaḥ
na ca vācyam
yadi bhavet evam kīdṛśaḥ doṣaḥ iti

iṣṭa aniṣṭa sākṣātkārasya ekasmin eva śarīre manasā eva siddha tvāt

original: na cendriyāṇāmarthānāṃ ca parasparamasannikṛṣṭānāmeva sattāmātraiṇa kvacidātmadharmasamutpāde sāmarthyamadhigatam,
analyzed: na ca indriyāṇām arthānām ca parasparam asannikṛṣṭānām eva sattā mātraiṇa kvacid ātma dharma samutpāde sāmarthyam adhigatam

original: tasmād yogarddhimatāṃ satyapi viṣayasākṣātkāre indriyārthasannikarṣābhāvāt sukhaṃ nāstītyabhipretyopasaṃharati--tasmāditi /
analyzed: tasmāt yoga ṛddhimatām sati api viṣaya sākṣātkāre indriya artha sannikarṣa abhāvāt sukham na asti iti abhipretya upasaṃharati tasmāt iti
tat ayam pramāṇa arthaḥ
yoga ṛddhīni indriyāṇi sukha duḥkha samutpāda prayojanāni
sukha duḥkha tap dodha anya tve sati anyatra ācāritārtha tvāt
iṣṭa aniṣṭa upalabdhi vat

asmāt ādi viṣaya sākṣātkāra vat iti

original: so 'yaṃ sannikarṣo yadā nāsti tadā teṣāmapi na sukhādikamiti /

original: ato na teṣāṃ sukhotpādaprasaṅga ityata āha--api ceti /

original: kathaṃ na tasya kāraṇatā sukhādikaṃ prati?

original: sā ca vyavacchittirvyāvṛttipratītirūbhābhyāṃ kriyata iti tadubhayamāha--viśeṣaṇamiti //

original: api ca yadi śabdārthayoḥ sāmānādhikaraṇye upāyopeyabhāva upādhiḥ syāt,

original: ayaṃ śabdo gakārādyākāro na tu sāsnādyākāra iti tātparyam /

original: na tvayaṃ ḍitthaśabda iti tameva niṣedhasi ceti kimidamityata āha--autsargikaṃ hīti /

original: yatra tarhi asaṃbhadena saṃketagrahe nityādipadāni santi,

original: svaparo 'pi yadi na syād vyarthaḥ prayogaḥ syādityata āha--yatrāpīti /

original: yathā hi gaurvāhīka ityatra gotvaṃ goguṇayogalakṣakatvena vāhikopādhirna tatsamavāyāt,

original: tathā hi ḍittho 'yamityatrāpi ḍitthaśabdo vācyatvopalakṣakatayā piṇḍopādhirna tu tatsamavāyāt tādātmyād veti /

original: yathā cātra vāhīke gauriti pratyayābhāvaḥ pramāṇam,

analyzed: tathā atra api vṛkṣa viśaiṣe ḍitthaḥ ayam iti pratyaya abhāvaḥ pramāṇam iti samudāya arthaḥ

original: nanu śabdapuraḥsaratvaniyamād vikalpasya tadupāyatā vā tadviṣayatvaṃ vā syāt,
analyzed: nanu śabda puraḥsara tva niyamāt vikalpasya tad upāya tā vā tad viṣaya tvam vā syāt

original: tatpuraḥsaratvaniyamasyātadupāyādatadviṣayatvānniyamato vyāvṛtteḥ tatra yadyarthavikalpastacchabdavipayastadā siddhaṃ naḥ samīhitam /

atha upāyaḥ tadā jñātaḥ a jñātaḥ vā

original: tasmāt śabda upāyo bhavan jñāta eva vaktavyaḥ /

original: tasmādarthatādātmyāt śabdasyārthasannidhānameva tatsannidhiḥ ityarthālocanameva tadālocanamityanicchatāpi svīkartavyamityata āha--yattviti
analyzed: tasmāt artha tādātmyāt śabdasya artha sannidhānam eva tad sannidhiḥ iti artha ālocanam eva tat ālocanam iti an icchatā api svīkartavyam iti atas āha yat tu iti

original: na tāvat śabdaḥ pūrvaṃ niyamato bhavati vikalpasya /
analyzed: na tāvat śabdaḥ pūrvam niyamataḥ bhavati vikalpasya

original: kiṃ nāma? vyutpannasya śabdasmaraṇapuraḥsaratvaṃ niyamavad dṛṣṭam /

tathā sati ghaṭa abhāva jñānasya api ghaṭa viṣaya tā syāt
tad smaraṇa puraḥsara tvāt

original: tasmād ghaṭe vikalpayitatavye anupāyo viṣayaśca ghaṭaśabdaḥ kimiti niyamataḥ smaryata ityavaśiṣyate /
analyzed: tasmāt ghaṭe anupāyaḥ viṣayaḥ ca ghaṭa śabdaḥ kim iti niyamataḥ smaryate iti avaśiṣyate
tatra iyam smaraṇa paripāṭī kathitā iti
śabda puraḥsarā śabda smaraṇa puraḥsarā iti arthaḥ
atra eva vṛddha saṃmatim āha yat āhuḥ iti
prati sambandhi piṇḍa darśana sahakṛtaḥ tad saṃskāraḥ smṛtim janayati
dhūma anubhava sahakṛtaḥ iva mahānasa stha dahana anubhava prabhavaḥ saṃskāraḥ tad smṛtim
na ca etāvatā niyamā iva śabda smaraṇa piṇḍa vikalpayoḥ rūpāya upeya bhāvaḥ
śabdasya vā vikalpa viṣaya tvam sidhyati
yena tayoḥ tādātmyam āśaḍkyeta
tathā sati vahni smaraṇa dhūma vikalpayoḥ api tathābhāvaḥ syāt
vahneḥ api vā dhūma vikalpa viṣaya tā bhavet iti vārttika arthaḥ
syāt etat

original: sarva eva vyavahāraḥ svārthaḥ parārtho vā vikalpasādhyo na tvālocanenāpi kaścidarthaḥ sādhayitavyo 'sti /
analyzed: sarvaḥ eva vyavahāraḥ sva arthaḥ para arthaḥ vā vikalpa sādhyaḥ na tu ālocanena api kaścid arthaḥ sādhayitavyaḥ asti
atas niṣprayojanam idam katham utpadyate iti atas āha tasmāt iti

original: na tāvat sarvasyaivotpattimataḥ prayojanaṃ piśitacakṣuṣaḥ sākṣātkurmaḥ /
analyzed: na tāvat sarvasya eva utpattimataḥ prayojanam piśita cakṣuṣaḥ sākṣātkurmaḥ

original: na ca prayojanāpratipattimātreṇa paṭutarapratyakṣaparikalitamapi kāryaṃ nānumanyāmahe /
analyzed: na ca prayojana apratipatti mātreṇa paṭutara pratyakṣa parikalitam api kāryam na anumanyāmahe
tat etat prayojana apratipatti lakṣaṇam alīkam uttaram

original: tathāpi sphuṭaṃ savikalpakotpattirevāsya prayojanam iti sādarśiteti //
analyzed: tathā api sphuṭam sa vikalpaka utpattiḥ eva asya prayojanam iti sā ādarśi tā iti
nāmadheya smaraṇāya iti

original: nāmāvacchinne vikalpe kartavye yato na viśiṣyate viśeṣeṇa na gṛhyate,
analyzed: nāma avacchinne vikalpe kartavye yatas na viśiṣyate viśeṣeṇa na gṛhyate

original: ato vaidharmyasya yogyapramāṇabādhitatvāt tadarthajñānaṃ tādṛgeva bhavati tatsamānajātīyameva bhavatītyarthaḥ /
analyzed: atas vaidharmyasya yogya pramāṇa bādhita tvāt tad artha jñānam tādṛś eva bhavati tad samāna jātīyam eva bhavati iti arthaḥ

original: ato bhāṣyapaunarūktyaṃ pariharato na sādhyāviśiṣṭo heturiti //
analyzed: atas bhāṣya paunarūktyam pariharataḥ na sādhya aviśiṣṭaḥ hetuḥ iti
vyapadeśa vyākhyayā bhāṣyakāreṇa sūcitam hetum sphuṭayati nanu iti
artha vyapadeśa ākāram artha vyapadeśa viṣayam
viṣayi rūpa jñānasya tāvat rūpa viṣaya tā ubhaya vādi siddhā

original: tasya ca tadvyapadeśaviṣayatā tadā syāt yadi rūpatadvyapadeśayorabhedaḥ syādityarthaḥ //
analyzed: tasya ca tad vyapadeśa viṣaya tā tadā syāt yadi rūpa tad vyapadeśayoḥ abhedaḥ syāt iti arthaḥ

original: anyenānyasya vyapadeśe atiprasaḍgo vyavahāravilopaśca vipralambhādityatra tannāmadheyatvādeva niyama iti sphuṭaṃ bhāṣya eva /
analyzed: anyena anyasya vyapadeśe ati prasaḍgaḥ vyavahāra vilopaḥ ca vipralambhāt iti atra tad nāmadheya tvāt eva niyamaḥ iti sphuṭam bhāṣye eva

original: svarūpeṇaiva viṣayeṇaiva vā kimiti jñānaṃ na vyapadiśyata ityetad vivṛṇvan pariharati--arthākārameveti /
analyzed: svarūpeṇa eva viṣayeṇa eva vā kim iti jñānam na vyapadiśyate iti etat vivṛṇvan pariharati artha ākāram eva iti

original: ātmānaṃ prati tāvat svarūpeṇaiva jñānamajñānād vyavacchidyate,
analyzed: ātmānam prati tāvat sva rūpeṇa eva jñānam ajñānāt vyavacchidyate

original: jñānāntarāt tu viṣayeṇāpītyetat ko nāma nābhyupaiti?
analyzed: jñāna antarāt tu viṣayeṇa api iti etat kaḥ nāma na abhyupaiti
parasya tu nitya parokṣam para jñānam

original: ata eva tadviṣayo 'pi tat kathaṃ svarūpaviṣayābhyāṃ paro bodhyatām?
analyzed: atas eva tad viṣayaḥ api tat katham svarūpa viṣayābhyām paraḥ bodhyatām
katham vai a bodhitaḥ vyavaharatām
tasmāt tad jñāna vācakena jñānam artha vācakena ca āryam asau pratipādyaḥ
na ca ajñātena
vācakena vācyam adhigattum arhati iti avarjanīya tayā pratipādakaḥ vācakam uccārayati
na ca etāvatā artha śabdayoḥ abheda siddhiḥ

original: na hi pramāṇavyatirekeṇa prameyamadhigantuṃ na śakyate ityetāvataiva tayorabhedaḥ syāditi tadidamuktam--anyathā aśakyatvāditi //
analyzed: na hi pramāṇa vyatirekeṇa prameyam adhigantum na śakyate iti etāvatā eva tayoḥ abhedaḥ syāt iti tat idam uktam anyathā aśakya tvāt iti
nanu kadācid artha jñāna kāle api śabdaḥ vyāpriyate eva
yadā prayojaka vṛddhāt prayojya vṛddhaḥ aratham adhigacchati iti a āha pratīyamāna tayā viṣaya tayā iti arthaḥ
syāt etat
utkarṣa apakarṣa ādi anuvidhāyi tvam hetuḥ kīdṛṅ iti atas āha tat anena iti
na tāvat tāratama tva ādeḥ utkarṣāt mayūra ādeḥ iva gavādeḥ api utkarṣaḥ pratīyate

original: na hi gośabde karṇajapite 'pabhraṣṭe vā aṇīyān gauḥ kṛśa upahatākṛtirvikṛto vā pratīyate,
analyzed: na hi go śabde karṇa japite apabhraṣṭe vā aṇīyān gauḥ kṛśaḥ upahata ākṛtiḥ vikṛtaḥ vā pratīyate
viparīte vā viparītaḥ

original: nāpi sādhutvādibhedavato gośabdasya prāśastyamaprāśastyaṃ ca kiñcidasti /
analyzed: nā api sādhu tva ādi bhedavataḥ go śabdasya prāśastyam aprāśastyam ca kiñcid asti
nandābhadrā ityādi maṅgala saṃjñā niveśasya tu artha maṅgalya ādi vyabhicāraḥ sphuṭataraḥ eva
abhadra ādau api bhadra ādi vyapadeśāt
tasmāt vyavahāra utkarṣa apakarṣa mātreṇa na ubhada siddhiḥ atiprasaḍgāt iti arthaḥ
asya eva sākṣāt avyapadeśya padāt pratīyamānasya eva

original: śabdānuvyādharahitatā śabdārthānuvyādharahitatopapattirityato 'sya nirākaraṇaṃ sūcitamiti pūrvoktena na virodhaḥ //
analyzed: śabda anuvyādha rahita tā śabda artha anuvyādha rahita tā upapattiḥ iti atas asya nirākaraṇam sūcitam iti pūrva uktena na virodhaḥ
nanu vārttika tātparya vyākhyānam upakramya bhāṣya vyākhyā akāṇḍa kūṣmāṇḍa patana vṛttāntam anuharati iti atas āha tat etat bhdāṣyam iti
tat etat vārttikam vyākhyātum ayam asmākam bhāṣya vyākhyā pariśramaḥ iti arthaḥ

original: śabdo hi yatkāryo yatkāraṇaṃ yadgrāhyo yatpramāṇaṃ yadvirodhi yaddharmā yadrūpo yadviṣayaḥ,
analyzed: śabdaḥ hi yad kāryaḥ yat kāraṇam yat grāhyaḥ yat pramāṇam yad virodhi yad dharmāḥ yad rūpaḥ yad viṣayaḥ
tat akāryaḥ tat akāraṇam tat agrāhyaḥ tat apramāṇam tat avirodhya tad dharma a tad rūpaḥ a tad viṣayaḥ athaḥ pratyakṣataḥ eva avasīyate
tat etat asya artha jñānasya viṣaya bheda anuvidhāyi tvam śabda abh deda grāhaka tvam
yadi punar eṣā pratītiḥ bhedam ullikhantī api avadhīryate
tadā ukta dharmāṇām avirodhe dharmi parivartena api upalambhāḥ syuḥ
tatra udāharaṇa artham kāṃścid āha cākṣuṣam hi iti
cākṣuṣam hi cakṣuṣā eva janyate
rūpe eva niyatam rūpeṇa iva nirūpyate
na śabde pravartate
na śabdena eva nirūpyate iti arthaḥ
evam uttaratra api
viṣayi viṣaya aniyama prasaḍgām uktvā karma karaṇa aniyama prasaṅgam āha api ca iti
nanu śrotram eva asya kadācid na asti iti atas āha asti hi iti
kim atra pramāṇam atas āha śabda jñānam ca iti
nanu locana abhāve api agrahaṇam upapadyate iti atas āha asti hi iti
kim atra pramāṇam atas āha rūpa jñānam ca iti
upalakṣaṇam ca etat
artha sāmānyasya sarva indriya grāhya tvāt śabda sāmānyam api sarva indriyaiḥ gṛhyeta

original: śabdasāmānyasya vā śrotrendriyaikavedyatvāt arthasāmānyamapi śrotrendriyaikavedyaṃ bhavet /
analyzed: śabda sāmānyasya vā śrotra indriya eka vedya tvāt artha sāmānyam api śrotra indriya eka vedyam bhavet
tathā ca indriya antarāṇām vaiyarthyam iti api draṣṭavyam iti
itaretara abhāvavat tā vyavahāra abhāva prasaṅgam āha aśabdaḥ iti
upalakṣaṇam ca etat
anutpannaḥ vinaṣṭaḥ atyanta asān iti atra api abhāva traye vivakṣita viparītam āpadyate iti mantavyam
itaretara abhāva vyapadeśe virodha prasaṅgam āha abhāve iti

original: atrāpyanutpādo vināśo 'tyantābhāva iti viruddhaṃ syāditi mantavyam /
analyzed: atra api anutpādaḥ vināśaḥ atyanta abhāvaḥ iti viruddham syāt iti mantavyam
iha hi artha śabdena indriya grāhyaḥ eva abhipretaḥ urayamāṇa tayā iti vyākhyānāt

original: indriyasya ca grāhyaḥ sa eva yastajjanyajñānaviṣayaḥ /
analyzed: indriyasya ca grāhyaḥ saḥ eva yaḥ tad janya jñāna viṣayaḥ
tat amī cakṣuḥ ādi sannikṛṣṭāḥ api anya viṣaya jñāna apekṣāyāḥ
a tad arthāḥ eva
evam ca indriya gati jñāne kaḥ pratyakṣa tāyāḥ prasaṅgaḥ
na hi tad apekṣayā dhaṭa ādayaḥ tad arthāḥ

original: tasmādaprasakte 'pyarthaśabdasya padārthamātraparatvamabhyupagamya parihāre gatyantaraṃ vārttikakṛtā darśitam /
analyzed: tasmāt aprasakte api artha śabdasya padārtha mātra paratvam abhyupagamya parihāre gati antaram vārttikakṛtā darśitam
tat ca duḥkha bodham iti vyācaṣṭena etat iti
na etat indriya artha sannikarṣāt upajāyate sattā mātra vyavasthitāt

original: indriyārthasannikarṣo hyajñāyamāna eva sattāmātravyavasthitaḥ pratyakṣe vivakṣitaḥ /
analyzed: indriya artha sannikarṣaḥ hi ajñāyamānaḥ eva sattā mātra vyavasthitaḥ pratyakṣe vivakṣitaḥ
anumāne tu liṅgasya jñāyamāna tvam eva vivakṣitam
na tu sattā iti arthaḥ

original: nanvanumāne 'pi liḍgāsattaiva ki na vivakṣitetyata āha--ata eveti /
analyzed: nanu anumāne api liḍga asattā eva ki na vivakṣitā iti atas āha atas eva iti
tad smaraṇa mātrāt eva iti
mātra grahaṇam sattām amipretya na tu anumeya jñānam prati kāraṇatām amipretya
dhūmasya eva jñāyamānasya tad kāraṇa tvāt
anyathā tad kāla ananuvidhāna prasaḍgāt

original: catra hi viṣayānapekṣaṃ jñānameva kāraṇaṃ tatra na viṣayakālānuvidhānam /
analyzed: hi viṣaya anapekṣam jñānam eva kāraṇam tatra na viṣaya kāla anuvidhānam
yathā abhāva jñāne pratiyogi jñāna janye pratiyoginaḥ

original: api ca liḍgānapekṣasya liṅgajñānasya liḍgijñānajanakatve pramāṇādīnāṃ gatidvayavādo 'pi tatra tatra na syāt //
analyzed: api ca liḍga anapekṣasya liṅga jñānasya liḍgi jñāna janaka tve pramāṇa ādīnām gati dvaya vādaḥ api tatra tatra na syāt
tat ayam arthaḥ
indriya artha sannikarṣāt sattā mātra vyavasthitāt utpadyate jñānam tad sādhakatamam pratyakṣam
liḍgāt tu
pañca rūpa sampannāt api jñāyamānāt eva asataḥ api yat utpadyate jñānam tat anumānam iti

original: nanvindriyaviṣayeṣvityadhyāhārastarhi sūtre pūrveṣāṃ kiṃ mūlam ityata āha--imaṃ ceti /
analyzed: nanu indriya viṣayeṣu iti adhyāhāraḥ tarhi sūtre pūrveṣām kim mūlam iti atas āha emam ca iti

original: na hyanumeyasyendriyeṇa sannikarṣāditi vadatā hyevamuktaṃ yasyendriyeṇa sannikarṣāt tajjñānamutpadyate nāsau tasya viṣayaḥ,
analyzed: na hi anumeyasya indriyeṇa sannikarṣāt iti vadatā hi evam uktam yasya indriyeṇa sannikarṣāt tat jñānam utpadyate na asau tasya viṣayaḥ

original: yastu viṣayo na tasyendriyeṇa sannikarṣāt idaṃ jāyate /
analyzed: yaḥ tu viṣayaḥ na tasya indriyeṇa sannikarṣāt idam jāyate
tasmāt indriya artha sannikarṣāt upajātam vijñānam yadi tad artha viṣayam eva bhavati
tadā tat pratyakṣam
na ca etat sūtrāt labhyate

original: tasmād vārttikakṛtā eva kṛto 'yamadhyāhāra iti keścid buddham / sa
analyzed: tasmāt vārttika kṛtā eva kṛtaḥ ayam adhyāhāraḥ iti keścid buddham sa
ca ayam asaṅgataḥ bodhaḥ
adhyāhārasya ubhayathā api anupapatteḥ
tad vyāvartyasya anyathā eva vyāvartita tvāt aprasakteḥ ca iti arthaḥ

original: indriyārthasannikarṣādutpannasya hi jñānasya vyabhicārasaṃbhādavyabhicārīti viśeṣaṇaṃ yadyapi nānupapannam,
analyzed: indriya artha sannikarṣāt utpannasya hi jñānasya viśeṣaṇam yadi api na anupapannam
tathā api etat vyāvarttyasya sāmānya lakṣaṇena eva vyāvṛtta tvāt niṣprayojanam idam
avaśyam ca tat anuvartanīyam

original: na hi yata ityadhyāhṛtapadena karaṇamātraṃ parāmṛśyate tasyāprakṛtatvāt,
analyzed: na hi yatas iti adhyāhṛta padena karaṇa mātram parāmṛśyate tasya aprakṛta tvāt
kim tu pramā karaṇam
tathā ca ayam arthaḥ

original: indriyārthasannikarṣotpannaṃ jñānaṃ yataḥ pramāṇād bhavati tatpratyakṣam /
analyzed: indriya artha sannikarṣa utpannam jñānam yatas pramāṇāt bhavati tat pratyakṣam

original: evaṃ ca vyabhicāriṇi kaḥ prasaṅga ityata āha--yadyapīti //
analyzed: evam ca vyabhicāriṇi kaḥ prasaṅgaḥ iti atas āha yadi api iti

original: nanvavyabhicāripadakaraṇaṃ pramāṇapadānuvartanaṃ veti kaścid viśeṣa ityata āha--anyatheti /
analyzed: nanu avyabhicāri pada karaṇam pramāṇa pada anuvartanam vā iti kaścid viśeṣaḥ iti atas āha anyathā iti
avyabhicāri padam pramāṇa param iti arthaḥ
pramāṇasya eva avyabhicāri tvāt
yadi api tatra tad pūrvakam iti lakṣaṇa pada paryālocanayā eva vyabhicāri nirāsaḥ

original: na hyuktarūpe dve pratyakṣe pūrvaṃ yasya jñānasya tadvyabhicāriṇīmapi pramāṃ janayet /
analyzed: na hi ukta rūpe dve pratyakṣe pūrvam yasya jñānasya tad vyabhicāriṇīm api pramām janayet
atas eva tad artham tatra sāmānya lakṣaṇa anuvartanam asāram eva

original: tathāpyevaṃbhūtapratyakṣadvayajanite saṃskāre nirṇaye ca anumānatvaprasaṅgastadavastha eva /
analyzed: tathā api evaṃbhūta pratyakṣa dvaya janite saṃskāre nirṇaye ca anumāna tva prasaṅgaḥ tad avasthaḥ eva

original: tasmāt tannivṛttyarthaṃ pramāṇapadaṃ na kṛtaṃ cedavaśyamanuvartanīyamityarthaḥ /
analyzed: tasmāt tad nivṛtti artham pramāṇa padam na kṛtam ced avaśyam anuvartanīyam iti arthaḥ

original: yadyevaṃ kimavyabhicāripadaprayojanamityata āha--tathāpīti nopayujyate na ca śakyate parasparāśrayaprasaḍgādityapi draṣṭavyam /
analyzed: yadi evam kim avyabhicāri pada prayojanam iti atas āha tathā api iti nā upayujyate na ca śakyate paraspara āśraya prasaḍgāt iti api draṣṭavyam

original: tathāpi niyamo na sphuṭībhūta ityata āha--tatreti //
analyzed: tathā api niyamaḥ na sphuṭībhūtaḥ iti atas āha tatra iti
nanu anumāna vat avyabhicāra siddhyā phala siddhiḥ na pratyakṣe yathā
tathā śabde api
tatas tad avabodhana artha tatra api avyabhicāri pada avatāra prasaṅgaḥ iti atas āha śabda ādau tu iti
pratyakṣe phala avyabhicāra nirṇayena eva avyabhicāra niścaya
iti niyamaḥ na anyatra iti arthaḥ
avyabhicāri pada upādānam phala viśeṣaṇatayā iti śeṣaḥ

original: ayaṃ ca niyamaḥ svarūpato 'pi phaladvāraiva pratyakṣamunnīyate,
analyzed: ayam ca niyamaḥ svarūpataḥ api phala dvārā eva pratyakṣam unnīyate
na tu anyathā iti
anumāna ādikam tu pratītam sat phalāya kalpate
na tu anyathā iti niyame sati syāt iti
ayam api artha ākṣipta tayā prāk eva darśitaḥ dvayī iti
aparam api utpatti jñaptibhyām niyama dvayam śliṣṭam āha athavā iti

original: kāraṇamutpādakaṃ pratyāyakaṃ ca ubhayaṃ sādhayati---na hīti /
analyzed: kāraṇam utpādakam pratyāyakam ca ubhayam sādhayati na hi iti
upādhi śaḍkā nivṛtti artham tarka sahāya tva upavarṇanam

original: āgamasyāpi ca vaktṛśrotṛgatatvena pratyakṣāpekṣā utpattau jñaptau ca cato 'taḥ saṃmugdhamāha--evamiti /
analyzed: āgamasya api ca vaktṛ śrotṛ gata tvena pratyakṣa apekṣā utpattau jñaptau ca catas atas saṃmugdham āha evam iti

original: tathāpyayamarthaḥ kathamavyabhicāripadopādānamātrat labhyata ityata āha--na hīti /
analyzed: tathā api ayam arthaḥ katham avyabhicāri pada upādāna mātrat labhyate iti atas āha na hi iti
tat ayam saṃkṣepaḥ

original: so 'yaṃ sūtrakārasyeha viśeṣataḥ prayatno jñāpayati yadetasminnavyabhicāriṇyanyatra vyabhicāraśaḍkaiva nāsti,
analyzed: saḥ ayam sūtrakārasya iha viśeṣataḥ prayatnaḥ jñāpayati yat etasmin avyabhicāriṇi anyatra vyabhicāra śaḍkā eva nā asti
atas iha eva tad grahāya viśeṣataḥ yatitavyam iti
yadi api jñāpti pakṣe laukika vacasām pravṛtti sāmarthya ādinā vyabhicāra abhāva grahaḥ
tathā api pāralaukika āgama avyabhicāra niścayaḥ āpta ukta tvena eva
tat ca mūla bhūta pratyakṣa śuddheḥ eva iti
nanu bhāṣya vārttikāyoḥ kā gatiḥ
na hi ayam arthaḥ tatas pratīyate
kim nāma vyabhicāri vyāvṛtti mātram iti atas āha tasmāt suṣṭhu uktam iti
saḥ eva arthaḥ
kim tu niyamya tayā
na tu vidheya tayā iti āśayaḥ
uccāvacam uccalataḥ iti jala sādṛśya saṃkīrtanam bhrānti bījatayā
upaghāta doṣān nayanasya ātapa ādinā
etat uktam bhavati
upadarśita artha aprāpaka tvam vyabhicāraḥ

original: na cārthena kaścidartha upadarśito yamaprāpayannartho vyabhicaret /
analyzed: na ca arthena kaścid arthaḥ upadarśitaḥ yam a prāpayan arthaḥ vyabhicaret
anyathā artha upadarśana svabhāvasya ca utpattiḥ na
ca artha upadarśana svabhāvaḥ na ca anyathā utpannaḥ
tasmāt evaṃbhūtaḥ vyabhicāraḥ jñānasya eva na ca arthasya
tat idam uktam pratyayaḥ bhrāntaḥ jāyate iti
vṛddha saṃmatim āha yathā āhuḥ iti
andhaḥ iti yamyagdarśana upāya rahita tva mātra param
na paśyati iti api samyak jñāna abhāva mātra upalakṣaṇa param
tena puruṣa aparādhaḥ sa bhavati iti
atra adarśanam viparīta darśanam vā iti aparādhaḥ iti arthaḥ

original: yathā hi sthāṇuradṛśyamānastathaiva puruṣatvenāpi daśyamāna iti tātparyam //
analyzed: yathā hi sthāṇuḥ adṛśyamānaḥ tathā eva puruṣa tvena api daśyamānaḥ iti tātparyam
saṃśayaḥ api sāmānya lakṣaṇa anuvṛttyā eva nirastaḥ tasya apramāṇa phala tvāt
tathā api avyabhicāri padam niyama jñāpana artham avaśyam kartavyam
tena ca vyabhicāri vyudāsa mukhena eva niyamaḥ pradarśayitavyaḥ
saṃśayaḥ api
vyabhicāri jātīyaḥ
atas tena eva asya vyudāsaḥ yuktaḥ iti āśayavān āha avyabhicāri padena eva iti
nanu vyabhicāri tvam eva asya katham
viparyājñānam hi niścaya ākaram

original: ayaṃ tu na tathetyata āha--no khalviti /
analyzed: ayam tu na tathā iti atas āha no khalu iti
na hi niścaya tvam prayojakam atra
kim tu visaṃvādaḥ
sa ca prāpti ayogaḥ
na ca prāpti yogaḥ dvi rūpasya vastunaḥ
kvacid kadācid kenacid aprāpteḥ iti arthaḥ

original: na ca vācyaṃ bhrānterabhrāntipratiyogitvādaniyatasya cārthasya kvacidapi
analyzed: na ca vācyam bhrānteḥ abhrānti pratiyogi tvāt aniyatasya ca arthasya kvacid api
pramāṇa agocara tvāt asat khyāteḥ anabhyupagamāt ca sarvam idam asamañjasam iti
no khalu dolāyamānaḥ sthāṇu puruṣa vyatiriktaḥ
kaścid aniyataḥ nāma arthaḥ parisphurati yatra asamañjasam syāt

original: nanu sthāṇupuruṣāvubhāvapi yadyāropitau tadobhayopamardātmanā bādhakena bhavitavyam /
analyzed: nanu sthāṇu puruṣau ubhau api yadi āropitau tadā ubhaya upamarda ātmanā bādhakena bhavitavyam
atha anya tad asya āropaḥ tadā aparasya pāramārthika tvāt tad pratipatteḥ abādhya tvam eva syāt

original: yathā yuktau rajatāṃśasya mithyātve śuklabhāsvaratvādiniścayasya satyatvam,
analyzed: yathā yuktau rajata aṃśasya mithyātve śukla bhāsvara tva ādi niścayasya satya tvam

original: tathā ca sthāṇvaṃśe niścayaḥ puruṣāṃśe tvekakoṭisanniveśavāneva vibhrama iti saṃśayo dattajalāñjaliḥ prasaktaḥ /
analyzed: tathā ca sthāṇu aṃśe niścayaḥ puruṣa aṃśe tu eka koṭi sanniveśavān eva vibhramaḥ iti saṃśayaḥ datta jala añjaliḥ prasaktaḥ
tasmāt ubhaya smaraṇa mātra ātmakaḥ ayam iti syāt

original: na syāt, yatra tāvadubhayoranubhayātmake pāṣāṇastambhādau samāropastatrobhayopamardātmaka eva bādhaka iti kimatra vaktavyam?
analyzed: na syāt yatra tāvat ubhayoḥ anubhaya ātmake pāṣāṇa stambha ādau samāropaḥ tatra ubhaya upamarda ātmakaḥ eva bādhakaḥ iti kim atra vaktavyam
yatra api ekatara āropaḥ tatra api na apara aṃśe niścayaḥ
paraspara pratikṣepa upasthiti vyāhatyā aniścaya ātmakasya eva jñānasya utpādāt

original: yatra hi rajatatvārope 'pi śuklatvādau niścayastatrāropitānānopitayormitho virodhābhāvaḥ /
analyzed: yatra hi rajata tva ārope api śukla tva ādau niścayaḥ tatra āropita an ānopitayoḥ mithas virodha abhāvaḥ
tasmāt āropita anāropita tva aviśeṣe api yatra āropita anāropitau paraspara aviruddhau sa viparyayaḥ

original: yatra tu parasparaviruddhau sa saṃśaya iti sarvamavadātam /
analyzed: yatra tu paraspara viruddhau sa saṃśayaḥ iti sarvam avadātam
yadi evam saṃśayaḥ api viparyaya antar bhūtaḥ tad apākaraṇena eva apākṛtaḥ ca
kimartham tarhi vyavasāya ātmaka padam sūtra ākāraḥ cakāra

original: san vā sa udārārtho vyākhyātṛbhiḥ kimityupekṣitaḥ?
analyzed: san vā saḥ udāra arthaḥ vyākhyātṛbhiḥ kim iti upekṣitaḥ
tathābhūtoḥ avācīnaiḥ katham unnīyate iti atas āha tasmāt iti
syāt etat iti
syāt tad avabodha artham
yadi tat pratyakṣam syāt
na tu etat asti iti arthaḥ
hetum āha abhilāpa iti
abhidhāna ākāra saṃsarga yogya abhidheya ākāram hi tat iti arthaḥ
vipakṣāt vyatirekam āha na ca iti
abhidhāna abhidheya saṃsarge hi tad ākārayoḥ saṃsarga niyamaḥ

original: sa ca saṃyogasamavāyakāryakāraṇabhāvarūpastāvanna saṃbhavatītyāha--na hyarthe śabdāḥ santīti /
analyzed: sa ca saṃyoga samavāya kārya kāraṇa bhāva rūpaḥ tāvat na saṃbhavati iti āha na hi arthe śabdāḥ santi iti
saṃyogena samavāyena kāryatayā vā iti śeṣaḥ
tad ātmānaḥ vā iti
na hi iti anuṣajyate
upapattim āha tathā sati iti
na ca iti

original: sa hi saṃvedanadharmo grāhyākārarūpo vā syāt?
analyzed: sa hi saṃvedana dharmaḥ grāhya ākāra rūpaḥ vā syāt
tad nirapekṣa grāhaka ākāra rūpaḥ vā
na tāvat ādyaḥ
artha a saṃsparśī yatas
artha asaṃsparśaḥ ca asya a tad vṛtti tvāt atad utpatteḥ ca iti pūrvā eva yuktiḥ iti āśayaḥ
na api dvitīyaḥ
artheṣu tad niyojanāt
aryamāneṣu bāhyeṣu artheṣu eva tasya amilāpasya niyojanāt
niyogataḥ bāhya sāmānādhikaraṇyena pratīteḥ iti arthaḥ

original: etaduktaṃ bhavati saṃvedanākāro hi jñātṛtvādistatsāmānādhikaraṇyena pratīyate /
analyzed: etat uktam bhavati saṃvedana ākāraḥ hi jñātṛ tva ādiḥ tad sāmānādhikaraṇyena pratīyate
abhilāpaḥ tu bāhya sanniyuktaḥ tad sāmānādhiraṇyena iti atas na saṃvedana dharmaḥ

original: tasmād viṣayataḥ svarūpataśca yato 'sya nābhibhalāpasaṃsargayogyatāsambhavastasmādidamarthāt sarūpakādupajāyamānaṃ jñānaṃ vikalparūpamarthamevādarśayediti  #
analyzed: tasmāt viṣayataḥ svarūpataḥ ca yatas asya na abhi bhalāpa saṃsarga yogya tā sambhavaḥ tasmāt idam arthāt sarūpakāt upajāyamānam jñānam vikalpa rūpam artham eva ādarśayet iti
prasaṅgaḥ
na amilāpam artha saṃsargi tayā iti śeṣaḥ
syāt etat
sva kāraṇat upajātasya kāraṇam akāraṇam vā kaścid eva viṣayaḥ

original: evaṃ cārthādupajātasyāpyaneko 'bhilāpo 'pyasya viṣayo yadi syāt ko doṣa ityata āha---na hīti /
analyzed: evam ca arthāt upajātasya api anekaḥ abhilāpaḥ api asya viṣayaḥ yadi syāt kaḥ doṣaḥ iti atas āha na hi iti

original: rūpāccakṣuṣo viṣayādupajāyamānaṃ cākṣuṣaṃ vijñānaṃ nayanāviṣayarasasahitamatad rūpamiti //
analyzed: rūpāt cakṣuṣaḥ viṣayāt upajāyamānam cākṣuṣam vijñānam nayana a viṣaya rasa sahitam a tat rūpam iti
etat uktam bhavati
sa ākāra vāda siddhau tāvat anupaplutam ākāram ādadhat eva arthaḥ viṣayaḥ
na ca śabda saṃsarga yogya tā
arthasya asti yena tad ākāram jñānam bhavet
na ca indriya vijñānam śabdaḥ svatantraḥ eva ākāra ādhāyakaḥ
vikalpa kāle tad abhāvāt
bhāve api vā svatantraḥ pratibhāseta na artha saṃsargi tayā iti uktam
nirākāra pakṣe api ātma anātma prakāśana śakteḥ vijñānasya saḥ eva viṣayaḥ yatra indriyam
niyata sāmarthyam
anyathā atiprasaḍgāt
na ca cakṣuḥ indriya antara viṣaye samartham
na ca cakṣuḥ viṣayasya eva śabda saṃsargaḥ asti iti cintitam iti
prasaṅgam uktvā viparyaya artham āha tasmāt iti
a milāpa saṃsarga anapekṣam artham tad saṃsargiṇam ādarśayat adhyavasyat vikalpa vāsanā utthāpitam na artha sāmarthya samuttham iti bhāvaḥ
viparyaye kim bādhakam iti atas āha aniyata artha grāhi yatas
vikalpa gatam artha ākāram prati aniyāmaka tvāt tasya iti arthaḥ
etat uktam bhavati

original: yadi hi pratibhāsamānor'thopi vikalpasya janako bhavet,
analyzed: yadi hi vikalpasya janakaḥ bhavet
tadā tad ākāram niyamayet
na tu niyamayati
tad asannidhau api vikalpa vāsanā vaśāt tasya tathāvidha ākāra upasthiteḥ
nanu indriyam asya janakam astu
na hi tasya ākāra niyāmaka tayā kāraka tvam iti atas āha mānasam iti
manaḥ mātra prabhavam iti arthaḥ
indriyam api hi jñāna janakam bhavat ākāra niyāmaka artha sannikarṣeṇa eva
na tu tad nirapekṣam
na ca asya tathāvidha artha sannikarṣaḥ asti iti uktam iti bhāvaḥ
nanu vivāda adhyāsite vikalpe dṛśya tayā eva artha ākāraḥ parisphurati
na ca evam ubhaya vādi siddhārtha sannidhi nipekṣa vikalpeṣu aparokṣa tayā arthaḥ prakāśate
tad viśeṣaḥ vikalpaḥ ūratha sannidhi sāpekṣaḥ
tathā ca arthasya tad ākāra niyāmaka tvāt tad janaka tvam anicchatā api abhyupeyam

original: anyathotprekṣāvyāpāratvād vikalpasya pravartakatvamapi na nirvahedityata āha--ātmīyamiti //
analyzed: anyathā utprekṣā vyāpāra tvāt vikalpasya pravartaka tvam api na nirvahet iti atas āha ātmīyam iti

original: utprekṣā asadāropaṇaṃ yato bhavatyavaśyamato 'pyevamutprekṣāmaha iti vyāhāraḥ /
analyzed: utprekṣā asat āropaṇam yatas bhavati avaśyam atas api evam utprekṣāmahe iti vyāhāraḥ
tiraskāraḥ anadhyavasāyaḥ
darśanam sākṣātkaraṇam
puraskāraḥ bheda agrahaḥ vā
tad hetukaḥ āropaḥ vā
tat siddham iti
prasaḍga ādi upanibandhena
yadi vivāda adhyāsitāḥ vikalpāḥ artha sāmarthya labdha janmānaḥ
tadā na śabda kalpanā anugatāḥ iti arthaḥ
tad anugata tvam iti
tasya upalabdhiḥ abhilāpa anugata tvam nirākurvatī artha sāmarthya ja tvam virūṇaddhi iti śeṣaḥ
asiddha viruddhayoḥ asambhavāt iha sambhāvita tayā pūrva ukta smāraṇa puraḥsaram sandigdha anaikāntika tva āśaḍkām eva apanayati na ca iti
artha rūpam anukuryāt artha rūpa sadṛśa ākāram bhavet iti arthaḥ
tādātmya tad utpattibhyām asaṃbaddha rūpa anukāre niyāmaka abhāvāt sarva rūpa anukāreṇa sarveṣām sarvajña tā āpattiḥ
sat rūpa anukāra mātra tvāt tad viṣaya tāyāḥ iti bhāvaḥ
na hi tādātmya tad utpatti lakṣaṇaḥ sambandhaḥ svarūpeṇa upapujyate
ki nāma niyāmaka tayā

original: tadatra saḍketa eva niyāmako yadi syāt ko doṣa ityāśayavānāśaṅkate--saḍketeti /
analyzed: tat atra saḍketaḥ eva niyāmakaḥ yadi syāt kaḥ doṣaḥ iti āśayavān āśaṅkate saḍketa iti
tat eva dṛṣṭam sat smārayet etān niyamena iti śeṣaḥ
kim etau api iti atas āha tatra eva ca iti
anugatam anugama gocaraḥ
atas eva sāmānyam deśa kāla anugatam
tatra eva saḍketasya sukara tvāt iti bhāvaḥ

original: kimetāvatāpītyata āha--na ca tattat dṛṣṭaṃ sākṣātkṛtaṃ kiṃ tu svalakṣaṇaṃ darśanagocaraḥ /
analyzed: kim etāvatā api iti atas āha na ca tat tat dṛṣṭam sākṣātkṛtam kim tu sva lakṣaṇam darśana gocaraḥ
sarūpaka tvāt iti śeṣaḥ
sarūpaka tvam eva asya kutas iti atas āha tat eva hi iti
paramārthaḥ akṛtrimam an āropitam rūpam tena asti iti paramārtha sat
etat eva kutas iti atas āha vijñānasya kāraṇam
vijñānasya iti prakṛta upayogāt kāraṇam artha kriyā samartham yatas iti arthaḥ

original: nanu sāmānyamapi kiṃ na darśanagocara ityata āha--na tu sāmānyamiti /
analyzed: nanu sāmānyam api kim na darśana gocaraḥ iti atas āha na tu sāmānyam iti
kutas sarva sāmarthya rahitam hi tat
sarvaḥ puruṣa arthaḥ heya upādeya rūpaḥ tasya sāmarthyam śaktiḥ
tad rahitam yasmāt tat
na hi kiñcid puruṣa prayojanam sāmānya sādhyam asti
atas ṛthakriyāyām aśakta tvāt na tat paramārtha sat asattva anna tad vijñāna janakam
ajanaka tvāt na sarūpakam
asarūpaka tvāt na darśana gocaraḥ iti arthaḥ

original: nanu sāmānyasya tāvadarthakriyāvirahād darśanagocaratvaṃ mā bhūt,
analyzed: nanu sāmānyasya tāvat artha kriyā virahāt darśana gocara tvam mā bhūt
darśana gocarasya eva tu vācya tā astu
saḍketaḥ api tatra kena api upāyena bhaviṣyati
tat nirvicikitsam eva tarhi arthakriyā samartha vaspu pratipādana abhiprāyavantaḥ prayojaka vṛddhāḥ

original: prayojyavṛddhāśca tathāvidhārthapratipattimantaḥ śābde vyavahāre upalabhyanta ityata āha--api ceti /
analyzed: prayojya vṛddhāḥ ca tathāvidha artha pratipattimantaḥ śābde vyavahāre upalabhyante iti atas āha api ca iti
na hi aupṇyāt atiriktaḥ vahniḥ nāma asti bauddha rāddhānte

original: na cobhayavādisaṃpratipattiviṣayaḥ pratītamauṣṇyaṃ śītāpanodanaṃ karotītyapi kadācit /
analyzed: na ca ubhaya vādi saṃpratipatti viṣayaḥ pratītam auṣṇyam śīta apanodanam karoti iti api kadācid

original: akurvaddhi sarvathā apratītaṃ na kuryādāropitaṃ vā /
analyzed: akurvat hi sarvathā apratītam na kuryāt āropitam vā
na ca vahni śabdāt sarvathā vahneḥ apratītiḥ
tasmāt
śabda kalpanā ullikhitam avastu eva vastu ābhāsam iti abhiprāyaḥ
jāti ādīn paramārthikān abhyupetya āha tat na iti
vivekena deśa bhedena iti arthaḥ
avacchedya avacchedaka bhāvena hi mithas yojanā viśeṣaṇa viśeṣya bhāvaḥ

original: sā cāto nivarttamānā svavyāpyaṃ viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhāvamādāyaiva nivartate /
analyzed: sā ca atas nivarttamānā sva vyāpyam viśeṣaṇa viśeṣya bhāvam ādāya eva nivartate

original: tataśca jātyādīnāṃ parasparamasambandhānna svatanatreṣu teṣu śabdo 'pi sukarasaḍketeḥ /
analyzed: tatas ca jāti ādīnām parasparam asambandhāt na svatanatreṣu teṣu śabdaḥ api sukara saḍketeḥ
tathā ca na saṃsṛṣṭa vedanam iti arthaḥ

original: etena śabdasya vivekagrahasaṃbhave 'pi tadyojanā nirasto boddhavyā /
analyzed: etena śabdasya viveka graha saṃbhave api tad yojanā nirastaḥ boddhavyā
ekam asamuditam
a vibhāgam an aṃśam

api ca paramārtha sat vastu traya vedane api vivekena iti śeṣaḥ

original: nanu na hyekajñānaviṣayau samānakāle 'ḍgulyau na kāryakāraṇabhūte iti niyatapūrvāparatve 'pi te sarvajñaikavijñānagocarau na tatheti yuktaṃ  #
analyzed: nanu na hi eka jñāna viṣayau samāna kāle aḍgulyau na kārya kāraṇa bhūte iti niyata pūrva apara tve api te sarvajña eka vijñāna gocarau na tathā iti yuktam
vaktum

original: kiṃ tarhi? yadanapekṣaṃ tat kāraṇam sāpekṣaṃ ca kāryamiti,
analyzed: kim tarhi yat anapekṣam tat kāraṇam sāpekṣam ca kāryam iti
tat atra api samānam
eka jñāna gocara tve api yat avacchedakam

original: yattu naivaṃ na tat yathetyata āha--viśeṣaṇaṃ khalviti /

na anyathā iti

original: sa cāyamekajñānagocarayorekakālayośca dvirūpo 'pi niyato nāsti yasmādityarthaḥ //
analyzed: sa ca ayam eka jñāna gocarayoḥ eka kālayoḥ ca dvi rūpaḥ api niyataḥ na asti yasmāt iti arthaḥ
syāt etat
yadi api ukta svarūpam upakāra dvayam na saṃbhavati tathā api ādhāra ādheya bhāvaḥ bhavet
sa hi samāna kālayoḥ eva kuṇḍa badarayoḥ dṛṣṭaḥ

original: kṣaṇabhaṅgastu tvayāpyupapādanīyo mayāpibhañjanīya ityata āha--api ceti /
analyzed: kṣaṇa bhaṅgaḥ tu tvayā api upapādanīyaḥ mayā api bhañjanīyaḥ iti atas āha api ca iti

original: yadyapi tīrthikaiḥ kuṇḍādhāvaśānna badarasyaiva apatanadharmakasyotpādaḥ svīkriyate sthaimaśraddhājaḍatvāt,
analyzed: yadi api tīrthikaiḥ kuṇḍa ādhā vaśāt na badarasya eva a patana dharmakasya utpādaḥ svīkriyate sthaima śraddhā jaḍa tvāt

original: tathāpi gatinivṛttilakṣaṇāṃ gurutvapratibandhakasaṃyogalakṣaṇāṃ vā sthitiṃ taddharmabhūtā vidadhadeva badarasya kuṇḍamādhāratayā abhyupetaṃ  #
analyzed: tathā api gati nivṛtti lakṣaṇām guru tva pratibandhaka saṃyoga lakṣaṇām vā sthitim tad dharma bhūtā vidadhat eva badarasya kuṇḍam ādhāra tayā abhyupetam

etāvatā api kim iti atas āha na ca śakti antaraiḥ iti

original: yadyapi badaravajjātyādīnāṃ dharmasya kasyacidupajanāpāyarūpamupakāraṃ nābhyupagacchatyeva paraḥ,

original: sannityanena hi vikalpena sattvopakārasamartho viṣayīkṛtaḥ na ca tato 'nyaḥ kaścid dravyatvādyupakārasamartho 'sattvopakārasamartho 'sti,
analyzed: san iti anena hi vikalpena sattva upakāra samarthaḥ viṣayīkṛtaḥ na ca tatas anyaḥ kaścid dravya tva ādi upakāra samarthaḥ a sattva upakāra samarthaḥ asti

original: bauddhasyātiparāmarśakuśalatāṃ codyasya cātitucchatāmālakṣyāsmākameva matilāghavaṃ saṃbhāvayiṣyatītyāśaḍkya tadgranthaṃ likhati--yadāheti /

analyzed: upakāraka svabhāve grāhye gṛhyamāṇe sati na upakārāḥ upakārakāḥ svabhāvāḥ

original: upādhyantarāṇāṃ tato 'pare bhinna vidyante ye tasminnekopakārakasvabhāve dṛṣṭe 'pi na dṛṣṭāḥ syuḥ /

original: nanu varaṃ vastusvabhāvavādamāsthāyānupakāryānupakārakayorapi viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhāvaṃ spaṣṭadṛṣṭamupapādayituṃ śaktāḥ pare /

original: evaṃ ca tvaccharāstvayyeva nipatitā ityata āha--asmākaṃ tviti /

original: atra tu viparyayo viṣayasyaiva pratibhāsasattayā buddhyadhīnatvāt /

original: tattadvadviśeṣaṇaviśiṣṭatayāpi kiṃ bhinno 'bhinno vetyatra vikalpa eva sākṣī,

janakaḥ tu bhaviṣyati iti atas āha api ca iti

apiḥ bhinnakramaḥ

original: artho vikalpasya na gocaro janako 'pi netyarthaḥ //
analyzed: arthaḥ vikalpasya na gocaraḥ janakaḥ api nā iti arthaḥ

original: sannidhisannihiteṣvapīndriyārtheṣu kadācid viśiṣṭād vāsanāparipākāt sākṣātkāravān vikalpa utpadyata /

original: kiṃ tu nirvikalpakabhedāgrahāt tadvānivāvabhāsata iti cet--na,

hi vivāda adhyāsita vikalpa gataḥ darśana vyāpāraḥ ayam aupādhikaḥ iti asti pratyakṣam

darśana vyāpāra tā kalpanā apoḍha tvena vyāptā

original: tathā ca vikalpasānnidhyādaupādhiko darśanavyāpāro 'yamālocanamiti kiṃ na syāt?

anubhavaḥ tu upādhi śaṅkayā tvayā eva a sākṣīkṛtaḥ

original: anāgate vikalpe kathamiva taddharmo nirvikalpake pratibhāseteti cet--na,

kāla bhedasya ubhayatra api tulya tvāt

original: hanta yadi sākṣātkāraḥ sākṣātkāravānutpadyate kathamasya tathātvamaupādhikam /
analyzed: hanta yadi sākṣātkāraḥ sākṣātkāravān utpadyate katham asya tathātvam aupādhikam
tāvat mātrāt eva indriya ādi nirapekṣāt upajātam iti etāvatā eva tat aupādhikam iti ucyate iti ced na

na ca asākṣātkāriṇaḥ sākṣātkāraḥ kadācid upapadyeta
sahakāri viśeṣāt evam api syāt iti ced
tarhi yādṛśi kārye yādṛś anvaya vyatireka anuvidhānam dṛṣṭam

dṛṣṭam ca ubhaya vādi saṃpratipanna nirvikalpake sākṣātkāram prati indriya arthayoḥ sāmarthyam

evam tāvat artha sākṣātkaraṇam svābhāvikam

avisaṃvādi tvam api asya an upādhikam
tathā hi yadi asya pāramārthikaḥ visaṃvādaḥ syāt
tadā pratīyamānaḥ api aupādhikaḥ ayam avisaṃvādaḥ iti saṃbhāvyeta
sa ca deśa kāla ākāra kṛtaḥ tāvat na bhavati
ananugatam eva anugata tayā darśayati iti ced na
asādhāraṇasya sva lakṣaṇasya vikalpena a saṃsparśāt

original: ajanakasyaiva tu vastusato viṣayatve pratyakṣatvamarthasāmarthyasamutthatvena vyāptamiti suptapralāpaḥ /

original: tathā ca kathamasya viparītāroparūpasya saṃvādo nāmeti cet--na,

original: na hyanyadasādhāraṇādrūpāt samarthaṃ nāma tava darśane /

iva arthaḥ ca na tatra āropyaḥ

original: na tāvat kalpanāgocarasyālīkasya kalpanayā abhedaḥ saṃbhavati,

original: sa khalvākāro vikalpādabhinno 'pi bhinna āropyata iti cet?

original: grāhyākāre 'prāmāṇyaṃ vikalpasyāpi svātmani ca saṃvedanatvādubhayorapi prāmāṇyameveti na kaścid viśeṣaḥ //

original: tathāpi yādṛśākāro vikalpastādṛśākāra eva bāhyatayā pratibhāseta?

original: tato yedatat sādhāraṇaṃ rūpamābhāti tanna vikalpākāramabhiniviśate
analyzed: tatas yat id atat sādhāraṇam rūpam ābhāti tat na vikalpa ākāram abhiniviśate
iti bahis eva avatiṣṭhate

original: evaṃ sati sarva eva saugatenaprayujyamānāḥ kālātyayāpadiṣṭatayā pratipakṣahetavaḥ padamadhyāropayitumasamarthāḥ prāgeva vikalpasyāpratyakṣatāṃ  #

original: yadetāvatāpi na paramārthasad viṣayasya prāmāṇyaṃ sādhitam /

original: na hyasti saṃbhavo vikalpasyārthasāmarthyasamutthatvaṃ niścitamaniścitaṃ ca tadarthasya paramārthasattvam,
analyzed: na hi asti saṃbhavaḥ vikalpasya artha sāmarthya samuttha tvam niścitam aniścitam ca tad arthasya paramārtha sattvam

original: tathāpi paro 'pi tannirākaraṇasiddhyaiva pratyavasthito na rājājñayā nirākaraṇīyaḥ /
