original: manastu na saguṇamindrayamityatrāpi yo viśeṣaguṇo yenendriyeṇa gṛhyate tajjātīyena guṇena saha vṛttiḥ saguṇatvam /
analyzed: manaḥ tu na sa guṇam indrayam iti atra api yaḥ viśeṣa guṇaḥ yena indriyeṇa gṛhyate tad jātīyena guṇena saha vṛttiḥ sa guṇa tvam

original: grāhyaviśeṣaguṇajātīyavirahaśca manasa iti yadyabhipretaṃ bhāṣyakṛtā tadaitadapi vaidharmyameva,
analyzed: grāhya viśeṣa guṇa jātīya virahaḥ ca manasaḥ iti yadi abhipretam bhāṣyakṛtā tadā etat api vaidharmyam eva
kim tu ebhiḥ akṣaraiḥ etat api abhidhātum na śakyate
vibhakti vipariṇāmena tu bhāṣyam sugamam

original: tathā hi, indriyabhūtānāmeṣāṃ saguṇatvaṃ grāhyairguṇaiḥ saha saṃbandhaścakṣurādīnām /
analyzed: tathā hi indriya bhūtānām eṣām sa guṇa tvam grāhyaiḥ guṇaiḥ saha saṃbandhaḥ cakṣuḥ ādīnām
manasaḥ tu indriyam ūtasya eva na sa guṇa tvam

original: na grāhyena guṇena saha saṃbandha iti /
analyzed: na grāhyena guṇena saha saṃbandhaḥ iti
tasmāt atra api śabda doṣaḥ
na tu abhri pāya doṣaḥ iti mantavyam
nanu anabhimata niṣedhena matam unneṣyate iti śaṅkatena ca iti
nirācaṣṭe abhāvasya iti
yāvat anabhimata niṣedhena abhimata lābhe garīyaḥ gauravam āpadyeta
tat tat niṣedhyam an upanīya niṣedhasya pratipādayitum aśakya tvāt
viśeṣa vidhau tu śeṣa niṣedhaḥ laghīyān iti bhāvaḥ

original: satrākāravacanasya vivādāspadatvāt kathaṃ tenaiva nirṇaya ityata āheti pūrayati bhāṣyakāra iti /
analyzed: satra ākāra vacanasya vivāda āspada tvāt katham tena eva nirṇayaḥ iti atas āha iti pūrayati bhāṣyakāraḥ iti

original: śābdetyanena śabdendriyasamāhārajamayamasāvaśva iti jñānaṃ vyavacchedyamabhimataṃ vārttikakṛta iti keṣāñcinmatamapanayati---na khalviti //
analyzed: śābda iti anena śabda indriya samāhāra jam ayam asau aśvaḥ iti jñānam vyavacchedyam abhimatam vārttikakṛtaḥ iti keṣāñcid matam apanayati na khalu iti

original: vācyatvena hi viśeṣaṇatayā gṛhītena niśeṣyaniṣṭhena bhavitvayamataḥ kevalavācyatvaprastāve 'pi tathaivodāhṛtam /
analyzed: vācya tvena hi viśeṣaṇa tayā gṛhītena niśeṣya niṣṭhena bhavitu ayam atas kevala vācya tva prastāve api tathā evā udāhṛtam
indriya vyatireka vyabhicārāt ca tad vyatirekaḥ na śaḍkitaḥ

original: gṛhīte hyaśvatve tadasannikarṣe 'pi yo 'yaṃ piṇḍastvayā dṛṣṭo 'yamasāvaśva ityupadeśāt kevalādeva vācyatvapratītidarśanāt /
analyzed: gṛhīte hi aśva tve tad asannikarṣe api yaḥ ayam piṇḍaḥ tvayā dṛṣṭaḥ ayam asau aśvaḥ iti upadeśāt kevalāt eva vācya tva pratīti darśanāt
nasmāt indriyasya saṃbandhi samarpaṇaḥ eva vyāpāraḥ
evam uttaratra api tavya arthaḥ saḍketayituḥ abhiprāya viśeṣaḥ
yadi api para abhiprāyaḥ tad upahitaḥ vā arthaḥ na indriya gocaraḥ
tathā api abhyupagamya āśaṅkate atha ayam api iti
idam aindriyakam idam atīndriyam iti hi sākṣātkāra asākṣātkāra unneyaḥ ayam arthaḥ
tatra spaṣṭa grahaṇa rūpa tvāt sākṣātkāra apara vyapadeśāt aindriyakam etat iti yuktam syāt
na tu asākṣātkārāt api

original: tayośca ko 'tra manasā vedyata iti bhavāneva paribhāvayatu /
analyzed: tayoḥ ca kaḥ atra manasā vedyate iti bhavān eva paribhāvayatu
tatra sākṣātkāri tva pakṣe pratyakṣam eva idam atas na vyavacchedanīyam

original: asākṣātkāritvapakṣe ca nedam aindriyakamiti prathamapadeneva vyudastam /
analyzed: asākṣātkāri tva pakṣe ca na idam aindriyakam iti prathama padena iva vyudastam
na avyapadeśya padasya avakāśaḥ iti gāthā pāṭhasya arthaḥ
kimartham tarhi avyavadeśya padam
kaḥ ca asya vārttikasya arthaḥ iti atas āha vyavasāya ātmaka padena tu iti
eka pada parigraham sphuṭam manvānaḥ api dvipada parigraham vyācaṣṭa dvipada iti
uttara prabandha upayogam darśayan āha tad evam iti
lakṣaṇam idam anumānam
tat ca tad ābhāsāt vivekena sugamam bhavati

original: sa ca tadābhāseṣu āviṣkṛteṣu bhavatītyāśayavataḥ ayamārambha ityarthaḥ /
analyzed: sa ca tad ābhāseṣu āviṣkṛteṣu bhavati iti āśayavataḥ ayam ārambhaḥ iti arthaḥ

original: tator'thādityatra hi pañcamyā hetutvamarthasya vijñānaṃ pratidarśitam /
analyzed: tatas athāt iti atra hi pañcamyā hetu tvam arthasya vijñānam pratidarśitam

original: tatparaśca evakāraḥ evaṃ saṃbadhyate--sa vyapadeśakor'tho hetureva yasya na punaraheturapi tadvijñānaṃ pratyakṣamiti /
analyzed: tad paraḥ ca eva kāraḥ evam saṃbadhyate sa vyapadeśakaḥ ṛathaḥ hetuḥ eva yasya na punar ahetuḥ api tat vijñānam pratyakṣam iti
evam ca ayoga vyavacchedaḥ eva

original: tathāpyanyayogavyavacchedo 'pi vārttikakṛtā nirākartavya iti vyākhyāyāmubhayaṃ darśitavān /
analyzed: tathā api anya yoga vyavacchedaḥ api vārttikakṛtā nirākartavyaḥ iti vyākhyāyām ubhayam darśitavān
yadi tatas eva
na artha antarāt iti avyapadeśakāt iti atas na virodhaḥ
nanu anumāna viśeṣaḥ tāvat kaścid avyapadeśakāt eva utpadyate

original: tato na tasya vyudāsaḥ kṛta ityata āha--tator'thādityatra hīti /
analyzed: tatas na tasya vyudāsaḥ kṛtaḥ iti atas āha tatas athāt iti atra hi iti
pratyakṣa jāteḥ idam lakṣaṇam
tasyāḥ ca pratiyoginī anumāna ādi jātiḥ eva
tathā ca tasyāḥ eva
jāteḥ vyavacchedaḥ vivakṣitaḥ
sa ca etāvatā eva siddhaḥ iti arthaḥ
yatra eva yad jātīye eva
tad ayogaḥ tasya vyapadeśakasya hetu tvena ayogaḥ tat apratyakṣam iti

original: tena vyapadeśo hi tadupādhikaṃ nirūpaṇami vivakṣitam /
analyzed: tena vyapadeśaḥ hi tad upādhikam vivakṣitam

original: na ca jñānaṃ kartrā karaṇena vā nirūpyate,
analyzed: na ca jñānam kartrā karaṇena vā nirūpyate
api tu karmaṇā eva iti arthaḥ
abhidhāna aparyavasānāt śabda vyāpāra aparyavasānāt
tad śabdasya pūrva prakrānte eva arthe saḍketita tvāt
tad anabhidhāne avācaka tva prasaḍgāt iti bhāvaḥ
pūrva prakrāntaḥ ca vyapadeśakaḥ eva
sa ca arthaḥ eva iti viśeṣyaḥ prāpyate
nāntarīyaka tvāt iti arthaḥ
na evam vārttikam iti atas āha abhyupetya tu iti
anumāna ādi vyudāsa artham hi ayoga vyavacchedaḥ sa
ca anya yoga vyavacchede api sidhyati iti arthaḥ
nanu anyoga vyavacchedaḥ aśakyaḥ eva
indriya ādeḥ a vyapadeśakasya api tad kāraṇatvāt atas āha anya vyavacchede api iti

original: indriyādayo hyavyapadeśakā api vyapadeśakādhipatyenaiva jñānajanakā ityavirodhitayā na te vyavacchedyāḥ /
analyzed: indriya ādayaḥ hi a vyapadeśakāḥ api vyapadeśaka ādhipatyena eva jñāna janakāḥ iti avirodhi tayā na te vyavacchedyāḥ

original: liḍgādayastu vyapadeśakādhipatyanirapekṣatayā tadvirodhina iti ta evānye vyavacchettavyā ityarthaḥ //
analyzed: liḍga ādayaḥ tu vyapadeśaka ādhipatya nirapekṣa tayā tad virodhinaḥ iti te eva anye vyavacchettavyāḥ iti arthaḥ
nanu sarvam ca sva viṣayāt iti vārttikam asaṅgatam eva
smṛti anumiti bhrāntīnām sva viṣaya apanutpatteḥ atas āha yad saṃvṛti tvena iti

original: nanu bhrāntijñānamapi na vyapadeśakam antareṇa bhavati,
analyzed: nanu bhrānti jñānam api na vyapadeśakam antareṇa bhavati
tat kutas codyam atasmāt api iti atas āha purovartī iti
a tasmāt api iti atra yadi api na śrūyate
tathā api vyapadeśakāt api na bhavati iti boddhavyam iti arthaḥ

original: tadidamuktam--yena viśeṣarūpeṇa tasya vyapadiśyate na tatastabhdavatīti /
analyzed: tat idam uktam yena viśeṣa rūpeṇa tasya vyapadiśyate na tatas tabhdavatī iti

original: tasmād yattata eva bhavati tato bhavatyevetyarthaḥ /
analyzed: tasmāt yat tatas eva bhavati tatas bhavati eva iti arthaḥ
a tataḥ ca na tataḥ ca iti arthaḥ

original: nanu vyapadeśakādanutpatterityavyapadeśakādutpatteriti vā codyamupakrābhyāśakte rajatāt notpadyata iti vākchalamātrāmityata āha--na hyatasmādāropitād  #
analyzed: nanu vyapadeśakāt anutpatteḥ iti avyapadeśakāt utpatteḥ iti vā codyam upakrābhya aśakte rajatāt na utpadyate iti vākchala mātrām iti atas āha na hi a tasmāt āropitāt
rūpāt iti
ayam arthaḥ
mithyājñāna nirāsaḥ hi anya yoga vyavacchedena vā
ayoga vyavacchedena vā
na tāvat ādyaḥ
anya yoga vyavacchedasya tatra api bhāvāt
tadā hi sa na syāt
yadi a vyapadeśakasya eva
vaṇij vīthyām svatantrasya rajatasya hetu tvam syāt
na ca etat asti
tat idam uktam na hi a tasmāt āropitāt tatra asataḥ tat mithyājñānam bhavati
na api dvitīyaḥ
vyapadeśakasya hetu tvāt eva
rajatam vyapadeśakam na hetuḥ iti ced

original: kathaṃ punā rajataṃ vyapadeśakaṃ svātantryeṇa purovartyātmanā vā?
analyzed: katham punar rajatam vyapadeśakam svātantryeṇa purovarti ātmanā vā
na tāvat ādyaḥ
sāmānādhikaraṇya anupapatteḥ
sva mithyātva prasaḍgāt ca

original: purovartyātmanā ca pratyantare tad bhavati vyapadeśakam /
analyzed: purovarti ātmanā ca prati antare tat bhavati vyapadeśakam
sa ca purovartī ātmā hetuḥ eva iti ayoga vyavacchedaḥ eva
tat idam ukam āropitam tu rajatam asya viṣayaḥ dṛśyamāna ākāra tayā iti
ayam tu abhiprāyaḥ syāt
yādṛśa ākāreṇa vyapadeśakaḥ ṛathaḥ tādṛśāt utpannam jñānam pratyakṣam iti
na tu ayam lakṣaṇa padānām arthaḥ
na ca abhiprāya viśuddhi mātreṇa paraḥ pratipādayitum śakyate
pratyabhijñāsu asaṃvedana avyāpaka tvāt ca
etat ca jaiminīye sphuṭībhaviṣyati
tat etat lakṣaṇam ābhiprāyikam api asmad naye kadācid saṃbhāvyeta
tvad nate tu viruddham asiddham ca idam uktam vārttikakṛtā
tat etat vyutpādayati yadi api etat iti

original: vyapadeśako hyartho vartamānatayā sarvatra pratyakṣasya viṣayaḥ /
analyzed: vyapadeśakaḥ hi arthaḥ vartamānatayā sarvatra pratyakṣasya viṣayaḥ
sa ced hetuḥ eva evam atītaḥ syāt

original: tathā ca pratyakṣatve sādhye 'pratyakṣatvameva sidhyatīti bhavati viruddhatvamityarthaḥ /
analyzed: tathā ca pratyakṣa tve sādhye apratyakṣa tvam eva sidhyati iti bhavati viruddha tvam iti arthaḥ

original: atha vartamāna eva vyapadeśakastadā samānakālatayā tator'thādityasiddhamāha--tatsamāneti //
analyzed: atha vartamānaḥ eva vyapadeśakaḥ tadā samāna kālatayā tatas rathāt iti asiddham āha tad samāna iti
yat tu kenacid pralapitam aparokṣa jñāna avabhāsi tā eva vartamāna tā iti
tat tuccham iti upekṣitavān
tathā hi aparokṣa eka sarvajña vijñāna avabhāsi tayā sarveṣām arthānām eka kāla tvāt savyetara go viṣāṇa vat kārya kāraṇa bhāva vārtā eva ucchidyeta
pūrva uktaḥ ca anuyogaḥ tad avasthaḥ eva iti
bhinna kālam katham grāhyam
ityādinā kārya kāraṇa bhāva viśeṣaḥ eva grāhya grāhaka bhāvaḥ

original: sa ca bhinnakālayoreva bhavatīti svabhāṣayā samarthitaṃ pareṇa /
analyzed: sa ca bhinna kālayoḥ eva bhavati iti sva bhāṣayā samarthitam pareṇa

original: na ca vayaṃ bhinnakālayoḥ kāryakāraṇabhāvaviśeṣam avajānīmahe;
analyzed: na ca vayam bhinna kālayoḥ kārya kāraṇa bhāva viśeṣam avajānīmahe

original: kiṃ tvatītasya vartamānatayāvabhāsanaṃ tasya vā satyatvam /
analyzed: kim tu atītasya vartamāna tayā avabhāsanam tasya vā satya tvam
na ca tat anena samarthitam iti arthaḥ
nanu jñāna ākāra arpaṇa kṣamam iti vadatā eva samarthitam etat

original: anene hi na pratibhāsamānatayārtho grāhya iti vyavahniyate /
analyzed: hi na pratibhāsamāna tayā arthaḥ grāhyaḥ iti vyavahniyate
kim nāma ākāra arpaka tayā iti darśitam
ākāraḥ eva tu avabhāsama māna tayā grāhyaḥ

original: sa ca jñānātmabhūtatayā vartamāna eveti na kaścid virodha ityata āha--anahaḍkāreti /
analyzed: sa ca jñāna ātma bhūta tayā vartamānaḥ eva iti na kaścid virodhaḥ iti atas āha anahaḍkāra iti
vijñānāt bhinnasya nīla ādeḥ anubhavaḥ
yadi satyaḥ na jñāna gata ākāra vedanam

original: asatyaścenna pratayakṣaṃ pramāṇamiti seyamubhayataḥ pāśā rajjurityarthaḥ //
analyzed: asatyaḥ ced na pratayakṣam pramāṇam iti sā iyam ubhayatas pāśāḥ rajjuḥ iti arthaḥ
api ca bhavatu ākāra vedanam
bhavatu vā arthasya ākāra arpaka tvam vā tathā api
tatas arathāt vijñānam pratyakṣam
iti asiddham lakṣaṇam
tathā hi pratibhāsamānasya eva jñānam vyapadiśyate
na tu apratibhāsamānasya
ākāraḥ ca pratibhāsane na tu janakaḥ api arthaḥ
tasmāt vyapadeśakaḥ na janakaḥ
janakaḥ ca na vyapadeśakaḥ iti
atra śaṅkatena ca iti
pratibhāsamāna ākāra dvāra arthaḥ vyapadeśakaḥ janakaḥ ca iti api na ca iti arthaḥ
kutas
bhākta tva prasaḍgāt
kim atas yadi evam iti atas āha na ca gauṇa mukhya iti
yathā hi avinābhāvam antar bhāvya eva gaḍgā śabdaḥ tīre
lakṣyamāṇa guṇa yogam antar bhāvya siha śabdaḥ māṇavake vartate
na tathā dhūma pratyakṣam agnau siṃha pratyakṣam māṇavake
pramāṇa antara uccheda prasaḍgāt iti arthaḥ
tat idam uktam bhinna prasthāna tvāt iti
etena etat api nirastam

original: yadāhuḥ--pratyakṣasiddhenākāreṇa artho 'numīyata iti phalataḥ pratyakṣor'tha iti /
analyzed: yat āhuḥ pratyakṣa siddhena ākāreṇa arthaḥ anumīyate iti phalatas pratyakṣaḥ ṛthaḥ iti
anumīyate iti kaḥ ṛthaḥ
anumitau parisphurati iti
tat ca bauddha naye svapne api durlabham
anumiteḥ api sva ākāra alīkayoḥ eva anyatarasmin paryavasita tvāt

original: yaśca sarvathaiva jñānāgocaraḥ sa vyavahniyata iti kutaḥ?
analyzed: yaḥ ca sarvathā eva jñāna agocaraḥ sa vyavahniyate iti kutas
tasmāt ākāra vāda pakṣe bāhyaḥ rathaḥ heyaḥ
tad abhyupagame vā ākāra vādaḥ iti anena abhiprāyeṇa āha tasmāt nirākāram iti
śaṅkate iti

original: na hi kiñcid vastubhūtaṃ vācyaṃ nāma saugatānāṃ samasti,
analyzed: na hi kiñcid vastu bhūtam vācyam nāma saugatānām samasti
lakṣaṇa vākyena tu vyavahāra mātram prasādhyate

original: jñānasya kalpanāpoḍhasya pratyakṣatayā vyutpādyamānasya kathaṃ sarver'thā pratyakṣatayā prasajyerannityata āha--na hīti /
analyzed: jñānasya kalpanā apoḍhasya pratyakṣa tayā vyutpādyamānasya katham sarva irathāḥ pratyakṣa tayā prasajyeran iti atas āha na hi iti
diś nāgasya ati vyāpaka tayā alakṣaṇam
kīrteḥ tu avyāpaka tayā vikalpa pratyakṣa anavarodhāt

aniṣṭa mātrasya atiprasañjaka tvāt iti siddhāntaḥ

sāmānya anvitam
abhidhīyate iti vārttika śeṣaḥ

original: manuṣyaśabdasya brāhmaṇo brāhmaṇatvādijātimattayā avācyo 'pi manuṣyatvajātimattayā vācya evetyarthaḥ //
analyzed: manuṣya śabdasya brāhmaṇaḥ brāhmaṇa tva ādi jātimat tayā avācyaḥ api manuṣya tva jātimat tayā vācyaḥ eva iti arthaḥ
paunaruktyam pariharan āha atha āścakarṇa iti
nanu vyatyaye api sat saṃprayogaḥ iti syāt

original: na tu tattacchabdasya prakṛtatayā viṣayaḥ kaścidastītyāha--buddhyeti /

original: yadyapi pratyakṣajñānamapyanena lakṣaṇena svātmani pratyakṣaṃ na syādeva,
analyzed: yadi api pratyakṣa jñānam api anena lakṣaṇena sva ātmani pratyakṣam na syāt eva

original: tathāpīndriyārthasannikarṣajanyatvamātraṃ tāvat tatrāpyastīti kadācit paro brūyādityata āha--anumānādīti /
analyzed: tathā api indriya artha sannikarṣa janya tva mātram tāvat tatra api asti iti kadācid paraḥ brūyāt iti atas āha anumāna ādi iti
etena tatas atha ādityasya abhiprāya śeṣaḥ dūṣitaḥ

śeṣaḥ
upalakṣaṇam ca etat
vaidharmyeṇa iti api draṣṭavyam
a prāmāṇya vidhānam prāmāṇya niṣedhaḥ eva

original: nāpratyakṣaṃ pramāṇamityanena hi viśeṣaniṣedhena kaṇṭhataḥ anumānaprāmāṇyaniṣedhor'thataḥ pratyakṣaprāmāṇyavidhiśca vivakṣitaḥ /
analyzed: na apratyakṣam pramāṇam iti anena hi viśeṣa niṣedhena kaṇṭhataḥ anumāna prāmāṇya niṣedhaḥ ūrathataḥ pratyakṣa prāmāṇya vidhiḥ ca vivakṣitaḥ

na api śabda upamāne
sva pratyaye tayoḥ anavakāśāt
para pratyaye api dharmya siddheḥ
siddhau api parasya āpta tva aniścayāt
tasmāt atīndriya vidhi niṣedhayoḥ anumānam anaḍgīkṛtya aśakya tvāt aśakya apahnavam anumānam iti arthaḥ
dṛṣṭa sādharmyam ca niyatam iti śeṣaḥ
katham tena eva tasya aprāmāṇyam iti vyāghāta mātram vivakṣitam
tena ayam arthaḥ yadi anu mānam apramāṇam
katham tena eva vidhi niṣedha siddhiḥ
atha tena vidhi niṣedha siddhiḥ
katham tasya aprāmāṇyam iti
kim ca anumānam an aḍgīkṛtya para pratyāyanāya śabda prayogaḥ api ayam aśakyaḥ para vedana pratipatteḥ ava tad antareṇa aśakya tvāt
na ced para pratyāyanam
nūnam aunmattyam āviṣkaroti vaktuḥ iti āha api ca iti
sūtre vibhāgaḥ api asti iti vyavacchidya āha lakṣaṇa sūtra tātparyam āha iti
syāt etat ativyāpakam iti
atra avyāpakam ca iti api draṣṭavyam
atas ubhaya vyutpādana upasaṃhāra virodhaḥ
vigraha traya pradarśanam vigraha trayam draṣṭavyam iti arthaḥ

original: vyāptismṛtisahāyād dvitīyaliṅgadarśanādevānumitisiddheralaṃ tṛtīyaliṅgadarśanakalpanayeti yathāśrutabhāṣyānusāriṇaḥ tān risyati na ceti //
analyzed: vyāpti smṛti sahāyāt dvitīya liṅga darśanāt eva anumiti siddheḥ alam tṛtīya liṅga darśana kalpanayā iti yathāśruta bhāṣya anusāriṇaḥ tān na ca iti
saḥ eṣa saṃskāra udbodham adhikam abhyupagacchataḥ doṣaḥ uktaḥ

original: yastu sahakārilābhādanyo na kaścidudbodho nāmeti manyate,
analyzed: yaḥ tu sahakāri lābhāt anyaḥ na kaścid udbodhaḥ nāma iti manyate
tam pratyāha vinaśyat avasthasya iti
na hi vyāpti smaraṇa mātrāt anumitiḥ
na api liṅga darśana mātrāt
kim tarhi
vyāpti viśiṣṭa liṅga darśanāt

original: na ca vyāptiviśiṣṭaṃ liṅgamekaikasyobhayasya vā gocaraḥ,
analyzed: na ca vyāpti viśiṣṭam liṅgam ekaikasya ubhayasya vā gocaraḥ
kim tu svatantram ubhayam ubhayasya
na ca svatantra ubhaya jñāne api viśiṣṭa jñānam bhavati
tat idam uktam paraspara vārttā anabhijña tayā svatantra sva sva viṣaya paryavasita tayā
mithas ghaṭanā yogaḥ viśiṣṭa pratyaya yogaḥ iti arthaḥ
na ca svatantram etat ubhayam eka ātma samavāya mātreṇa anumiti bhāvayiṣyati iti vācyam

original: dvitīyaliṅgadarśanaṃ hi vasatugatyā liṅgaviṣayamityetāvataiva vyāptismṛteḥ sahakāriliṅgatvarūpollekhitayā vā?
analyzed: dvitīya liṅga darśanam hi vasatu gatyā liṅga viṣayam iti etāvatā eva vyāpti smṛteḥ sahakāri liṅga tva rūpa ullekhi tayā vā
na tāvat ādyaḥ
dūrāt dhūma viṣaya vastu tva jñānasya api prakāra antara āyāta vyāpti smṛtim prati sahakāri tva prasaḍgāt
dvitīyaḥ tu dvitīya liṅga darśane
na asti eva
tat idam uktam vṛttyā salu ayam ghaṭayet
vyāpāreṇa na rūpataḥ na ubhaya samavāyi tā mātreṇa atiprasaḍgāt iti
tasmāt liṅga tva ullekhi tṛtīyam liṅga darśanam āstheyam iti āha tasmāt iti

original: iha tādātmyatadutpattisvarūpādiniścaye pratibandhaniścayastadā na syāt yadi te eva pratibandhaḥ,
analyzed: iha tādātmya tad utpatti svarūpa ādi niścaye pratibandha niścayaḥ tadā na syāt yadi te eva pratibandhaḥ
tābhyām samāna upāyaḥ vā pratibandhaḥ
tayoḥ eva vā pratibandha paryavasānam
te eva vā pratibandha niścaya upāyaḥ
tatra upāya tvam sahacāra avasāye vā
vyabhicāra śaḍkā nirāse vā
vyabhicāra śaḍkā api upādhi darśanāt vā
upādhi śaṅkayā vā
bhūyas bhūyas sahacaritayoḥ kayoḥ cit arthayoḥ vyabhicāra anusandhāna mātreṇa vā iti

original: tatra ca sahacārāvasāyaḥ tāvadindriyasannikarṣādhīnotpattiḥ tadutpattyaniścaye 'pi vahnidhūmayoḥ sidhyati,
analyzed: tatra ca sahacāra avasāyaḥ tāvat indriya sannikarṣa adhīna utpattiḥ tad utpatti aniścaye api vahni dhūmayoḥ sidhyati
vyabhicāra śaḍkā api darśana yogya upādhi adhīnā yogya anupalambha bādhāt eva nirastā

original: atīndriyāstu upādhayaḥ anyatra pramāṇaparidṛṣṭāḥ śaḍkitā api yathā nivartante,
analyzed: atīndriyāḥ tu upādhayaḥ anyatra pramāṇa paridṛṣṭāḥ śaḍkitāḥ api yathā nivartante
tathā vakṣyāmaḥ
pramāṇa pathā anavatīrṇa upādhi śaḍkā tu tad utpatti niścayam api āskandati iti katham sā
tena nivartanīyā iti āha atra ucyate iti
sahacaritayoḥ vyabhicāra darśana mātreṇa tu vyabhicāra śaḍkā kārya kāraṇayoḥ api samānā
tad utpatti lakṣaṇa viśeṣa siddhau vipakṣe bādhaka pramāṇa vṛttyā śaḍga anivṛttiḥ iti yadi

original: tadāsmākamapi svābhāvikasaṃbandhasiddhau vipakṣe bādhakapramāṇavṛttyaiva śaḍkānivṛttiriti samaḥ samādhiḥ /
analyzed: tadā asmākam api svābhāvika saṃbandha siddhau vipakṣe bādhaka pramāṇa vṛttyā eva śaḍkā nivṛttiḥ iti samaḥ samādhiḥ
viśeṣaḥ tu svābhāvika saṃbandhasya vyāpaka tvam
avyāpaka tvam tu tad utpatti ādeḥ iti āha api ca iti

original: tadidamuktam--sa ca yo vā sa veti /
analyzed: tat idam uktam sa ca yaḥ vā sa vā iti

original: na ca samānopāyatvādubhayoranyatarāniścaye nānyataraniścaya iti sāmpratam,
analyzed: na ca samāna upāya tvāt ubhayoḥ anyatara aniścaye na anyatara niścayaḥ iti sāmpratam
pratibandha aniścaye api hutāśa bhasmanoḥ kārya kāraṇa bhāva avadhāraṇāt
kārya kāraṇa bhāva aniścaye api dhāma dhūmayoḥ pratibandha avabodhāt
yat anatītam eva vahnim anumimate iti āha api ca kāryāt iti

original: tayoreva pratibandhaḥ paryavasyatīti pakṣaṃ nirācaṣṭe--api ca rasāditi //
analyzed: tayoḥ eva pratibandhaḥ paryavasyati iti pakṣam nirācaṣṭe api ca rasāt iti

original: yattu bhede sati vyāpyavyāpakābhāva eva kāryakāraṇabhāva eva kāryakāraṇabhāva iti vyudapādi prajñākareṇa tat pāpādapi pāpīyaḥ /
analyzed: yat tu bhede sati vyāpya vyāpaka abhāvaḥ eva kārya kāraṇa bhāvaḥ eva kārya kāraṇa bhāvaḥ iti vyudapādi prajñākareṇa tat pāpāt api pāpīyaḥ

original: tathā hi niyāmakavirahe bhinnāyoravyabhicāraḥ śaḍkākalaḍkāḍkitatvāt duravadhāraṇa iti tāmapanetuṃ kāryakāraṇabhāvo 'nenopanītaḥ,
analyzed: tathā hi niyāmaka virahe bhinna ayoḥ avyabhicāraḥ śaḍkā kalaḍka āḍkita tvāt duravadhāraṇaḥ iti tām apanetum kārya kāraṇa bhāvaḥ anena upanītaḥ

original: sa ced rūpa eva kathaṃ tanniścayenaivāvyabhicāraniścayaḥ?
analyzed: sa ced rūpaḥ eva katham tad niścayena eva avyabhicāra niścayaḥ

original: na caitat kīrteranumataṃ yad rasena rūpānumāne 'nyathābhyupāyamāha--yadi ca sarvalokasiddhamativāhya svayaṅkṛtalakṣaṇairvyavahāraḥ,
analyzed: na ca etat kīrteḥ anumatam yat rasena rūpa anumāne anyathā abhyupāyam āha yadi ca sarva loka siddham ativāhya svayaṅkṛta lakṣaṇaiḥ vyavahāraḥ
tadā bhede sati iti etat api parihīyatām
avyabhicāra mātram tad utpattiḥ iti eva astu
laghu ca evam sati lakṣaṇam syāt
tad ātmanaḥ api etat asti iti ced
astu śiśapā api vṛkṣa kāryam
katham tena eva tat kartavyam iti ced
kaḥ doṣaḥ
asiddham siddhena sādhyate
na tu tat eva siddham asiddham ca iti ced
hanta evam anāgatam api katham vyāpaka tā mātreṇa kāraṇam asiddha tvāt
vartamānam api katham vyāpya tā mātreṇa kāryam siddha tvāt
evam samāna kāle api katham avinābhāva mātreṇa kārya kāraṇa bhūte
asiddha avasthāyām ubhayoḥ api asādhaka tva aviśeṣāt
siddha avasthāyām ubhayoḥ api asādhya tva aviśeṣāt
tasmāt pūrva kāla bhāva niyamaḥ kāraṇa tvam kaḥ ca adbhāvitā niyamaḥ kārya tvam
avinābhāvaḥ tu niyama mātram iti eva jyāyaḥ

original: api ca rasarūpayoḥ kāryakāraṇabhāvaniścayo vahnidhūmayoriva pratyakṣānupalambhasādhyo vā syāt,
analyzed: api ca rasa rūpayoḥ kārya kāraṇa bhāva niścayaḥ vahni dhūmayoḥ iva pratyakṣa anupalambha sādhyaḥ vā syāt
kṣaṇa bhaṅga siddhau puñjāt puñja antara utpāttiḥ iti nyāyena vā
ādyaḥ tāvat kṣaṇayoḥ aśakyaḥ eva
tayoḥ eva pratyakṣa an ārohāt
tatra tasya a niścāyaka tvāt
santānayoḥ api duravabodhaḥ

original: na hi vahneriva rūpasya pūrvakālatāniyamaṃ dhūmasyeva rasasya praścādbhāvitāniyamaṃ laukikāḥ pratipadyante /
analyzed: na hi vahneḥ iva rūpasya pūrva kāla tā niyamam dhūmasya iva rasasya praścāt bhāvi tā niyamam laukikāḥ pratipadyante

original: kṣaṇabhaṅgasiddhinyāyastu na laukika iti vastuto laukikānāṃ rasato rūpānumānaṃ na syādityāha---laukikānāṃ cedamiti //
analyzed: kṣaṇabhaṅga siddhi nyāyaḥ tu na laukikaḥ iti vastutas laukikānām rasataḥ rūpa anumānam na syāt iti āha laukikānām ca idam iti

original: api ca ityanena te eva pratibandha iti nirastam /
analyzed: api ca iti anena te eva pratibandhaḥ iti nirastam

original: tādātmyaṃ tu gamyagamakabhāve pratyuta viruddhamityāha--api ceti /
analyzed: tādātmyam tu gamya gamaka bhāve pratyuta viruddham iti āha api ca iti
na hi tat eva karma niśceyam
kartṛ ca sva niścayena niścāyakam ca
niścita aniścitayoḥ paraspara virodhāt iti arthaḥ
bhavatu abhede api gamya gamaka bhāvaḥ
tathā api na śiśapā tvena vṛkṣa tva anumānam anavasara dusthā tvāt

original: na hyasti saṃbhavaḥ sāmānyamaniścitaṃ niścitastu viśeṣa ityāśaḍkya kenacit samarthitam utthāpya dūṣayati---yatviti /
analyzed: na hi asti saṃbhavaḥ sāmānyam aniścitam niścitaḥ tu viśeṣaḥ iti āśaḍkya kenacid samarthitam utthāpya dūṣayati yatu iti

original: bhinnayoreva vyāvṛttyorgamyagamakabhāvaḥ kiṃ tvabhinnādhyavaseyasaṃbandhāt tayorapi tādātmyaṃ vyavahniyata iti /
analyzed: bhinnayoḥ eva vyāvṛttyoḥ gamya gamaka bhāvaḥ kim tu abhinna adhyavaseya saṃbandhāt tayoḥ api tādātmyam vyavahniyate iti
sa yadi abhinna devadatta saṃbandhāt
chatra kuṇḍalayoḥ api abhedam vyavaharati kaḥ vārayitā
kevalam pramāṇa prayojanayoḥ vyāvṛttiḥ laukika virodhaḥ ca iti anena abhiprāyeṇa upasaṃharati tasmāt itas
asya idam kāryam kāraṇam iti ekaḥ saṃbandhaḥ
svābhāvikam saṃbandham upasaṃhṛtya tasya svarūpam āha tathā hi iti
svābhāvikaḥ nirūpādhiḥ iti arthaḥ
yadi api vyabhicāra avyabhicāra vyāpte aupādhika tva anaupādhika tve tābhyām ca
vyabhicāra avyabhicārau iti niyamaḥ
tau hi na tāvat nirnimittau sārvatrika tva prasaḍgāt
niyata viṣayau ca upalabhyete
na api animittau
sa upādheḥ api avyabhicāre nirūpādheḥ api vyabhicāre aniyama prasaḍgāt
tathā sati kārya ātmanoḥ api kāraṇa ātma vyabhicāraḥ prasajyeta
tasmāt upādhau avaśyam vyabhicāraḥ anupādhau avaśyam avyabhicāraḥ
vyabhicāre avaśyam upādhiḥ avyabhicāre avaśyam upādhi abhāvaḥ

original: tathāpi yatra sphuṭo vyabhicārastatra niṣphalamupādhyanusaraṇaṃ tadarthatvāt tasya /
analyzed: tathā api yatra sphuṭaḥ vyabhicāraḥ tatra niṣphalam upādhi anusaraṇam tad artha tvāt tasya
asphuṭe tu vyabhicāre tasya upayogaḥ
na tu upādhi tad ama avasiddhaye vyabhicāra avyabhicāra paryeṣaṇam upayujyate
vyabhicāra ādi siddhau satyām upādhi tad abhāva parīkṣāyāḥ niṣphala tvāt
tasmāt anyonya vyāpti pradarśana mātra prayuktaḥ vyabhicāram udbhāvya api upādhim āha yadā tu iti
yatas na svābhāvikaḥ na nirūpādhikaḥ
tatas na niyataḥ na avyabhicārī iti arthaḥ

original: atha dhūmādīnāmapi vahnyādibhiḥ kathaṃ svābhāvika ityata āha---svābhāvikastviti /
analyzed: atha dhūma ādīnām api vahni ādibhiḥ katham svābhāvikaḥ iti atas āha svābhāvikaḥ tu iti
nanu asphuṭe vyabhicāre
sa phalam upādhi anusaraṇam

original: tat kimatra nāsau sphuṭa ityata āha---kvacidvyabhicārasyādarśanāditi /
analyzed: tat kim atra na asau sphuṭaḥ iti atas āha kvacid vyabhicārasya adarśanāt iti

original: nanu kvacit kadācid vyabhicāro 'pi syādayogyatvācca na dṛśyetāpītyata āha---anupalabhyamānasyāpi kalpanānupatteḥ,
analyzed: nanu kvacid kadācid vyabhicāraḥ api syāt ayogya tvāt ca na dṛśyeta api iti atas āha anupalabhyamānasya api kalpanā anupatteḥ
anupalabhyamāna vyabhicāra kalpanā dvārībhūta upādhi abhāvāt iti arthaḥ
atas niyataḥ avyabhicārī iti arthaḥ
nanu upādhi abhāve anupalabhyamāna vyabhicāra kalpanā anavakāśaḥ

original: sa eva tūpādhyabhāvaḥ kutastya ityāśaṅkate---na ceti /
analyzed: saḥ eva tu upādhi abhāvaḥ kutastyaḥ iti āśaṅkatena ca iti
pariharati avaśyam iti
upādhiḥ hi pramāṇa padavīm avatīrṇaḥ eva vaktavyaḥ

original: anyathā sarvaiḥ pramāṇaiḥ sarvadā sarvatra sarveṣāṃ jātyā kaścit anupalabhyamāno 'pi syādupādhiriti śaḍkā tadutpattāvapi brahmaṇāpyapanetumaśakyā
analyzed: anyathā sarvaiḥ pramāṇaiḥ sarvadā sarvatra sarveṣām jātyā kaścid anupalabhyamānaḥ api syāt upādhiḥ iti śaḍkā tad utpattau api brahmaṇā api apanetum aśakyā

original: nānāpramāṇagocarārthasākṣātkāravataḥ sarvajñasyāpi svabhāvata evānupalabhyaḥ kaścidartho bhavet,
analyzed: nānā pramāṇa gocara artha sākṣātkāravataḥ sarvajñasya api svabhāvataḥ evā anupalabhyaḥ kaścid arthaḥ bhavet
bhavet ca sarva pramāṇa apoḍham api kadācid advaitam
prakṛti puruṣau vā
niḥsvabhāva tā vā jagataḥ
vedānām vā a prāmāṇyam
tat katham caitya vandana ādau api bhikṣuḥ pravarteta
artha sandehāt pravṛttiḥ iti ced

original: yatra pramāṇāni paribhūya śaḍkāpiśācī prasarati kutastatrārthasaṃbhāvanāpi?
analyzed: yatra pramāṇāni paribhūya śaḍkā piśācī prasarati kutas tatra artha saṃbhāvanā api
āstām tāvat para loka pravṛttiḥ
ihaloka pravṛttiḥ api na
syāt iti āha antatas iti

original: yadyapi viśiṣṭāhārānantaraṃ bhūyo bhūyaḥ puṣṭidhātusāmyādi daśyate,
analyzed: yadi api viśiṣṭa āhāra anantaram bhūyas bhūyas puṣṭi dhātu sāmya ādi daśyate
maraṇam tam roga ādi anantaram eva

original: tathāpi āhāraviśeṣo maraṇasyaiva hetuḥ kadācid bhavet,
analyzed: tathā api āhāra viśeṣaḥ maraṇasya eva hetuḥ kadācid bhavet
katham anyathā ante tad antaram asya upalambhaḥ
yat tu iyantam kālam na māritavān
tad mantra pratibaddha vahni vat
kenacid pratibaddha tvāt
saḥ eva pratibandhakaḥ puṣṭi ādi hetuḥ iti api saṃbhāvyeta
roga ādikam eva ca puṣṭi ādi hetuḥ
tat tu puṣṭi ādi kāle adṛśya tvāt eva na apalabhyate

original: na hi puṣṭyādikāraṇairdṛśyaireva bhavitavyamityapi kadācit syāt,
analyzed: na hi puṣṭi ādi kāraṇaiḥ dṛśyaiḥ eva bhavitavyam iti api kadācid syāt
yathā ca aprāmāṇika upādhi śaḍkyā vyabhicāri tva śaṅkayā vā anumāna nivṛttiḥ
tathā aprāmāṇika anartha śaṅkayā eva viśiṣṭa āhāra bhojana ādi nivṛttiḥ iti arthaḥ
tasmāt utprekṣita artha niścaya vat tad śaḍkā api bandhyā eva
pramitasya eva tu niścaya vat śaḍkā api samīha upayoginī iti āha tasmāt iti
tat ayam saṃkṣepaḥ
vyabhicāraḥ eva pratibandha abhāvaḥ
upādheḥ eva vyabhicāra āśaḍkā
pramāṇa niścitaḥ eva upādhi tvena śaṅkanīyaḥ

original: sādhane sopādhiḥ sādhye nirūpādhireva upādhitvena niśceyaḥ /
analyzed: sādhane sa upādhiḥ sādhye nirūpādhiḥ eva upādhi tvena niśceyaḥ
atas anyaḥ ca anyathātvena iti
pramāṇa paridṛṣṭeṣu eva kaścid upādhiḥ bhaviṣyati iti atas āha prayatnena iti
ayam prayatna arthaḥ
pratyakṣa upalabhyāḥ tāvat yogya anupalabdheḥ eva nirastāḥ
pramāṇa antara paridṛṣṭānām api vyāpakānām upādhi tve vahneḥ sārvatrika tva prasaṅgaḥ
nityānām upādhi tve bahneḥ sadā anuvṛtti prasaṅgaḥ
anityāḥ tu trividhāḥ ubhaya avyabhicāriṇaḥ
ubhaya vyabhicāriṇaḥ
anyatara avyabhicāriṇaḥ ca iti
tatra prathama dvitīyāḥ upādhi lakṣaṇa abhāvāt eva na upādhayaḥ
anyatara avyabhicāriṇaḥ ca dvividhāḥ dhūma mātra avyabhicāriṇaḥ vahni mātra avyabhicāriṇaḥ ca iti
pūrve lakṣaṇa abhāvāt eva na upādhayaḥ
vahni mātra avyabhicāriṇaḥ api dvividhāḥ
vyāpya mātra rūpāḥ ubhaya rūpāḥ ca iti
pūrva vat eva pūrve
ubhaya rūpāḥ tu sāmagrītaḥ
na api pare vidyante
sā ca na kvacid upādhiḥ
dhūmasya vahninā iva tayā api svabhāva saṃbandhāt

analyzed: etat ca abhyupetya uktam vastutas tu na na nirūpa ākhyam kasyacid vyavahārasya bhājanam iti
nanu yadi āvayoḥ akuśala tayā sva vacana virodhaḥ
atha praṣṭuḥ kim uttaram vaktavyam iti avaśiṣṭam upasaṃharan pariharati tasmāt iti

original: yatra vacane sarvathaiva virodhasatatrāvacanameva śreya ityarthaḥ /
analyzed: yatra vacane sarvathā eva virodha sa tatra avacanam eva śreyaḥ iti arthaḥ
etena mūka tā hetu vikalpāḥ parihṛtāḥ boddhavyāḥ iti
nanu eka rūpam avikalam idam katham gamakam

original: gamakatve vā vyatirekavikalavad rūpāntaravikalamapi tathā kiṃ na syādaviśeṣādityāśaḍkyāha---na caitāvateti /
analyzed: gamaka tve vā vyatireka vikala vat rūpa antara vikalam api tathā kim na syāt aviśeṣāt iti āśaḍkya āha na ca etāvatā iti
rūpa antara vaikalya vat na vyatireka vaikalyam avinābhāva kṣatim āvahati iti arthaḥ

original: evaṃ tarhi satyapi vipakṣe vyatireko na paryeṣaṇīya ityata āha---vipakṣasambhave tviti /
analyzed: evam tarhi sati api vipakṣe vyatirekaḥ na paryeṣaṇīyaḥ iti atas āha vipakṣa sambhave tu iti
vipakṣe sati tatra vṛtti śaḍkā
tatas tad nivṛtti artham tad upayogaḥ
vipakṣa abhāve tu śaḍkā eva nā asti
yathā uktam prāk

original: na hi tāyābhyavaharaṇe 'pyasamarthasya mumūrṣoḥ śaṣkulībhakṣaṇaṃ śaṅkate cetana ityarthaḥ //
analyzed: na hi tāyā abhyavaharaṇe api asamarthasya mumūrṣoḥ śaṣkulī bhakṣaṇam śaṅkate cetanaḥ iti arthaḥ

original: asya tu kālpaniko 'pi vipakṣaḥ pareṇābhidhātuṃ na śakyate,

original: tasya kiṃ vipakṣe vṛttiravṛttirveti praśne anenottarakovidena kiṃ vaktavyam?
analyzed: tasya kim vipakṣe vṛttiḥ avṛttiḥ vā iti praśne anena uttara kovidena kim vaktavyam

original: mūkībhūya tiṣṭhāsostu na kaścit pratimalla iti svayamevollapitamanena /
analyzed: mūkībhūya tiṣṭhāsoḥ tu na kaścid pratimallaḥ iti svayam evā ullapitam anena
na tu evaṃbhūtaḥ ahetuḥ eva doṣa abhāvāt

original: arūcimātrasya sarvatra sulabhatvāditi bhāgāsiddhinirākāraṇāya vyāptyeti vadataḥ //

atiśayaḥ ca vyāptiḥ eva iti āśayaḥ

original: tadidam uktaṃ ṭīkākṛtā---asti gandhavatvasya sādhyaṃ na tu vyāptyeti /

atha kim liṅkam

viṣaya viṣayiṇoḥ abheda vivakṣayā ca sāmānādhikaraṇyam iti mantavyam

avikala indriyasya yogya viṣaya avadhānena jñāna anumānam

original: śeṣavallakṣaṇayoge 'pi tadudāharaṇāntaravailakṣaṇyenedameva sāmānyatodṛṣṭapadārthe bhaviṣyatītyata āhā---na caitāvateti /

na tāvat aśvakarṇa ādi śabda vat ayam sūrya vrajyā anumāne vartate
anyatra api vṛddha prayogāt
nā api sūtrakārasya eva paribhāṣā iyam
niṣprayojana tvāt

tasmāt bhāṣyakāra vyākhyāna viruddha udāharaṇa mātra ākhyānam a rocayamānaḥ sāmānyatodṛṣṭa padam vyākhyāya anyathā udāharaṇam āha iti yojanā
kṣaya vṛddhi pratyaya aviṣaya tve sati iti spaṣṭa artham

original: prāḍmukhopalabhyatve cetyasya ṭīkayā sphoritasya prāḍmukhopalabdhasya prāḍmukhenānupalambhe satītyarthaḥ /

original: anyathā mārtaṇḍamaṇḍalasyāpi lokāntaravartipuruṣāpekṣayā prāḍmukhopalabhyatā durvāretyasiddhaṃ viśeṣaṇaṃ syāt /
analyzed: anyathā mārtaṇḍa maṇḍalasya api loka antara varti puruṣa apekṣayā prāḍmukha upalabhya tā durvārā iti asiddham viśeṣaṇam syāt
tat etat nara padena sūcitam

original: na hi yathātathā pādavihāraṇamātramasya hetoḥ kṣatimāvahatīti /

original: satyavināśe iti ca draṣṭavyam sati draṣṭavyatva iti veti śeṣaḥ //

original: iha yadyapi diśaḥ pratyakṣatve sādhye 'ḍgulyā nirdeśo vyadhikaraṇaḥ,

original: tathāpi yasyāṃ diśi ete taravaḥ sā prācīti tarvādibhedena apyaḍgulyā vyapadeśo 'stīti
analyzed: tathā api yasyām diśi ete taravaḥ sā prācī iti taru ādi bhedena api aḍgulyāḥ vyapadeśaḥ asti iti

original: na vyadhikaraṇatvamāhatyābhidhātuṃ śakyata ityanenābhiprāyeṇa anyathāsiddhimeva vārtikārthamāha---anyathāsiddhatayeti /
analyzed: na vyadhikaraṇa tvam āhatya abhidhātum śakyate iti anena abhiprāyeṇa anyathāsiddhim eva vārtika artham āha anyathā siddha tayā iti
upalakṣaṇam ca etat

original: calantīṃ patākāmupalabhyāyaṃ vāyurvātīti aḍagulīnirdeśasyācākṣuṣe vāyāvapi gatatvena vyabhicārasya api saṃbhavāt /

original: sāmānyena kāryaṃ vā kāraṇaṃ vā anubhayātmakaṃ vā avinābhāvitayā dṛṣṭaṃ niścitaṃ sāmānyatodṛṣṭameva ca yojanā /

original: kāryatvaṃ punarasyānupalabdhikāraṇabhāve sati anupalabdhasyopalabhyamānatvād vā pratyakṣād veti /

original: tathāpi bhāṣyakārīyo heturūpekṣitaḥ syādityato 'vyāpakatāmātraṃ prasādhyaiva prakṛte lagayati---karṇeti /

atra api prayogaḥ

original: kṣityādikaṃ sakartṛkaṃ kāryatvādityatra sarvajñatvamantareṇa kṣityādīnāṃ kartṛtvameva nopapadyate,
analyzed: kṣiti ādikam sa kartṛkam kārya tvāt iti atra sarvajñatvam antareṇa kṣiti ādīnām kartṛ tvam eva nā upapadyate
tad adhiṣṭhāne vā asarvajña tva anupapatteḥ
tasmāt sarvajña tvam antareṇa pratijñāta artha anupapattau tad abhiprāya vyāptam
ābhiprāyika tvāt ca pakṣa dharmatā gocaraḥ
icchā ādayaḥ paratantrāḥ guṇa tvāt iti atra punar ātmā na abhiprāya vyāptaḥ

api tu mānasa pratyakṣa vedya tva ādibhaḥ bādhitam

tad avyāpta tvāt ca na pakṣa dharma tā tam aṅkam āropayitum arhati
api tu icchā saṃbaddha para mātram ādāya eva nivartate

original: etaduttarakālaṃ kṣityādau bādhite tadanyāsiddhau vidhāyakapramāṇābhāvānniṣedhamukhena vyatirekī pravartate /

original: tamimaṃ viśeṣaṃ hṛdi nidhāyoktam---bādhakairapanīte dravyāṣṭakaguṇatva iti //

nanu sāmānyatodṛṣṭāt yat rūpam siddham

na ca tathābhūte sandehaḥ api kāraṇa abhāvāt
samāna asamāna dharma vipratipattīnām anupalabdha cara aviṣaya tvāt iti atas āha yadi api ca ayam iti
sva rūpeṇa asādhāraṇa rūpeṇa iti arthaḥ

original: na hi vākyārthasayāpūrvatayā padārthānāṃ viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhāvo vihanyate /
analyzed: na hi vākya artha sayā apūrva tayā padārthānām viśeṣaṇa viśeṣya bhāvaḥ vihanyate

viśeṣa siddheḥ sāmānya sidbhiḥ adūra viprakarṣaḥ
tad asiddhiḥ tu tad viparyaya
iti arthaḥ

original: athavā pratyekotthitaḥ saṃśayaḥ samudāye viśrāmyatīti nyāyaḥ /

original: uta tadatiriktāśritā ityanenākāreṇa sarvadravyeṣu bhavan sandehaḥ samānadharmadarśanādeva dravyāṣṭakatadatiriktakoṭyoreva paryavasito bhavati
analyzed: uta tad atirikta āśritāḥ iti anena ākāreṇa sarva dravyeṣu bhavan sandehaḥ samāna dharma darśanāt eva dravya aṣṭaka tad atirikta koṭyoḥ eva paryavasitaḥ bhavati

original: na hyutpanno 'pyasaṃyukta eva turyā prathamekṣaṇe paṭa iti kasyacinniścayaḥ,

original: tathotpanne 'pi prathame kṣaṇe tantuṣvasamaveta eveṣyata iti pādau prasārya tiṣṭhato nedamuttaramityarthaḥ /

original: anavasthābhiyā avaśyamantataḥ kācit prāptiśca na ca vṛttimatīti svīkartavyam,

original: anāditāyāṃ hyaḍkurotpādānuguṇasamayasaṃbhavinā bījena janite 'ḍkureṇa janite bīje vartamānaṃ bījatvaṃ tasyāḍkurapūrvakatāmavagamayatīti yujyate,

original: yasmāt tadekavākyatāyāmeva satyāṃ vipakṣamātraviṣayatvamasya vaktuṃ śakyate /
analyzed: yasmāt tad ekavākyatāyām eva satyām vipakṣa mātra viṣaya tvam asya vaktum śakyate
sā api tasmin sati evā iti durūttara doṣa āpattiḥ

original: tathāpi bauddhanaye śābddhaṃ vyavahāramāśritya samuccaya eva na nirvahet,
analyzed: tathā api bauddha naye śābddham vyavahāram āśritya samuccayaḥ eva na nirvahet
kṛtam anayā virodhe sūkṣma īkṣikayā iti āśayavān āha anya apoha iti
saḥ ayam sādhāraṇaḥ api nyāyaḥ aprastuta tva bhiyā viśeṣa niṣṭha tayā avatāritaḥ iti
pariśuddhiḥ
yathoddeśam ca lakṣaṇāt iti bhāva padam
lakṣaṇam āha iti anayoḥ madhye itiḥ pūraṇīyaḥ
atra api iti apiśabdaḥ pratyakṣa lakṣaṇa upakṣayā
nanu sādhyate anena iti sādhanam iti eva astu
saṃbhavati ca ayam arthaḥ jñānasya karaṇa tāyām
tasya prasiddha sādharmya samuttha tvāt iti atas āha tat etat iti
na sāmānya atiriktam sādṛśyam
anāśritasya anya āśraya tve dravya tva prasaḍgāt
ananya āśritasya api ayuta siddha ubhaya vyaḍgya tve samavāya tva prasaḍgāt
go gavaya ādi yuta siddha niṣṭha abhivyakti anupapatteḥ ca
yuta siddha abhivyaḍgya tve abhāva tva prasaḍgāt
ayuta siddha avayavi avayava ādi niṣṭha abhivyakti anupapatteḥ ca

original: nityasyānekāśrayatve jātitvaprasaḍgāt ekāśrayatve tasya nāśe anāśrayasyāvasthānānupapatteḥ nityatve pramāṇābhāvaprasaḍgācca /
analyzed: nityasya aneka āśraya tve jāti tva prasaḍgāt eka āśraya tve tasya nāśe anāśrayasya avasthāna anupapatteḥ nitya tve pramāṇa abhāva prasaḍgāt ca
sāmānyam hi eka āśraya nāśe api āśraya antare tādrūpyeṇa eva
pratyabhijñānāt nityam iti vyavasthāpyate

original: idaṃ tu na tatheti kathaṃ nityamiti jñātavyam?
analyzed: idam tu na tathā iti katham nityam iti jñātavyam
pratyuta anitya eka āśraya tvāt eva anitya tvam eva anumīyate
nitya eka vṛtti tve tu svarūpa sataḥ viśeṣa tva prasaṃgāt
sattā asataḥ guṇa tva āpatteḥ
anityeṣu ca sadṛśa vyavahāra hāna prasaḍgāt
anityasya tu aneka āśraya tve guṇavataḥ dravya tva prasaḍgāt
nirguṇa tve guṇa tva prasaḍgāt
eka āśraya tve saṃyoga vibhāgayoḥ anapekṣa kāraṇasya karma tva prasaḍgāt
tad viparītasya tu guṇa tva prasaḍgāt

original: guṇeṣu ca karmasu ca sādṛśyavyavahāro na syāt,
analyzed: guṇeṣu ca karmasu ca sādṛśya vyavahāraḥ na syāt
teṣām samavāyi kāraṇa tva abhāvena anitya dharma ayogāt
āśraya sādṛśyena tad vyavahāra upapattau visadṛśa āśrayāṇām guṇa karmaṇām tad vyavahāra anupapatteḥ
kāraṇa traya vicāra anupapatteḥ ca iti arthaḥ
sādharmya prasiddhiḥ api draṣṭavyā iti
sūtre sā ca karmadhāraya samāśrayeṇa
iti āpta vākyāt iti vākyāt ārabhyam pratyakṣa paryantena iti hṛdayam
prajñāpanīyasya gavaya śabda vācya tayā iti vadatā atideśa vākyasya akṛta samaya saṃjñā samabhivyāhāraḥ darśitaḥ

original: tathāpi karaṇavyutpattyā sādhanapadavyākhyānasya parityāge na kācidupapattirdarśitā,
analyzed: tathā api karaṇa vyutpattyā sādhana pada vyākhyānasya parityāge na kācid upapattiḥ darśitā
prajñāpana padasya api karaṇa vyutpatti saṃbhavāt atas
āha piṇḍasya hi iti

original: pratyakṣāt sādṛśyāt prajānan tena prajñāpyata iti vadan sādṛśyasyaiva prajñāyamānasya kāraṇatvamabhipraiti /
analyzed: pratyakṣāt sādṛśyāt prajānan tena prajñāpyate iti vadan sādṛśyasya eva prajñāyamānasya kāraṇa tvam abhipraiti

original: tathā ca tena saha sādhyasādhanapadasya vyadhikaraṇatvādanyasya ca karaṇasyābhāvāt sādhyasādhanapadamanarthakamāpadyeta,
analyzed: tathā ca tena saha sādhya sādhana padasya vyadhikaraṇa tvāt anyasya ca karaṇasya abhāvāt sādhya sādhana padam anarthakam āpadyeta
yadi bhāva sādhanam na syāt
na ca tat jñānam eva astu karaṇam iti vācyam
avāntara vyāpāra virahiṇaḥ karaṇa tva ayogāt
asamīcīne api sādṛśya jñāne tathā bhāva prasaḍgāt ca
tat api hi sādṛśya jñānam eva
pramāṇa anuvṛttyā tad nivṛttiḥ iti api na vācyam
vṛttaiḥ eva padaiḥ samīhita siddhau anuvṛtteḥ anavakāśāt
sā api hi grantha vaicitryam āpādayantī pada antara vṛttiḥ eva

original: tathāpi prajñānaṃ prasiddhipadārthona tu prajñāpanamityata āha---ityetadarthe /
analyzed: tathā api prajñānam prasiddhi padārthaḥ na tu prajñāpanam iti atas āha eti etad arthe
pramāṇasya vyāpāraḥ avyavadhānena phala uparaktā prātisvikī kriyā

original: jñāyamānasya sādṛśyasya karaṇatvamāviṣkartuṃ tasyānyatra acaritārthaḥ phalānuguṇo vyāpāro darśita iti tātparyār'thaḥ //
analyzed: jñāyamānasya sādṛśyasya karaṇa tvam āviṣkartum tasya anyatra acaritārthaḥ phala anuguṇaḥ vyāpāraḥ darśitaḥ iti tātparyār'thaḥ
tatra iti
tātparya artha akṣara arthayoḥ

original: lakṣyapadaṃ hi lakṣaṇavyavasthāpakaṃ na bhavati parasparāśrayatvamagatirveti doṣāt /
analyzed: lakṣya padam hi lakṣaṇa vyavasthāpakam na bhavati paraspara āśraya tvam agatiḥ vā iti doṣāt
nanu upasthāpakam api iti āśayavān āśaḍkya dvitīya pada upādāna tātparyam āha yadi api iti
nanu evam sati prathamā eva astu
na ca iyam aśoka vanikā
tasyāḥ prathama tvāt eva prathamam buddhau upanipātāt
na sādhya sādhana padena phala vācinā sāmānādhikaraṇya anupapatteḥ
astu tarhi tat api karaṇa sādhanam
evam yatas iti adhyāhāra kaṣṭa sṛṣṭiḥ api na syāt
satyam eva etat
kintu phala abhāvena eva hetunā upamānasya prāmāṇyam apanīyate pareṇa

original: tasmāt tadavabodhāya niṣkṛṣya phalamasya darśanīyamiti tathaiva sūcitavān /
analyzed: tasmāt tad avabodhāya niṣkṛṣya phalam asya darśanīyam iti tathā eva sūcitavān
etat ca agre sphuṭam iti na iha ṭīkā kṛtā darśitam
bhāṣya vārttikayoḥ virodham āśaḍkya āha vārttikakāreṇa iti
tṛtīyā samāse iti upalakṣaṇam artha siddhaḥ
karmadhāraya samāsaḥ api na nirastaḥ iti draṣṭavyam
a viruddha tvāt

original: prasiddhaṃ sādharmyaṃ yasyeti bahuvrīhāvapi karmadhārayārthasya praviṣṭatvāt /
analyzed: prasiddham sādharmyam yasya iti bahuvrīhau api karmadhāraya arthasya praviṣṭa tvāt

original: evaṃ prasiddhena sādharmyamityatra tṛtīyātatpuruṣasya praveśād virodhāntaramāśaḍkyāha---bhāṣyakāreṇa hīti /
analyzed: evam prasiddhena sādharmyam iti atra tṛtīyā tatpuruṣasya praveśāt virodha antaram āśaḍkya āha bhāṣyakāreṇa hi iti
na ayam arthaḥ bhāṣya akṣarebhyaḥ śrūyate iti atas āha ākṣipra iti
praścāt niṣkṛṣya abhidhānam kṛtam
samaya pratipatteḥ phalasya
tat āha samākhyā iti
tathā api kim āyātam vārttika virodhasya iti atas
āha etat eva iti
pratipadyatām ayam ityādi śaḍkā uttara artha sūtra uktam karoti prasiddha sādharmyāt iti atra iti

original: atropamānasya phale vipratipadyamānān prati sāśaḍkaṃ jarannaiyāyikajayanta prabhṛtīnāṃ parihāramāha--yadyapīti /
analyzed: atra upamānasya phale vipratipadyamānān prati sa āśaḍkam jarat naiyāyika jayanta prabhṛtīnām parihāram āha yadi api iti
saṃjñā karma saṃjñā karaṇam

original: mānāntaraṃ śabdo vā śabdārtho vā liṅgabhūtaḥ /
analyzed: māna antaram śabdaḥ vā śabda arthaḥ vā liṅga bhūtaḥ
tatra liṅga pakṣe
upalakṣitaḥ pratipāditaḥ

original: śabdādavagatena gosādṛśyena pratipādyamānaḥ piṇḍa samānāsamānajātīyebhyo vyavacchinnaḥ śakyamavaganatumiti saṃbandhaḥ /
analyzed: śabdāt avagatena go sādṛśyena pratipādyamānaḥ piṇḍa samāna asamāna jātīyebhyaḥ vyavacchinnaḥ śakyam avaganatum iti saṃbandhaḥ
śabda pakṣe

original: tu gosādṛśyenopalakṣito viśiṣṭaḥ śabdādavagamyamānaḥ piṇḍaḥ samānāsamānajātīyebhyo vyavacchinnaḥ śakyo 'vagantum,
analyzed: tu go sādṛśyena upalakṣitaḥ viśiṣṭaḥ śabdāt avagamyamānaḥ piṇḍaḥ samāna asamāna jātīyebhyaḥ vyavacchinnaḥ śakyaḥ avagantum
guṇa karma ādi vat sādṛśyasya api samāna samāna jītīya vyavacchedaka tvāt iti sugamam
go sadṛśaḥ gavaya śabda vācyaḥ iti tāvat astu

original: atha gosadṛśa eva ka ityāśaḍkānivartanāsāmarthyamateḥ pariplavaḥ /
analyzed: atha go sadṛśaḥ eva kaḥ iti āśaḍkā nivartanā sāmarthya mateḥ pariplavaḥ
enam eva artham kaścid ityādinā darśitavān
tatra iti

original: tarhi viśiṣṭaiva pratipattirvākyādastu ityata āha---na ceti /
analyzed: tarhi viśiṣṭā eva pratipattiḥ vākyāt astu iti atas āha na ca iti
pratyakṣa mātrāt bhaviṣyati iti atas āha na ca iti
etena vākya pratyakṣa samāhāraḥ api nirastaḥ
sa hi pramāṇa samāhāraḥ vā syāt
phala samāhāraḥ vā
ādye api pramāṇa tve sati samāhāraḥ
samāhṛtayoḥ vā prāmāṇyam iti
na tāvat prathamaḥ
phala aneka tve sati samāhāra anupapatteḥ
tasya eka phalam prati paraspara ādhipatya rūpa tvāt
na api dvitīyaḥ
vākya pratyakṣayoḥ bhinna kāla tvāt
vākya tad arthayoḥ smṛti dvāra upanītau api gavaya piṇḍa saṃbaddhena api indriya ādinā tad gata sādṛśya anupanaye samaya pariccheda asiddheḥ
phala samāhāre tu tad antarbhāve anumāna śabdayoḥ api pratyakṣa tva prasaṅgaḥ
tat kim tad phalasya tad pramāṇa bahirbhāvaḥ eva
antarbhāve vā kiyatī sīmā

original: asti tarhi sādṛśyādijñānakāle 'pi vistāritasya cakṣuṣo vyāpāraḥ?
analyzed: asti tarhi sādṛśya ādi jñāna kāle api vistāritasya cakṣuṣaḥ vyāpāraḥ
na tasmin sati
tasya anupayogāt
upalabdha go sādṛśya viśiṣṭa gavaya piṇḍasya vākya smṛtimataḥ kāla antare api anusandhāna balāt samaya pariccheda upapattiḥ iti
tat etat jarat naiyāyika matam āskandati nanu iti

original: pūrve hi yathā gaustathetyeva vākyaṃ gavayapadenāpratītasamayenāpi prayogamātropayoginā sahitaṃ saṃbandhapratipattihetuḥ,
analyzed: pūrve hi yathā gauḥ tathā iti eva vākyam gavaya padena apratīta samayena api prayoga mātra upayoginā sahitam saṃbandha pratipatti hetuḥ
pratisaṃbandhinaḥ tu śabdāt vā upalakṣaṇāt vā upasthāpanam iti āhuḥ
ādhunikāḥ tu pratisaṃbandhi upasthitiḥ pūrvavat eva
samaya paricchedaḥ tu prayoga anumānāt iti āhuḥ

original: avācakaprayogasya vākyānaṅgatayeti tadvirahiṇaśca saṃbandhyupalakṣaṇaparyavasānāditi manyamānā etadeva
analyzed: avācaka prayogasya vākya anaṅga tayā iti tad virahiṇaḥ ca saṃbandhi upalakṣaṇa paryavasānāt iti manyamānāḥ etat eva
prayogam āropya darśayanti yaḥ hi iti
etena eva pariplavaḥ nirastaḥ
yadi hi saṃbandhaḥ viditaḥ
kaḥ pariplava arthaḥ

original: atha na vidita iti tatrākāḍkṣānuvṛtterevamucyata iti cet--tadapyayuktam /
analyzed: atha na viditaḥ iti tatra ākāḍkṣā anuvṛtteḥ evam ucyate iti ced tat api ayuktam
na hi viśeṣa niṣṭhaḥ samayaḥ
tathā sati aśakya graha tvāt
api tu kiñcid nimittīkṛtya deśa kāla ādi viśeṣa vinākṛta vyakti mātra niṣṭhaḥ
tat eva nimittam na avagatam iti ced

original: avagatireva tarhi saṃndhasya saṃbandhino 'navagamāditi kiṃ pariplutaṃ pramātuḥ?
analyzed: avagatiḥ eva tarhi saṃndhasya saṃbandhinaḥ an avagamāt iti kim pariplutam pramātuḥ
na ca eṣa parama arthaḥ
sādṛśya viśiṣṭa piṇḍa upakṣepe nimittasya api upakṣepāt

original: anyathā piṇḍopakṣepe 'pi nimittānupakṣepe manodharmādiśabdānāṃ jātiśabdatvaṃ na syāt,
analyzed: anyathā piṇḍa upakṣepe api nimitta anupakṣepe manaḥ dharma ādi śabdānām jāti śabda tvam na syāt
avācaka tvam eva vā syāt
tad jātīyānām nitya parokṣa tvāt iti
atrā ucyate abhinava naiyāyikaiḥ
pañcadhā hi vācya vācaka bhāva vyavasthā
nimitta upalakṣaṇa rahite śṛṅga grāhikayā caitra maitra vat
nirnimitte antarbhūta upalakṣaṇe nirvacanikayā pācaka ādi śabda vat
nirnimitte eva taṭastha upalakṣaṇe paribhāṣaṇikayā ākāśa ādi śabda vat
sa nimitte taṭastha upalakṣaṇe evaṃprakārikayā pṛthivī ādi vat
viśeṣavat nimitte nimitta saṃḍkocanikayā svarga ādi vat iti

original: tatra prathamadvitīyayorasaṃbhāvitatvādiha viditavṛttāntatayā tṛtīyaṃ prakāraṃ nirasya pañcamaścaturthamupayātīti caturthaṃ vyavasthāpayati---na  #
analyzed: tatra prathama dvitīyayoḥ asaṃbhāvita tvāt iha vidita vṛttānta tayā tṛtīyam prakāram nirasya pañcamaḥ caturtham upayāti iti caturtham vyavasthāpayati na
tāvat iti
a vidita gavaya śabda vṛttāntasya tu yat bhaviṣyati
tad anantaram eva vakṣyati
tat idam uktam iti

original: tataśca tathābhūta eva piṇḍe saṃbandho grāhyo,
analyzed: tatas ca tathābhūte eva piṇḍe saṃbandhaḥ grāhyaḥ
na tu sādṛśya upalakṣaṇa upanīte piṇḍa mātre iti arthaḥ
nanu nimittam api avagatam iti atas āha na ca iti
na ca go sādṛśyena upalakṣyate iti upalakṣaṇam anumāpanam
smāraṇam vā
ubhayam api adṛṣṭa saṃbandhe anupapannam
smaraṇa mātra apekṣayā daṇḍa puruṣa udāharaṇam
etāvat eva ca syāt
yat uta
gavaya śabdaḥ vā gavaya tvam gamayet
yathā gauḥ tathā gavayaḥ iti
śabda arthaḥ vā anumāpayet avyabhicāra pakṣe
vyabhicāra pakṣe tu smārayet iti

original: nanu sādṛśyameva jātibhedamanantarbhāvya pratyetuṃ na śakyam,
analyzed: nanu sādṛśyam eva jāti bhedam an antarbhāvya pratyetum na śakyam
tasya bhinna pradhāna sāmānya vyakti guṇa avayava karma sāmānya bāhulya rūpa tvāt
tasmāt sādṛśa yathā tathā ādi śabdāḥ eva tasya pratyāyakāḥ
kevalam prasiddha aprasiddha sandehaḥ
tatra hasti tva ādikam go śabdena nirastam
mahiṣa tva ādikam tu anucita viṣaya tayā
anyathā upamāna svīkāre api apratīkārāt
tat ayam go sadṛśaḥ iti asya arthaḥ
gotaḥ bhinna jātīyaḥ
tad gata guṇa avayava ādi sāmānya bāhulyavān iti
na etat api sādhīyaḥ
darpaṇaḥ iva candraḥ
candraḥ iva mukham mukham iva aravindam

original: ado 'ravindamivedamaravindamiti caturdhā sādṛśyagatau bhinnapradhānasāmānyaniyamāyogena tadanantarbhāvyaiva sādṛśyapratipattyupapatteḥ /
analyzed: adaḥ aravindam iva idam aravindam iti caturdhā sādṛśya gatau bhinna pradhāna sāmānya niyama ayogena tat an antar bhāvya eva sādṛśya pratipatti upapatteḥ
kvacid dṛṣṭam iha smaryeta tāvat iti ced
smaryatām tāvat atra avagatam
na tu iha tat avagatam iti brūmaḥ

original: tasmād gosāmānyenopalakṣyamāṇaḥ piṇḍaḥ kiṃ tadvāneva gavayaśabdasya vācyo bhavatu?
analyzed: tasmāt go sāmānyena upalakṣyamāṇaḥ piṇḍaḥ kim tadvān eva gavaya śabdasya vācyaḥ bhavatu
paci kriyayā upalakṣyamāṇaḥ kartā iva pācaka śabdasya
āhosvit taṭa stham eva go sādṛśyam

original: tadupalakṣita eva piṇḍa ākāśavat tasya vācyo bhavet?
analyzed: tad upalakṣitaḥ eva piṇḍaḥ ākāśa vat tasya vācyaḥ bhavet
kim vā upalakṣaṇam vihāya gandha apalakṣita pṛthivī tva jātimān iva go sādṛśya upalakṣita jāti viśeṣavān eva
piṇḍaḥ asya vācyaḥ bhaviṣyati itara niyata koṭi saṃśaya tiraskāreṇa koṭi traya avalambī sandeha
eva jarat naiyāyikaiḥ ūpaplutaḥ saṃbandha paricchedaḥ iti ucyate

original: etāsvavaśyamanyatamā koṭirgavayapadārtho bhaviṣyatīti nirdhāraṇasaṃbhāvanāṃ hṛdi nidhāya /
analyzed: etāsu avaśyam anyatamā koṭiḥ gavaya padārthaḥ bhaviṣyati iti nirdhāraṇa saṃbhāvanām hṛdi nidhāya
ā etena manaḥ dharma ādi pratibandi grahaḥ pratyuktaḥ
tatra api anumānena unnīyamānānām manaḥ vyaktīnām samāna guṇa tayā samāna artha kriyā kāri tayā
samāna jātīya tva anumānāt
sāmānya anavagatau tu tatra api aśakyaḥ eva samaya grahaḥ
sāmānyam vā na tasya pravṛtti nimittam iti
tat idam uktam sarvathā anupalabdheḥ iti

original: yadyapi gavayatvāvagame 'pi saṃjñāsaṃjñisaṃbandhānavagame tatra prayujyamānatvāditi heturasiddha eva /
analyzed: yadi api gavaya tva avagame api saṃjñā saṃjñi saṃbandha an avagame tatra prayujyamāna tvāt iti hetuḥ asiddhaḥ eva

original: na hyasati vṛttyantare tadviṣayatayā prayogaḥ saṅgatimavijñāya jñātuṃ śakayate,
analyzed: na hi asati vṛtti antare tad viṣaya tayā prayogaḥ saṅgatim a vijñāya jñātum śakayate

original: prāgeva pramāṇāntarāt tadavagame tu kimanumānena sādhanīyam?
analyzed: prāk eva pramāṇa antarāt tad avagame tu kim anumānena sādhanīyam
atas eva pratyakṣe api gavaye anumānam anavakāśam eva

original: tathāpi saṃbandhyavagame gavayapadasamabhivyāhṛtaṃ vākyameva saṃbandhaṃ bodhayiṣyati /
analyzed: tathā api saṃbandhi avagame gavaya pada samabhivyāhṛtam vākyam eva saṃbandham bodhayiṣyati

original: avācakasyāpi ca samabhivyāhāra upayokṣyate upamānapakṣa iva /
analyzed: avācakasya api ca samabhivyāhāraḥ upayokṣyate upamāna pakṣaḥ iva
tat api hi atideśa vākyam
vākyam evā iti matvā tad nirāsa artham saṃbandhinaḥ eva apratipattiḥ rūpa pādi tā
atas eva āha kutas vākyāt vā iti
atas eva vākyasya vyāpti para tā api nirākṛtā
saṃbandhinaḥ an avagamāt
na ca vyatireke tātparyam
saṃketayituḥ abhiprāya upādhika tvāt
sat pratipakṣa tvāt ca iti

original: yadyapi vinigamanāyāṃ hetvabhāve 'pi nopamānasya kācit kṣatiḥ,
analyzed: yadi api vinigamanāyām hetu abhāve api nā upamānasya kācid kṣatiḥ
ubhayoḥ api vācya tve saṃbandhasya tadānīm avadhāraṇāt
tathā api vastugati vivecayati tathā api
kim ityādi tat anujānāti ityantam karabha vṛttāntam
pariharati sādhyarmya grahaṇam ca iti
upalakṣaṇa pada prayogaḥ ca avāntarabheda saṃsūcanāya tena iyam sūtra gatiḥ
prasiddha sādharmyāt sādhya sādhanam upamānam

original: sa ca prasiddho dharmaḥ samānaḥ pratiyogitayā tadupakṣipto 'samānaśceti /
analyzed: sa ca prasiddhaḥ dharmaḥ samānaḥ pratiyogitayā tad upakṣiptaḥ asamānaḥ ca iti
bahuvrīhi pakṣe tu prasiddha dharmaṇaḥ iti
śeṣam pūrvavat

original: jaranmīmāṃsakamataṃ gosādṛśyaṃ gavayasthaṃ pratyakṣameveti vadatā nirastam /
analyzed: jarat mīmāṃsaka matam go sādṛśyam gavaya stham pratyakṣam eva iti vadatā nirastam
śābara matam āśaḍkya nirācaṣṭe gosthām iti
jāti antara varti jāti antarasya iti prāyovādaḥ
tathā api gavaya vyakti avacchinnasya na go vyakti avacchedaḥ avagataḥ
tatra upamānam avatariṣyati iti atas āha tasmāt yathā iti
dṛṣṭānte tātparyam
prayogaḥ tu ityādi
akṛta samaya saṃjñā samāna adhikaraṇa vākya artha upadhānam pramāṇa vailakṣaṇyam iha draṣṭavyam
viṣaya sva rūpa vailakṣaṇyayoḥ asiddha tvāt ati
pariśuddhi
iha śabde trividhā
bhedataḥ
lakṣaṇataḥ ca iti
tatra prathamaḥ kalpaḥ vacana virodhāt eva nirastaḥ
tad prāmāṇyam an abhyupagamya vivakṣita arthasya pratipādayitum aśakya tvāt
pratipādane vā tatas eva tad prāmāṇya siddheḥ iti
bhedaḥ tu parīkṣāparvaṇi nirūpaṇīyaḥ
leśataḥ tu iha api
vyāvartaka dharma yogāt eva bheda vyavahāraḥ api
lakṣaṇam ca tathā
tatas tat eva vivecanīyam

original: tatra vipratipadyamānaṃ prati tu parīkṣāvatāra ityāśayavān siddhavat saṅgatibhāṣyaṃ vyākhyāya lakṣaṇamavatārayati---atheti //
analyzed: tatra vipratipadyamānam prati tu parīkṣā avatāraḥ iti āśayavān siddha vat saṅgati bhāṣyam vyākhyāya lakṣaṇam avatārayati atha iti

original: tatra samayabalena samyakparokṣānubhavasādhanaṃ śabda iti eke /
analyzed: tatra samaya balena samyak parokṣa anubhava sādhanam śabdaḥ iti eke
iha ca ādyena padena anumānam
dvitīyena śabda ābhāsaḥ
tṛtīyena sa vikalpaka pratyakṣam
caturthena padārtha smaraṇam
pañcamena kartṛ karmaṇī nirasyete
apare tu
ceṣṭāyām api gatam etat iti ati vyāpakam śabda tva samavāye sati iti āhuḥ
atra prācayānām ayam āśayaḥ
yadi ceṣṭā na prāmāṇam
aprasaṅgaḥ eva tasyāḥ
kim śabda tva samavāye sati iti anena nirvartanīyam
pramāṇam ced tasyāḥ pratyakṣa ādi an antarbhāve pañcama pramāṇa abhyupagama prasaṅgaḥ

original: tasmāt śabda eva ceṣṭāyāḥ praveśaḥ samayabalapravṛtteḥ /
analyzed: tasmāt śabdaḥ eva ceṣṭāyāḥ praveśaḥ samaya bala pravṛtteḥ

original: śabda eva tu śabdavyavahāro laukikaḥ prāyikatvāt,
analyzed: śabdaḥ eva tu śabda vyavahāraḥ laukikaḥ prāyika tvāt
cākṣuṣe jñāna darśana vyavahāra vat iti
te api sthūla dṛśvānaḥ
ceṣṭā hi abhiprāya stha śabda smaraṇa mātra upayoginī lipi vat
śabdaḥ eva tu ceṣṭā utpādita smaraṇa samārūḍhaḥ pramāṇam

original: arthena ca smṛtyutpādanāt śabdaviṣayam evāsyāḥ prāmāṇyam,
analyzed: arthena ca smṛti utpādanāt śabda viṣayam eva asyāḥ prāmāṇyam
pramāṇa phalasya pramāṇa tvāt
na ca smṛtiḥ asyāḥ avāntara vyāpāraḥ

original: yadi ceṣṭopadhānamantareṇāvagato 'pi śabdo nārthaṃ gamayedevamapi saṃbhavet,
analyzed: yadi ca iṣṭa upadhānam antareṇa avagataḥ api śabdaḥ na artham gamayet evam api saṃbhavet
na ca etat asti
nanu evam sati ceṣṭayā eḍa mūka vyavahāra anupapattiḥ
na hi asau tatas śabda smṛtimān
agṛhīta samaya tvāt iti ced

original: ---ata eva taṃ prati samayabalena śabdavadarthe 'pi ceṣṭāyāḥ kuṇṭhatvameva /
analyzed: atas eva tam prati samaya balena śabdavat arthe api ceṣṭāyāḥ kuṇṭha tvam eva
vyavahāraḥ tu anvaya vyatirekābhyām niyata viṣaya avinābhāva grahe pravṛtti nimitta aupayikaḥ
abhiprāya anumānāt eva eḍamūkasya
kari turagayoḥ
kaśāḍkuśa abhighātāt iva

original: atha kṛtasamayāpi ceṣṭaiva kiṃ na syāt,
analyzed: atha kṛta samayā api ceṣṭā eva kim na syāt
avinābhāva abhāvāt
smārayatu vā padārthān
tathā api na pramāṇam
dvividhā hi sā samaya pramāra bhedāt kṛti anvayinī
jñapti anvayinī ca
tatra kṛti anvayinī prayojaka abhiprāyam smārayantī pravartayati
na tu kiñcid pramāṇayati śaḍkha dhvani vat
atas apramāṇam eva
jñapti anvayinī tu kārakeṣu pratipadikā artha pradhānā
kriyāsu vartamāna artha pradhānā

original: tathā ca gauraśvaḥ puruṣa ityādipadairiva svatantreṣu padārtheṣu smāriteṣu parasparānvayayogaḥ /
analyzed: tathā ca gauḥ aśvaḥ puruṣaḥ ityādi padaiḥ iva svatantreṣu padārtheṣu smāriteṣu paraspara anvaya yogaḥ

original: padaikadeśavibhaktiviśeṣavat ceṣṭaikadeśaviśeṣāt prakaraṇādiviśeṣād vā kārakādismṛtiniyama iti cet---ceṣṭaikadeśaviśeṣābhāvāt /
analyzed: pada eka deśa vibhakti viśeṣa vat ceṣṭā eka deśa viśeṣāt prakaraṇa ādi viśeṣāt vā kāraka ādi smṛti niyamaḥ iti ced ceṣṭā eka deśa viśeṣa abhāvāt
na hi atīta anāgata vartamāna pāka ādi pratipādakam ceṣṭā eka deśa viśeṣam paśyāmaḥ
prakaraṇa ādayaḥ tu viṣaya viśeṣe śabdān niyamayanti
na tu kāraka kāla viśeṣeṣu pravartayanti

original: tathātve vā gauraśvaḥ puruṣo hastītyādāvapi karmatvādīnyunnīya vivakṣitārthāvasāyaḥ syāt /
analyzed: tathātve vā gauḥ aśvaḥ puruṣaḥ hastī ityādau api karma tva ādīni unnīya vivakṣita artha avasāyaḥ syāt
na hi ceṣṭā kalāpe prakaraṇa ādayaḥ
kāraka viśeṣa ādīn ākṣeptum alam
na tu pada kadambkaḥ iti asti niyamaḥ
tathā ca kāla saṃkhyā kāraka viśeṣa pratipādaka vibhakti samabhivyāhāra vaiyarthya prasaṅgaḥ
katham tarhi tatas vyavahāra viśeṣāḥ

original: saṃśayapratibhayoranyatarasmād viśeṣānupalambhe vidūravartini samānadharmiṇi sthāṇvarthina iveti /
analyzed: saṃśaya pratibhayoḥ anyatarasmāt viśeṣa anupalambhe vidūra vartini samāna dharmiṇi sthāṇu arthinaḥ iva iti
tasmāt ubhayathā api ceṣṭā na pramāṇam
atas kasya caturṣu praveśa apraveśau cintanīyau
etat ca saṃbhāvita prāmāṇyam aitihya ādi antar bhāvayatā ceṣṭā apabhraṃśa lipi dhvani pada ekadeśān

original: sāvyavahārikānapyakīrtayatā sūtrakṛtā sūcitamapi mandamatayo na gṛhṇantīti tadanukampayā
analyzed: sāvyavahārikān api a kīrtayatā sūtrakṛtā sūcitam api manda matayaḥ na gṛhṇanti iti tad anukampayā
lakṣaṇam vyācakṣāṇaḥ eva kiñcid udbhāvayati
vākya jñānam tad artha jñānam vā iti
ākāḍkṣā yogya tā sattimat pada kadambakam vākyam
tasya jñānam jñāna mānam tat iti arthaḥ
yathāśrutam uttaratra
kim tu tatra api vākyam eva pradhānam
asādhāraṇa tvāt indriya ādi vat
sannidhi tāratamya vivecane tu sarvasmin ayam nyāyaḥ
hāna ādi buddhiḥ parāmarśa lakṣaṇā
itarasyāḥ anumāna phala tvāt

original: tadanena nirākāḍkṣāyogyānāsannāni padāni nirasyātā ceṣṭādayo 'pi nirastā bhavantīti vijātīyavyudāsaḥ /
analyzed: tat anena nirākāḍkṣa ayogya anāsannāni padāni ceṣṭā ādayaḥ api nirastāḥ bhavanti iti vijātīya vyudāsaḥ
svārtha dvārakam ca ākāḍkṣā ādikam iti saṃgati graha pada pratisandhāna tad artha smaraṇa yogyatā ādi anusandhāna prakaraṇa ādikam uktam bhavati
anena eva abhiprāyeṇa uktam padārtha smṛti ādayaḥ tu iti
tat anena pratyakṣa ādeḥ samāna jātīyasya vyudāsaḥ
anāpta vacasām ca āpta grahaṇena nirākaraṇam iti sāmānya lakṣaṇa lābhaḥ

original: nanu nāyamupadeśaśabdasyārtho yathāśruti cāvyāpakatā siddhārthāsaṃgrahādivadityata āha---yadyapīti /
analyzed: nanu na ayam upadeśa śabdasya arthaḥ yathāśruti ca avyāpaka tā siddhārtha asaṃgraha ādi vat iti atas āha yadi api iti

original: na kevalaṃ bhūtārthāsaṃgrahaḥ sādhyārthamapi na kiñcit saṃgṛhṇātītyāha---yadyapi ceti /
analyzed: na kevalam bhūta artha asaṃgrahaḥ sādhya artham api na kiñcid saṃgṛhṇāti iti āha yadi api ca iti
nanu pravartaka tvena vidheḥ ājñā adhyeṣaṇayoḥ kaḥ viśeṣaḥ

original: yenānayorūpadeśapadenāsaṃgraha ityatastābhyāṃ vidhervaidharmyaṃ pratipādya tayorapi tato vaidharmyamuktam---te hīti /
analyzed: yena anayoḥ ūpadeśa padena asaṃgrahaḥ iti atas tābhyām vidheḥ vaidharmyam pratipādya tayoḥ api tatas vaidharmyam uktam te hi iti
tat kim ājñā adhyeṣaṇā saṃgrahe api prayatnaḥ kartavyaḥ
na iti āha tathā api iti
ayam āśayaḥ

original: yadyapi lakṣaṇayā te api saṃgrahītuṃ śakyete parasthāne prayoktṛpadaṃ prakṣipya,
analyzed: yadi api lakṣaṇayā te api saṃgrahītum śakyete para sthāne prayoktṛ padam prakṣipya
tathā api nā asti asmākam tad asaṃgrahe api kācid prayojana kṣatiḥ

original: svargāpavargopāyaviṣayasya śabdaviśeṣasya lakṣaṇārambhāt śāstrasya tadadhikāreṇa pravṛtteḥ /
analyzed: svarga apavarga upāya viṣayasya śabda viśeṣasya lakṣaṇa ārambhāt śāstrasya tad adhikāreṇa pravṛtteḥ

original: sāmānyalakṣaṇe tvakṛte viśeṣalakṣaṇānavatāra ityataḥ prathamaṃ tathaiva vyākhyātam /
analyzed: sāmānya lakṣaṇe tu akṛte viśeṣa lakṣaṇa anavatāraḥ iti atas prathamam tathā eva vyākhyātam
vakṣyati ca
dignāga nirākaraṇa prastāve

original: parapadamapahāya prayojanavānityeva vākyārthapratipattiḥ phalamiti ca lākṣaṇikapadaprayogasya cāyamevopayogo yadubhayalakṣaṇalābhaḥ /
analyzed: para padam apahāya prayojanavān iti eva vākya artha pratipattiḥ phalam iti ca lākṣaṇika pada prayogasya ca ayam eva upayogaḥ yat ubhaya lakṣaṇa lābhaḥ
prayojanam artha gatam asādhāraṇam grāhyam ca
sādhāraṇam tu śabdasya sva artha pratipādaka tvam
tat ca parasya eva
tatas tad apekṣayā parā iti viśeṣaṇam anarthakam syāt
nanu yadi upaniṣadaḥ prayojanavatyaḥ

original: nūnaṃ kañcidarthaṃ pratipādayantyaḥ kvacit paraṃ pravartayeyuḥ pravṛttyaḍkitatvāt prayojanasadbhāvasya /
analyzed: nūnam kañcid artham pratipādayantyaḥ kvacid param pravartayeyuḥ pravṛtti aḍkita tvāt prayojana sadbhāvasya

original: na cet paraṃ pravartayeyuḥ kathaṃ paraprayojanavattyaḥ pravṛttivirahāḍkitatvāt prayojanābhāvasyetyata āha---yadyapīti /
analyzed: na ced param pravartayeyuḥ katham para prayojanavattyaḥ pravṛtti virahāḍkita tvāt prayojana abhāvasya iti atas āha yadi api iti
na kvacid ityādau sākṣāt iti śeṣaḥ
buddha ṛṣabha ādīnām anāpta tve kārakaḥ hetuḥ māyā moha nimitta tvam
jñāpakaḥ tu pramāṇa aviruddha sarva dharma kṣaṇika nairātmya ādi vacanam
yathāśrutam bhāṣyam avyāpakam manvānaḥ āha su dṛḍhena iti
su dṛḍham paritas nirasta vibhrama āśaṅkam pramāṇam pramā
tathā avadhāritāḥ viṣayīkṛtāḥ iti
na iyam nitya anitya vyāptim abhisandhāya
nanu kāraṇam adhitiṣṭhataḥ eva īśvarasya api kartṛ tvam

original: tathā ca sthānakaraṇādīnāmanvayavyatirekābhyāṃ varṇanipatti prati sāmarthyāvagamāt,
analyzed: tathā ca sthāna karaṇa ādīnām anvaya vyatirekābhyām varṇa nipatti prati sāmarthya avagamāt
tad adhiṣṭhāna śūnyatayā tasya nā āgama kartṛ tvam bhavet
na ca śarīram antareṇa tasya
sthāna karaṇa ādi saṃbhavaḥ
teṣām tālu ādi vivṛta ādi rūpa tvāt iti āśayavān āśaṅkate tathā api iti
bhāṣyam uttarayati atas āha upadeṣṭā iti
na vayam asya bhagavataḥ kārya viśeṣeṇa anuvihita bhāva abhāva tayā upakaraṇam śarīram nirākurmaḥ
tryaṇuka ādi niṣpattaye dvyaṇuka ādi vat śarīra anvaya vyatireka anuvidhāyi kārya niṣpattaye tad upagrahasya api iṣyamāṇa tvāt

original: api tvāyatanatayā kartṛtvanirvāhakatayā vyāpakatayā ca tat tasya neṣyate bhogābhāvāt,
analyzed: api tu āyatana tayā kartṛ tva nirvāhaka tayā vyāpaka tayā ca tat tasya na iṣyate bhoga abhāvāt
kartṛ tvasya nitya tvāt
kāryasya kartrā nirūpa ādhi saṃbandhāt
śarīrasya avyabhicārāt ca iti abhiprāyavataḥ vivaraṇam sthāna karaṇa iti

original: tadevaṃ rūpa āptaḥ kutaḥ pramāṇāt niścetavyaḥ,
analyzed: tat evam rūpa āptaḥ kutas pramāṇāt niścetavyaḥ
para citta vṛttīnām apratyakṣa tvāt
kāya vāc vyāpārayoḥ ca buddhi pūrvakam

original: anyathāpi saṃbhavādityāśaḍkya mlecchā api hītyādinā bhāṣyatātparyaṃ bruvāṇaḥ tanniścayopāyamapi leśato darśayati---hetudarśanaśūnyā iti //
analyzed: anyathā api saṃbhavāt iti āśaḍkya mlecchāḥ api hi ityādinā bhāṣya tātparyam bruvāṇaḥ tad niścaya upāyam api leśataḥ darśayati hetu darśana śūnyāḥ iti
ayam āśayaḥ
dvividhaḥ hi puruṣaḥ asarvajñaḥ sarvajñaḥ ca iti

original: tatra pūrvasya tāvat sattvaprasādhakādeva pramāṇād rāgadveṣamohavirahasiddhāvanāptatvaṃ nirastam /
analyzed: tatra pūrvasya tāvat sattva prasādhakāt eva pramāṇāt rāga dveṣa moha viraha siddhau anāpta tvam nirastam
uttarasya api jñāna icchā prayatna sthāna karaṇa pāṭavāni tāvat upadeśa mātreṇa eva niścīyante iti
tatra sarveṣām avivādaḥ eva
jñānam tu yathārtham ayathārtham vā syāt

original: icchāpi pratipipādayiṣā vipralipsā vā syāditi sandeho 'vaśiṣyate /
analyzed: icchā api pratipipādayiṣā vipralipsā vā syāt iti sandehaḥ avaśiṣyate

original: tatrāpyabhyāsadaśāpanne 'yamartho 'syeti sāmānyato niścaye bhavatyeva tajjñānasya yathārthatvaniścayaḥ,
analyzed: tatra api abhyāsa daśā āpanne ayam arthaḥ asya iti sāmānyatas niścaye bhavati eva tad jñānasya yathārtha tva niścayaḥ

original: yathābhyāsadaśāpannamidamaraṇyamamīṣāṃ mlecchānāmataḥ asminnete mārgāmārgavibhāgajñā iti pānthānāmevaṃ niścayaḥ /
analyzed: yathā abhyāsa daśā āpannam idam araṇyam amīṣām mlecchānām atas asmin ete mārga amārga vibhāga jñāḥ iti pānthānām evam niścayaḥ

original: vipralipsā ca hetudarśanena vyāptā hetau sati syāt /
analyzed: vipralipsā ca hetu darśanena vyāptā hetau sati syāt
sa ca dvi rūpaḥ
sva upakāraḥ para upakāraḥ vā

original: tatra tāvat pāntheṣu vimārgeṇa pratiṣṭhamāneṣu mlecchādīnāṃ na kaścit svopakāraḥ,
analyzed: tatra tāvat pāntheṣu vimārgeṇa pratiṣṭhamāneṣu mleccha ādīnām na kaścid sva upakāraḥ
svasya gṛhīta tvāt śarīra mātrasya ca karaṇīya antara abhāvāt
bhāve vā aparityāgāt
na api dvitīyaḥ
na hi an unmattāḥ anapakāriṇam apakurvate

original: nāpi parāpakāramātraṃ puruṣārthaḥ tathā sati sarvaḥ sarvamapakuryādityevaṃ vipralipsāpi nivāryate /

tat kim antarāle śarīra ādi lakṣaṇam iti atas āha ātmānam ityādi
apavargasya abhāva rūpa tvāt pratiyogi adhīna nirūpaṇa tayā duḥkhāt apakarṣaḥ
tasya api hetu adhīna utpattika tayā tad hetu rūpebhyaḥ indriya ādibhyaḥ apakarṣaḥ

original: teṣāmapi śarīramāśritya tathābhāvāt śarīrādapakarṣa iti saṃgatisaṃkṣepaḥ /
analyzed: teṣām api śarīram āśritya tathā bhāvāt śarīrāt apakarṣaḥ iti saṃgati saṃkṣepaḥ
sākṣāt śarīram āśritya iti

original: indriyāṇāṃ manasaḥ aṃśator'thādeḥ paramparayā tu śarīrāśritatvam /
analyzed: indriyāṇām manasaḥ aṃśataḥ atha ādeḥ paramparayā tu śarīra āśrita tvam
buddheḥ deṣāṇām artha ādi aṃśasya ca
asmin eva arthe bhāṣyam iti āha tad avatārāya iti
atra hi ceṣṭāyāḥ śarīra avyabhicāra pakṣe artha indriya samuccayaḥ anupapannaḥ
sambhave vyabhicāre ca viśeṣaṇasya arthavat tvāt

original: samuccayapakṣe vyabhicāradarśinaḥ kathaṃ ceṣṭāśraya iti praśno 'nupapannaḥ,
analyzed: samuccaya pakṣe vyabhicāra darśinaḥ katham ceṣṭā āśrayaḥ iti praśnaḥ anupapannaḥ
pratyeka vyabhicāre sati eva hi samuccaya sambhavāt
atas vikalpam gṛhītvā bhāṣyam utthāpayati atra iti

original: yadyapi ceṣṭā kāyavyāpārastathāpi tasyaiva lakṣyatvāditaretarāśrayabhiyā vyāpāramātraṃ vaktavyamityāha---ceṣṭā vyāpāra iti /
analyzed: yadi api ceṣṭā kāya vyāpāraḥ tathā api tasya eva lakṣya tvāt itaretara āśraya bhiyā vyāpāra mātram vaktavyam iti āha ceṣṭā vyāpāraḥ iti
prayuktasya iti sa tātparyam padam
atas vyācaṣṭe prayuktasya utpādita prayatnasya iti
tena kāraṇa dvārā ceṣṭā nirūktiḥ
phala dvārā tu hita ahita prāpti parihāra phalā iti

original: tadidamubhayaṃ vivakṣatoktam---api tu viśiṣṭo vyāpāra iti /
analyzed: tat idam ubhayam vivakṣatā uktam api tu viśiṣṭaḥ vyāpāraḥ iti
tena phala dvāra nirūktau vyabhicāra udāharaṇam
dārūyantra ādi kāraṇa dvāra nirūktau tu prāṇa ākhyaḥ vāyuḥ
manaḥ kara caraṇa ādayaḥ tu antya avayavi padena eva nirastāḥ
tatra ubhaya vyabhicāram udbhāvayan
dvayam api pariharati mūrta antara iti

original: atra ca sparśavaddravyaparimāṇaṃ mūrtiriti paralakṣaṇābhiprāyeṇa mūrtiśabdaḥ prayuktaḥ /
analyzed: atra ca sparśavat dravya parimāṇam mūrtiḥ iti para lakṣaṇa abhiprāyeṇa mūrti śabdaḥ prayuktaḥ
tena ca sparśavat dravya antara aprayoge sati iti arthaḥ
prayogaḥ ca kriyā aupayikaḥ guṇaḥ
sa ca dārūyantra ādau nodana ādiḥ
prāṇe tu prayatnaḥ
tena yadi api śarīrasya prayojakam manaḥ asti eva
tathā api na tat sparśavat
yadi api ca śarīreṇa api tatra prayatyate
tathā api na tat tatas anyat
tat idam anya ra grahaṇa phalam
atas na asiddham viśeṣaṇam iti
etat ca yathāśrutam bhāṣya vārttika anurodhena viśeṣaṇam

original: āgāmivārttikaparyālocanāyāṃ tu ceṣṭāśabda evāyamevambhūter'thaviśeṣe vartata iti na nyūnaṃ sūtramāśaṅkanīyam /
analyzed: āgāmi vārttika paryālocanāyām tu ceṣṭā śabdaḥ eva ayam evambhūteḥ atha viśeṣe vartate iti na nyūnam sūtram āśaṅkanīyam
pāṣāṇa ityādi

original: na ca tasyāpi prāṇitvenocchvāsaniḥśvāsānumānāt nayanodarādyavayavasaṃkocavikāśalakṣaṇā ceṣṭāstīti vācyam,
analyzed: na ca tasya api prāṇi tvena ucchvāsa niḥśvāsa anumānāt nayana udara ādi avayava saṃkoca vikāśa lakṣaṇā ceṣṭā asti iti vācyam
ucchvāsa niḥśvāsa avakāśa abhāvāt antya avayavinaḥ niṣkriya tvāt ca
api ca mṛta śarīra avyāpti parihārāya yogyatā eva śaraṇam
na ca udāharaṇam ādaraṇīyam iti
nanu yadi api indriyāṇi śarīre na samavayanti
tathā api saṃyujyante

original: tāvataiva āśrayārtha upapanna ityato vārttikakārasya bhāvamāviṣkaroti---saṃyogitayā tviti /
analyzed: tāvatā eva āśraya arthaḥ upapannaḥ iti atas vārttikakārasya bhāvam āviṣkaroti saṃyogi tayā tu iti
yadi api golakasya abhidhāte api cakṣuḥ ūpahanyate tad anugrahe ca anugṛhyate
tathā api viśeṣa anupādānāt sarva indriya abhiprāyam etat draṣṭavyam

original: na hi golakamātrasyopadhāte 'nugrahe vā tvagādīnyupahanyante anugṛhyante vā /
analyzed: na hi golaka mātrasya upadhāte anugrahe vā tvac ādīni upahanyante anugṛhyante vā

original: yathā jarāyauvanādinā śarīropaghātānugrahābhyāṃ sarvāṇi vikalāyante paṭūni vā sampadyanta iti /
analyzed: yathā jarā yauvana ādinā śarīra upaghāta anugrahābhyām sarvāṇi vikalāyante paṭūni vā sampadyante iti

original: tadetad bhāṣyavārttikakārābhyāmevānugṛhyante upahanyanta iti bahuvacanaprayogeṇa spaṣṭaṃ darśitamityupekṣitavān /
analyzed: tat etat bhāṣya vārttikakārābhyām eva anugṛhyante upahanyante iti bahuvacana prayogeṇa spaṣṭam darśitam iti upekṣitavān
na sva rūpeṇa śarīram āśrayantaḥ iti
avyāpti ativyāptī vihāya iti śeṣaḥ
nanu sukha ādi upalabdhi hetu tvam arthānām kārya upahitam rūpam

original: na tu tadeva kāryamityata āha---prayojanaṃ tadadhikāreṇa tatra pravṛtteriti /
analyzed: na tu tat eva kāryam iti atas āha prayojanam tad adhikāreṇa tatra pravṛtteḥ iti
tat ayam lakṣaṇa arthaḥ

original: yadavacchinne ātmani arthā bhogaṃ janayanti taccharīram /
analyzed: yad avacchinne ātmani arthāḥ bhogam janayanti tat śarīram
tena na ātmanā vyabhicāraḥ na
hi ātmā ātmanā eva avacchidyate
na api manasā
tasya śarīra anavacchedena pravṛtteḥ abhāvāt
na api indriyaiḥ
tad avacchedena tatra bhoga utpattau bahis api bhoga prasaṅgat iti

original: tadetat tasya bhogadhiṣṭhānamiti vadatā bhāṣyakṛtā eva prāk darśitaṃ sphuṭamiti
analyzed: tat etat tasya bhoga dhiṣṭhānam iti vadatā bhāṣyakṛtā eva prāk darśitam sphuṭam iti
na iha vitanyate
codayati iti
artha gatim samarthya śabda gatau iti śeṣaḥ

original: ceṣṭādayaḥ sāmānyaśabdā iti vārttike bahuvacanaṃ dṛṣṭāntabrahmaṇādiśabdāntarbhāvena /
analyzed: ceṣṭā ādayaḥ sāmānya śabdāḥ iti vārttike bahuvacanam dṛṣṭānta brahmaṇā ādi śabda antarbhāvena
āśraya śabda āvṛtti bheda vivakṣayā vā iti atas manda āśaṅkā tvāt upekṣitam
aśeṣa brāhmaṇa bhojanasya aśakya tvāt iti anupapatti varṇanam sampāta āyātam asya pakṣasya agre varṇanīya tvāt
atas eva tat upekṣya prakṛta upayuktam vivṛṇoti viśeṣeṇa iti

atra anayoḥ prakaraṇa ādi ityādi pada saṃgṛhītayoḥ madhye iti arthaḥ
pramāṇa asambhavaḥ anupapattiḥ bādhaḥ iti arthaḥ
yasya api pramāṇena śarīra tvam bādhitam bhavati

atha samavāya abhiprāyeṇa iti
atra hi indriya āśrayaḥ iti ṣaṣṭhī tatpuruṣaḥ bahuvrīhiḥ vā
tatra samavāya abhiprāyeṇa ubhayam dūṣayati tathā api iti
upalakṣaṇam ca etat
śarīrasya indriyeṣu iti api draṣṭavyam

indriya viśeṣam gṛhṇāti ghrāṇasya iti
śliṣṭam vākyam
atra ayam anuyogaḥ

original: śarīrāvayavāntareṇa ghrāṇasya samavāyo vā saṃyogo vā?

prathame api dvayī gatiḥ

tat etat anuyoga dvayam abhipretya āha na tasya iti

original: na hi kāraṇaṃ kāryakārye samavaitītyarthaḥ iti ṣaṣṭhatatpuruṣapakṣe /
analyzed: na hi kāraṇam kārya kārye samavaiti iti arthaḥ iti ṣaṣṭha tatpuruṣa pakṣe

original: ghrāṇasya śarīrāvayave samavāya iti tu na sambhavatyeva,
analyzed: ghrāṇasya śarīra avayave samavāyaḥ iti tu na sambhavati eva
mūrtayoḥ ekāśraya tva anupapatteḥ iti atra ṭīkā sphuṭā
saṃyoga pakṣam gṛhṇāti atha tad ādhāram iti
tatra saṃyuktam iti arthaḥ
atra api dvayī gatiḥ
ārambhaka tayā anārambhaka tayā vā

ārabhyamāṇam hi dravyam aindriyakaiḥ eva avayavaiḥ ārabhyate yathā ghaṭaḥ
atīndriyaiḥ eva vā yathā dvi aṇuka ādikam

original: tathā ca na tatra śarīrasamavāyasambhava iti kimanena śaḍkitenāpītyupekṣitavān /

api ca iti

original: paramārthatastu yadi dvandvānantaraṃ bahuvrīhiḥ ka liṅgasaṅgatirarthasaṅgatiśca?
analyzed: paramārthataḥ tu yadi dvandva anantaram bahuvrīhiḥ liṅga saṅgatiḥ artha saṅgatiḥ ca

original: śarīrādīnāmeva dharmaḥ pretyabhāvo dharminirūpaṇādhīnatvācca dharmasya tebhyaḥ pretyabhāvasyāpakarṣaḥ /
analyzed: śarīra ādīnām eva dharmaḥ pretyabhāvaḥ dharmi nirūpaṇa adhīna tvāt ca dharmasya tebhyaḥ pretyabhāvasya apakarṣaḥ

original: arthādīnāṃ doṣāntānāṃ śarīramāśritya duḥkhahetutvāviśeṣe 'pi paramparayā śarīrāśriyatvādindriyāṇāṃ tu sākṣāt tathābhāvādebhyasteṣāmapakarṣaḥ
analyzed: artha ādīnām doṣa antānām śarīram āśritya duḥkha hetu tva aviśeṣe api paramparayā indriyāṇām tu sākṣāt tathābhāvāt ebhyaḥ teṣām apakarṣaḥ

original: manasastvevaṃrūpatve satyapi bāhyendriyavaidharmyajñāpanārthatvāt buddhikramānumeyatvācca buddheḥ sakāśādapakarṣaḥ /
analyzed: manasaḥ tu evaṃrūpa tve sati api bāhya indriya vaidharmya jñāpana artha tvāt buddhi krama anumeya tvāt ca buddheḥ sakāśāt apakarṣaḥ
tat idam uktam upanāyaka tvena iti
sākṣāt śarīram āśritya pratiniyata viṣaya ādi upanaya dvārā duḥkha hetu tvena iti arthaḥ

atas na ubhaya avadhāraṇe bhāga asiddham asiddham vā iti doṣaḥ
sarpa maṇi pradīpa ādīnām tu saṃskāra padena eva nirāsaḥ

pradīpa ādīnām tu viṣaya saṃskāraka tvam iti
nanu bhāṣyakṛt āha bhoga sādhanāni iti
tat katham etat tena sūcitam iti atas āha sākṣāt iti
yadi api bhujyeta

original: iti bhogau sukhaduḥkhe iti sākṣādeva bhogasādhanatvaṃ sarveṣāṃ sambhavati,
analyzed: iti bhogau sukha duḥkhe iti sākṣāt eva bhoga sādhana tvam sarveṣām sambhavati

original: tathāpi bhogo buddhiriti tatra tatra bhāṣyadarśanāt tadanusāreṇa vyācaṣṭe---pāramparyeṇa ceti //
analyzed: tathā api bhogaḥ buddhiḥ iti tatra tatra bhāṣya darśanāt tad anusāreṇa vyācaṣṭe pāramparyeṇa ca iti
yathā ca sāmānya lakṣaṇam antareṇa na viśeṣa lakṣaṇa avasaraḥ
tathā vibhāgam antareṇa api iti saḥ api vaktavyaḥ syāt

original: tadetadevaṃlakṣaṇakamindriyaṃ bāhyamābhyantaraṃ cetīndriprakaraṇāt mano 'nyatra nayatā sūtrakṛtā eva sūcitam /
analyzed: tat etat evaṃlakṣaṇakam indriyam bāhyam ābhyantaram ca iti indri prakaraṇāt manaḥ anyatra nayatā sūtrakṛtā eva sūcitam
bāhyam api pañcadhā iti

original: gandharasarūpasparśaśabdā iti pratiniyatārthavibhāgaṃ kurvatā sūtrakṛtā eva darśitam /
analyzed: gandha rasa rūpa sparśa śabdāḥ iti pratiniyata artha vibhāgam kurvatā sūtrakṛtā eva darśitam
yadi hi aparam api bāhyam indriyam syāt

original: kathaṃ pañcaiva pratiniyatā viṣayā iti tadeva vyavacchedyaṃ darśayanneva manāk smārayati,
analyzed: katham pañca eva pratiniyatāḥ viṣayāḥ iti tat eva vyavacchedyam darśayan eva manāk smārayati
rasanā ādi pratiniyata viṣayam
manaḥ ādi sarva viṣayam iti ca
ādi grahaṇena ātma śarīre
na tu ātma ādi prameya uddeśa sūtre sāmānyena indriya mātram uddiṣṭam
iha tu ghrāṇa ityādi ucyate

original: tat kathaṃ tato na viśeṣa ityata āha---pramāṇādyudyeśeneti /
analyzed: tat katham tatas na viśeṣaḥ iti atas āha pramāṇa ādi udya īśena iti
uddeśa viśeṣeṇa

original: atha vibhāgasūtratve 'pi lakṣaṇasūtraṃ kiṃ na syāt?
analyzed: atha vibhāga sūtra tve api lakṣaṇa sūtram kim na syāt

original: na hyanayoḥ kaścid virodha ityata āha---lakṣaṇaṃ hīti /
analyzed: na hi anayoḥ kaścid virodhaḥ iti atas āha lakṣaṇam hi iti
jñātam ca uddiśyate vidhi viṣaya tayā anūdyate iti arthaḥ

lakṣyasya pakṣa rūpa tayā sādhya tvāt
lakṣaṇasya ca liṅga rūpa tayā siddha tvāt iti arthaḥ

original: tathāpi kathamebhya eva padebhyo vivakṣitobhayalābha ityata āha---atra ceti /
analyzed: tathā api katham ebhyaḥ eva padebhyaḥ vivakṣita ubhaya lābhaḥ iti atas āha atra ca iti
kvacid kvacid sāmānya viśeṣaḥ iti
jāti rūpe sādharmya rūpe ca iti arthaḥ

original: tena śrotrapadamapyavayavārthaṃ nimittīkṛtya nabhaso viśiṣṭādṛṣṭopagṛhītakarṇaśaṣkulyavacchinnatve vartata iti /
analyzed: tena śrotra padam api avayava artham nimittīkṛtya nabhasaḥ viśiṣṭa adṛṣṭa upagṛhīta karṇa śaṣkulī avacchinna tve vartate iti
tarhi yogaḥ eva astu iti atas āha avayava artha yoge api iti
tathā api ubhaya abhidhāyaka tva aviśeṣe katham lakṣya lakṣaṇa pada vyavasthā iti atas āha tathā ca iti
nanu kevalena avayava arthena lakṣaṇe ativyāptiḥ
ghrāṇa tva ādi sahitena tu itaretara āśraya tvam iti atas āha na ca iti
sāmānya lakṣaṇa yuktasya iti
yāvatā vyabhicāraḥ nivartate tāvat upalakṣaṇa param

original: na tu samuccitaṃ padaṃ nirūcyate tvakpadaṃ tvanavayavaṃ vṛddhikṣayavaddravyasahajāvaraṇamātre vartata ityabhiprāyavatā bhāṣyakṛtā lakṣaṇaṃ  #
analyzed: na tu samuccitam padam nirūcyate tvac padam tu anavayavam vṛddhi kṣayavat dravya sahaja āvaraṇa mātre vartate iti abhiprāyavatā bhāṣyakṛtā lakṣaṇam
tad bījam ca darśitam
tathā api na prakṛta siddhiḥ
na hi evam api lakṣya lakṣaṇa vyavasthā sidhyati iti atas āha nirvacana grahaṇena iti

original: saṃyogādhāratvāditi grāhyasya mṛgamadādigandhasya tatrāsamavāyāt mṛgamadādīnāṃ svāvayavasamavāyena samavetasamavāyābhāvāt /
analyzed: saṃyoga ādhāra tvāt iti grāhyasya mṛgamada ādi gandhasya tatra asamavāyāt mṛgamada ādīnām sva avayava samavāyena samaveta samavāya abhāvāt

itara sannikarṣa trayasya saṃyoga garbha tvāt saṃyogaḥ siddhaḥ eva iti upakramaḥ
atha kaḥ niyama arthaḥ

original: kiṃ yajjātīyaṃ yadindriyaṃ tattajjātīyasyaiva guṇaviśeṣaṃ gṛhṇāti?
analyzed: kim yad jātīyam yat indriyam tad tad jātīyasya eva guṇa viśeṣam gṛhṇāti

original: atha yajjātīyaṃ yadindriyaṃ tajjātīyasya tenaiva guṇaviśeṣo gṛhyate ityata āha---na caivamiti /

original: vastutastu pītaśaḍkhavibhrame ayam api na pītasyaiva śaḍkhasyotpādamicchati,

tasya tad nimitta nirapekṣasya api nimitta antara anapekṣaṇāt
