original: yathā paṭena tantava ityutthāpya dūṣayatītyāha---atra ceti /
analyzed: yathā paṭena tantavaḥ iti utthāpya dūṣayati iti āha atra ca iti
anaikāntika tām draḍhayitum atiprasaḍgaḥ avatāritaḥ

original: nanu sukhatatsaṃvedanena brahmayaṇo bhinno brahma cānuditānastamitarūpaṃ śuddhabuddhasvabhāvaṃ svata eva siddham /
analyzed: nanu sukha tad saṃvedanena brahmayaṇaḥ bhinnaḥ brahma ca an udita an astamita rūpam śuddha buddha svabhāvam svatas eva siddham
kaḥ tatra pramāṇa praśna avakāśaḥ
sarveṣām eva pramāṇānām anubhavaḥ eva sīmā
kutas ca abhivyakti ādi cintā
mukta saṃsāra avasthayoḥ aviśeṣaḥ ca prasañjitaḥ api na aniṣṭaḥ iti atas āha ayam abhisandhiḥ iti
viṣaya sukha saṃvedane eva ātmā tad atiriktaḥ vā
ādyam dūṣayati sukham iti
ukta upapatti smārayitvā aparām āha na hi iti
nanu sukha saṃvedanayoḥ udaya vyayau na tāttvikau

original: na ca kalpito virūddhadharmādhyāso bhedahetuḥ sphaṭikasyāpi javātāpicchādisannidhānāpāditārūṇimanīlimādinā bhedaprasaḍgādityāśaḍkya pariharati---na  #
analyzed: na ca kalpitaḥ virūddha dharma adhyāsaḥ bheda hetuḥ sphaṭikasya api javātā picchā ādi sannidhāna āpādita arūṇima nīlima ādinā bheda prasaḍgāt iti āśaḍkya pariharati na
ca ātmā eva iti

original: na hyasti saṃbhavaḥ sphaṭikaḥ svarūpeṇa pūrvāparakālaikatayā sphuranneva nīlīdivyāvṛttātmā nīlādyātmanāropyata iti bhāvaḥ //
analyzed: na hi asti saṃbhavaḥ sphaṭikaḥ sva rūpeṇa pūrva apara kāla eka tayā sphuran eva nīlī divya āvṛtta ātmā nīla ādi ātmanā āropyate iti bhāvaḥ
syāt etat sva saṃvedanam ātma svabhāvam api anādya vidyā vaśāt anātma tayā sphurat tad tad viṣaya uparāgeṇa
bhinnam iva sphurati ātmani ekatayā pratisandhīyamāne api yathā gagana savituḥ eka tvena anubhūyamānasya api
pratibimbam ambuni taraḍga bhedāt iti atas
āha na ca etat asati iti
ayam arthaḥ

original: na tāvat sa eva tasminneva tadānīmeva bhrānto 'bhrāntaśceti saṃbhavati /
analyzed: na tāvat saḥ eva tasmin eva tadānīm eva bhrāntaḥ abhrāntaḥ ca iti saṃbhavati

original: tasmādavidyāyā durghaṭatvaṃ nāmālaḍkāra eveti pādaprasārikayā pratyavastheyam /
analyzed: tasmāt avidyāyāḥ durghaṭa tvam nāma alaḍkāraḥ evā iti pāda prasārikayā pratyavastheyam
sā iyam bheda jñāne bādhakam ālambya syāt
tat ca na asti iti vakṣyāmaḥ

original: pratibimbe tu suvyakta eva bhrama iti /
analyzed: pratibimbe tu su vyaktaḥ eva bhramaḥ iti
dvitīyam dūṣayati na ca āgantukā iti
nanu ātmani nityam caitanyam iti kaḥ evam āha

original: ki tvātmaiva nityacaitanyasvabhāva ityata āha---na cātmaiveti /
analyzed: ki tu ātmā eva nitya caitanya svabhāvaḥ iti atas āha na ca ātmā eva iti
na ca sukhena aham asvāpsam iti asti eva smaraṇam iti vācyam

original: ghaṭamahaṃ jānāmīti tadajñāsiṣamitivat sukhenāhaṃ svapimīti tadajñāsiṣamityevamapi smaraṇaprasaḍgāt,
analyzed: ghaṭam aham jānāmi iti tat ajñāsiṣam iti vat sukhena aham svapimi iti tat ajñāsiṣam iti evam api smaraṇa prasaḍgāt

original: tarhi kimidaṃ sukhamahamasvāpsamiti duḥkhābhāvānumānamātraṃ supto 'haṃ na kiñcidajñāsiṣamiti jñānābhāvānumānavat /
analyzed: tarhi kim idam sukham aham asvāpsam iti duḥkha abhāva anumāna mātram suptaḥ aham na kiñcid ajñāsiṣam iti jñāna abhāva anumāna vat
atha kena liḍgena smaraṇa arha asamaraṇena

original: ko dharmī? ātmā anubhūyamānaḥ smaryamāṇo vā pratyabhijñāyamānaḥ /
analyzed: kaḥ dharmī ātmā anubhūyamānaḥ smaryamāṇaḥ vā pratyabhijñāyamānaḥ
tathā api suṣupta avasthā yā
na anubhūtā atas eva na smṛtā
katham iva tad śabdena parāmṛśyate iti ced na
pūrva apara avasthayoḥ eka tva pratyabhijñānena madhya avasthāyāḥ api sāmānyena upanayanāt

original: yathā prāgupalabdhaḥ paścādupalabhyamāno ghaṭo madhyāvasthāyāṃ nāyaṃ jñāta iti jñānābhāvaviśiṣṭo 'numīyata iti na kiñcidanupapannam,
analyzed: yathā prāk upalabdhaḥ paścāt upalabhyamānaḥ ghaṭaḥ madhya avasthāyām na ayam jñātaḥ iti jñāna abhāva viśiṣṭaḥ anumīyate iti na kiñcid anupapannam

original: stāmātmano jñānasukhe bhinne na tu mithastathā ca sukhātmakaṃ jñānamātmani jñānāntareṇa yadi nānubhūyata /
analyzed: stām ātmanaḥ jñāna sukhe bhinne na tu mithas tathā ca sukha ātmakam jñānam ātmani jñāna antareṇa yadi nā anubhūyata

original: evametat, svayamapi na prakāśata iti tvasiddhamityata āha---sukhaṃ ceti /
analyzed: evam etat svayam api na prakāśate iti tu asiddham iti atas āha sukham ca iti

original: tadevamātmani sukhaṃ nityaṃ bhinnaṃ bhinnanaiva jñānena prakāśyamānamāstheyam tatra bhāṣyavārtike ityāha---tadevamiti /
analyzed: tat evam ātmani sukham nityam bhinnam bhinnanā eva jñānena prakāśyamānam āstheyam tatra bhāṣya vārtike iti āha tat evam iti
nanu vaiṣayika sukha jñāne kartavye sukha atiriktam kim ātma manaḥ saṃyogaḥ apekṣate

original: yena tatrāpi viṣayamātrāpekṣāyāṃ manasaiva rūpādyupalabdhiprasaḍgo na syāt,
analyzed: yena tatra api viṣaya mātra apekṣāyām manasā eva rūpa ādi upalabdhi prasaḍgaḥ na syāt

original: atha bahirmanaḥsāpekṣaṃ nanvantariti parihāraḥ, sa ihāpīti /
analyzed: atha bahis manaḥ sāpekṣam nanu antar iti parihāraḥ saḥ iha api iti
atas vārttikam sphorayati saṃsāra avasthāyām iti

original: āpāditaprayāsavaiyarthyaparihāraṃ parasya vārttikakṛto hṛdisthaṃ sphuṭīkaroti siddhāntavārttikaṃ saṃgamayitum---nanu tvanmata iti /
analyzed: āpādita prayāsa vaiyarthya parihāram parasya vārttikakṛtaḥ hṛdistham sphuṭīkaroti siddhāntavārttikam saṃgamayitum nanu tvad mate iti
yathā hi śāstreṇa pravartamānaḥ pravartayitvā ayaḥ
tathā saḥ eva śakya sādhane
na ca nityam śakyam
tat hi na nirvartyam nitya tvāt
na api vikāryam apariṇāmi tvāt
na api prāpyam

original: na hi tasya saṃbandhalakṣaṇā prāptirapratisaṃkramatvāt nāpi tādātmyalakṣaṇā,
analyzed: na hi tasya saṃbandha lakṣaṇā prāptiḥ apratisaṃkrama tvāt nā api tādātmya lakṣaṇā

na api jñāna lakṣaṇā

anatirekāt

ṣaṣ padārtha atirekasya asiddheḥ

na api saṃskāryam tat
anādheya tva atiśaya tvāt iti

prayojanam tu duḥkha abhāvaḥ

atra āhuḥ nanu sa sādhanam duḥkham api na pāramārthikam asti
tatas kasya abhāvaḥ śakyaḥ
yathā vidyā upadarśanam tu pravṛttiḥ sukhe api samānā iti

original: tadidaṃ pūrvoktaṃ hṛdi nidhāyoktam---śakyau bhogena kṣetumiti /
analyzed: tat idam pūrva uktam hṛdi nidhāya uktam śakyau bhogena kṣetum iti

a virūddha tvāt ca iti arthaḥ

original: na viparītaprayojano vā bhavitumarhatīti bhāktatvamevānandaśrutīnāṃ nyāyyamityāha---tasmāditi /

original: yadyapi kiñcinnārabhate nopādatte tathāpi nimittatayā kiñcitkurvan san bhaviṣyatīti cet?

original: sarveṣāṃ pramāṇādhīnatvāt prameyasya tu bubhutsitatamatvāt tābhyāṃ saṃśayādīnāmapakarṣaḥ /

original: sāṅgepāṅge ca nyāye vyutpādye pūrvāṅgatayā prakaraṇāntarebhyaḥ saṃśayādiprakāraṇasyotkarṣaḥ /

tatra api sandigdhe prayojana ādi cintā

original: na ca prayojanamanusandhāya saṃśaya iti saṃśayasya prāthamyamevaṃlakṣaṇakrame 'pi nyāyaḥ /

uddeśya lakṣaṇayoḥ eka vākya tvāt iti abhisandhinā bhāṣyam iti āha saṃśaya iti
atas eva dvitīya pāṭham vyācaṣṭe kvacid iti

na akṛte sāmānya lakṣaṇe teṣām avasaraḥ

original: vimarśa ityanena ca viṣayataḥ svarūpataśca sāmānyalakṣaṇadvayaṃ sūcitam /

kim iti upakrame

original: saṃśayapadasannidhaśca vimarśapadaṃ vivakṣitamarthamāheti tatsahitamevoktavāniti parasparaniṣedhavadubhayavidhipradhāna ekaḥ /
analyzed: saṃśaya pada sannidhaḥ ca vimarśa padam vivakṣitam artham āha iti tad sahitam evā uktavān iti paraspara niṣedha vat ubhaya vidhi pradhānaḥ ekaḥ
paraspara vidhimat ubhaya niṣedha pradhānaḥ aparaḥ

original: parasparaviraharūpavidhiniṣedhapradhāno 'nya iti yathāsaṃkhyaṃ viśiṣṭaḥ saṃśayo lakṣya ityāha---atra viśiṣṭa iti /

original: guṇagataṃ saṃśayo lakṣya ityāha---atra viśiṣṭa iti /

yatas tulya āroha pariṇāhau imau iti pratyayaḥ bhavati

mahat tva dīrgha tva sāmānya dharma yogaḥ iti

original: iha vārtikakāreṇa samānadharmopapatterityādau sattāmātreṇa saṃśayāhetutayā upalabdheraśrutyā ca pūrvapakṣayitvā samādhānatrayamabhihitaṃ tadvivecayati---yadyapīti
analyzed: iha vārtikakāreṇa samāna dharma upapatteḥ ityādau sattā mātreṇa saṃśaya ahetutayā upalabdheḥ aśrutyā ca pūrvapakṣayitvā samādhāna trayam abhihitam tat vivecayati yadi api iti
prathame anupapatti śabdaḥ sattā vācakaḥ tad paraḥ ca
upalabdhiḥ tu viśeṣa apekṣaḥ iti anena ākṣipyate
dvitīye tu upapatti śabdaḥ ayam aneka arthaḥ api iha upalabdhi vācakaḥ upāttaḥ

original: tṛtīye tu sattāvacana eva lakṣaṇayopalabdhipara iti /

original: tatra viśeṣāpekṣa iti padaṃ tadā sāmānyajñānamākṣipet,

original: yadyapi viśeṣāpekṣaśabdaḥ sākṣād viśeṣopalabdhi na niṣedhati,
analyzed: yadi api viśeṣa apekṣa śabdaḥ sākṣāt viśeṣa upalabdhi na niṣedhati

original: yathā hi gaḍgātīrayoḥ saṃyogamantarbhāvyāvinābhāvastathā agṛhyamāṇasmaraṇabubhutsayorekaviṣayatayā saṃśayamantarākṛtvā paurvāparyaniyamenāvinābhāva  #
analyzed: yathā hi gaḍgā tīrayoḥ saṃyogam antar bhāvya avinābhāvaḥ tathā agṛhyamāṇa smaraṇa bubhutsayoḥ eka viṣaya tayā saṃśayam antarā kṛtvā paurvāparya niyamena avinābhāva
eva saṃbandhaḥ iti arthaḥ
saukarya viśeṣāt

original: viśeṣamapekṣata iti hi viśeṣāpekṣaḥ saṃśaya uktaḥ /
analyzed: viśeṣam apekṣate iti hi viśeṣa apekṣaḥ saṃśayaḥ uktaḥ

original: tathā ca viśeṣe jijñāsājanaka ityukte phalamasya darśitaṃ bhavati /

tat utthāpya vārttikeṇa uttarayati syāt etat iti

original: tad vārttikamukhenaiva pariharati---na ceyamalaukikī lakṣaṇetyādi yena prayojanamanurudhyeteti śeṣaḥ /
analyzed: tat vārttika mukhena eva pariharati na ca iyam alaukikī lakṣaṇā ityādi yena prayojanam anurudhyeta iti śeṣaḥ
nanu kṛtaka tvam paricchedasya hetuḥ
na vyavacchedasya iti atas āha api tu anitya tvasya iti

original: nanu tathāpi vivakṣitatajjātīyavṛttitve satyanyavṛttireva dharmaḥ samānaśabdavācya iti kuto niyama ityata āha---samāno hīti /
analyzed: nanu tathā api vivakṣita tad jātīya vṛtti tve sati anya vṛttiḥ eva dharmaḥ samāna śabda vācyaḥ iti kutas niyamaḥ iti atas āha samānaḥ hi iti
atra uttara parasya yāvat na avatāraḥ tāvat parihāraḥ

original: yadi hi samāno dharmo vyavacchedaheturiti kutaḥ sādhakabādhakapramāṇābhāvaḥ,

na ca upalabdhi ādi padam tad itarasya sādhaka bādhaka tvam pratikṣipati
nanu tasya iti viśeṣa lakṣaṇam asti iti

original: tasmāt tasminnasatyapi na vaktavyasyāvakāśa iti darśayitumiyaṃ yuktirukteti /

original: tathā hi saptamo rasaḥ saṃśayajñāne dharmitayā viṣayaḥ syād,
analyzed: tathā hi saptamaḥ rasaḥ saṃśaya jñāne dharmi tayā viṣayaḥ syāt

original: na kadācilloka evaṃ sandigdhe yadayaṃ saptamo rasaḥ sthāṇurvā puruṣo veti,

original: nāpyevaṃ sandigdhe ayamupalabhyamānaḥ padārthaḥ saptamo vā raso daśamaṃ vā dravyamiti?

yad siddhau iti atra nimitta viṣaya bhāva pratibhāsanāt vyākhyātṛ vipratipatteḥ ca saptamī arthe sandehaḥ
tam apākaroti viṣaya saptamī iti
upapattim āha dvayoḥ iti
idānīm ekam vyākhyānam upādāya sphuṭa bhāṣya anusāreṇa tāvat āha tena iti

original: nanu ca pakṣo vā heturvā kaṇṭhata eva niyatatantrābhyupagamāt pratitantrasiddhāntānna bhidyata ityata āha---anena rūpeṇeti /
analyzed: nanu ca pakṣaḥ vā hetuḥ vā kaṇṭhataḥ eva niyata tantra abhyupagamāt prati tantra siddhāntāt na bhidyate iti atas āha anena rūpeṇa iti
yadi api svarūpataḥ asya vācanikaḥ eva abhyupagamaḥ
tathā api anena rūpeṇa ābhiprāyikaḥ eva iti atas tatas bhidyate iti arthaḥ
udāharati pakṣaḥ tāvat iti
nanu pratītam eva kartṛmattvam kṣiti ādeḥ aparyavasyat sarvajñatva ādi viśeṣam ākṣipati
tatas na vyākhyāta viṣaya saptamī udāhaṇam idam iti atas āha atra iti

original: nanvetadantarbhāvamantareṇa kimupalabdhimatpūrvakatvameva pratyetuṃ na śakyata ityata āha---nānyatheti /
analyzed: nanu etad antarbhāvam antareṇa kim upalabdhimat pūrvakatvam eva pratyetum na śakyate iti atas āha na anyathā iti
na hi yathā tārṇa pārṇa tva ādi saṃdehe api vahni niścaya saṃbhavaḥ
tathā paramāṇu ādi a dṛṣṭānta abhijñāna abhijña tva saṃdehe tad prayoktṛ tva viniścaya saṃbhavaḥ
jñāna cikīrṣā eka viṣaya prayatnavat tvam eva hi prayoktṛ tvam kartṛ tvam iti vā ucyate

original: tacca jñānaṃ dvyaṇukādyadṛṣṭaparyantapakṣīkaraṇe yadi sarvaviṣayaṃ na sidhyet,
analyzed: tat ca jñānam dvyaṇuka ādi adṛṣṭa paryanta pakṣīkaraṇe yadi sarva viṣayam na sidhyet
na sidhyet eva iti

original: tasmād yathā gaṅgāyāṃ ghoṣa ityatra tīralakṣaṇāmantareṇa gaṅgāpadārtho na ghoṣapadārthamanveti yathā sakartṛkapadārtho 'pi
analyzed: tasmāt yathā gaṅgāyām ghoṣaḥ iti atra tīra lakṣaṇām antareṇa gaṅgā padārthaḥ na ghoṣa padārtham anveti yathā sa kartṛka padārthaḥ api
tad kāraṇa paramāṇu ādi abhijñam an upasthāpya na kṣiti ādi padārtham anveti iti pratīti aparyavasānam eva iti arthaḥ
na ca evam kevala vyatireki vidhvaṃsaḥ
abhiprāya avyāptasya tad viṣaya tvāt iti uktam
vakṣyate ca iti

original: tadevaṃ prathamaṃ vyākhyānaṃ bhāṣyānusāreṇa samarthya dvitīye vārttikaṃ sphuṭamityāha---tadetaditi /
analyzed: tat evam prathamam vyākhyānam bhāṣya anusāreṇa samarthya dvitīye vārttikam sphuṭam iti āha tat etat iti

pariśuddhiḥ

original: nanu bhāṣyamata eva sūtraṃ sphuṭārthamityata āha---sūtraṃ caivamiti /
analyzed: nanu bhāṣyam atas eva sūtram sphuṭa artham iti atas āha sūtram ca evam iti

atra hi yathā rūpa ādi jñāna viśeṣa sādhanāni cakṣuḥ ādīni upapadyante

original: manaḥparihāre vā sarvendriyavilopaḥ prasajyata ityabhihite punaḥ sūtrakāreṇa rūpādijñānaṃ cakṣurādisādhanamasatu niḥsādhanameva tu sukhādijñānamityāśaṅkya
analyzed: manaḥ parihāre vā sarva indriya vilopaḥ prasajyate iti abhihite punar sūtrakāreṇa rūpa ādi jñānam cakṣuḥ ādi sādhanam asatu niḥsādhanam eva tu sukha ādi jñānam iti āśaṅkya
niyamaḥ ca niranumānaḥ
iti
tat idam asūtritasya viśeṣasya parīkṣaṇam abhyupagamāt evā upapadyate

katham parīkṣyam vyavasthāpayet iti arthaḥ

original: idaṃ ca svābhimatonnayanaprakārāviṣkaraṇaṃ sūtrakṛtaḥ śiṣyahitatayetyato lakṣaṇārthamāha---so 'yamiti uktārthānuṣaṅgiṇaḥ arthasyābhyupagamo  #
analyzed: idam ca sva abhimata unnayana prakāra āviṣkaraṇam sūtrakṛtaḥ śiṣya hita tayā iti atas lakṣaṇa artham āha saḥ ayam iti ukta artha anuṣaṅgiṇaḥ arthasya
nanu bhāṣyakāra abhimatasya abhyupagama siddhāntasya tad lakṣaṇa yoge kim ayukta tvena
ayoge ca tat eva ucyatām

original: tamimaṃ vibhāgalakṣaṇaprapañcaṃ sarva evāyaṃ pakṣa iti pūrvapakṣavārttikavivaraṇavyājena saṃkalayyāha---sarvatantretyādi //31 //

iti nyāyāśrayasiddhānta lakṣaṇa prakaraṇam

original: upaneyanyāyaprakaraṇam ārabhyata iti sphuṭārthaṃ bhāṣyam---athāvayavā iti /

original: sa cādau vipratipattyā paścāt pratijñayā gatārtha iti matvā tarkābhiprāyeṇa vyācaṣṭe---yadi śabdo nityaḥ syāditi /

original: vyudasyate hi tena saṃśayaḥ phalataḥ svarūpataśca /

original: saṃśayo hi dve koṭī parispṛśya vartamānāṃ jijñāsāmapi tathābhūtāmeva janayati /
analyzed: saṃśayaḥ hi dve koṭī parispṛśya vartamānām jijñāsām api tathābhūtām eva janayati

original: tadevaṃ tāvantarā vartamānastarka ekasyāṃ koṭau pramāṇabādhitaṃ kañcidarthamāharan tadgatāmicchāṃ vicchidya dvitīyakoṭau niyamayati /

original: enāṃ ca janayatā tarkeṇa saṃśayaphalaṃ prabalecchā tadaiva vyudasyate /

original: nanu sāmānyalakṣaṇamantareṇa na viśeṣalakṣaṇāvasara ityata āha---śrutyarthābhyāmiti /
analyzed: nanu sāmānya lakṣaṇam antareṇa na viśeṣa lakṣaṇa avasaraḥ iti atas āha śruti arthābhyām iti
sādhyate niścīyate anena iti
na tu evam sati liṅgam uktam syāt

original: tathā ca kathaṃ vākyāvayava ityata āha---yadyapīti /
analyzed: tathā ca katham vākya avayavaḥ iti atas āha yadi api iti
nanu alam upalakṣaṇena yāvatā vacanam eva sādhanam astu

original: sādhyate pratipādyate tenāpi hi svārtha ityata āha---yadi tviti /
analyzed: sādhyate pratipādyate tena api hi svārthaḥ iti atas āha yadi tu iti
evam hi sādhya sādhanam sādhya pratipādakam vacanam iti arthaḥ
tathā ca pratijñā eva hetuḥ syāt

original: atha sādhyapadaṃ vihāya sādhanaṃ pratipādakaṃ vacanamityarthaḥ,
analyzed: atha sādhya padam vihāya sādhanam pratipādakam vacanam iti arthaḥ
tatra āha atha iti
tat etat artha antara avivakṣāyām dūṣaṇam uktam

original: yadi tvevaṃ kriyeya liṅgapratipādanadvāreṇa sādhyasādhanaṃ niścāyakaṃ vacanamiti /
analyzed: yadi tu evam kriyeya liṅga pratipādana dvāreṇa sādhya sādhanam niścāyakam vacanam iti
tadā aśruta adhyāhāraḥ
udāharaṇa sādharmyāt iti sahitasya tu avyāptiḥ alābhaḥ vā sāmānya lakṣaṇasya iti draṣṭavyam
evam ca vyākhyāne

original: vacanapadamasūtrasthameva ṭīkākṛtā svayamupanīyavirodhātivyāptī kutaḥ śaṅkite iti śaṅkā nivartate /
analyzed: vacana padam a sūtra stham eva ṭīkākṛtā svayam upanīya virodha ativyāptī kutas śaṅkite iti śaṅkā nivartate
nanu tathā api upanaye prasaṅgaḥ iti atas āha aupanayāt api iti
sādhya sādhana vacanam iti atra hi sādhana tva viśiṣṭa artha vacanam iti arthaḥ gamyate
na ca upanayaḥ
koṣṭha gatyā tathābhūta artha gocaraḥ api tathābhūtam abhidhatte
sādhanatva abhivyañjaka vibhakti viśeṣa śūnya tvāt
atas eva kutas iti ākāṅkṣā
tathā ca ayam kṛtakaḥ iti asmāt na nivartate
api tu kṛtaka tvāt iti asmāt eva

original: tarhi kiṃbhūtamupanayāt pratīyata ityata āha---kiṃ tviti /
analyzed: tarhi kiṃbhūtam upanayāt pratīyate iti atas āha kim tu iti
sva niṣṭham sādhanatva ādi dharma rahitam
kutas prātipadika artha pradhāna tayā
tad para tayā tāvat mātra abhidhāyaka vibhaktimataḥ prayukta tvāt iti śeṣaḥ
etat uktam bhavati

original: na hi hetuvadupanayo 'pi kuta ityākāṅkṣāyā pravartate,
analyzed: na hi hetu vat upanayaḥ api kutas iti ākāṅkṣāyā pravartate
api tu udāharaṇena vyāptau pradarśitāyām
bhavatu tāvat etat

original: tathāpi prakṛto vivādaviṣayaḥ kiṃ vyāptadharmaviśiṣṭo na vetyapekṣāyāṃ sā ca tathā cāyaṃ kṛtaka ityanenaiva paraṃ nivartyate,
analyzed: tathā api prakṛtaḥ vivāda viṣayaḥ kim vyāpta dharma viśiṣṭaḥ na vā iti apekṣāyām sā ca tathā ca ayam kṛtakaḥ iti anena eva param nivartyate
na tu kṛtaka tvāt iti anena

original: tasmānna hetūpanayayorarthato rūpataḥ prayojanato vā saṃkara ityarthaḥ //
analyzed: tasmāt na hetu upanayayoḥ arthataḥ rūpataḥ prayojanataḥ vā saṃkaraḥ iti arthaḥ

original: nanu ca vacanalakṣaṇāyāṃ yadyapi jñāner'the vā na prasaṅgaḥ,
analyzed: nanu ca vacana lakṣaṇāyām yadi api jñāneḥ athe vā na prasaṅgaḥ

original: tathāpi sādhyasādhanamiti kṛtakatvamatra heturityādau vacana eva prasaṅgaḥ /
analyzed: tathā api sādhya sādhanam iti kṛtaka tvam atra hetuḥ ityādau vacane eva prasaṅgaḥ
etasya api tathābhūta artha pratipādaka tvāt iti atas āha nyāya vākya iti
anena ākāṅkṣā aupayika tā
darśitā

original: na ca kuta ityākāṅkṣāyāṃ sādhyasādhanamiti vā kṛtakatvaṃ heturiti vā vacanamaupayikam /
analyzed: na ca kutas iti ākāṅkṣāyām sādhya sādhanam iti vā kṛtaka tvam hetuḥ iti vā vacanam aupayikam
atas na evaṃbhūteṣu prasaṃgaḥ iti arthaḥ

original: tena viśeṣaparatvena heturiti lakṣyanirdeśo nānupapanna iti śeṣaḥ /
analyzed: tena viśeṣa para tvena hetuḥ iti lakṣya nirdeśaḥ na anupapannaḥ iti śeṣaḥ
viśiṣṭa vidhānasya iti

original: na kvacit pradeśo sādharmyaṃ hetulakṣaṇatvena vihitam,
analyzed: na kvacid sādharmyam hetu lakṣaṇa tvena vihitam
yena iha sa viśeṣaṇa tayā viśeṣaṇa mātra upasaṃkrāntaḥ vidhiḥ syāt

original: nāpyatra viśeṣaṇaśūnyasyaiva sādharmyasyopādānam yena tāvanmātragocaro vidhirbhavet,
analyzed: na api atra viśeṣaṇa śūnyasya eva sādharmyasya upādānam yena tāvat mātra gocaraḥ vidhiḥ bhavet
paraspara svatantra ubhaya artha tve vākya bhedāt ca
tasmāt ananyagatika tayā lohita uṣṇīṣa vat viśiṣṭa vidhiḥ eva ayam
tathā ca a lohita uṣṇīṣa vat anudāharaṇa sādharmyasya artha siddhaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ iti arthaḥ
pakṣa antaram āha iti
abhyupagamasya api aviśiṣṭa sādharmya mātra vidhone api na doṣaḥ iti bhāvaḥ
nanu yadi aviśiṣṭa vidhānena eva prakṛta siddhiḥ
kim udāharaṇa grahaṇena
na ced kim aviśiṣṭa vidhānena iti atas āha sādharmyāt iti atas iti
parisaṃkhyā atiprasakti nivartanam apākariṣyati
tad udāharaṇa pradarśanena parisaṃkhyāyakam hetvābhāsa lakṣaṇam
parisaṃkhyā parivarjana buddhiḥ

original: viśeṣato jñātānāṃ teṣā svavākye parivarjanādimukhena bhavatvityetadarthamarthalabdhamapi kaṇṭhoktyābhidhīyate /
analyzed: viśeṣataḥ jñātānām teṣām sva vākye parivarjana ādi mukhena bhavatu iti etad artham artha labdham api kaṇṭhoktyā abhidhīyate
tad lakṣaṇam iti arthaḥ
na vidhāyakam na sarvathā eva alabdha vidhāyakam iti arthaḥ
sugamaḥ dignāga bhaṅgaḥ
hetau udāhartavye pratijñā uktiḥ kimartham iti atas āha atra iti

original: udāhṛte hetau lakṣaṇaṃ yojayituṃ hetvarthe ca vivecayitavye prasaṅgāt pratijñārthaṃ vivecayitumiti bhāvaḥ /
analyzed: udāhṛte hetau lakṣaṇam yojayitum hetu arthe ca vivecayitavye prasaṅgāt pratijñā artham vivecayitum iti bhāvaḥ

original: tathāpi pradhvaṃsasya nānātvāt jātyāderupasaṃgrāhakasya vā bhāvāt kathaṃ vyāptyādisiddhiḥ?
analyzed: tathā api pradhvaṃsasya nānātvāt jāti ādeḥ upasaṃgrāhakasya vā bhāvāt katham vyāpti ādi siddhiḥ

original: upalakṣyābhedamātreṇa ca tatsiddhau kuṇḍalavatā devadattena sādhyo vyavahāro daṇḍavatāpi sādhyetetyata āha---virodhīti /
analyzed: upalakṣya abheda mātreṇa ca tad siddhau kuṇḍalavatā devadattena sādhyaḥ vyavahāraḥ daṇḍavatā api sādhyeta iti atas āha virodhi iti
yathā hi abhāva mātrasya bhāva pratiyogi tayā eva aupādhika sāmānya saṃbandhāt eka vyavahāra hetu tvam
tathā tad viśeṣasya api āśraya antara bhāva pratiyogitayā tad tad vyavahāra avirodhaḥ iti arthaḥ
na ca evam labdha utpattinī iti
sarvatra hi dhātvartha uparaktā bhāvanā ākhyāta arthaḥ
bhāvanā ca kāraka vyāpāraḥ

original: utpadyate ghaṭa ityatra tu ghaṭo na kārakamasattvāt /
analyzed: utpadyate ghaṭaḥ iti atra tu ghaṭaḥ na kārakam asattvāt

original: tataśca akārakasyaiva kārakairatyantasannidhestathopacāro vā kārakāṇāmeva kāryaśabdopacāro vā /
analyzed: tatas ca akārakasya eva kārakaiḥ atyanta sannidheḥ tathā upacāraḥ vā kārakāṇām eva kārya śabda upacāraḥ vā

original: ubhayathāpi vyāpārāveśasamaya evākhyātaprayogo na tu dhātvarthamātrāveśasamaye /
analyzed: ubhayathā api vyāpāra āveśa samaye eva ākhyāta prayogaḥ na tu dhātvartha mātra āveśa samaye

original: na hi pakve dhātvarthamātramupādāya pacyata iti prayujyate lokaiḥ /
analyzed: na hi pakve dhātu artha mātram upādāya pacyate iti prayujyate lokaiḥ
tat kasya hetoḥ
vyāpāra āveśa abhāvāt
tathā iha api iti
pariśuddhiḥ
nanu na sapakṣa tā bhāvaḥ atra sūtre śrūyate
na api ārthaḥ avadhāraṇasya ca vyāptyā

original: pakṣe sattvenopapatteraikāntikaṃ sapakṣe sattvaṃ mā prasāṃkṣīt /
analyzed: pakṣe sattvena upapatteḥ aikāntikam sapakṣe sattvam mā prasāṃkṣīt
pākṣikam tu prasaktam eva
tathā ca kevala vyatireki lābhe api na anvaya vyatirekī nirākṛtaḥ
evam sapakṣa abhāve api pakṣa vyāpakasya vipakṣa eka deśa vṛtteḥ tad avasthā eva prasaktiḥ iti āha tathā api iti
udāharaṇena eva iti avadhāraṇasya pakṣa vyāpti parasya sapakṣa abhāva pradarśana audāsīnyam āviṣkartum anityaḥ mūrta tvāt iti udāhṛtam
vastutas tu

original: nedaṃ nirātmakaṃ jīvacchīrīraṃ māṃsādimayatvāt ityasaṃkīrṇamudāharaṇaṃ draṣṭavyam /
analyzed: na idam nirātmakam jīvat śīrīram māṃsa ādi maya tvāt iti asaṃkīrṇam udāharaṇam draṣṭavyam

original: etaddvayamapi nirākarta vaidharmyameva codāharaṇeneti pūrvāvadhāraṇena pakṣavyāptau labdhāyāṃ vaidharmyamevetyanena sādharmyarūpatā nirākṛtāvayamarthaḥ  #
analyzed: etat dvayam api vaidharmyam eva ca udāharaṇena iti pūrva avadhāraṇena pakṣa vyāptau labdhāyām vaidharmyam eva iti anena sādharmya rūpa tā nirākṛtau ayam arthaḥ
syāt

original: pakṣasya vyāpako dharmastaditaravaidharmyarūpa eveti tathā cebhayorapi kaḥ prasaṃgaḥ?
analyzed: pakṣasya vyāpakaḥ dharmaḥ tad itara vaidharmya rūpaḥ evā iti tathā ca ibhayoḥ api kaḥ prasaṃgaḥ
kevalam asādhāraṇaḥ prasajyate

original: sa ca vipakṣodāharaṇeneti viśeṣayatā sapakṣābhāvapradarśanena nirastaḥ /
analyzed: sa ca vipakṣa udāharaṇena iti viśeṣayatā sapakṣa abhāva pradarśanena nirastaḥ

original: yadi hi sati sapakṣe anvayo vivakṣitaḥ tadā tathā vaidharmyādityanārabhyameva,
analyzed: yadi hi sati sapakṣe anvayaḥ vivakṣitaḥ tadā tathā vaidharmyāt iti anārabhyam eva
pūrva lakṣaṇena eva gatārtha tvāt
vyatirekaḥ ced vivakṣitaḥ vipakṣeṇa iti vyartham
tasmāt vaidharmya avadhi tayā upāttam vipakṣa padam sapakṣa abhāva pratipatti phalam eva iti arthaḥ
nanu tathā api vaidharmyāt iti atra tathāśabda arthaḥ udāharaṇena iti

original: udāharaṇaṃ ca sapakṣo 'pi bhavatīti kathaṃ viśeṣalābha ityāśaṅkya vyācaṣṭe---vipakṣeti /
analyzed: udāharaṇam ca sapakṣaḥ api bhavati iti katham viśeṣa lābhaḥ iti āśaṅkya vyācaṣṭe vipakṣa iti

original: vyākhyānato viśeṣapratipattirna hi sandehādalakṣaṇamiti bhāva iti tatra tatroktamityarthaḥ /
analyzed: vyākhyānataḥ viśeṣa pratipattiḥ na hi sandehāt alakṣaṇam iti bhāvaḥ iti tatra tatra uktam iti arthaḥ
nanu avadhārita kārya svabhāvaḥ ṛathaḥ kevala vyatireki sādhyaḥ anyathā atiprasaṅgāt iti vakṣyati
tathābhūtaḥ ca atra prāṇa ādi apekṣayā prayatnaḥ

original: tasmiśca sādhye sidvāsādhanaṃ vyatirekyasaṃbhavaśca svaśarīre prāṇasya prayatnapūrvakatvāvadhāraṇena svapakṣānvayasyāpi saṃbhavādityata āha---prāṇādineti
analyzed: tasmin ca sādhye sidva asādhanam vyatireki asaṃbhavaḥ ca sva śarīre prāṇasya prayatna pūrvaka tva avadhāraṇena sva pakṣa anvayasya api saṃbhavāt iti atas āha prāṇa ādinā iti

original: tathāpyasmadāyatte śabdaprayoge kiścityavācakaṃ prayokṣyāmaha ityata āha---prāṇādikāraṇecchādikāraṇarahitamiti /
analyzed: tathā api asmad āyatte śabda prayoge kiściti avācakam prayokṣyāmahe iti atas āha prāṇa ādi kāraṇa icchā ādi kāraṇa rahitam iti

original: paraśarīre pakṣapraviṣṭe hetusiddhyarthaṃ vipakṣībhūte ca ghaṭādau sādhyarahite hetuvyatirekasiddhyarthaṃ tathoktamityarthaḥ /
analyzed: para śarīre pakṣa praviṣṭe hetu siddhi artham vipakṣībhūte ca ghaṭa ādau sādhya rahite hetu vyatireka siddhi artham tathā uktam iti arthaḥ
nanu icchā ādi samavāyi kāraṇa viraha niṣedhena tadvatvam sidhyet
tathā ca punar api na ātma siddhiḥ

original: na ca kevalavyatirekī tāvanmātrasyānvayenaiva siddherityata āha---yaśceti /
analyzed: na ca kevala vyatirekī tāvat mātrasya anvayena eva siddheḥ iti atas āha yaḥ ca iti
anvayinā hi tad kāraṇa mātram siddham

original: anena tu tadeva pṛthivyādivilakṣaṇaṃ sidhyatīti na niravakāśo vyatirekī /
analyzed: anena tu tat eva pṛthivī ādi vilakṣaṇam sidhyati iti na niravakāśaḥ vyatirekī
na ca na ātma siddhiḥ tathābhūtasya tasya eva ātma śabda vācya tvāt iti arthaḥ
gṛhīta avinābhāvaḥ hi ityādīnā vyāpti asiddhiḥ darśitā
pakṣa dharmatā siddhiḥ api anayā eva diśā ūhanīyā
jijñāsita dharma viśiṣṭasya pakṣa tvāt

original: sandigdhasya ca jijñāsyatvāt viśeṣasmaraṇe ca saṃśayāt,
analyzed: sandigdhasya ca jijñāsya tvāt viśeṣa smaraṇe ca saṃśayāt
anupalabdha care ca tad abhāvāt iti
dvidhā hi prakṛta vyatireki gatiḥ
kāryam kāryavat tā ca
tatra kāryam anumāna lakṣaṇe darśitam
tat yathā icchā ādayaḥ dravya aṣṭaka atirikta dravya āśritāḥ
tad anāśrita tve sati kārya tvāt iti

original: iha tu kāryavattā darśitā nedaṃ nirātmakaṃ jīvaccharīraṃ necchādisamavāyikāraṇībhūtadravyaviśeṣarahitamityarthaḥ /
analyzed: iha tu kāryavat tā darśitā na idam nirātmakam jīvat śarīram na icchā ādi samavāyi kāraṇī bhūta dravya viśeṣa rahitam iti arthaḥ
icchā ādimattvāt icchā di rūpa kāryavat tvāt iti arthaḥ
tat etat ubhayam atra eva antarbhāvya vyutpādayan prathamatas tāvat kāryam pradhānīkṛtya āha ayam arthaḥ eti
icchā ādi kāryāḥ santaḥ tān gamayanti
te api anitya tayā kāryāḥ iti śeṣaḥ
kim ca atas iti āha akṣaṇika tve iti
hetoḥ viśeṣaṇa asiddhim nirākaroti śarīra indriya iti
na śarīra indriya manaḥsu anyatamasmin ete samavayanti
mānasa eka pratyakṣa tvāt iti niṣedhe sati iti arthaḥ
niścodyaḥ ca eṣa kevala vyātirekī
evam prathamam upapādya tadīya aprasiddha viśaṣaṇa tva saṃśaya anupapattī sādhāraṇa nyāyena nirākurvan eva dvitīyam upapādayati tat asya iti
etat ca tatra eva sphuṭīkṛtam

original: nanu yadi nāma sāmānyata icchādisamavāyikāraṇamātravyāvṛttirghaṭādau pratipannā kimāyātaṃ nairātmyasyetyata āha---nirātmakaśabdenāpīti //
analyzed: nanu yadi nāma sāmānyatas icchā ādi samavāyi kāraṇa mātra vyāvṛttiḥ ghaṭa ādau pratipannā kim āyātam nairātmyasya iti atas āha nirātmaka śabdena api iti

original: evamarthagati pariśodhya vārttikaṃ yojayitvā dvatīyaṃ pradhānīkṛtyāha---etaduktaṃ bhavatīti /
analyzed: evam artha gati pariśodhya vārttikam yojayitvā dvatīyam pradhānīkṛtya āha etat uktam bhavati iti
śaṅkatena
cetiḥ

original: iśvarānumāna iva pakṣadharmatāvalenaiva vivakṣito viśeṣaḥ setsyatītyarthaḥ /

original: nanvanvayinā viśeṣaṃ sādhayatā kevalavyatirekiṇaḥ kiṃ khaṇḍitam,
analyzed: nanu anvayinā viśeṣam sādhayatā kevala vyatirekiṇaḥ kim khaṇḍitam
yena ayam tasmin sambhavati eva udāste
khaṇḍane vā

original: atha tenaiva viparyayasyāpi vaktuṃ sukaratvādityata āha---ṛjumārgeṇeti /

vyāptiḥ hi siddhi mārgaḥ

original: na ca dravyāṣṭakātiriktamapratītya teṣāṃ samavāyikāraṇameva pratyetuṃ na śakyate /
analyzed: na ca dravya aṣṭaka atiriktam a pratītya teṣām samavāyi kāraṇam eva pratyetum na śakyate

original: na hīcchādīn prati pṛthivyāḥ samavāyikāraṇatve teṣāṃ tadvattā abhidhīyamānā virudhyate /
analyzed: na hi icchā ādīn prati pṛthivyāḥ samavāyi kāraṇa tve teṣām tadvat tā abhidhīyamānā virudhyate

uttaramsaḥ eva iti
ayam arthaḥ
pūrvasmāt āśrita tvam siddham tad anyasmāt api dravya aṣṭaka anāśrita tvam
tad atirikta artha āśrita tva siddhiḥ tu nā ekasmāt api
tad abhāve ca anayoḥ api varodhaḥ eva
tasmāt arthāt aṣṭa atirikta āśrita tva siddhiḥ sa ca arthaḥ tāvat na anvayaḥ
na hi dravya aṣṭaka anāśrita tve sati yat āśritam
tad atirikta dravya āśritam iti asti anvayaḥ
vakroktikaḥ ca anvayī
kevala vyatireki prapañcaḥ vivakṣā bhedāt

viparyayeṇa prayogaḥ
śarīra indriyāṇi na icchā ādi samavāyi kāraṇāni bhūta tvāt ghaṭa ādi vat iti
nanu yatra dravya aṣṭaka atirikta dravya āśritāḥ iti pratijñā
tatra yuktam etat

original: yatra tu nedaṃ nirātmakamiti tatra nirātmakaśabdenāpi ayamevārtha ucyata iti vadatā icchādisamavāyikāraṇavirahaniṣedha eva pratijñārthaḥ svīkṛtaḥ
analyzed: yatra tu na idam nirātmakam iti tatra nirātmaka śabdena api ayam eva arthaḥ ucyate iti vadatā icchā ādi samavāyi kāraṇa viraha niṣedhaḥ eva pratijñā arthaḥ svīkṛtaḥ
tathā ca katham aṣṭa dravya atirikta icchā ādi samavāyi kāraṇavat tā śarīrasya iti āśaṅkām upasaṃharan eva pariharati tasmāt iti
atra api pṛthivī ādi vilakṣaṇa icchā ādi samavāyi kāraṇa vat jīvat śarīram iti pratijñā arthaḥ
tad samaveta icchā ādi kāryavat tvāt iti hetvarthaḥ nanu
tathā api bauddham prati siddhasādhanam bhavati eva
saḥ api pṛthivī ādi atiriktam eva icchā ādīnām upādānam icchati iti atas āha na ca eṣām iti
sthairye sati iti śeṣaḥ

original: nanu tathāpi ghaṭādibhyo nirātmakebhya icchādivyatirekaḥ kiṃ tathābhūtadravyavyāvṛttikṛtaḥ?
analyzed: nanu tathā api ghaṭa ādibhyaḥ nirātmakebhyaḥ icchā ādi vyatirekaḥ kim tathābhūta dravya vyāvṛtti kṛtaḥ

original: kiṃ vā bhūtānāmeva pariṇatibhedavyāvṛttikṛta iti sandigdhopādhikatvādagamaka evetyata āha---yathā ceti /
analyzed: kim vā bhūtānām eva pariṇati bheda vyāvṛtti kṛtaḥ iti sandigdha upādhika tvāt agamakaḥ eva iti atas āha yathā ca iti
vyatireka mukheṇa api iti
yadi sādhyena asya kvacid api anvayaḥ na asti
tadā viruddhaḥ eva ayam iti arthaḥ
na svābhāvikam iti
na vayam asya upeyam anvayam vyāsedhāmaḥ api tu upāyam iti arthaḥ
tathā api na asya anvayinaḥ bhedaḥ upeya bhūtena api anvayena anvayi tvāt iti atas āha etāvatā eva iti
nanu vastutas sādhya dharmavān eva dharmī sapakṣaḥ
sa ca tathā jñātaḥ vyavahriyate param
tatas ca tad anvitaḥ api hetuḥ anvaya vyatirekī eva

original: ajñaistu tathā na vyavahriyata ityanyadetaditi śaṅkate---na ca pakṣa eveti /
analyzed: ajñaiḥ tu tathā na vyavahriyate iti anyat etat iti śaṅkatena ca pakṣe eva iti
vyavahāra ituḥ anvayaḥ cintyate
na tu vyavahāryaḥ iti āśayavān pariharati jijñāsita iti
nanu yadi asya sapakṣa vyatireka apratiṣedhaḥ
katham na asādhāraṇyam
tad pratiṣedhaḥ ced katham na anvayaḥ
atha tad pratiṣedhe api na anvayaḥ

original: evaṃ tarhi sapakṣavat pakṣe 'pi nairātmyapratiṣedhe 'pi nātmasadbhāva iti parākṣepaṃ parihṛtya tadgranthaṃ paṭhati śarīrādiṣviti /
analyzed: evam tarhi sapakṣa vat pakṣe api nairātmya pratiṣedhe api na ātma sadbhāvaḥ iti parākṣepam parihṛtya tad grantham paṭhati śarīra ādiṣu iti

original: vipakṣe hi sati sata eva kasyacid vyatirekaḥ pratīta iti pramāṇena pratīta iti pratipāditam /
analyzed: vipakṣe hi sati sataḥ eva kasyacid vyatirekaḥ pratītaḥ iti pramāṇena pratītaḥ iti pratipāditam

original: tasya ca pramāṇapratītasya vyatirekasya pakṣe 'pi satyeva niṣedhaḥ pramāṇena kriyata iti yuktā niṣedhalakṣaṇā vidhisiddhiḥ /
analyzed: tasya ca pramāṇa pratītasya vyatirekasya pakṣe api sati eva niṣedhaḥ pramāṇena kriyate iti yuktā niṣedha lakṣaṇā vidhi siddhiḥ

original: sapakṣastu na kenacit pramāṇena pratīta iti na tatrānvayavyatirekatanniṣedhāḥ paramārthataḥ kenacitpramāṇena śakyate pratyetum /
analyzed: sapakṣaḥ tu na kenacid pramāṇena pratītaḥ iti na tatra anvaya vyatireka tad niṣedhāḥ paramārthataḥ kenacid pramāṇena śakyate pratyetum
tat katham vidhi niṣedhayoḥ anyatara prasaktiḥ iti arthaḥ
sapakṣa avyatirekī ced sapakṣa vyatireka niṣedhau anitya arthaḥ
anvayī sapakṣa anvayī

api tu vyatirekī iva
atha sapakṣa vyatireka niṣedhasya api vyatireka niṣedha mātra paryavasāyi tayā anvaya aparyavasānāt iti manyase

original: tadā pakṣe 'pi nairātmyaniṣedhe 'pi tāvanmātraparyavasāyitayā na sātmakatvaparyavasānamiti vārttikārthaḥ /

original: na tasya vyatirekavyabhicāro 'pi tasya vyatirekadharmatayā tadabhāve 'nupapatterityarthaḥ /

na ca pakṣa sapakṣābhyām anyena maitra tanaya tva ādeḥ yogaḥ sandigdhaḥ api

original: na ca pakṣo 'pi vipakṣa iti tatra tatra darśitameva /

atas eva anvaya vyatirekiṇi vyāpya vyāpakayoḥ anya yoga ayoga vyavacchedena vyāpti nirūpaṇam

original: tathā cānvayaṃ pratītya tanniṣedho vyatirekaḥ pratyetavyaḥ /

yadi api parīkṣāyām na vādi prativādinau staḥ
pṛcchā upakrama mātreṇa dvitīya upayogāt
saṃbhave api tayoḥ viṣaya mātra ākhyāna paryavasānāt
parīkṣaka tvam

original: tathāpi pūrvapakṣottarapakṣaṃ pratyākalitaniṣkarṣabhedena catuṣpādavyavahārapradarśanāt phalato na kaścid viśeṣaḥ,
analyzed: tathā api pūrvapakṣa uttarapakṣam pratyākalita niṣkarṣa bhedena catuṣpāda vyavahāra pradarśanāt phalataḥ na kaścid viśeṣaḥ

original: ekavaktṛkatve 'pi tāvata eva vyāpārakalāpasya vicāre 'pi vidyamānatvāt /
analyzed: eka vaktṛka tve api tāvataḥ eva vyāpāra kalāpasya vicāre api vidyamāna tvāt

original: tasmād yadyapyanipuṇaścodakastathāpi codyaṃ sāvakāśameveti yathāśrutameva abhyupetya pariharatīti /
analyzed: tasmāt yadi api anipuṇaḥ codakaḥ tathā api codyam sa avakāśam eva iti yathāśrutam eva abhyupetya pariharati iti

original: nanu kathaṃ śāstre saṃśayānapekṣo nirṇayo mīmāṃsāyā vaiyarthyaprasaṅgādityata āha---nahīti /
analyzed: nanu katham śāstre saṃśaya anapekṣaḥ nirṇayaḥ mīmāṃsāyāḥ vaiyarthya prasaṅgāt iti atas āha nahi iti
śāstram eva hi tatra vicāryate
tatra ca saṃśayaḥ na pratiṣidhyate
tad nirṇayasya parīkṣā sādhya tvāt

original: tadarthanirṇaye tu śāstreṇa kartavye kutaḥ saṃśayaḥ?
analyzed: tad artha nirṇaye tu śāstreṇa kartavye kutas saṃśayaḥ
śāstra arthasya sarvathā anupalabdha cara tayā saṃśaya anāspada tvāt iti arthaḥ

original: atha kathānirṇaye saṃśayaḥ kiṃ na syāt?
analyzed: atha kathā nirṇaye saṃśayaḥ kim na syāt

original: kathamanyathā caturthe bhāṣyakṛd eva vādasya saṃśayavyudāsaṃ phalaṃ vakṣyatītyata āha---niścitayoreveti /
analyzed: katham anyathā caturthe bhāṣyakṛt eva vādasya saṃśaya vyudāsam phalam vakṣyati iti atas āha niścitayoḥ eva iti
vādāt pūrvam sandigdhau api pravṛtti kāle niścitau eva abhimānāt
na anyathā tayoḥ pakṣa pratipakṣa parigraha saṃbhavaḥ iti bhāvaḥ

original: nanu bhāṣyakāreṇa codyopasaṃhāre yo 'vatiṣṭhate tena nirṇaya iti vadatā tābhyāmiti tṛtīyā darśitā /
analyzed: nanu bhāṣyakāreṇa codya upasaṃhāre yaḥ avatiṣṭhate tena nirṇayaḥ iti vadatā tābhyām iti tṛtīyā darśitā

original: sā ca pakṣācca pratipakṣācceti vadatā vārttikakṛtā avadhīritā kayā śaṅkayetyata
analyzed: sā ca pakṣāt ca pratipakṣāt ca iti vadatā vārttika kṛtā avadhīritā kayā śaṅkayā iti atas
āhananu iti

original: tat kiṃ vādasamānayogakṣematayā śāstre 'pi pakṣapratipakṣābhyāmeva nirṇayaḥ?
analyzed: tat kim vāda samāna yogakṣema tayā śāstre api pakṣa pratipakṣābhyām eva nirṇayaḥ

original: na caitat saṃbhavatītyata āha śāstre tu nirṇaya eveti /
analyzed: na ca etat saṃbhavati iti atas āha śāstre tu nirṇayaḥ eva iti
na vimarśaḥ na api pakṣa pratipakṣau iti arthaḥ
tat eva ahana tu iti
yat tat uktam vārttike sphuṭībhaviṣyati iti
tat āha artha grahaṇe iti
nanu catur pañca ādi kakṣā api kvacid kathā bhavati

original: tat kathaṃ kakṣātraye niyama ityata āha---prathamaṃ sādhanamiti /
analyzed: tat katham kakṣā traye niyamaḥ iti atas āha prathamam sādhanam iti
kakṣā sahasram api atra eva antarbhavati iti
anantarbhāve tu artha antara tva prasaṅgaḥ
na hi sādhana dūṣaṇa tad uddhāra bahirbhāvaḥ prakṛta upayogī iti arthaḥ
iti audayana tātparya pariśuddhau prathama adhyāye prathama āhnikam
iti nyāya uttara aṅga prakaraṇam
